translated_abstract: 根际中植物与微生物组之间的动态且复杂的相互作用对植物健康和生产力起着重要作用。Behr 等人采用跨学科方法研究了耕作实践如何影响根际过程，为通过微生物操作提高农业生产力提供了令人兴奋的方向。

translated_title: 水杨酸在植物免疫及其它方面的应用。
affiliations: Institute of Molecular Plant Sciences, School of Biological Sciences, University of Edinburgh, The King's Buildings, Edinburgh EH9 3BF, UK.; Department of Biology, Howard Hughes Medical Institute, Duke University, Durham, NC 27708, USA.
title: Salicylic acid in plant immunity and beyond.
authors: Spoel Steven H; Dong Xinnian
keywords: (Auto-generated) 水杨酸；植物免疫；信号转导；代谢调控；转录因子；RNA结合蛋白；激素互作；分子生物学；生物化学
abstract: As the most widely used herbal medicine in human history and a major defence hormone in plants against a broad spectrum of pathogens and abiotic stresses, salicylic acid (SA) has attracted major research interest. With applications of modern technologies over the past 30 years, studies of the effects of SA on plant growth, development, and defence have revealed many new research frontiers and continue to deliver surprises. In this review, we provide an update on recent advances in our understanding of SA metabolism, perception, and signal transduction mechanisms in plant immunity. An overarching theme emerges that SA executes its many functions through intricate regulation at multiple steps: SA biosynthesis is regulated both locally and systemically, while its perception occurs through multiple cellular targets, including metabolic enzymes, redox regulators, transcription cofactors, and, most recently, an RNA-binding protein. Moreover, SA orchestrates a complex series of post-translational modifications of downstream signaling components and promotes the formation of biomolecular condensates that function as cellular signalling hubs. SA also impacts wider cellular functions through crosstalk with other plant hormones. Looking into the future, we propose new areas for exploration of SA functions, which will undoubtedly uncover more surprises for many years to come.
translated_keywords: 水杨酸；植物免疫；信号转导；代谢调控；转录因子；RNA结合蛋白；激素互作；分子生物学；生物化学
translated_abstract: SA的生物合成既受局部调控也受系统调控，而其感知则通过多个细胞靶标进行，包括代谢酶、氧化还原调节因子、转录共因子，以及最近发现的一种RNA结合蛋白。此外，SA通过下游信号成分的复杂翻译后修饰以及促进生物分子凝聚体的形成来调控细胞信号传导，这些凝聚体作为细胞信号枢纽发挥作用。SA还通过与其他植物激素的串扰影响更广泛的细胞功能。展望未来，我们提出了探索SA功能的新领域，这无疑将在未来多年内继续带来新的惊喜。

translated_title: 植物-微生物组相互作用及其对植物适应气候变化的影响
affiliations: State Key Laboratory of Regional and Urban Ecology, Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing, 100085, China.; University of Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing, 100049, China.; School of Agriculture, Food and Ecosystem Sciences, Faculty of Science, The University of Melbourne, Parkville, VIC 3010, Australia.; Key Laboratory of Plant Carbon Capture, CAS Center for Excellence in Molecular Plant Sciences, Institute of Plant Physiology and Ecology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Shanghai, 200032, China.; Hawkesbury Institute for the Environment, Western Sydney University, Penrith, NSW 2751, Australia.; School of Life Sciences, Institute of Life Science and Green Development, Hebei University, Baoding, 071002, China.
title: Plant-microbiome interactions and their impacts on plant adaptation to climate change.
authors: Zeng Qing; Hu Hang-Wei; Ge An-Hui; Xiong Chao; Zhai Chang-Chun; Duan Gui-Lan; Han Li-Li; Huang Si-Yun; Zhang Li-Mei
keywords: phyllosphere microbiomes; elevated CO2; plant fitness; warming; drought; plant–microbe interactions
abstract: Plants have co-evolved with a wide range of microbial communities over hundreds of millions of years, this has drastically influenced their adaptation to biotic and abiotic stress. The rapid development of multi-omics approaches has greatly improved our understanding of the diversity, composition, and functions of plant microbiomes, but how global climate change affects the assembly of plant microbiomes and their roles in regulating host plant adaptation to changing environmental conditions is not fully known. In this review, we summarize recent advancements in the community assembly of plant microbiomes, and their responses to climate change factors such as elevated CO2 levels, warming, and drought. We further delineate the research trends and hotspots in plant-microbiome interactions in the context of climate change, and summarize the key mechanisms by which plant microbiomes influence plant adaptation to the changing climate. We propose that future research is urgently needed to unravel the impact of key plant genes and signal molecules modulated by climate change on microbial communities, to elucidate the evolutionary response of plant-microbe interactions at the community level, and to engineer synthetic microbial communities to mitigate the effects of climate change on plant fitness.
translated_keywords: 叶际微生物群落；升高CO₂；植物适合度；增温；干旱；植物-微生物互作
translated_abstract: 植物在数亿年的演化过程中与多种微生物群落共同进化，这对植物适应生物和非生物胁迫产生了深远影响。多组学技术的快速发展极大地提高了我们对植物微生物组多样性、组成和功能的理解，但全球气候变化如何影响植物微生物组的组装及其在调节宿主植物适应环境变化中的作用尚不完全清楚。本文综述了植物微生物组群落组装的最新进展以及其对气候变暖、二氧化碳浓度升高和干旱等气候变化因素的响应。此外，本文还探讨了气候变化背景下植物—微生物互作的研究趋势和热点，并总结了植物微生物组影响植物适应气候变化的关键机制。我们认为，亟需开展未来研究以揭示气候变化调控的关键植物基因和信号分子对微生物群落的影响，阐明植物—微生物互作在群落水平上的进化响应，并构建合成微生物群落以缓解气候变化对植物适应性的不利影响。

translated_title: 近期进展与未来方向
affiliations: State Key Laboratory for Ecological Pest Control of Fujian and Taiwan Crops, Vector-borne Virus Research Center, College of Plant Protection, Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University, Fuzhou, 350002, China.; State Key Laboratory of Plant Environmental Resilience and Ministry of Agriculture Key Laboratory of Soil Microbiology, College of Biological Sciences, China Agricultural University, Beijing, 100193, China.; State Key Laboratory for Biology of Plant Diseases and Insect Pests, Institute of Plant Protection, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing, 100193, China.; State Key Laboratory of Integrated Management of Pest Insects and Rodents, Institute of Zoology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing, 100101, China.; CAS Center for Excellence in Biotic Interactions, University of Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing, 100049, China.; State Key Laboratory of Plant Genomics, Institute of Microbiology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing, 100101, China.; State Key Laboratory of Rice Biology, Institute of Biotechnology, Zhejiang University, Hangzhou, 310058, China.; Department of Plant Pathology, The Key Laboratory of Plant Immunity, Nanjing Agricultural University, Nanjing, 210095, China.; State Key Laboratory for Managing Biotic and Chemical Threats to the Quality and Safety of Agro-products, Institute of Plant Virology, Ningbo University, Ningbo, 315211, China.; MOE Key Laboratory of Bioinformatics, Center for Plant Biology, School of Life Sciences, Tsinghua University, Beijing, 100084, China.; State Key Laboratory of Protein and Plant Gene Research, School of Life Sciences, Peking University, Beijing, 100871, China.
title: Plant virology in the 21st century in China: Recent advances and future directions.
authors: Wu Jianguo; Zhang Yongliang; Li Fangfang; Zhang Xiaoming; Ye Jian; Wei Taiyun; Li Zhenghe; Tao Xiaorong; Cui Feng; Wang Xianbing; Zhang Lili; Yan Fei; Li Shifang; Liu Yule; Li Dawei; Zhou Xueping; Li Yi
keywords: plant virus-based vectors; plant-virus transmission vector interactions; plant virology; viral pathogenesis; emerging plant viruses; China; plant resistance/susceptibility to viral infection
abstract: Plant viruses are a group of intracellular pathogens that persistently threaten global food security. Significant advances in plant virology have been achieved by Chinese scientists over the last 20 years, including basic research and technologies for preventing and controlling plant viral diseases. Here, we review these milestones and advances, including the identification of new crop-infecting viruses, dissection of pathogenic mechanisms of multiple viruses, examination of multilayered interactions among viruses, their host plants, and virus-transmitting arthropod vectors, and in-depth interrogation of plant-encoded resistance and susceptibility determinants. Notably, various plant virus-based vectors have also been successfully developed for gene function studies and target gene expression in plants. We also recommend future plant virology studies in China.
translated_keywords: 基于植物病毒的载体；植物病毒传播载体互作；植物病毒学；病毒致病机制；新发植物病毒；中国；植物对病毒侵染的抗性/感性
translated_abstract: 植物病毒是一类持续威胁全球粮食安全的胞内病原体。近20年来，中国科学家在植物病毒学基础研究以及植物病毒病预防和控制技术方面取得了显著进展。本文综述了这些里程碑式的进展，包括新作物侵染病毒的鉴定、多种病毒致病机制的解析、病毒与其宿主植物及病毒传播昆虫介体之间多层次互作的分析，以及植物编码抗性和感病因子的深入研究。值得注意的是，还成功开发了多种基于植物病毒的载体用于植物基因功能研究和目标基因表达。最后，本文还对我国未来植物病毒学研究进行了展望。

translated_title: 基因组组织与植物多样性
affiliations: Plant Genome Mapping Laboratory, University of Georgia, Athens, GA, USA.; Department of Genome Sciences, University of Washington, Seattle, WA, USA.
title: Genome organization and botanical diversity.
authors: Paterson Andrew H; Queitsch Christine
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因组组织;植物多样性;比较基因组学;基因调控;多倍体化;形态生理变异;选择压力;生物进化;生物信息学;分子生物学
abstract: The rich diversity of angiosperms, both the planet's dominant flora and the cornerstone of agriculture, is integrally intertwined with a distinctive evolutionary history. Here, we explore the interplay between angiosperm genome organization and botanical diversity, empowered by genomic approaches ranging from genetic linkage mapping to analysis of gene regulation. Commonality in the genetic hardware of plants has enabled robust comparative genomics that has provided a broad picture of angiosperm evolution and implicated both general processes and specific elements in contributing to botanical diversity. We argue that the hardware of plant genomes-both in content and in dynamics-has been shaped by selection for rather substantial differences in gene regulation between plants and animals such as maize and human, organisms of comparable genome size and gene number. Their distinctive genome content and dynamics may reflect in part the indeterminate development of plants that puts strikingly different demands on gene regulation than in animals. Repeated polyploidization of plant genomes and multiplication of individual genes together with extensive rearrangement and differential retention provide rich raw material for selection of morphological and/or physiological variations conferring fitness in specific niches, whether natural or artificial. These findings exemplify the burgeoning information available to employ in increasing knowledge of plant biology and in modifying selected plants to better meet human needs.
translated_keywords: 基因组组织;植物多样性;比较基因组学;基因调控;多倍体化;形态生理变异;选择压力;生物进化;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 被子植物既是地球占主导地位的植物群，也是农业的基础，其丰富的多样性与独特的进化历史密切相关。本文通过从遗传连锁作图到基因调控分析等基因组学方法，探讨了被子植物基因组组织与植物学多样性的相互作用。植物遗传硬件的共同性使得稳健的比较基因组学成为可能，从而为被子植物的进化提供了宏观视角，并揭示了通用过程和特定元件在植物多样性形成中的贡献。我们认为，植物基因组的硬件——无论是内容还是动态变化——都受到选择压力的影响，这种压力导致植物（如玉米）与动物（如人类）之间尽管基因数量和基因组大小相近，但基因调控存在相当大的差异。植物独特的基因组内容和动态变化可能部分反映了植物不定形态发育对基因调控提出的不同需求。植物基因组重复多倍化、单个基因复制以及广泛的重排和选择性保留，为形态和/或生理变异的选择提供了丰富的原始材料，这些变异有助于植物在自然或人工生态位中适应特定环境。这些发现为增加植物生物学知识以及改良植物以更好地满足人类需求提供了丰富的信息资源。

translated_title: 探索暗基因组的新方法及其在脊椎动物病毒化石记录绘图中的应用
affiliations: Vaccine and Infectious Disease Division, Fred Hutchinson Cancer Center, 1100 Fairview Ave N, Seattle, WA, 98109, USA.; Herbold Computational Biology Program, Public Health Sciences Division, Fred Hutchinson Cancer Center, 1100 Fairview Ave N, Seattle, WA, 98109, USA.; University of California, Davis, 1 Shields Ave, Davis, CA, 95616, USA.; MRC-University of Glasgow Centre for Virus Research, 464 Bearsden Rd, Bearsden, Glasgow, G61 1QH, UK.; MRC-University of Glasgow Centre for Virus Research, 464 Bearsden Rd, Bearsden, Glasgow, G61 1QH, UK. robert.gifford@glasgow.ac.uk.; Centre for Epidemic Response and Innovation (CERI), School of Data Science and Computational Thinking, Stellenbosch University, Stellenbosch, South Africa. robert.gifford@glasgow.ac.uk.
title: A novel approach to exploring the dark genome and its application to mapping of the vertebrate virus fossil record.
authors: Blanco-Melo Daniel; Campbell Matthew A; Zhu Henan; Dennis Tristan P W; Modha Sejal; Lytras Spyros; Hughes Joseph; Gatseva Anna; Gifford Robert J
keywords: (Auto-generated) 暗基因组;内源性病毒元件;数据库集成基因组筛查;水平基因转移;病毒化石记录;基因组进化;生态与演化;生物信息学;分子生物学
abstract: Genomic regions that remain poorly understood, often referred to as the dark genome, contain a variety of functionally relevant and biologically informative features. These include endogenous viral elements (EVEs)-virus-derived sequences that can dramatically impact host biology and serve as a virus fossil record. In this study, we introduce a database-integrated genome screening (DIGS) approach to investigate the dark genome in silico, focusing on EVEs found within vertebrate genomes. Using DIGS on 874 vertebrate genomes, we uncover approximately 1.1 million EVE sequences, with over 99% originating from endogenous retroviruses or transposable elements that contain EVE DNA. We show that the remaining 6038 sequences represent over a thousand distinct horizontal gene transfer events across 10 virus families, including some that have not previously been reported as EVEs. We explore the genomic and phylogenetic characteristics of non-retroviral EVEs and determine their rates of acquisition during vertebrate evolution. Our study uncovers novel virus diversity, broadens knowledge of virus distribution among vertebrate hosts, and provides new insights into the ecology and evolution of vertebrate viruses. We comprehensively catalog and analyze EVEs within 874 vertebrate genomes, shedding light on the distribution, diversity, and long-term evolution of viruses and reveal their extensive impact on vertebrate genome evolution. Our results demonstrate the power of linking a relational database management system to a similarity search-based screening pipeline for in silico exploration of the dark genome.
translated_keywords: 暗基因组;内源性病毒元件;数据库集成基因组筛查;水平基因转移;病毒化石记录;基因组进化;生态与演化;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 基因组中未被充分理解的区域，通常被称为“暗基因组”，包含了许多功能相关且具有生物学信息特征的内容。这些内容包括内源性病毒元件（EVEs），即来源于病毒的序列，它们能够显著影响宿主生物学并作为病毒化石记录存在。在本研究中，我们引入了一种数据库集成基因组筛查（DIGS）方法，以计算机模拟的方式探索暗基因组中的内容，重点关注脊椎动物基因组中的EVEs。通过对874个脊椎动物基因组进行DIGS分析，我们发现了大约110万个EVE序列，其中超过99%源自内源性逆转录病毒或含有EVE DNA的可移动元件。我们发现剩余的6038个序列代表了超过一千次来自10个病毒科的水平基因转移事件，其中包括一些之前未被报道为EVEs的序列。我们探讨了非逆转录病毒EVEs的基因组和系统发育特性，并确定了它们在脊椎动物进化过程中被获取的速率。本研究揭示了新型病毒多样性，扩展了对病毒在脊椎动物宿主中分布的认识，并提供了关于脊椎动物病毒生态学和进化的全新见解。我们全面整理并分析了874个脊椎动物基因组中的EVEs，揭示了病毒的分布、多样性和长期进化，并展示了其对脊椎动物基因组进化的重要影响。我们的结果证明了将关系型数据库管理系统与基于相似性搜索的筛选管道相结合，用于计算机模拟探索暗基因组的强大能力。

translated_title: 基因组和细胞环境对基因表达噪声的影响
affiliations: The Edison Family Center for Genome Sciences and Systems Biology, School of Medicine, Washington University in St. Louis, Saint Louis, MO, 63110, USA.; Department of Genetics, School of Medicine, Washington University in St. Louis, Saint Louis, MO, 63110, USA.; The Edison Family Center for Genome Sciences and Systems Biology, School of Medicine, Washington University in St. Louis, Saint Louis, MO, 63110, USA. cohen@wustl.edu.; Department of Genetics, School of Medicine, Washington University in St. Louis, Saint Louis, MO, 63110, USA. cohen@wustl.edu.
title: Effect of genomic and cellular environments on gene expression noise.
authors: Hong Clarice K Y; Ramu Avinash; Zhao Siqi; Cohen Barak A
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因表达噪声; 基因组环境; 表观遗传修饰; 单细胞分析; 报告基因; 组蛋白修饰; 干细胞样亚群; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
abstract: Individual cells from isogenic populations often display large cell-to-cell differences in gene expression. This "noise" in expression derives from several sources, including the genomic and cellular environment in which a gene resides. Large-scale maps of genomic environments have revealed the effects of epigenetic modifications and transcription factor occupancy on mean expression levels, but leveraging such maps to explain expression noise will require new methods to assay how expression noise changes at locations across the genome. To address this gap, we present Single-cell Analysis of Reporter Gene Expression Noise and Transcriptome (SARGENT), a method that simultaneously measures the noisiness of reporter genes integrated throughout the genome and the global mRNA profiles of individual reporter-gene-containing cells. Using SARGENT, we perform the first comprehensive genome-wide survey of how genomic locations impact gene expression noise. We find that the mean and noise of expression correlate with different histone modifications. We quantify the intrinsic and extrinsic components of reporter gene noise and, using the associated mRNA profiles, assign the extrinsic component to differences between the CD24+ "stem-like" substate and the more "differentiated" substate. SARGENT also reveals the effects of transgene integrations on endogenous gene expression, which will help guide the search for "safe-harbor" loci. Taken together, we show that SARGENT is a powerful tool to measure both the mean and noise of gene expression at locations across the genome and that the data generatd by SARGENT reveals important insights into the regulation of gene expression noise genome-wide.
translated_keywords: 基因表达噪声; 基因组环境; 表观遗传修饰; 单细胞分析; 报告基因; 组蛋白修饰; 干细胞样亚群; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract: 同基因群体中的单个细胞在基因表达上往往表现出显著的细胞间差异，这种“噪声”来源于多个因素，包括基因所在的基因组和细胞环境。大规模的基因组环境图谱已经揭示了表观遗传修饰和转录因子占据对平均表达水平的影响，但要利用这些图谱解释表达噪声，则需要新的方法来检测基因组各位置处的表达噪声如何变化。为填补这一空白，我们开发了Single-cell Analysis of Reporter Gene Expression Noise and Transcriptome（SARGENT）方法，该方法能够同时测量整合到基因组各处的报告基因的噪声程度以及含有这些报告基因的单个细胞的整体mRNA谱。使用SARGENT，我们进行了首次全面的全基因组范围调查，以研究基因组位置对基因表达噪声的影响。我们发现表达的均值与噪声与不同的组蛋白修饰相关联。我们量化了报告基因噪声的内在成分和外在成分，并利用相关的mRNA谱将外在成分归因于CD24+“干细胞样”亚群与更“分化”的亚群之间的差异。SARGENT还揭示了转基因整合对内源基因表达的影响，这将有助于指导寻找“安全港”位点的研究。综上所述，我们证明SARGENT是一种强大的工具，可以测量基因组各位置处基因表达的均值和噪声，并且由SARGENT生成的数据揭示了关于基因表达噪声全基因组调控的重要见解。

translated_title: 病毒如何塑造微生物浮游生物的微多样性
affiliations: Evolutionary Genomics Group, Departamento de Producción Vegetal y Microbiología, Universidad Miguel Hernández, San Juan de Alicante, Spain; email: frvalera@umh.es.; Department of Ecology, Universität Innsbruck, Innsbruck, Austria; email: christopher.bellas@uibk.ac.at.
title: How Viruses Shape Microbial Plankton Microdiversity.
authors: Rodriguez-Valera Francisco; Bellas Christopher
keywords: kill-the-winner; phages; pangenome; constant-diversity equilibrium; population genomics
abstract: One major conundrum of modern microbiology is the large pangenome (gene pool) present in microbes, which is much larger than those found in complex organisms such as humans. Here, we argue that this diversity of gene pools carried by different strains is maintained largely due to the control exercised by viral predation. Viruses maintain a high strain diversity through time that we describe as constant-diversity equilibrium, preventing the hoarding of resources by specific clones. Thus, viruses facilitate the release and degradation of dissolved organic matter in the ocean, which may lead to better ecosystem functioning by linking top-down to bottom-up control. By maintaining this equilibrium, viruses act as a key element of the adaptation of marine microbes to their environment and likely behave as a single evolutionary unit.
translated_keywords: “捕杀胜者”；噬菌体；泛基因组；恒定多样性平衡；群体基因组学
translated_abstract: 现代微生物学面临的一个重要难题是微生物中存在的巨大泛基因组（基因池），其规模远超人类等复杂生物的基因组。本文认为，这种基因池的多样性主要由病毒捕食所调控。病毒通过时间上的恒定-多样性平衡维持了较高的菌株多样性，从而防止特定克隆体对资源的垄断。因此，病毒促进了海洋中溶解有机物的释放与降解，这可能通过自上而下和自下而上的控制机制改善生态系统的功能。通过维持这一平衡，病毒成为海洋微生物适应环境的关键要素，并可能作为一个单一的进化单元发挥作用。

translated_title: 磷缺乏条件下植物免疫及生物相互作用的调控
affiliations: Division of Biological Science, Graduate School of Science and Technology, Nara Institute of Science and Technology, Takayama 8916-5, Ikoma, Nara, 630-0192, Japan.; Division of Biological Science, Graduate School of Science and Technology, Nara Institute of Science and Technology, Takayama 8916-5, Ikoma, Nara, 630-0192, Japan. saijo@bs.naist.jp.
title: Modulation of plant immunity and biotic interactions under phosphate deficiency.
authors: Inoue Kanako; Tsuchida Natsuki; Saijo Yusuke
keywords: Mycorrhiza symbiosis; Plant immunity; Phosphate starvation response; Plant–microbe interactions
abstract: Phosphorus (P) is an essential macronutrient for plant life and growth. P is primarily acquired in the form of inorganic phosphate (Pi) from soil. To cope with Pi deficiency, plants have evolved an elaborate system to improve Pi acquisition and utilization through an array of developmental and physiological changes, termed Pi starvation response (PSR). Plants also assemble and manage mutualistic microbes to enhance Pi uptake, through integrating PSR and immunity signaling. A trade-off between plant growth and defense favors the notion that plants lower a cellular state of immunity to accommodate host-beneficial microbes for nutrition and growth at the cost of infection risk. However, the existing data indicate that plants selectively activate defense responses against pathogens, but do not or less against non-pathogens, even under nutrient deficiency. In this review, we highlight recent advances in the principles and mechanisms with which plants balance immunity and growth-related processes to optimize their adaptation to Pi deficiency.
translated_keywords: 菌根共生；植物免疫；磷饥饿响应；植物-微生物互作
translated_abstract: 磷（P）是植物生长发育所必需的主要营养元素，植物主要以无机磷酸盐（Pi）的形式从土壤中吸收磷。为应对低磷胁迫，植物通过一系列形态和生理变化形成了一套复杂的适应性响应机制，即低磷胁迫响应（PSR）。同时，植物通过整合PSR与免疫信号通路，招募并管理有益微生物来提高对Pi的吸收能力。研究表明，在植物生长与防御之间存在权衡关系，植物会降低其免疫状态以容纳对宿主有益的微生物，从而获取营养并促进生长，但这种行为也伴随着感染风险的增加。然而，现有数据表明，即使在营养缺乏的情况下，植物仍会选择性激活对病原体的防御反应，而对非病原体的防御反应则较弱甚至不激活。本文综述了植物在低磷胁迫下平衡免疫与生长相关过程的原理和机制，以优化其适应性。

translated_title: 非生物胁迫下植物氮吸收、代谢的生理、分子及环境见解
affiliations: State Key Laboratory for Conservation and Utilization of Subtropical Agro-bioresources, Guangxi Key Laboratory of Sugarcane Biology, College of Life Science and Technology, Guangxi University, Nanning, China.; Shenzhen Branch, Guangdong Laboratory for Lingnan Modern Agriculture, Genome Analysis Laboratory of the Ministry of Agriculture, Agricultural Genomics Institute at Shenzhen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Shenzhen, China.; Feed the Future Innovation Lab for Collaborative Research on Sustainable Intensification, Kansas State University, Manhattan, Kansas, USA.; Institute of Environment and Ecology, School of the Environment and Safety Engineering, Jiangsu University, Zhenjiang, China.; College of Agriculture, Food and Natural Resources (CAFNR), Division of Plant Sciences & Technology, University of Missouri, Columbia, Missouri, USA.; Institute of Field and Vegetable Crops, National Institute of the Republic of Serbia, Novi Sad, Serbia.; Department of Environmental Sciences and Engineering, Government College University Faisalabad, Faisalabad, Pakistan.; WA State Agricultural Biotechnology Centre, Centre for Crop and Food Innovation, Food Futures Institute, Murdoch University, Murdoch, Western Australia, Australia.; Guangxi Key Laboratory of Agro-Environment and Agric-Products Safety, College of Agriculture, Guangxi University, Nanning, China.
title: Physiological, molecular, and environmental insights into plant nitrogen uptake, and metabolism under abiotic stresses.
authors: Akhtar Kashif; Ain Noor Ul; Prasad P V Vara; Naz Misbah; Aslam Mehtab Muhammad; Djalovic Ivica; Riaz Muhammad; Ahmad Shakeel; Varshney Rajeev K; He Bing; Wen Ronghui
keywords: (Auto-generated) 氮吸收;代谢;非生物胁迫;硝酸盐转运蛋白;WRKY1转录因子;氮同化;氨基酸;生物量;作物产量;植物生理学;分子生物学
abstract: Nitrogen (N) as an inorganic macronutrient is inevitable for plant growth, development, and biomass production. Many external factors and stresses, such as acidity, alkalinity, salinity, temperature, oxygen, and rainfall, affect N uptake and metabolism in plants. The uptake of ammonium (NH4 +) and nitrate (NO3 -) in plants mainly depends on soil properties. Under the sufficient availability of NO3 - (>1 mM), low-affinity transport system is activated by gene network NRT1, and under low NO3 - availability (4 + ion is the final form of N assimilated by cells mediated through the key enzymes glutamine synthetase and glutamate synthase. The WRKY1 is a major transcription factor of the N regulation network in plants. However, the transcriptome and metabolite profiles show variations in N assimilation metabolites, including glycine, glutamine, and aspartate, under abiotic stresses. The overexpression of NO3 - transporters (OsNRT2.3a and OsNRT1.1b) can significantly improve the biomass and yield of various crops. Altering the expression levels of genes could be a valuable tool to improve N metabolism under the challenging conditions of soil and environment, such as unfavorable temperature, drought, salinity, heavy metals, and nutrient stress.
translated_keywords: 氮吸收;代谢;非生物胁迫;硝酸盐转运蛋白;WRKY1转录因子;氮同化;氨基酸;生物量;作物产量;植物生理学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 氮（N）作为一种无机大量营养元素对植物的生长、发育和生物量积累不可或缺。许多外部因素和胁迫，如酸碱度、盐分、温度、氧气和降雨等，都会影响植物对氮的吸收与代谢。植物对铵离子（NH₄⁺）和硝酸根离子（NO₃⁻）的吸收主要依赖于土壤特性。在高浓度硝酸根离子（>1 mM）条件下，低亲和力转运系统由基因网络NRT1激活；而在低浓度硝酸根离子条件下，高亲和力转运系统则由基因网络NRT2激活。细胞内最终通过谷氨酰胺合成酶和谷氨酸合成酶等关键酶介导的氮同化过程以铵离子形式完成。WRKY1是植物氮调控网络中的重要转录因子。然而，转录组和代谢组分析表明，在非生物胁迫下，氮同化相关代谢物如甘氨酸、谷氨酰胺和天冬氨酸的含量存在差异。过表达硝酸根离子转运蛋白（OsNRT2.3a 和 OsNRT1.1b）可显著提高多种作物的生物量和产量。调节相关基因的表达水平可能是改善土壤和环境胁迫（如不利温度、干旱、盐分、重金属及养分胁迫）下氮代谢的有效工具。

translated_title: 转运蛋白作为生态资产及微生物真核生物泛基因组的特征
affiliations: Department of Biology, University of Oxford, Oxford, United Kingdom; email: thomas.richards@biology.ox.ac.uk.; Merton College, University of Oxford, Oxford, United Kingdom.
title: Transporter Proteins as Ecological Assets and Features of Microbial Eukaryotic Pangenomes.
authors: Milner David S; Galindo Luis Javier; Irwin Nicholas A T; Richards Thomas A
keywords: horizontal gene transfer; core genome; gene duplication; accessory genome; adaptation; virulence
abstract: Here we review two connected themes in evolutionary microbiology: (a) the nature of gene repertoire variation within species groups (pangenomes) and (b) the concept of metabolite transporters as accessory proteins capable of providing niche-defining "bolt-on" phenotypes. We discuss the need for improved sampling and understanding of pangenome variation in eukaryotic microbes. We then review the factors that shape the repertoire of accessory genes within pangenomes. As part of this discussion, we outline how gene duplication is a key factor in both eukaryotic pangenome variation and transporter gene family evolution. We go on to outline how, through functional characterization of transporter-encoding genes, in combination with analyses of how transporter genes are gained and lost from accessory genomes, we can reveal much about the niche range, the ecology, and the evolution of virulence of microbes. We advocate for the coordinated systematic study of eukaryotic pangenomes through genome sequencing and the functional analysis of genes found within the accessory gene repertoire.
translated_keywords: 水平基因转移；核心基因组；基因复制；辅助基因组；适应；毒力
translated_abstract: （a）物种群内基因组变异（泛基因组）的本质；（b）代谢物转运蛋白作为辅助蛋白的概念，这些蛋白能够提供定义生态位的“附加”表型。我们讨论了改善真核微生物泛基因组变异采样和理解的需求，并回顾了影响泛基因组内辅助基因库组成的因素。在这一讨论中，我们概述了基因复制在真核生物泛基因组变异和转运蛋白基因家族演化中的关键作用。此外，我们还指出，通过功能表征编码转运蛋白的基因，结合分析这些基因如何从辅助基因组中获得或丢失，可以揭示大量关于微生物生态位范围、生态学以及毒力演化的信息。我们提倡对真核生物泛基因组进行系统的协调研究，包括基因组测序以及对辅助基因库中基因的功能分析。

translated_title: 植物与环境互作中的非编码RNA的跨界通讯
affiliations: Shanghai Center for Plant Stress Biology, CAS Center for Excellence in Molecular Plant Sciences, Shanghai Institute of Plant Physiology and Ecology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Shanghai, 200032, China.; Univ. of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing, 100049, China.
title: The trans-kingdom communication of noncoding RNAs in plant-environment interactions.
authors: Liu Ting; Xu Liu-Gen; Duan Cheng-Guo
keywords: (Auto-generated) 非编码RNA;植物-环境互作;跨 kingdom 通讯;细胞间运输;RNA干扰;外泌体;RNA结合蛋白;生物信息学;分子生物学
abstract: As conserved regulatory agents, noncoding RNAs (ncRNAs) have an important impact on many aspects of plant life, including growth, development, and environmental response. Noncoding RNAs can travel through not only plasmodesma and phloem but also intercellular barriers to regulate distinct processes. Increasing evidence shows that the intercellular trans-kingdom transmission of ncRNAs is able to modulate many important interactions between plants and other organisms, such as plant response to pathogen attack, the symbiosis between legume plants and rhizobia and the interactions with parasitic plants. In these interactions, plant ncRNAs are believed to be sorted into extracellular vesicles (EVs) or other nonvesicular vehicles to pass through cell barriers and trigger trans-kingdom RNA interference (RNAi) in recipient cells from different species. There is evidence that the features of extracellular RNAs and associated RNA-binding proteins (RBPs) play a role in defining the RNAs to retain in cell or secrete outside cells. Despite the few reports about RNA secretion pathway in plants, the export of extracellular ncRNAs is orchestrated by a series of pathways in plants. The identification and functional analysis of mobile small RNAs (sRNAs) are attracting increasing attention in recent years. In this review, we discuss recent advances in our understanding of the function, sorting, transport, and regulation of plant extracellular ncRNAs.
translated_keywords: 非编码RNA;植物-环境互作;跨 kingdom 通讯;细胞间运输;RNA干扰;外泌体;RNA结合蛋白;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 作为保守的调控因子，非编码RNA（ncRNAs）对植物的生长、发育以及环境响应等诸多方面具有重要影响。非编码RNA不仅可以通过胞间连丝和韧皮部在细胞间传递，还能跨越细胞屏障来调节不同的生理过程。越来越多的证据表明，非编码RNA的细胞间跨界传播能够调控植物与其它生物之间许多重要的相互作用，例如植物对病原体攻击的响应、豆科植物与根瘤菌的共生关系以及与寄生植物的相互作用。在这些相互作用中，植物ncRNAs被认为会被分选到胞外囊泡（EVs）或其他非囊泡载体中，穿过细胞屏障，并在来自不同物种的受体细胞中触发跨界的RNA干扰（RNAi）。有研究表明，胞外RNA及其相关的RNA结合蛋白（RBPs）的特性在决定哪些RNA保留在细胞内或分泌到细胞外的过程中起着重要作用。尽管关于植物中RNA分泌途径的报道较少，但植物中外泌ncRNA的输出是由一系列通路共同调控的。近年来，人们对可移动小RNA（sRNAs）的鉴定和功能分析越来越关注。本文综述了我们对植物胞外ncRNA的功能、分选、运输和调控等方面理解的最新进展。

translated_title: 细菌生活方式塑造泛基因组
affiliations: Department of Biology, University of Oxford, Oxford OX1 3SZ, United Kingdom.
title: Bacterial lifestyle shapes pangenomes.
authors: Dewar Anna E; Hao Chunhui; Belcher Laurence J; Ghoul Melanie; West Stuart A
keywords: phylogenetic comparative methods; causal inference; horizontal gene transfer
abstract: Pangenomes vary across bacteria. Some species have fluid pangenomes, with a high proportion of genes varying between individual genomes. Other species have less fluid pangenomes, with different genomes tending to contain the same genes. Two main hypotheses have been suggested to explain this variation: differences in species' bacterial lifestyle and effective population size. However, previous studies have not been able to test between these hypotheses because the different features of lifestyle and effective population size are highly correlated with each other, and phylogenetically conserved, making it hard to disentangle their relative importance. We used phylogeny-based analyses, across 126 bacterial species, to tease apart the causal role of different factors. We found that pangenome fluidity was lower in i) host-associated compared with free-living species and ii) host-associated species that are obligately dependent on a host, live inside cells, and are more pathogenic and less motile. In contrast, we found no support for the competing hypothesis that larger effective population sizes lead to more fluid pangenomes. Effective population size appears to correlate with pangenome variation because it is also driven by bacterial lifestyle, rather than because of a causal relationship.
journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America
translated_keywords: 系统发育比较方法；因果推断；水平基因转移
journal_full_name: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America
translated_abstract: 细菌的生活方式和有效种群规模的差异。然而，以往的研究无法在这两种假说之间进行检验，因为生活方式的不同特征与有效种群规模高度相关且在系统发育上保守，这使得很难区分它们的重要性。我们通过基于系统发育的分析方法，在126个细菌物种中分离出不同因素的因果作用。研究发现，与自由生活的物种相比，宿主相关的物种泛基因组流动性较低，并且对于那些严格依赖宿主、生活在细胞内、更具致病性和运动能力较弱的宿主相关物种，其泛基因组流动性也较低。相比之下，我们并未发现支持相反假设的证据，即较大的有效种群规模会导致更流动的泛基因组。有效种群规模似乎与泛基因组变异相关，是因为它同样受到细菌生活方式的影响，而不是因为存在因果关系。

translated_title: 主要植物病原真菌附属染色体的无参鉴定与泛基因组分析
affiliations: Theoretical Biology and Bioinformatics, Utrecht University, Padualaan 8, 3583CH, Utrecht, the Netherlands.; Laboratory of Phytopathology, Wageningen University & Research, Droevendaalsesteeg 1, 6708PB, Wageningen, the Netherlands.; Molecular Plant Pathology, Swammerdam Institute of Life Sciences, University of Amsterdam,1090GE, Amsterdam, the Netherlands.
title: Reference-free identification and pangenome analysis of accessory chromosomes in a major fungal plant pathogen.
authors: van Westerhoven Anouk C; Fokkens Like; Wissink Kyran; Kema Gert H J; Rep Martijn; Seidl Michael F
keywords: (Auto-generated) 参考基因组;附着染色体;泛基因组变异图; Fusarium oxysporum;水平基因转移;染色体动态;宿主特异性;生物信息学;植物病理学
abstract: Accessory chromosomes, found in some but not all individuals of a species, play an important role in pathogenicity and host specificity in fungal plant pathogens. However, their variability complicates reference-based analysis, especially when these chromosomes are missing in the reference genome. Pangenome variation graphs offer a reference-free alternative for studying these chromosomes. Here, we constructed a pangenome variation graph for 73 diverse Fusarium oxysporum genomes, a major fungal plant pathogen with a compartmentalized genome that includes conserved core as well as variable accessory chromosomes. To obtain insights into accessory chromosome dynamics, we first constructed a chromosome similarity network using all-vs-all similarity mapping. We identified eleven core chromosomes conserved across all strains and a substantial number of highly variable accessory chromosomes. Some of these accessory chromosomes are host-specific and likely play a role in determining host range. Using a k-mer based approach, we further identified the presence of these accessory chromosomes in all available (581) F. oxysporum assemblies and corroborated the occurrence of host-specific accessory chromosomes. To further analyze the evolution of chromosomes in F. oxysporum, we constructed a pangenome variation graph per group of homologous chromosomes. This reveals that accessory chromosomes are composed of different stretches of accessory regions, and possibly rearrangements between accessory regions gave rise to these mosaic accessory chromosomes. Furthermore, we show that accessory chromosomes are likely horizontally transferred in natural populations. Our findings demonstrate that a pangenome variation graph is a powerful approach to elucidate the evolutionary dynamics of accessory chromosomes in F. oxysporum, which is not only a useful resource for Fusarium but also provides a framework for similar analyses in other species containing accessory chromosomes.
translated_keywords: 参考基因组;附着染色体;泛基因组变异图; Fusarium oxysporum;水平基因转移;染色体动态;宿主特异性;生物信息学;植物病理学
translated_abstract: 附加染色体在某些但并非所有物种个体中存在，在真菌植物病原体的致病性和宿主特异性方面发挥着重要作用。然而，由于其变异特性，基于参考的分析变得复杂，尤其是在参考基因组中缺失这些染色体的情况下。泛基因组变异图谱提供了一种无需参考的替代方法来研究这些染色体。本文构建了由73个不同株系的尖孢镰刀菌（Fusarium oxysporum）基因组组成的泛基因组变异图谱，这是一种主要的植物病原真菌，其基因组具有分隔结构，包括保守的核心染色体和可变的附加染色体。为了深入了解附加染色体的动态变化，我们首先利用全对全相似性映射构建了一个染色体相似性网络。我们确定了在所有菌株中均存在的11条核心染色体以及大量高度变异的附加染色体。其中一些附加染色体是宿主特异性的，并可能在决定宿主范围方面发挥作用。通过基于k-mer的方法，我们进一步确认了所有可用的（581个）F. oxysporum基因组组装中这些附加染色体的存在，并验证了宿主特异性附加染色体的存在。为进一步分析尖孢镰刀菌中染色体的进化，我们针对同源染色体组构建了泛基因组变异图谱。这揭示了附加染色体由不同的附加区域片段组成，且可能在附加区域之间的重排形成了这些镶嵌状的附加染色体。此外，我们还表明附加染色体很可能在自然群体中发生水平转移。我们的研究结果表明，泛基因组变异图谱是一种强大的工具，可用于阐明尖孢镰刀菌中附加染色体的进化动态，这不仅对镰刀菌具有重要意义，也为其他含有附加染色体的物种提供了类似的分析框架。

translated_title: 真核基因组维持的单分子研究
affiliations: Department of Biophysics and Biophysical Chemistry, Johns Hopkins University School of Medicine, Baltimore, Maryland, USA.; Department of Biology, Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, Maryland, USA.; Program in Cellular and Molecular Medicine, Boston Children's Hospital, Boston, Massachusetts, USA; email: taekjip.ha@childrens.harvard.edu.; Department of Pediatrics, Harvard Medical School, Boston, Massachusetts, USA.; Howard Hughes Medical Institute, Boston Children's Hospital, Boston, Massachusetts, USA.
title: Single-Macromolecule Studies of Eukaryotic Genomic Maintenance.
authors: Rudnizky Sergei; Murray Peter J; Wolfe Clara H; Ha Taekjip
keywords: genomic maintenance; DNA repair; single-molecule biophysics; chromatin; genomic organization; DNA replication
abstract: Genomes are self-organized and self-maintained as long, complex macromolecules of chromatin. The inherent heterogeneity, stochasticity, phase separation, and chromatin dynamics of genome operation make it challenging to study genomes using ensemble methods. Various single-molecule force-, fluorescent-, and sequencing-based techniques rooted in different disciplines have been developed to fill critical gaps in the capabilities of bulk measurements, each providing unique, otherwise inaccessible, insights into the structure and maintenance of the genome. Capable of capturing molecular-level details about the organization, conformational changes, and packaging of genetic material, as well as processive and stochastic movements of maintenance factors, a single-molecule toolbox provides an excellent opportunity for collaborative research to understand how genetic material functions in health and malfunctions in disease. In this review, we discuss novel insights brought to genomic sciences by single-molecule techniques and their potential to continue to revolutionize the field-one molecule at a time.
translated_keywords: 基因组维护；DNA修复；单分子生物物理；染色质；基因组组织；DNA复制
translated_abstract: 基因组作为染色质的长链复杂大分子，具有自我组织和自我维持的特性。然而，基因组运作中的内在异质性、随机性、相分离以及染色质动力学使得使用群体分析方法研究基因组变得极具挑战性。为了弥补群体测量技术的不足，来自不同学科的各种基于单分子力、荧光和测序的技术应运而生，这些技术能够提供关于基因组结构及其维持机制的独特且难以通过传统方法获得的见解。单分子工具箱能够捕捉到遗传物质的组织细节、构象变化与包装信息，以及维持因子的连续性和随机运动，为跨学科合作提供了绝佳机会，以深入理解遗传物质在健康状态下的功能及其在疾病状态下如何发生功能障碍。本文综述了单分子技术为基因组科学带来的新见解，并探讨其在未来继续推动该领域发展的潜力——一个分子一个分子地推进。

translated_title: 混杂群体基因组分析策略
affiliations: Department of Molecular and Human Genetics, Baylor College of Medicine, Houston, Texas, USA; email: elizabeth.atkinson@bcm.edu.
title: Strategies for the Genomic Analysis of Admixed Populations.
authors: Tan Taotao; Atkinson Elizabeth G
keywords: admixture; ancestry; genomics; methods; complex traits; statistical genetics
abstract: Admixed populations constitute a large portion of global human genetic diversity, yet they are often left out of genomics analyses. This exclusion is problematic, as it leads to disparities in the understanding of the genetic structure and history of diverse cohorts and the performance of genomic medicine across populations. Admixed populations have particular statistical challenges, as they inherit genomic segments from multiple source populations-the primary reason they have historically been excluded from genetic studies. In recent years, however, an increasing number of statistical methods and software tools have been developed to account for and leverage admixture in the context of genomics analyses. Here, we provide a survey of such computational strategies for the informed consideration of admixture to allow for the well-calibrated inclusion of mixed ancestry populations in large-scale genomics studies, and we detail persisting gaps in existing tools.
journal: Annual review of biomedical data science
translated_keywords: 混合群体；祖先；基因组学；方法；复杂性状；统计遗传学
translated_abstract: 混血人群构成了全球人类遗传多样性的重要组成部分，但它们常常被排除在基因组学分析之外。这种排除是有问题的，因为它导致了对不同群体遗传结构和历史理解的差异，以及跨群体基因组医学表现的不均衡。混血人群在统计上具有特殊挑战，因为它们从多个来源群体继承基因组片段——这也是它们历史上被排除在遗传学研究之外的主要原因。然而近年来，越来越多的统计方法和软件工具已经被开发出来，以考虑并利用基因组学分析中的混血现象。本文综述了这些计算策略，以便在大规模基因组学研究中合理地纳入混合血统人群，并详细说明了现有工具中存在的持续性空白。

translated_title: 大型复杂植物基因组泛基因组的构建及其表示格式
affiliations: Center of Excellence in Genomics and Systems Biology (CEGSB) and Center for Pre-Breeding Research (CPBR), International Crops Research Institute for the Semi-Arid Tropics (ICRISAT), Hyderabad, India. Electronic address: pradeep.ruperao@icrisat.org.; ICAR-National Bureau of Plant Genetic Resources (NBPGR), New Delhi, India; Queensland Alliance for Agriculture and Food Innovation, The University of Queensland, St Lucia, Australia.; International Institute of Tropical Agriculture (IITA), Nairobi, Kenya.; Center of Excellence in Genomics and Systems Biology (CEGSB) and Center for Pre-Breeding Research (CPBR), International Crops Research Institute for the Semi-Arid Tropics (ICRISAT), Hyderabad, India.; International Maize and Wheat Improvement Center (CIMMYT), Nairobi, Kenya.; Center of Excellence in Genomics and Systems Biology (CEGSB) and Center for Pre-Breeding Research (CPBR), International Crops Research Institute for the Semi-Arid Tropics (ICRISAT), Hyderabad, India. Electronic address: Manish.Pandey@icrisat.org.
title: Developing pangenomes for large and complex plant genomes and their representation formats.
authors: Ruperao Pradeep; Rangan Parimalan; Shah Trushar; Sharma Vinay; Rathore Abhishek; Mayes Sean; Pandey Manish K
keywords: PHG; Haplotype graph; Pangenome; Genome viewer; Graph viewer; Graph format
abstract: The development of pangenomes has revolutionized genomic studies by capturing the complete genetic diversity within a species. Pangenome assembly integrates data from multiple individuals to construct a comprehensive genomic landscape, revealing both core and accessory genomic elements. This approach enables the identification of novel genes, structural variations, and gene presence-absence variations, providing insights into species evolution, adaptation, and trait variation. Representing pangenomes requires innovative visualization formats that effectively convey the complex genomic structures and variations. This review delves into contemporary methodologies and recent advancements in constructing pangenomes, particularly in plant genomes. It examines the structure of pangenome representation, including format comparison, conversion, visualization techniques, and their implications for enhancing crop improvement strategies. Earlier comparative studies have illuminated novel gene sequences, copy number variations, and presence-absence variations across diverse crop species. The concept of a pan-genome, which captures multiple genetic variations from a broad spectrum of genotypes, offers a holistic perspective of a species' genetic makeup. However, constructing a pan-genome for plants with larger genomes poses challenges, including managing vast genome sequence data and comprehending the genetic variations within the germplasm. To address these challenges, researchers have explored cost-effective alternatives to encapsulate species diversity in a single assembly known as a pangenome. This involves reducing the volume of genome sequences while focusing on genetic variations. With the growing prominence of the pan-genome concept in plant genomics, several software tools have emerged to facilitate pangenome construction. This review sheds light on developing and utilizing software tools tailored for constructing pan-genomes in plants. It also discusses representation formats suitable for downstream analyses, offering valuable insights into the genetic landscape and evolutionary dynamics of plant species. In summary, this review underscores the significance of pan-genome construction and representation formats in resolving the genetic architecture of plants, particularly those with complex genomes. It provides a comprehensive overview of recent advancements, aiding in exploring and understanding plant genetic diversity.
translated_keywords:
全基因组泛化图  
单倍型图；泛基因组；基因组可视化器；图可视化器；图格式
translated_abstract: 泛基因组的发展通过捕获物种内的全部遗传多样性彻底改变了基因组学研究。泛基因组组装整合多个个体的数据，构建全面的基因组景观，揭示核心和辅助基因组元件。这种方法能够识别新的基因、结构变异以及基因存在-缺失变异，为物种进化、适应及性状变异提供见解。表示泛基因组需要创新的可视化格式，以有效传达复杂的基因组结构和变异。本文深入探讨了构建泛基因组的当代方法及其在植物基因组中的最新进展。文章考察了泛基因组表示的结构，包括格式比较、转换、可视化技术及其对提升作物改良策略的意义。早期的比较研究已经揭示了不同作物物种中新基因序列、拷贝数变异和存在-缺失变异。泛基因组的概念，即从广泛的基因型中捕捉多种遗传变异，为物种遗传组成提供了整体视角。然而，对于具有较大基因组的植物构建泛基因组面临挑战，包括管理庞大的基因组序列数据和理解种质中的遗传变异。为应对这些挑战，研究人员探索了成本效益更高的替代方案，以在一个称为泛基因组的单一组装中封装物种多样性。这涉及减少基因组序列量，同时关注遗传变异。随着泛基因组概念在植物基因组学中的日益重要，出现了多种软件工具来促进泛基因组构建。本文阐明了开发和利用专为植物泛基因组构建设计的软件工具，并讨论了适合下游分析的表示格式，为理解植物物种的遗传图景和进化动态提供了有价值的见解。总之，本文强调了泛基因组构建和表示格式在解析复杂植物基因组遗传架构中的重要意义，为探索和理解植物遗传多样性提供了全面概述。

translated_title: 植物泛基因组构建与分析的技术发展与进展
affiliations: Rice Research Institute, Guangdong Academy of Agricultural Sciences & Key Laboratory of Genetics and Breeding of High Quality Rice in Southern China (Co-construction by Ministry and Province), Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs & Guangdong Key Laboratory of New Technology in Rice Breeding & Guangdong Rice Engineering Laboratory, Guangzhou 510640, China.; College of Agriculture, South China Agricultural University, Guangzhou, Guangdong 510642, China.; School of Biological Sciences, University of Western Australia, Perth, WA, Australia.; Centre for Applied Bioinformatics, University of Western Australia, Perth, WA 6009, Australia.
title: Technological Development and Advances for Constructing and Analyzing Plant Pangenomes.
authors: Hu Haifei; Li Risheng; Zhao Junliang; Batley Jacqueline; Edwards David
keywords: plant; data analysis and visualization; genome variation; pangenome; bioinformatic pipeline
abstract: A pangenome captures the genomic diversity for a species, derived from a collection of genetic sequences of diverse populations. Advances in sequencing technologies have given rise to three primary methods for pangenome construction and analysis: de novo assembly and comparison, reference genome-based iterative assembly, and graph-based pangenome construction. Each method presents advantages and challenges in processing varying amounts and structures of DNA sequencing data. With the emergence of high-quality genome assemblies and advanced bioinformatic tools, the graph-based pangenome is emerging as an advanced reference for exploring the biological and functional implications of genetic variations.
translated_keywords: 植物；数据分析与可视化；基因组变异；泛基因组；生物信息学流程
translated_abstract: 从头组装与比较、基于参考基因组的迭代组装以及基于图模型的泛基因组构建。每种方法在处理不同数量和结构的DNA测序数据时都有其优势和挑战。随着高质量基因组组装技术和先进生物信息学工具的出现，基于图模型的泛基因组正成为探索遗传变异生物学和功能意义的高级参考。

translated_title: 应激反应中的多倍体、非整倍体和拷贝数变异
affiliations: Department of Microbiology and Immunology, University of Minnesota, Minneapolis, Minnesota, USA; email: selmecki@umn.edu.
title: The Dynamic Fungal Genome: Polyploidy, Aneuploidy and Copy Number Variation in Response to Stress.
authors: Vande Zande Pétra; Zhou Xin; Selmecki Anna
keywords: aneuploidy; polyploidy; copy number variation; genome plasticity; adaptation to stress
abstract: Fungal species have dynamic genomes and often exhibit genomic plasticity in response to stress. This genome plasticity often comes with phenotypic consequences that affect fitness and resistance to stress. Fungal pathogens exhibit genome plasticity in both clinical and agricultural settings and often during adaptation to antifungal drugs, posing significant challenges to human health. Therefore, it is important to understand the rates, mechanisms, and impact of large genomic changes. This review addresses the prevalence of polyploidy, aneuploidy, and copy number variation across diverse fungal species, with special attention to prominent fungal pathogens and model species. We also explore the relationship between environmental stress and rates of genomic changes and highlight the mechanisms underlying genotypic and phenotypic changes. A comprehensive understanding of these dynamic fungal genomes is needed to identify novel solutions for the increase in antifungal drug resistance.
translated_keywords: 染色体非整倍体；多倍体；拷贝数变异；基因组可塑性；对压力的适应
translated_abstract: 真菌物种具有动态基因组，并且在应对压力时常常表现出基因组可塑性。这种基因组可塑性通常伴随着影响适应性和抗逆性的表型后果。真菌病原体在临床和农业环境中均表现出基因组可塑性，尤其是在适应抗真菌药物的过程中，对人类健康构成了重大挑战。因此，理解大规模基因组变化的速率、机制及其影响至关重要。本文综述了多倍体、非整倍体以及拷贝数变异在多种真菌物种中的普遍存在情况，重点关注重要的真菌病原体和模式生物。我们还探讨了环境压力与基因组变化速率之间的关系，并强调了基因型和表型变化背后的机制。全面了解这些动态的真菌基因组对于寻找解决抗真菌药物耐药性增加的新方法至关重要。

translated_title: 基因组革命推动昆虫学进入新时代
affiliations: Zhejiang Key Laboratory of Biology and Ecological Regulation of Crop Pathogens and Insects, Institute of Insect Sciences, Zhejiang University, Hangzhou, China; email: lifei18@zju.edu.cn.; State Key Laboratory of Integrated Management of Pest Insects and Rodents, Institute of Zoology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing, China; email: wangxh@ioz.ac.cn.; Department of Entomology, China Agricultural University, Beijing, China; email: xinzhou@cau.edu.cn.
title: The Genomics Revolution Drives a New Era in Entomology.
authors: Li Fei; Wang Xianhui; Zhou Xin
keywords: data sharing policy; genomic features; life-history traits; databases; phylogenomics; comparative genomics; genome resequencing; insect genomics
abstract: Thanks to the fast development of sequencing techniques and bioinformatics tools, sequencing the genome of an insect species for specific research purposes has become an increasingly popular practice. Insect genomes not only provide sets of gene sequences but also represent a change in focus from reductionism to systemic biology in the field of entomology. Using insect genomes, researchers are able to identify and study the functions of all members of a gene family, pathway, or gene network associated with a trait of interest. Comparative genomics studies provide new insights into insect evolution, addressing long-lasting controversies in taxonomy. It is also now feasible to uncover the genetic basis of important traits by identifying variants using genome resequencing data of individual insects, followed by genome-wide association analysis. Here, we review the current progress in insect genome sequencing projects and the application of insect genomes in uncovering the phylogenetic relationships between insects and unraveling the mechanisms of important life-history traits. We also summarize the challenges in genome data sharing and possible solutions. Finally, we provide guidance for fully and deeply mining insect genome data.
translated_keywords: 数据共享政策；基因组特征；生活史性状；数据库；系统基因组学；比较基因组学；基因组重测序；昆虫基因组学
translated_abstract: 得益于测序技术与生物信息学工具的快速发展，针对特定研究目的对昆虫物种进行基因组测序的做法变得日益普遍。昆虫基因组不仅提供了基因序列集，还标志着昆虫学领域从还原论向系统生物学的转变。借助昆虫基因组，研究人员能够识别并研究与感兴趣性状相关的整个基因家族、通路或基因网络的所有成员的功能。比较基因组学研究为昆虫进化提供了新的见解，解决了分类学中的长期争议。通过使用个体昆虫的重测序数据来鉴定变异，并结合全基因组关联分析，现在也可以揭示重要性状的遗传基础。本文综述了当前昆虫基因组测序项目进展以及昆虫基因组在揭示昆虫系统发育关系和解析重要生活史性状机制方面的应用。同时总结了基因组数据共享面临的挑战及可能的解决方案，并为充分挖掘昆虫基因组数据提供了指导。

translated_title: 丛枝菌根共生中的植物免疫调控及其对病原体和害虫的影响
affiliations: Department of Life Sciences and Systems Biology, University of Turin, Turin, Italy; email: luisa.lanfranco@unito.it.; Department of Plant-Microbe Interactions, Institute of Natural Resources and Agrobiology of Salamanca, CSIC, Salamanca, Spain.; Department of Soil and Plant Microbiology, Estación Experimental del Zaidín, CSIC, Granada, Spain; email: mariajose.pozo@eez.csic.es.
title: Plant Immunity Modulation in Arbuscular Mycorrhizal Symbiosis and Its Impact on Pathogens and Pests.
authors: Fiorilli V; Martínez-Medina A; Pozo Maria J; Lanfranco L
keywords: plant immunity; priming; MIR; pathogens; mycorrhiza-induced resistance; pests; phytohormones; arbuscular mycorrhizal symbiosis
abstract: Arbuscular mycorrhizal (AM) symbiosis is the oldest and most widespread mutualistic association on Earth and involves plants and soil fungi belonging to Glomeromycotina. A complex molecular, cellular, and genetic developmental program enables partner recognition, fungal accommodation in plant tissues, and activation of symbiotic functions such as transfer of phosphorus in exchange for carbohydrates and lipids. AM fungi, as ancient obligate biotrophs, have evolved strategies to circumvent plant defense responses to guarantee an intimate and long-lasting mutualism. They are among those root-associated microorganisms able to boost plants' ability to cope with biotic stresses leading to mycorrhiza-induced resistance (MIR), which can be effective across diverse hosts and against different attackers. Here, we examine the molecular mechanisms underlying the modulation of plant immunity during colonization by AM fungi and at the onset and display of MIR against belowground and aboveground pests and pathogens. Understanding the MIR efficiency spectrum and its regulation is of great importance to optimizing the biotechnological application of these beneficial microbes for sustainable crop protection.
translated_keywords: 植物免疫；诱导抗性；MIR；病原体；菌根诱导抗性；害虫；植物激素；丛枝菌根共生
translated_abstract: 丛枝菌根（arbuscular mycorrhizal, AM）共生是地球上最古老且分布最广泛的互利共生关系，涉及属于Glomeromycotina亚门的植物和土壤真菌。复杂的分子、细胞和遗传发育程序使双方能够识别彼此、在植物组织中定殖，并激活如磷元素交换碳水化合物和脂质等共生功能。作为古老的专性生物营养体，AM真菌已经进化出策略来规避植物防御反应，以确保这种密切而持久的互利共生关系。它们是那些能够增强植物应对生物胁迫能力的根际相关微生物之一，从而诱导产生菌根诱导抗性（mycorrhiza-induced resistance, MIR），这种抗性对多种宿主有效，并能对抗不同的攻击者。本文综述了在AM真菌侵染过程中调控植物免疫机制以及在地下和地上害虫及病原体诱导的MIR表现方面的分子机制。了解MIR的效率谱及其调控对于优化这些有益微生物的生物技术应用以实现可持续作物保护具有重要意义。

translated_title: 生命之树中的基因组分歧
affiliations: Department of Molecular Biosciences, University of Texas at Austin, Austin, TX 78712.; Department of Ecology and Evolution, University of Chicago, Chicago, IL 60637.; Department of Integrative Biology, University of Texas at Austin, Austin, TX 78712.
title: Genomic divergence across the tree of life.
authors: Hart Rowan; Moran Nancy A; Ochman Howard
keywords: genomic divergence; species boundaries; biodiversity; genetic recombination
abstract: Nucleotide sequence data are being harnessed to identify species, even in cases in which organisms themselves are neither in hand nor witnessed. But how genome-wide sequence divergence maps to species status is far from clear. While gene sequence divergence is commonly used to delineate bacterial species, its correspondence to established species boundaries has yet to be explored across eukaryotic taxa. Because the processes underlying gene flow differ fundamentally between prokaryotes and eukaryotes, these domains are likely to differ in the relationship between reproductive isolation and genome-wide sequence divergence. In prokaryotes, homologous recombination, the basis of gene flow, depends directly on the degree of genomic sequence divergence, whereas in sexually reproducing eukaryotes, reproductive incompatibility can stem from changes in very few genes. Guided by measures of genome-wide sequence divergence in bacteria, we gauge how genomic criteria correspond to species boundaries in eukaryotes. In recognized species of eukaryotes, levels of gene sequence divergence within species are typically very small, averaging 1% genome-wide sequence divergence are likely separate species, whereas prokaryotic populations with 1% divergence are still able to recombine and thus can be considered the same species.
journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America
translated_keywords: 基因组分化；物种边界；生物多样性；基因重组
journal_full_name: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America
translated_abstract: 尽管生物体本身无法获取或观察到，核苷酸序列数据已被用于识别物种。然而，基因组范围内的序列分化如何映射到物种状态仍不清楚。虽然基因序列分化常被用来界定细菌物种，但其与已确立的物种界限之间的对应关系尚未在真核生物类群中得到探索。由于同源重组等基因流动的基础过程在原核生物和真核生物之间存在根本差异，这两个领域在生殖隔离与基因组范围序列分化的关系上可能有所不同。在原核生物中，同源重组作为基因流动的基础，直接依赖于基因组序列分化的程度；而在有性繁殖的真核生物中，生殖不兼容可能源于少数几个基因的变化。基于细菌中全基因组序列分化度量的指导，我们评估了基因组标准如何对应真核生物中的物种界限。在公认的真核生物物种中，种内基因序列分化的水平通常非常小，平均而言，全基因组序列分化度为1%的群体可能属于不同的物种，而原核生物种群即使达到1%的分化度仍能进行重组，因此可以被视为同一物种。

translated_title: 泛基因组分析揭示转座元件和倍性对马铃薯物种进化的影响
affiliations: Department of Plant Science, McGill University, Sainte-Anne-de-Bellevue, QC H9X 3V9, Canada.; International Potato Center, Lima 15023, Peru.; United States Department of Agriculture - Agricultural Research Service (USDA ARS) Small Grains and Potato Germplasm Research, Aberdeen, ID 1691S 2700W.; Fredericton Research and Development Centre, Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, Fredericton, NB E3B 4Z7, Canada.
title: Pangenome analyses reveal impact of transposable elements and ploidy on the evolution of potato species.
authors: Bozan Ilayda; Achakkagari Sai Reddy; Anglin Noelle L; Ellis David; Tai Helen H; Strömvik Martina V
keywords: Solanum; transposons; polyploidy; Petota pangenome; adaptation
abstract: Potato (Solanum sp., family Solanaceae) is the most important noncereal food crop globally. It has over 100 wild relatives in the Solanum section Petota, which features species with both sexual and asexual reproduction and varying ploidy levels. A pangenome of Solanum section Petota composed of 296 accessions was constructed including diploids and polyploids compared via presence/absence variation (PAV). The Petota core (genes shared by at least 97% of the accessions) and shell genomes (shared by 3 to 97%) are enriched in basic molecular and cellular functions, while the cloud genome (genes present in less than 3% of the member accessions) showed enrichment in transposable elements (TEs). Comparison of PAV in domesticated vs. wild accessions was made, and a phylogenetic tree was constructed based on PAVs, grouping accessions into different clades, similar to previous phylogenies produced using DNA markers. A cladewise pangenome approach identified abiotic stress response among the core genes in clade 1+2 and clade 3, and flowering/tuberization among the core genes in clade 4. The TE content differed between the clades, with clade 1+2, which is composed of species from North and Central America with reproductive isolation from species in other clades, having much lower TE content compared to other clades. In contrast, accessions with in vitro propagation history were identified and found to have high levels of TEs. Results indicate a role for TEs in adaptation to new environments, both natural and artificial, for Solanum section Petota.
journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America
translated_keywords: 茄属；转座子；多倍体；茄属泛基因组；适应性
journal_full_name: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America
translated_abstract: 马铃薯（茄科茄属，学名 *Solanum*）是全球最重要的非谷物类粮食作物。其近缘野生种群主要分布在茄属 *Petota* 节段中，该节段包含具有有性和无性繁殖方式以及不同倍性水平的物种。本研究构建了一个包含 296 个样本的 *Petota* 节段泛基因组，其中包括二倍体和多倍体样本，并通过存在/缺失变异（PAV）进行比较分析。研究发现，核心基因组（至少 97% 的样本共享的基因）和外壳基因组（3%-97% 的样本共享的基因）在基础分子和细胞功能方面富集，而云基因组（存在于少于 3% 的样本中的基因）则富含转座元件（TEs）。对栽培种与野生种样本的 PAV 比较显示，基于 PAV 构建的系统发育树将样本分成了不同的分支，这与以往基于 DNA 标记构建的系统发育树结果一致。通过分支特异性泛基因组方法，研究发现第 1+2 分支和第 3 分支的核心基因与非生物胁迫响应相关，而第 4 分支的核心基因与开花和块茎形成相关。各分支间的转座元件含量存在差异，其中第 1+2 分支由来自北美和中美洲的物种组成，这些物种与其他分支的物种存在生殖隔离，其转座元件含量显著低于其他分支。相比之下，具有离体培养历史的样本显示出较高的转座元件水平。研究结果表明，转座元件在 *Petota* 节段适应新环境（包括自然环境和人工环境）中发挥了重要作用。

translated_title: 高等植物向重力性反应中SGR家族的细胞与生理功能
affiliations: Division of Life Science and Division of Applied Life Science (BK21 Four), Plant Molecular Biology and Biotechnology Research Center, Gyeongsang National University, Jinju, Gyeongnam, 52828, Republic of Korea.; Division of Life Science and Division of Applied Life Science (BK21 Four), Plant Molecular Biology and Biotechnology Research Center, Gyeongsang National University, Jinju, Gyeongnam, 52828, Republic of Korea. Electronic address: ukadam@gnu.ac.kr.; Division of Life Science and Division of Applied Life Science (BK21 Four), Plant Molecular Biology and Biotechnology Research Center, Gyeongsang National University, Jinju, Gyeongnam, 52828, Republic of Korea. Electronic address: jchong@gnu.ac.kr.
title: Cellular and physiological functions of SGR family in gravitropic response in higher plants.
authors: Cho Yuhan; Kim Yujeong; Lee Hyebi; Kim Sundong; Kang Jaehee; Kadam Ulhas S; Ju Park Soon; Sik Chung Woo; Chan Hong Jong
keywords: Endodermis; Amyloplast sedimentation; Vacuole formation; SGR family; Cell division; Gravity sensing; Shoot Gravitropism
abstract: In plants, gravity directs bidirectional growth; it specifies upward growth of shoots and downward growth of roots. Due to gravity, roots establish robust anchorage and shoot, which enables to photosynthesize. It sets optimum posture and develops plant architecture to efficiently use resources like water, nutrients, CO2, and gaseous exchange. Hence, gravitropism is crucial for crop productivity as well as for the growth of plants in challenging climate. Some SGR members are known to affect tiller and shoot angle, organ size, and inflorescence stem in plants. Although the SHOOT GRAVITROPISM (SGR) family plays a key role in regulating the fate of shoot gravitropism, little is known about its function compared to other proteins involved in gravity response in plant cells and tissues. Moreover, less information on the SGR family's physiological activities and biochemical responses in shoot gravitropism is available. This review scrutinizes and highlights the recent developments in shoot gravitropism and provides an outlook for future crop development, multi-application scenarios, and translational research to improve agricultural productivity. Plants have evolved multiple gene families specialized in gravitropic responses, of which the SGR family is highly significant. The SGR family regulates the plant's gravity response by regulating specific physiological and biochemical processes such as transcription, cell division, amyloplast sedimentation, endodermis development, and vacuole formation. Here, we analyze the latest discoveries in shoot gravitropism with particular attention to SGR proteins in plant cell biology, cellular physiology, and homeostasis. Plant cells detect gravity signals by sedimentation of amyloplast (starch granules) in the direction of gravity, and the signaling cascade begins. Gravity sensing, signaling, and auxin redistribution (organ curvature) are the three components of plant gravitropism. Eventually, we focus on the role of multiple SGR genes in shoot and present a complete update on the participation of SGR family members in gravity.
translated_keywords: 内皮层；淀粉质沉降；液泡形成；SGR家族；细胞分裂；重力感知；向地性
translated_abstract: 在植物中，重力引导双向生长；它决定了地上部分的向上生长和根系的向下生长。由于重力的作用，根系能够牢固地固定植株，而地上部分则可以进行光合作用。重力还帮助植物建立最佳姿态，并发展其结构以高效利用水资源、养分、二氧化碳以及气体交换等资源。因此，向重力性对作物产量以及植物在恶劣气候条件下的生长至关重要。一些SGR成员已知会影响分蘖角度、器官大小以及植物的花序茎。尽管SHOOT GRAVITROPISM（SGR）家族在调控地上部分向重力性命运方面起着关键作用，但与植物细胞和组织中其他参与重力响应的蛋白质相比，人们对它的功能了解甚少。此外，关于SGR家族在向重力性中的生理活动和生化反应的信息也较少。本文综述了近期在向重力性方面的研究进展，并展望了未来作物开发、多应用场景以及提高农业生产力的转化研究方向。植物已经进化出多个专门针对重力响应的基因家族，其中SGR家族尤为重要。SGR家族通过调节特定的生理和生化过程（如转录、细胞分裂、淀粉体沉降、内皮层发育和液泡形成）来调控植物的重力响应。本文重点分析了地上部分向重力性的最新发现，特别是关注植物细胞生物学、细胞生理学和稳态中的SGR蛋白。植物细胞通过淀粉体（淀粉颗粒）在重力方向上的沉降来感知重力信号，从而启动信号级联反应。植物重力性包括重力感知、信号传递和生长素重新分布（器官弯曲）三个组成部分。最后，我们聚焦于多个SGR基因在植物地上部分的作用，并全面更新了SGR家族成员在重力响应中的参与情况。

translated_title: 十年进展
affiliations: Department of Entomology, Purdue University, West Lafayette, Indiana, USA; email: cameros@purdue.edu.
title: Insect Mitochondrial Genomics: A Decade of Progress.
authors: Cameron Stephen L
keywords: genome fragmentation; organelle genomes; mitonuclear incompatibility; genome annotation; phylogenomics; genome rearrangements
abstract: The past decade has seen the availability of insect genomic data explode, with mitochondrial (mt) genome data seeing the greatest growth. The widespread adoption of next-generation sequencing has solved many earlier methodological limitations, allowing the routine sequencing of whole mt genomes, including from degraded or museum specimens and in parallel to nuclear genomic projects. The diversity of available taxa now allows finer-scale comparisons between mt and nuclear phylogenomic analyses; high levels of congruence have been found for most orders, with some significant exceptions (e.g., Odonata, Mantodea, Diptera). The evolution of mt gene rearrangements and their association with haplodiploidy have been tested with expanded taxonomic sampling, and earlier proposed trends have been largely supported. Multiple model systems have been developed based on findings unique to insects, including mt genome fragmentation (lice and relatives) and control region duplication (thrips), allowing testing of hypothesized evolutionary drivers of these aberrant genomic phenomena. Finally, emerging research topics consider the contributions of mt genomes to insect speciation and habitat adaption, with very broad potential impacts. Integration between insect mt genomic research and other fields within entomology continues to be our field's greatest opportunity and challenge.
translated_keywords: 基因组碎裂；细胞器基因组；线粒体核互作不亲和；基因组注释；系统基因组学；基因组重排
translated_abstract: 过去十年见证了昆虫基因组数据的爆炸式增长，其中线粒体（mt）基因组数据的增长最为显著。新一代测序技术的广泛应用解决了许多早期方法学上的限制，使得整个mt基因组的常规测序成为可能，包括从降解标本或博物馆标本中进行测序，并且可以与核基因组项目并行开展。如今，不同分类群的多样性使得mt基因组和核基因组系统发育基因组学分析之间的精细比较成为可能；大多数目之间发现了高度的一致性，但也存在一些显著例外（例如蜻蜓目、螳螂目、双翅目）。通过扩展分类取样对mt基因重排的进化及其与单倍体二倍体现象的关联进行了检验，早期提出的趋势得到了广泛支持。基于昆虫特有的发现，多个模型系统得以开发，包括mt基因组片段化（虱目及其近缘类群）和控制区重复（蓟马），从而能够测试这些异常基因组现象的假定进化驱动力。最后，新兴研究课题探讨了mt基因组在昆虫物种形成和栖息地适应中的作用，具有非常广泛的影响潜力。昆虫mt基因组学研究与其他昆虫学领域之间的整合仍然是我们领域的最大机遇与挑战。

translated_title: 单细胞真核微生物群体基因组学的一种方法
affiliations: Department of Biology, Aquatic Ecology, Lund University, Lund, Sweden.; Department of Earth Sciences, University of Oxford, Oxford, United Kingdom.; Faculty of Medicine, Department of Clinical Sciences, Lund University, Lund, Sweden.; Marine Biological Laboratory, Woods Hole, MA, USA.; National Bioinformatics Infrastructure Sweden (NBIS), SciLifeLab, Department of Biology, Lund University, Lund, Sweden.
title: SAG-RAD: A Method for Single-Cell Population Genomics of Unicellular Eukaryotes.
authors: Gollnisch Raphael; Wallenius Joel; Gribble Kristin E; Ahrén Dag; Rengefors Karin
keywords: restriction-site associated DNA (RAD) sequencing; microbial genetic diversity; microeukaryotes; single amplified genome (SAG); culturing bias; whole-genome amplification (WGA)
abstract: Sequencing of reduced representation libraries enables genotyping of many individuals for population genomic studies. However, high amounts of DNA are required, and the method cannot be applied directly on single cells, preventing its use on most microbes. We developed and implemented the analysis of single amplified genomes followed by restriction-site-associated DNA sequencing to bypass labor-intensive culturing and to avoid culturing bias in population genomic studies of unicellular eukaryotes. This method thus opens the way for addressing important questions about the genetic diversity, gene flow, adaptation, dispersal, and biogeography of hitherto unexplored species.
translated_keywords: 限制性位点相关DNA（RAD）测序；微生物遗传多样性；微型真核生物；单细胞扩增基因组（SAG）；培养偏倚；全基因组扩增（WGA）
translated_abstract: 构建简化代表文库的测序技术能够对许多个体进行基因分型，从而开展种群基因组学研究。然而，该方法需要大量的DNA，并且无法直接应用于单细胞，这限制了它在大多数微生物上的应用。我们开发并实施了单扩增基因组分析后接限制位点相关DNA测序的技术，以绕过劳动密集型的培养过程，并避免在单细胞真核生物种群基因组学研究中的培养偏差。此方法因此为解决遗传多样性、基因流动、适应性、扩散以及尚未被探索物种的生物地理学等重要问题开辟了道路。

translated_title: 技术进展、应用与展望
affiliations: State Key Laboratory of Cotton Biology, State Key Laboratory of Crop Stress Adaptation and Improvement, Key Laboratory of Plant Stress Biology, School of Life Sciences, Henan University, 85 Minglun Street, Kaifeng 475001, P.R. China.; State Key Laboratory of Cotton Biology, State Key Laboratory of Crop Stress Adaptation and Improvement, Key Laboratory of Plant Stress Biology, School of Life Sciences, Henan University, 85 Minglun Street, Kaifeng 475001, P.R. China. Electronic address: sunxuwussd@sina.com.
title: Single-cell and spatial multi-omics in the plant sciences: Technical advances, applications, and perspectives.
authors: Yu Xiaole; Liu Zhixin; Sun Xuwu
keywords: plants; single-cell transcriptomics; mass spectrometry imaging; spatial transcriptomics; spatial metabolomics
abstract: Plants contain a large number of cell types and exhibit complex regulatory mechanisms. Studies at the single-cell level have gradually become more common in plant science. Single-cell transcriptomics, spatial transcriptomics, and spatial metabolomics techniques have been combined to analyze plant development. These techniques have been used to study the transcriptomes and metabolomes of plant tissues at the single-cell level, enabling the systematic investigation of gene expression and metabolism in specific tissues and cell types during defined developmental stages. In this review, we present an overview of significant breakthroughs in spatial multi-omics in plants, and we discuss how these approaches may soon play essential roles in plant research.
translated_keywords: 植物；单细胞转录组学；质谱成像；空间转录组学；空间代谢组学
translated_abstract: 植物包含大量的细胞类型，并表现出复杂的调控机制。在植物科学中，单细胞水平的研究正变得越来越普遍。单细胞转录组学、空间转录组学和空间代谢组学技术已被结合用于分析植物发育。这些技术被用来研究植物组织在单细胞水平上的转录组和代谢组，从而系统地研究特定组织和细胞类型在明确发育阶段中的基因表达和代谢过程。本文综述了植物空间多组学方面的重要突破，并讨论了这些方法如何在未来在植物研究中发挥关键作用。

translated_title: 从完整基因组到泛基因组
affiliations: Department of Biomolecular Engineering, University of California Santa Cruz, Santa Cruz, CA 95064, USA. Electronic address: khmiga@ucsc.edu.
title: From complete genomes to pangenomes.
authors: Miga Karen H
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因组;泛基因组;人类遗传学;基因组学;ASHG年会;75周年;杰出演讲者研讨会;生物信息学;分子生物学
abstract: Highlighting the Distinguished Speakers Symposium on "The Future of Human Genetics and Genomics," this collection of articles is based on presentations at the ASHG 2023 Annual Meeting in Washington, DC, in celebration of all our field has accomplished in the past 75 years, since the founding of ASHG in 1948.
translated_keywords: 基因组;泛基因组;人类遗传学;基因组学;ASHG年会;75周年;杰出演讲者研讨会;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 本文集围绕“人类遗传学与基因组学的未来”杰出演讲者研讨会展开，收录了在华盛顿特区举行的ASHG 2023年会的报告内容，旨在庆祝自1948年美国人类遗传学会（ASHG）成立以来，本领域在过去75年间取得的各项成就。

translated_title: 需求、方法与应用
affiliations: Shenzhen Branch, Guangdong Laboratory of Lingnan Modern Agriculture, Genome Analysis Laboratory of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs, Agricultural Genomics Institute at Shenzhen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Shenzhen 518120, China.; Shenzhen Branch, Guangdong Laboratory of Lingnan Modern Agriculture, Genome Analysis Laboratory of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs, Agricultural Genomics Institute at Shenzhen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Shenzhen 518120, China; Yazhouwan National Laboratory, Sanya 572024, China; State Key Laboratory of Rice Biology, China National Rice Research Institute, Hangzhou 310006, China; Academician Workstation, National Nanfan Research Institute (Sanya), Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Sanya 572024, China.
