Electronic address: shanglianguang@caas.cn.
title: The developments and prospects of plant super-pangenomes: Demands, approaches, and applications.
authors: He Wenchuang; Li XiaoXia; Qian Qian; Shang Lianguang
keywords: pangenomics; plant; molecular breeding; super-pangenome; methodology
abstract: By integrating genomes from different accessions, pangenomes provide a more comprehensive and reference-bias-free representation of genetic information within a population compared to a single reference genome. With the rapid accumulation of genomic sequencing data and the expanding scope of plant research, plant pangenomics has gradually evolved from single-species to multi-species studies. This shift has given rise to the concept of a super-pangenome that covers all genomic sequences within a genus-level taxonomic group. By incorporating both cultivated and wild species, the super-pangenome has greatly enhanced the resolution of research in various areas such as plant genetic diversity, evolution, domestication, and molecular breeding. In this review, we present a comprehensive overview of the plant super-pangenome, emphasizing its development requirements, construction strategies, potential applications, and notable achievements. We also highlight the distinctive advantages and promising prospects of super-pangenomes while addressing current challenges and future directions.
translated_keywords: 泛基因组学；植物；分子育种；超级泛基因组；方法学
translated_abstract: 相比于单一参考基因组，泛基因组通过整合不同株系的基因组，能够提供更为全面且无参考偏倚的种群遗传信息表征。随着基因组测序数据的快速积累和植物研究领域的不断拓展，植物泛基因组学研究已从单个物种逐渐扩展到多个物种的研究。这一转变催生了涵盖属级分类单元内所有基因组序列的超泛基因组概念。通过纳入栽培与野生种质资源，超泛基因组显著提升了植物遗传多样性、进化、驯化及分子育种等领域的研究分辨率。本文综述了植物超泛基因组的发展需求、构建策略、潜在应用及重要进展，并强调了其独特优势与广阔前景，同时探讨了当前面临的挑战及未来发展方向。

translated_title: 方法学考量对基于基因的植物泛基因组构建的影响
affiliations: Department of Life Sciences, School of Plant Sciences and Food Security, Tel-Aviv University, Tel Aviv, Israel.
title: The Effect of Methodological Considerations on the Construction of Gene-Based Plant Pan-genomes.
authors: Glick Lior; Mayrose Itay
keywords: gene content; assembly; presence–absence variation; annotation; pan-genome
abstract: Pan-genomics is an emerging approach for studying the genetic diversity within plant populations. In contrast to common resequencing studies that compare whole genome sequencing data with a single reference genome, the construction of a pan-genome (PG) involves the direct comparison of multiple genomes to one another, thereby enabling the detection of genomic sequences and genes not present in the reference, as well as the analysis of gene content diversity. Although multiple studies describing PGs of various plant species have been published in recent years, a better understanding regarding the effect of the computational procedures used for PG construction could guide researchers in making more informed methodological decisions. Here, we examine the effect of several key methodological factors on the obtained gene pool and on gene presence-absence detections by constructing and comparing multiple PGs of Arabidopsis thaliana and cultivated soybean, as well as conducting a meta-analysis on published PGs. These factors include the construction method, the sequencing depth, and the extent of input data used for gene annotation. We observe substantial differences between PGs constructed using three common procedures (de novo assembly and annotation, map-to-pan, and iterative assembly) and that results are dependent on the extent of the input data. Specifically, we report low agreement between the gene content inferred using different procedures and input data. Our results should increase the awareness of the community to the consequences of methodological decisions made during the process of PG construction and emphasize the need for further investigation of commonly applied methodologies.
translated_keywords: 基因含量；组装；存在-缺失变异；注释；泛基因组
translated_abstract: 泛基因组学是一种研究植物群体遗传多样性的新兴方法。与传统的重测序研究不同，后者通过将全基因组测序数据与单一参考基因组进行比较，泛基因组（PG）的构建涉及多个基因组之间的直接比较，从而能够检测出参考基因组中不存在的基因组序列和基因，并分析基因含量的多样性。尽管近年来已有多篇描述各种植物物种泛基因组的论文发表，但对用于泛基因组构建的计算方法的影响了解得更透彻，可以帮助研究人员做出更加明智的方法选择。本文通过构建和比较多种拟南芥和栽培大豆的泛基因组，并对已发表的泛基因组进行元分析，探讨了几个关键方法因素对获得的基因池以及基因存在-缺失检测的影响。这些因素包括构建方法、测序深度以及用于基因注释的数据范围。我们观察到，使用三种常见程序（从头组装和注释、图谱到泛基因组、迭代组装）构建的泛基因组之间存在显著差异，并且结果依赖于输入数据的范围。具体而言，我们报告了使用不同程序和输入数据推断的基因内容之间的一致性较低。我们的结果应提高该领域对泛基因组构建过程中方法决策后果的认识，并强调进一步调查常用方法的必要性。

translated_title: 磷脂酸信号在调控植物生殖与株型中的作用
affiliations: Department of Biology, University of Missouri-St. Louis, St. Louis, MO 63121, USA; Donald Danforth Plant Science Center, St. Louis, MO 63132, USA.; Department of Biology, University of Missouri-St. Louis, St. Louis, MO 63121, USA; Donald Danforth Plant Science Center, St. Louis, MO 63132, USA. Electronic address: wangxue@umsl.edu.
title: Phosphatidic acid signaling in modulating plant reproduction and architecture.
authors: Yao Shuaibing; Yang Bao; Li Jianwu; Tang Shan; Tang Shaohua; Kim Sang-Chul; Wang Xuemin
keywords: phospholipases; lipid signaling; phosphatidic acid; plant reproduction; DAG kinases; root architecture
abstract: Phosphatidic acid (PA) is an important class of signaling lipids involved in various biological processes in plants. Functional characterization of mutants of PA-metabolizing enzymes, combined with lipidomics and protein-lipid interaction analyses, has revealed the key role of PA signaling in plant responses to biotic and abiotic stresses. Moreover, PA and its metabolizing enzymes influence several reproductive processes, including gametogenesis, pollen tube growth, self-incompatibility, haploid embryo formation, embryogenesis, and seed development. They also play a significant role in shaping plant reproductive and root architecture. Recent studies have shed light on the diverse mechanisms of PA's action, though much remains to be elucidated. Here, we summarize recent advances in the study of PA and its metabolizing enzymes, emphasizing their roles in plant sexual reproduction and architecture. We also explore potential mechanisms underlying PA's functions and discuss future research directions.
translated_keywords: 磷脂酶；脂质信号；磷脂酸；植物生殖；二酰甘油激酶；根系构型
translated_abstract: 磷脂酸（PA）是一类参与植物多种生物过程的重要信号脂质。对PA代谢酶突变体的功能表征，结合脂质组学和蛋白-脂质相互作用分析，揭示了PA信号在植物应对生物和非生物胁迫中的关键作用。此外，PA及其代谢酶还影响多个生殖过程，包括配子发生、花粉管生长、自交不亲和性、单倍体胚形成、胚胎发生以及种子发育，并且在塑造植物生殖结构和根系构型中发挥重要作用。近期研究揭示了PA作用的多样化机制，但仍有许多问题有待阐明。本文综述了关于PA及其代谢酶研究的最新进展，重点阐述其在植物有性生殖和形态建成中的作用，并探讨了PA功能背后的潜在机制及未来的研究方向。

translated_title: 植物通过生物分子凝聚体进行应力感知与响应
affiliations: Center for Plant Biology, School of Life Sciences, Tsinghua University, Beijing 100084, China.; Center for Plant Biology, School of Life Sciences, Tsinghua University, Beijing 100084, China. Electronic address: xffang@tsinghua.edu.cn.
title: Stress sensing and response through biomolecular condensates in plants.
authors: Peng Jiaxuan; Yu Yidan; Fang Xiaofeng
keywords: biomolecular condensates; sensor; phase separation; stress
abstract: Plants have developed intricate mechanisms for rapid and efficient stress perception and adaptation in response to environmental stressors. Recent research highlights the emerging role of biomolecular condensates in modulating plant stress perception and response. These condensates function through numerous mechanisms to regulate cellular processes such as transcription, translation, RNA metabolism, and signaling pathways under stress conditions. In this review, we provide an overview of current knowledge on stress-responsive biomolecular condensates in plants, including well-defined condensates such as stress granules, processing bodies, and the nucleolus, as well as more recently discovered plant-specific condensates. By briefly referring to findings from yeast and animal studies, we discuss mechanisms by which plant condensates perceive stress signals and elicit cellular responses. Finally, we provide insights for future investigations on stress-responsive condensates in plants. Understanding how condensates act as stress sensors and regulators will pave the way for potential applications in improving plant resilience through targeted genetic or biotechnological interventions.
translated_keywords: 生物分子凝聚体；传感器；相分离；压力（应力）
translated_abstract: 植物已经进化出复杂机制以快速高效地感知和适应环境胁迫。近期研究表明，生物分子凝聚体在调节植物胁迫感知与响应中发挥着重要作用。这些凝聚体通过多种机制调控胁迫条件下的转录、翻译、RNA代谢及信号通路等细胞过程。本文综述了当前关于植物胁迫响应生物分子凝聚体的知识，包括已明确的应激颗粒、加工小体和核仁等凝聚体以及最近发现的植物特异性凝聚体。通过简要回顾酵母和动物研究的成果，我们讨论了植物凝聚体感知胁迫信号并引发细胞响应的机制。最后，本文对未来植物胁迫响应凝聚体的研究提供了见解。理解凝聚体如何作为胁迫感受器和调节器，将为通过靶向遗传或生物技术干预提高植物抗逆性提供潜在应用途径。

translated_title: 用于检测质体基因组反向重复序列的增强工具
affiliations: Escuela Politécnica Superior, Universidad Autónoma de Madrid, Madrid, Spain.; Botany Unit, Finnish Museum of Natural History, University of Helsinki, Helsinki, Finland.; Museomics Research Group, Helsinki Institute of Life Science (HiLIFE), University of Helsinki, Helsinki, Finland.; Department of Computer Science, University of Helsinki, Helsinki, Finland.; Systems Oncology Research Program, Faculty of Medicine, University of Helsinki, Helsinki, Finland.; Ludwig Center at Harvard and Laboratory of Systems Pharmacology, Harvard Medical School, Boston, Massachusetts, USA.
title: IRplus: An Augmented Tool to Detect Inverted Repeats in Plastid Genomes.
authors: Díez Menéndez Carmen; Poczai Peter; Williams Bernardo; Myllys Leena; Amiryousefi Ali
keywords: plastid genome; chloroplasts; molecular evolution; comparative genomics; genome structure
abstract: High-throughput sequencing methods have increased the accessibility of plastid genomes, which are crucial for clarifying phylogenetic relationships. Current large sequencing efforts require software tools for routine display of their distinctive quadripartite structure, which is denoted by four junction sites. By concentrating on these junctions and their close vicinity, IRscope has emerged as the standard tool for detection of this structure and creating simplified comparative graphical maps of plastid genomes. Here, we provide an augmented version (IRplus) that encompasses a novel set of functions such as integrated error detection, flexible color schemes, and an upgraded method to detect inverted repeats in genomic sequences. Spanning across the plant tree of life, IRplus allows the quick visualization of various sets of plastid genomes and features, next to smooth interoperability with other widely used annotation file formats and platforms. The IRplus can be accessed at https://irscope.shinyapps.io/IRplus/, and source codes are freely available at https://github.com/AmiryousefiLab/IRplus.

translated_abstract: //irscope.shinyapps.io/IRplus/ 访问，源代码可在 https://github.com/AmiryousefiLab/IRplus/ 免费获取。

translated_title: 拟病毒属病毒受到重复序列的侵袭，这些重复序列对其进化和从塞德拉病毒的分化有贡献。
affiliations: Information Génomique & Structurale, Unité Mixte de Recherche 7256 (Institut de Microbiologie de la Méditerranée, FR3479), IM2B, IOM, Aix-Marseille University, Centre National de la Recherche Scientifique, Marseille 13288 Cedex 9, France.
title: Pithoviruses Are Invaded by Repeats That Contribute to Their Evolution and Divergence from Cedratviruses.
authors: Rigou Sofia; Schmitt Alain; Alempic Jean-Marie; Lartigue Audrey; Vendloczki Peter; Abergel Chantal; Claverie Jean-Michel; Legendre Matthieu
keywords: genome evolution; giant viruses; comparative genomics
abstract: Pithoviridae are amoeba-infecting giant viruses possessing the largest viral particles known so far. Since the discovery of Pithovirus sibericum, recovered from a 30,000-yr-old permafrost sample, other pithoviruses, and related cedratviruses, were isolated from various terrestrial and aquatic samples. Here, we report the isolation and genome sequencing of 2 Pithoviridae from soil samples, in addition to 3 other recent isolates. Using the 12 available genome sequences, we conducted a thorough comparative genomic study of the Pithoviridae family to decipher the organization and evolution of their genomes. Our study reveals a nonuniform genome organization in 2 main regions: 1 concentrating core genes and another gene duplications. We also found that Pithoviridae genomes are more conservative than other families of giant viruses, with a low and stable proportion (5% to 7%) of genes originating from horizontal transfers. Genome size variation within the family is mainly due to variations in gene duplication rates (from 14% to 28%) and massive invasion by inverted repeats. While these repeated elements are absent from cedratviruses, repeat-rich regions cover as much as a quarter of the pithoviruses genomes. These regions, identified using a dedicated pipeline, are hotspots of mutations, gene capture events, and genomic rearrangements that contribute to their evolution.
translated_keywords: 基因组演化；巨型病毒；比较基因组学
translated_abstract: 一个区域集中了核心基因，另一个区域则存在基因复制现象。此外，我们发现Pithoviridae基因组比其他巨型病毒家族更为保守，其水平基因转移所占比例较低且稳定（5%至7%）。该家族内基因组大小的变化主要由基因复制率（从14%到28%）的差异以及反向重复序列的大规模入侵引起。尽管这些重复元件在Cedratvirus中不存在，但它们在Pithovirus基因组中覆盖面积可达四分之一。通过专用分析流程识别出的这些富含重复序列的区域是突变、基因捕获事件及基因组重排的热点，这些过程共同推动了Pithoviridae的进化。

translated_title: 生命之树上蛋白质功能的尺度变化
affiliations: Earth-Life Science Institute, Tokyo Institute of Technology, Tokyo, Japan.; School of Life Sciences and Technology, Tokyo Institute of Technology, Tokyo, Japan.; The Santa Fe Institute, Santa Fe, New Mexico, USA.; Blue Marble Space Institute of Science, Seattle, Washington, USA.; Center for Sustainable Resource Science, RIKEN, Saitama, Japan.
title: Scaling of Protein Function across the Tree of Life.
authors: Gondhalekar Riddhi; Kempes Christopher P; McGlynn Shawn Erin
keywords: genome; proteins; scaling laws; evolution; major transitions
abstract: Scaling laws are a powerful way to compare genomes because they put all organisms onto a single curve and reveal nontrivial generalities as genomes change in size. The abundance of functional categories across genomes has previously been found to show power law scaling with respect to the total number of functional categories, suggesting that universal constraints shape genomic category abundance. Here, we look across the tree of life to understand how genome evolution may be related to functional scaling. We revisit previous observations of functional genome scaling with an expanded taxonomy by analyzing 3,726 bacterial, 220 archaeal, and 79 unicellular eukaryotic genomes. We find that for some functional classes, scaling is best described by multiple exponents, revealing previously unobserved shifts in scaling as genome-encoded protein annotations increase or decrease. Furthermore, we find that scaling varies between phyletic groups at both the domain and phyla levels and is less universal than previously thought. This variability in functional scaling is not related to taxonomic phylogeny resolved at the phyla level, suggesting that differences in cell plan or physiology outweigh broad patterns of taxonomic evolution. Since genomes are maintained and replicated by the functional proteins encoded by them, these results point to functional degeneracy between taxonomic groups and unique evolutionary trajectories toward these. We also find that individual phyla frequently span scaling exponents of functional classes, revealing that individual clades can move across scaling exponents. Together, our results reveal unique shifts in functions across the tree of life and highlight that as genomes grow or shrink, proteins of various functions may be added or lost.
translated_keywords: 基因组；蛋白质；标度律；演化；重大转变
translated_abstract: 规模律是一种强大的方法，用于比较基因组，因为它们可以将所有生物体置于同一条曲线之上，并揭示基因组大小变化过程中非平凡的一般性规律。先前的研究发现，不同基因组中功能类别的丰度与总功能类别数量之间表现出幂律缩放关系，这表明普遍约束条件塑造了基因组类别丰度。本文通过研究生命之树来理解基因组进化可能与功能缩放之间的关系。我们通过对3,726个细菌、220个古菌和79个单细胞真核生物基因组进行分析，重新审视了之前在扩展分类学范围内的功能基因组缩放观察结果。我们发现，对于某些功能类别而言，缩放关系最好用多个指数来描述，揭示了之前未被观察到的随着基因组编码蛋白质注释的增加或减少而发生的缩放转变。此外，我们发现不同系统发育群组在域级和门级上的缩放关系存在差异，并且比以前认为的更不具普适性。这种功能缩放的变化与门级分类学系统发育无关，表明细胞计划或生理学差异超过了广泛的分类学演化模式。由于基因组由其编码的功能蛋白维持和复制，这些结果指向了分类群之间的功能退化以及向这些功能的独特演化轨迹。我们还发现，各个门经常跨越功能类别的缩放指数，表明单独的分支可以跨越缩放指数。总之，我们的研究结果揭示了生命之树上功能的独特变化，并强调了随着基因组的增大或减小，各种功能的蛋白质可能会被添加或丢失。

translated_title: 植物物种形成基因组学
affiliations: Department of Botany and Biodiversity Research Centre, University of British Columbia, Vancouver, BC, Canada.; Department of Biology, University of Victoria, Victoria, BC, Canada.; Department of Botany and Biodiversity Research Centre, University of British Columbia, Vancouver, BC, Canada. Electronic address: lriesebe@mail.ubc.ca.
title: Genomics of plant speciation.
authors: Bock Dan G; Cai Zhe; Elphinstone Cassandra; González-Segovia Eric; Hirabayashi Kaede; Huang Kaichi; Keais Graeme L; Kim Amy; Owens Gregory L; Rieseberg Loren H
keywords: genomic islands of speciation; hybrid speciation; polyploid speciation; standing genetic variation; structural variation; reproductive isolation
abstract: Studies of plants have been instrumental for revealing how new species originate. For several decades, botanical research has complemented and, in some cases, challenged concepts on speciation developed via the study of other organisms while also revealing additional ways in which species can form. Now, the ability to sequence genomes at an unprecedented pace and scale has allowed biologists to settle decades-long debates and tackle other emerging challenges in speciation research. Here, we review these recent genome-enabled developments in plant speciation. We discuss complications related to identification of reproductive isolation (RI) loci using analyses of the landscape of genomic divergence and highlight the important role that structural variants have in speciation, as increasingly revealed by new sequencing technologies. Further, we review how genomics has advanced what we know of some routes to new species formation, like hybridization or whole-genome duplication, while casting doubt on others, like population bottlenecks and genetic drift. While genomics can fast-track identification of genes and mutations that confer RI, we emphasize that follow-up molecular and field experiments remain critical. Nonetheless, genomics has clarified the outsized role of ancient variants rather than new mutations, particularly early during speciation. We conclude by highlighting promising avenues of future study. These include expanding what we know so far about the role of epigenetic and structural changes during speciation, broadening the scope and taxonomic breadth of plant speciation genomics studies, and synthesizing information from extensive genomic data that have already been generated by the plant speciation community.
translated_keywords: 物种形成基因岛；杂交物种形成；多倍体物种形成；现存遗传变异；结构变异；生殖隔离
translated_abstract: 植物研究对于揭示新物种起源发挥了重要作用。几十年来，植物学研究既补充了也挑战了一些通过其他生物研究得出的物种形成概念，同时揭示了物种形成的其他方式。如今，基因组测序能力以空前的速度和规模发展，使生物学家能够解决长期存在的争议并应对物种形成研究中的其他新兴挑战。本文综述了植物物种形成的这些近期基因组驱动的发展。我们讨论了利用基因组分化景观分析识别生殖隔离（RI）位点时遇到的复杂性，并强调了结构变异在物种形成中的重要角色，这由新的测序技术逐渐揭示。此外，我们回顾了基因组学如何推进了我们对某些物种形成途径（如杂交或全基因组复制）的理解，同时对其他一些途径（如种群瓶颈效应和遗传漂变）提出了质疑。尽管基因组学可以快速识别赋予生殖隔离的基因和突变，但我们强调后续分子实验和野外实验仍然至关重要。然而，基因组学已经阐明了古老变异而非新突变在物种形成早期阶段的重要作用。最后，我们指出了未来研究的有前景方向，包括扩展我们对表观遗传和结构变化在物种形成中的作用的认识，扩大植物物种形成基因组学研究的范围和分类广度，以及综合已有的大量基因组数据信息，这些数据是由植物物种形成研究社区生成的。

translated_title: 植物次生代谢物介导的植物对细菌和真菌病原体的防御
affiliations: State Key Laboratory of Biocatalysis and Enzyme Engineering, School of Life Sciences, Hubei University, Wuhan 430062, China.; State Key Laboratory of Biocatalysis and Enzyme Engineering, School of Life Sciences, Hubei University, Wuhan 430062, China. Electronic address: xhb_2086@163.com.; State Key Laboratory of Biocatalysis and Enzyme Engineering, School of Life Sciences, Hubei University, Wuhan 430062, China. Electronic address: yangpf@hubu.edu.cn.
title: Plant secondary metabolites-mediated plant defense against bacteria and fungi pathogens.
authors: Yang Wenjuan; Zhang Lu; Yang Yong; Xiang Haibo; Yang Pingfang
keywords: Pathogenic bacteria; Pathogenic fungi; Plant secondary metabolites; Plant defense
abstract: Plant diseases caused by pathogenic bacteria and fungi are major threats to both wild plants and crops. To counteract these threats, plants have evolved various defense mechanisms, including the production of plant secondary metabolites (PSMs). These compounds, such as terpenoids, phenolics, alkaloids, and glucosinolates, offer a versatile, efficient, and cost-effective means of pathogen resistance. The traditional pathogen management methods relying on synthetic microbicides are often environment unfriendly. In contrast, PSMs provide promising alternative way due to their high efficiency and environmental benefits. This article reviews the categories, biosynthetic pathways, mechanisms of actions, and the commercialization of the PSMs to enhance our understanding of their pathogen resistance capabilities. The goal is to develop sustainable disease management strategies using PSM-based bactericides and fungicides.
translated_keywords: 致病菌；致病真菌；植物次生代谢物；植物防御
translated_abstract: 由致病细菌和真菌引起的植物病害对野生植物和农作物均构成重大威胁。为应对这些威胁，植物进化出了多种防御机制，其中包括植物次生代谢物（PSMs）的产生。这些化合物如萜类、酚类、生物碱和硫代葡萄糖苷等，为病原体抗性提供了多样化、高效且经济的手段。传统依赖合成微杀菌剂的病原体管理方法往往对环境不友好。相比之下，由于PSMs具有高效性和环境优势，它们提供了一种有前景的替代途径。本文综述了PSMs的种类、生物合成途径、作用机制及其商业化情况，以加深对其病原体抗性能力的理解。目标是开发基于PSM的可持续细菌杀虫剂和真菌杀虫剂的疾病管理策略。

translated_title: 南非南部两种矮小型避役（布拉迪波迪翁属，避役科）的从头组装全基因组
affiliations: School of Animal, Plant and Environmental Sciences, University of the Witwatersrand, Johannesburg, South Africa.; South African National Biodiversity Institute, Kirstenbosch Research Centre, Claremont, South Africa.; Centre for Ecological Genomics and Wildlife Conservation, University of Johannesburg, Johannesburg, South Africa.; Department of Biology, Center for Computational and Integrative Biology, Rutgers University-Camden, Camden, New Jersey, USA.
title: De Novo Whole Genome Assemblies for Two Southern African Dwarf Chameleons (Bradypodion, Chamaeleonidae).
authors: Taft Jody M; Tolley Krystal A; Alexander Graham J; Geneva Anthony J
keywords: HiFi data; reptiles; Hi-C; chameleon genomics; reference genome; Africa
abstract: A complete and high-quality reference genome has become a fundamental tool for the study of functional, comparative, and evolutionary genomics. However, efforts to produce high-quality genomes for African taxa are lagging given the limited access to sufficient resources and technologies. The southern African dwarf chameleons (Bradypodion) are a relatively young lineage, with a large body of evidence demonstrating the highly adaptive capacity of these lizards. Bradypodion are known for their habitat specialization, with evidence of convergent phenotypes across the phylogeny. However, the underlying genetic architecture of these phenotypes remains unknown for Bradypodion, and without adequate genomic resources, many evolutionary questions cannot be answered. We present de novo assembled whole genomes for Bradypodion pumilum and Bradypodion ventrale, using Pacific Biosciences long-read sequencing data. BUSCO analysis revealed that 96.36% of single copy orthologs were present in the B. pumilum genome and 94% in B. ventrale. Moreover, these genomes boast scaffold N50 of 389.6 and 374.9 Mb, respectively. Based on a whole genome alignment of both Bradypodion genomes, B. pumilum is highly syntenic with B. ventrale. Furthermore, Bradypodion is also syntenic with Anolis lizards, despite the divergence between these lineages estimated to be nearly 170 Ma. Coalescent analysis of the genomic data also suggests that historical changes in effective population size for these species correspond to notable shifts in the southern African environment. These high-quality Bradypodion genome assemblies will support future research on the evolutionary history, diversification, and genetic underpinnings of adaptation in Bradypodion.
translated_keywords: 高保真数据；爬行动物；Hi-C；变色龙基因组学；参考基因组；非洲
translated_abstract: 一个完整且高质量的参考基因组已成为功能、比较和进化基因组学研究的基础工具。然而，由于资源和技术的有限获取，针对非洲类群产生高质量基因组的努力进展缓慢。南非侏儒变色龙（Bradypodion）是一支相对较年轻的谱系，大量证据表明这些蜥蜴具有高度的适应能力。Bradypodion 以其栖息地特化而闻名，并在系统发育树中表现出趋同表型的证据。然而，Bradypodion 这些表型的遗传结构仍然未知，缺乏足够的基因组资源使得许多进化问题无法解答。我们利用太平洋生物科学公司（PacBio）长读长测序数据，对 Bradypodion pumilum 和 Bradypodion ventrale 进行了从头组装的全基因组测序。BUSCO 分析显示，B. pumilum 基因组中包含 96.36% 的单拷贝直系同源基因，而 B. ventrale 中包含 94%。此外，这两个基因组的支架 N50 分别达到 389.6 Mb 和 374.9 Mb。基于对两种 Bradypodion 基因组的整体比对，B. pumilum 与 B. ventrale 高度共线。此外，尽管 Bradypodion 和 Anolis 蜥蜴之间的分歧时间估计接近 1.7 亿年，但它们的基因组仍表现出共线性。基因组数据的种群历史分析还表明，这些物种的有效种群大小的历史变化与南非南部环境的显著变化相对应。这些高质量的 Bradypodion 基因组组装将支持未来关于 Bradypodion 进化历史、多样化以及适应遗传基础的研究。

translated_title: 全球冷泉的综合基因组目录
affiliations: Key Laboratory of Marine Genetic Resources, Third Institute of Oceanography, Ministry of Natural Resources, Xiamen, 361005, China.; School of Marine Sciences, Sun Yat-Sen University, Zhuhai, 519082, China.; Southern Marine Science and Engineering Guangdong Laboratory (Zhuhai), Zhuhai, 519000, China.; Key Laboratory of Marine Genetic Resources, Third Institute of Oceanography, Ministry of Natural Resources, Xiamen, 361005, China. dongxiyang@tio.org.cn.; Southern Marine Science and Engineering Guangdong Laboratory (Zhuhai), Zhuhai, 519000, China. dongxiyang@tio.org.cn.
title: A comprehensive genomic catalog from global cold seeps.
authors: Han Yingchun; Zhang Chuwen; Zhao Zhuoming; Peng Yongyi; Liao Jing; Jiang Qiuyun; Liu Qing; Shao Zongze; Dong Xiyang
keywords: (Auto-generated) 冷泉;微生物;基因目录;宏基因组组装基因组(MAGs);未培养物种;厌氧甲烷氧化菌(ANME);共生硫酸盐还原菌(SRB);生物地理分布;生物应用;生物信息学;分子生态学
abstract: Cold seeps harbor abundant and diverse microbes with tremendous potential for biological applications and that have a significant influence on biogeochemical cycles. Although recent metagenomic studies have expanded our understanding of the community and function of seep microorganisms, knowledge of the diversity and genetic repertoire of global seep microbes is lacking. Here, we collected a compilation of 165 metagenomic datasets from 16 cold seep sites across the globe to construct a comprehensive gene and genome catalog. The non-redundant gene catalog comprised 147 million genes, and 36% of them could not be assigned to a function with the currently available databases. A total of 3,164 species-level representative metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) were obtained, most of which (94%) belonged to novel species. Of them, 81 ANME species were identified that cover all subclades except ANME-2d, and 23 syntrophic SRB species spanned the Seep-SRB1a, Seep-SRB1g, and Seep-SRB2 clades. The non-redundant gene and MAG catalog is a valuable resource that will aid in deepening our understanding of the functions of cold seep microbiomes.
translated_keywords: 冷泉;微生物;基因目录;宏基因组组装基因组(MAGs);未培养物种;厌氧甲烷氧化菌(ANME);共生硫酸盐还原菌(SRB);生物地理分布;生物应用;生物信息学;分子生态学
translated_abstract: 冷泉环境中栖息着丰富且多样的微生物，这些微生物在生物应用方面具有巨大潜力，并对生物地球化学循环产生显著影响。尽管近年来宏基因组学研究扩展了我们对冷泉微生物群落及其功能的理解，但全球冷泉微生物的多样性和遗传库仍缺乏充分认识。本文从全球16个冷泉采样点收集了165个宏基因组数据集，构建了一个全面的基因和基因组目录。非冗余基因目录包含1.47亿个基因，其中36%无法通过现有数据库分配到特定功能。共获得3,164个物种水平的代表性宏基因组组装基因组（MAGs），其中94%属于新种。其中鉴定出81个ANME物种，涵盖了除ANME-2d外的所有亚分支，以及23个共生硫酸盐还原菌（SRB）物种，覆盖了Seep-SRB1a、Seep-SRB1g和Seep-SRB2三个分支。非冗余基因和MAG目录是一项宝贵的资源，将有助于深入理解冷泉微生物群落的功能。

translated_title: DNA修复、发育调控与免疫响应

title: The plant SMC5/6 complex: DNA repair, developmental regulation, and immune responses.
authors: Zhao Yan; Zhang Jian; Fang Yiru; Zhang Pingxian; Chen Hanchen
keywords: Plant immunity; DNA damage; SMC5/6; Cell cycle; Plant development; Meiosis
abstract: The Structural Maintenance of Chromosomes 5/6 (SMC5/6) complex plays a pivotal role in safeguarding the structural integrity and morphology of chromosomes, thereby contributing to genomic stability-a cornerstone for normal growth and development across organisms. Beyond its fundamental role in eukaryotic DNA damage repair, recent research has broadened our understanding of SMC5/6's multifaceted functions. It has emerged as a crucial regulator not only of the cell cycle but also in developmental processes, plant immunity, and meiotic DNA damage repair. In this review, we highlight its novel roles in modulating plant growth, development, and immunity, providing fresh perspectives on how this complex might help combat DNA damage stress and orchestrate growth strategies. Furthermore, we emphasize that SMC5/6 offers a unique window into the intricate mechanisms underlying genomic maintenance, development, and stress responses, with profound implications for crop improvement.
translated_keywords: 植物免疫；DNA损伤；SMC5/6；细胞周期；植物发育；减数分裂
translated_abstract: 染色体结构维持蛋白5/6（Structural Maintenance of Chromosomes 5/6，SMC5/6）复合体在维持染色体的结构完整性和形态方面发挥关键作用，从而有助于基因组稳定性的维持——这是生物正常生长和发育的基础。除了其在真核生物DNA损伤修复中的基本功能外，近期研究扩展了我们对SMC5/6多面功能的理解。它不仅作为细胞周期调控的重要因子，还参与发育过程、植物免疫以及减数分裂DNA损伤修复等多重生物学过程。本文综述了SMC5/6在调控植物生长、发育和免疫方面的新兴角色，为理解该复合体如何应对DNA损伤压力并协调生长策略提供了新视角。此外，我们强调，SMC5/6为深入理解基因组维持、发育及应激反应背后的复杂机制提供了一个独特的窗口，这对作物改良具有深远意义。

translated_title: 梨的单倍型解析的端粒到端粒（T2T）基因组组装和泛基因组图谱揭示了等位基因特异性表达的多样化模式及果实品质性状的基因组基础。

title: Haplotype-resolved T2T genome assemblies and pangenome graph of pear reveal diverse patterns of allele-specific expression and the genomic basis of fruit quality traits.
authors: Li Qionghou; Qiao Xin; Li Lanqing; Gu Chao; Yin Hao; Qi Kaijie; Xie Zhihua; Yang Sheng; Zhao Qifeng; Wang Zewen; Yang Yuhang; Pan Jiahui; Li Hongxiang; Wang Jie; Wang Chao; Rieseberg Loren H; Zhang Shaoling; Tao Shutian
keywords: haplotype-resolved assembly; fruit quality traits; pangenome graph; allele-specific expression; pear
abstract: Hybrid crops often exhibit increased yield and greater resilience, yet the genomic mechanism(s) underlying hybrid vigor or heterosis remain unclear, hindering our ability to predict the expression of phenotypic traits in hybrid breeding. Here, we generated haplotype-resolved T2T genome assemblies of two pear hybrid varieties, 'Yuluxiang' (YLX) and 'Hongxiangsu' (HXS), which share the same maternal parent but differ in their paternal parents. We then used these assemblies to explore the genome-scale landscape of allele-specific expression (ASE) and create a pangenome graph for pear. ASE was observed for close to 6000 genes in both hybrid cultivars. A subset of ASE genes related to aspects of fruit quality such as sugars, organic acids, and cuticular wax were identified, suggesting their important contributions to heterosis. Specifically, Ma1, a gene regulating fruit acidity, is absent in the paternal haplotypes of HXS and YLX. A pangenome graph was built based on our assemblies and seven published pear genomes. Resequencing data for 139 cultivated pear genotypes (including 97 genotypes sequenced here) were subsequently aligned to the pangenome graph, revealing numerous structural variant hotspots and selective sweeps during pear diversification. As predicted, the Ma1 allele was found to be absent in varieties with low organic acid content, and this association was functionally validated by Ma1 overexpression in pear fruit and calli. Overall, these results reveal the contributions of ASE to fruit-quality heterosis and provide a robust pangenome reference for high-resolution allele discovery and association mapping.
translated_keywords: 单倍型解析组装；果实品质性状；泛基因组图谱；等位特异性表达；梨
translated_abstract: 杂交作物通常表现出更高的产量和更强的适应性，但杂种优势或异质性的基因组机制尚不清楚，这限制了我们预测杂交育种中表型性状表达的能力。本文中，我们生成了两种梨杂交品种“玉露香”（YLX）和“红星酥”（HXS）的单倍型解析的端粒到端粒（T2T）基因组组装，这两个品种具有相同的母本亲本但父本亲本不同。然后，我们利用这些组装来探索全基因组范围内的等位基因特异性表达（ASE），并构建了梨的泛基因组图谱。在两个杂交品种中，接近6000个基因观察到了ASE。其中一组与果实品质相关的ASE基因，如糖、有机酸和角质蜡，被鉴定出来，表明它们对杂种优势的重要贡献。具体而言，调控果实酸度的基因Ma1在HXS和YLX的父本单倍型中缺失。基于我们的组装和七个已发表的梨基因组，构建了一个泛基因组图谱。随后，对139个栽培梨种质（包括97个新测序的种质）的重测序数据与该泛基因组图谱进行比对，揭示了梨多样化过程中大量的结构变异热点和选择性清除。正如预期的那样，在低有机酸含量的品种中未发现Ma1等位基因，并通过在梨果实和愈伤组织中的Ma1过表达验证了这一关联。总体而言，这些结果揭示了ASE对果实品质杂种优势的贡献，并为高分辨率等位基因发现和关联作图提供了稳健的泛基因组参考。

translated_title: 韩国地方牛的染色体水平基因组组装及14个Bos taurus组装的泛基因组图谱

title: Chromosome-level genome assembly of Korean native cattle and pangenome graph of 14 Bos taurus assemblies.
authors: Jang Jisung; Jung Jaehoon; Lee Young Ho; Lee Sanghyun; Baik Myunggi; Kim Heebal
keywords: (Auto-generated) Hanwoo; 韩牛; 牛基因组; 染色体水平组装; 潘通基因组图谱; 重复元件; 蛋白编码基因; Bos taurus; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
abstract: This study presents the first chromosome-level genome assembly of Hanwoo, an indigenous Korean breed of Bos taurus taurus. This is the first genome assembly of Asian taurus breed. Also, we constructed a pangenome graph of 14 B. taurus genome assemblies. The contig N50 was over 55 Mb, the scaffold N50 was over 89 Mb and a genome completeness of 95.8%, as estimated by BUSCO using the mammalian set, indicated a high-quality assembly. 48.7% of the genome comprised various repetitive elements, including DNAs, tandem repeats, long interspersed nuclear elements, and simple repeats. A total of 27,314 protein-coding genes were identified, including 25,302 proteins with inferred gene names and 2,012 unknown proteins. The pangenome graph of 14 B. taurus autosomes revealed 528.47 Mb non-reference regions in total and 61.87 Mb Hanwoo-specific regions. Our Hanwoo assembly and pangenome graph provide valuable resources for studying B. taurus populations.
translated_keywords: Hanwoo; 韩牛; 牛基因组; 染色体水平组装; 潘通基因组图谱; 重复元件; 蛋白编码基因; Bos taurus; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract: 本研究首次完成了韩国地方品种汉牛（Bos taurus taurus）的染色体水平基因组组装，这是首个亚洲牛品种的基因组组装。此外，我们构建了包含14个B. taurus基因组组装的泛基因组图谱。Contig N50超过55 Mb，scaffold N50超过89 Mb，BUSCO评估基于哺乳动物集的基因组完整性达95.8%，表明这是一个高质量的组装。基因组中有48.7%由多种重复元件组成，包括DNA转座子、串联重复序列、长散在核元件和简单重复序列等。共鉴定出27,314个蛋白编码基因，其中25,302个具有推断的基因名称，2,012个为未知蛋白。对14个B. taurus常染色体的泛基因组图谱分析显示，总计有528.47 Mb的非参考区域和61.87 Mb的汉牛特有区域。我们的汉牛组装及其泛基因组图谱为研究B. taurus群体提供了宝贵的资源。

translated_title: 植物激素与膜转运蛋白在缓解植物盐胁迫中的协同效应
affiliations: Plant Physiology and Biochemistry Laboratory, Department of Botany, Aligarh Muslim University, Aligarh, 202002, India.; Department of Botany, School of Chemical and Life Sciences, Jamia Hamdard, New Delhi, 110062, India.; Plant Physiology and Biochemistry Laboratory, Department of Botany, Aligarh Muslim University, Aligarh, 202002, India. Electronic address: naf9.amu@gmail.com.
title: Synergistic effects of phytohormones and membrane transporters in plant salt stress mitigation.
authors: Nidhi; Iqbal Noushina; Khan Nafees A
keywords: Abiotic stress; Mitigation; Transporters; Salt stress; Phytohormones
abstract: Plants are frequently exposed to high salinity, negatively affecting their development and productivity. This review examined the complex roles of membrane transporters (MTs) and phytohormones in mediating salt stress. MTs are crucial in capturing sodium ions (Na+) and maintaining a delicate balance between sodium (Na+) and potassium (K+), essential for supporting cellular homeostasis and enhancing overall plant health. These MTs were instrumental in regulating ion balance and promoting the absorption and segregation of vital nutrients, thereby enhancing salt stress tolerance. Various plant hormones, including abscisic acid, auxin, ethylene, cytokinin, and gibberellins, along with gaseous growth regulators such as nitric oxide and hydrogen sulfide, collaborate to regulate and synchronize numerous aspects of plant growth, development, and stress responses to environmental factors. These transporters and other phytohormones, including brassinosteroids, melatonin, and salicylic acid, also collaborated to initiate adaptation processes, such as controlling osmotic pressure, removing ions, and initiating stress signaling pathways. This study consolidated the advancements in understanding the molecular and physiological processes contributing to plant salt tolerance, emphasizing the intricate relationships between MTs and phytohormones. The aim was to elucidate these interactions to promote further research and develop strategies for enhancing plant salt tolerance.
translated_keywords: 非生物胁迫；缓解；转运蛋白；盐胁迫；植物激素
translated_abstract: 高盐胁迫频繁影响植物的生长发育和生产力。本文综述了膜转运蛋白（MTs）和植物激素在介导盐胁迫中的复杂作用。膜转运蛋白在捕获钠离子（Na+）、维持钠（Na+）与钾（K+）之间的微妙平衡方面发挥关键作用，这对支持细胞稳态和提高植物整体健康至关重要。这些转运蛋白通过调节离子平衡、促进重要营养物质的吸收与隔离来增强植物对盐胁迫的耐受性。多种植物激素，包括脱落酸、生长素、乙烯、细胞分裂素、赤霉素以及一氧化氮和硫化氢等气体生长调节剂，协同调控植物生长、发育及环境因子诱导的胁迫响应的多个方面。此外，油菜素甾体、褪黑素和水杨酸等其他植物激素也参与启动适应过程，如调控渗透压、排除离子和启动胁迫信号通路。本研究总结了关于植物耐盐分子和生理机制的研究进展，强调了膜转运蛋白与植物激素之间复杂的相互关系，旨在阐明这些相互作用以推动相关研究并开发提高植物耐盐性的策略。

translated_title: 药用和芳香植物次生代谢物收获时间的优化
affiliations: Department of Agronomy and Plant Breeding, Faculty of Agriculture, Azarbaijan Shahid Madani University, Tabriz, 53714-161, Iran. Electronic address: saeid.hazrati@azaruniv.ac.ir.; Department of Agronomy and Plant Breeding, Faculty of Agriculture, Azarbaijan Shahid Madani University, Tabriz, 53714-161, Iran.; Department of Agricultural, Forest and Food Sciences, Horticultural Sciences - Inhortosanitas Lab, University of Turin, 10095, Grugliasco (TO), Italy. Electronic address: silvana.nicola@unito.it.
title: Harvest time optimization for medicinal and aromatic plant secondary metabolites.
authors: Hazrati Saeid; Mousavi Zahra; Nicola Silvana
keywords: Growth and development; Balsamic time; Medicinal and aromatic plants; Secondary metabolites
abstract: Plant secondary metabolites (SMs) play a crucial role in shielding plants from pathogens and environmental stressors. These natural products find widespread applications across various industries, including pharmaceutical, food, cosmetic, and healthcare. However, the quantity and quality of these compounds in plants can be influenced by factors such as genetics, morphology, plant age, and the seasonal and daily variations. The timing of harvest holds particular significance for medicinal and aromatic plants (MAPs) as their active compounds peak at a specific moment during the plant growth cycle. Determining the optimal harvest time is essential to ensure the plants meet their intended cultivation goal. In this review, we analyzed how developmental and external factors impact the qualitative and quantitative effectiveness of SMs in MAPs. We examined recent studies on the effects of environmental and developmental factors on SMs of MAPs, compiling relevant data for analysis. The results of this review demonstrate how these factors influence the quantity and quality of plant SMs, underscoring the importance of determining the optimal harvest time (known as the balsamic time) to maximize the utilization of these compounds. Our findings offer crucial insights into the factors affecting SMs, serving as a tool for quality control in MAPs production. Moreover, this review can be a valuable resource for researchers, farmers, and industrial users aiming to optimize plant growth and harvest timing for maximum yield. Overall, our review provides valuable information for devising effective strategies to produce high-quality MAPs products.
translated_keywords: 生长发育；最佳采收期；药用和香料植物；次生代谢物
translated_abstract: 植物次生代谢物（SMs）在保护植物免受病原体和环境胁迫方面发挥着关键作用。这些天然产物在制药、食品、化妆品和健康保健等多个行业中有着广泛的应用。然而，植物中这些化合物的数量和质量会受到遗传、形态、植物年龄以及季节性和昼夜变化等因素的影响。对于药用和芳香植物（MAPs）而言，收获时间尤为重要，因为其活性成分在植物生长周期的特定时刻达到峰值。确定最佳收获时间对于确保植物实现其栽培目标至关重要。本文综述了发育和外部因素对MAPs中SMs定性和定量效果的影响。我们分析了近期关于环境和发育因素对MAPs次生代谢物影响的研究，并整理相关数据进行分析。本研究结果表明，这些因素如何影响植物次生代谢物的数量和质量，强调了确定最佳收获时间（即最佳采收期）以最大化利用这些化合物的重要性。我们的研究结果为理解影响次生代谢物的因素提供了重要见解，可作为MAPs生产中的质量控制工具。此外，本综述还可为研究人员、农民和工业用户优化植物生长和收获时间提供有价值的参考资源，从而实现最大产量。总体而言，本综述为制定有效策略以生产高质量MAPs产品提供了有价值的信息。

translated_title: 泛基因组的简要介绍
affiliations: School of Agriculture, Food and Wine, Waite Campus, University of Adelaide, Urrbrae, South Australia 5064, Australia.; Australian Genome Research Facility, Victorian Comprehensive Cancer Centre, Melbourne, Victoria 3000, Australia.; South Australian Genomics Centre, SAHMRI, North Terrace, Adelaide, South Australia 5000, Australia.; Alkahest Inc., San Carlos, CA 94070, United States.; School of Biological Sciences, University of Adelaide, Adelaide, South Australia 5005, Australia.
title: A gentle introduction to pangenomics.
authors: Matthews Chelsea A; Watson-Haigh Nathan S; Burton Rachel A; Sheppard Anna E
keywords: pangenome; genomic variation; reference bias; presence–absence variation (PAV)
abstract: Pangenomes have emerged in response to limitations associated with traditional linear reference genomes. In contrast to a traditional reference that is (usually) assembled from a single individual, pangenomes aim to represent all of the genomic variation found in a group of organisms. The term 'pangenome' is currently used to describe multiple different types of genomic information, and limited language is available to differentiate between them. This is frustrating for researchers working in the field and confusing for researchers new to the field. Here, we provide an introduction to pangenomics relevant to both prokaryotic and eukaryotic organisms and propose a formalization of the language used to describe pangenomes (see the Glossary) to improve the specificity of discussion in the field.
translated_keywords: 泛基因组；基因组变异；参考偏倚；存在-缺失变异（PAV）
translated_abstract: 泛基因组的出现是为了应对传统线性参考基因组的局限性。与通常由单个个体组装的传统参考基因组不同，泛基因组旨在代表一个生物群体中存在的所有基因组变异。目前，“泛基因组”一词被用来描述多种不同类型的基因组信息，但用于区分这些信息的语言却十分有限。这对该领域的研究人员来说令人沮丧，对新进入该领域的研究人员也造成了困惑。本文为原核和真核生物的泛基因组学提供了介绍，并提出了对描述泛基因组的语言进行规范化（详见术语表），以提高该领域讨论的准确性。

translated_title: 植物-病毒互作中的新兴角色
affiliations: Department of Plant Molecular Biology, University of Delhi South Campus, New Delhi, 110021, India.; Department of Plant Molecular Biology, University of Delhi South Campus, New Delhi, 110021, India. Electronic address: indasgup@south.du.ac.in.
title: Abscisic acid: An emerging player in plant-virus interactions.
authors: Kumar Rohit; Dasgupta Indranil
keywords: Hormones; Resistance; Susceptibility; Signalling; Virus; Abscisic acid
abstract: In the evolutionary arm race between plants and viral pathogens, the plant hormone abscisic acid (ABA) has surfaced as a crucial player. This review accumulates substantial evidence that portrays ABA as a crucial regulatory hub, coordinating the complex network of plant antiviral immunity. It is capable of synchronizing resistance pathways, yet it can also be exploited as a susceptibility factor by viral effectors. ABA fortifies multi-layered defenses on one hand, by activating RNA silencing mechanisms that precisely degrade viral genomes, strengthening plasmodesmal gateways with callose barriers, and priming the transcriptional programs of resistance genes. On the other hand, ABA can augment susceptibility by counteracting other defense hormones, dampening oxidative bursts, and inhibiting antiviral defence proteins. Interestingly, a variety of viruses have independently evolved strategies to manipulate ABA signalling pathways. This fascinating paradigm of hormonal conflicts unveils ABA as an important regulatory handle that determines infection trajectories. Future studies should carefully explore the multifaceted impacts of ABA modulation on plant immunity and susceptibility to diverse pathogens before considering practical applications in viral resistance strategies.
translated_keywords: 激素；抗性；易感性；信号传导；病毒；脱落酸
translated_abstract: 在植物与病毒病原体的协同进化过程中，植物激素脱落酸（ABA）已成为一个关键角色。本文综述了大量证据，表明ABA作为植物抗病毒免疫复杂网络的重要调控枢纽，能够同步多种抗性途径，但同时也可能被病毒效应蛋白利用为易感因子。一方面，ABA通过激活RNA沉默机制精确降解病毒基因组、以胼胝质屏障强化胞间连丝闸门，并启动抗性基因的转录程序，从而加强多层防御；另一方面，ABA可通过拮抗其他防卫激素、抑制活性氧爆发以及抑制抗病毒防御蛋白等方式增强植物的易感性。有趣的是，多种病毒已独立进化出操纵ABA信号通路的策略。这种激素冲突的迷人范式揭示了ABA作为一个重要的调控节点，决定了感染进程。未来的研究应在考虑将其应用于病毒抗性策略之前，仔细探讨ABA调控对植物免疫和对多种病原体易感性的多方面影响。

translated_title: 非生物胁迫下植物生理学中的新兴战士
affiliations: Department of Botany, Maharshi Dayanand University, Rohtak, 124001, Haryana, India.; Department of Botany, Zakir Husain Delhi College, University of Delhi, New Delhi, India. Electronic address: pyadav@botany.du.ac.in.; Department of Botany, Maharshi Dayanand University, Rohtak, 124001, Haryana, India. Electronic address: drasha.botany@mdurohtak.ac.in.
title: Nitric oxide: An emerging warrior of plant physiology under abiotic stress.
authors: Saini Sakshi; Sharma Priyanka; Singh Pooja; Kumar Vikram; Yadav Priya; Sharma Asha
keywords: Abiotic stress; Growth; Crosstalk; Signaling molecule; Post-translational modifications; Plant response; Nitric oxide; Phytohormones
abstract: The natural environment of plants comprises a complex set of various abiotic stresses and their capability to react and survive under this anticipated changing climate is highly flexible and involves a series of balanced interactions between signaling molecules where nitric oxide becomes a crucial component. In this article, we focussed on the role of nitric oxide (NO) in various signal transduction pathways of plants and its positive impact on maintaining cellular homeostasis under various abiotic stresses. Besides this, the recent data on interactions of NO with various phytohormones to control physiological and biochemical processes to attain abiotic stress tolerance have also been considered. These crosstalks modulate the plant's defense mechanism and help in alleviating the negative impact of stress. While focusing on the diverse functions of NO, an effort has been made to explore the functions of NO-mediated post-translational modifications, such as the N-end rule pathway, tyrosine nitration, and S-nitrosylation which revealed the exact mechanism and characterization of proteins that modify various metabolic processes in stressed conditions. Considering all of these factors, the present review emphasizes the role of NO and its interlinking with various phytohormones in maintaining developmental processes in plants, specifically under unfavorable environments.
translated_keywords: 非生物胁迫；生长；串扰；信号分子；翻译后修饰；植物响应；一氧化氮；植物激素
translated_abstract: 植物的自然环境包含复杂的非生物胁迫集合，其在预期变化的气候下反应和生存的能力高度灵活，并涉及信号分子之间一系列平衡相互作用，其中一氧化氮（NO）成为关键组分。本文聚焦于NO在植物各种信号转导通路中的作用及其在多种非生物胁迫下维持细胞稳态的积极作用。此外，还探讨了NO与各种植物激素相互作用的最新数据，以调控生理和生化过程以获得非生物胁迫耐受性。这些相互作用调节了植物的防御机制并有助于减轻胁迫的负面影响。在探讨NO多样功能的同时，还探索了NO介导的翻译后修饰（如N端规则通路、酪氨酸硝化和S-亚硝基化）的功能，揭示了在胁迫条件下修饰各种代谢过程的蛋白质的确切机制和特性。综合考虑这些因素，本综述强调了NO及其与各种植物激素之间的联系在植物发育过程中特别是在不利环境下的重要作用。

translated_title: 复杂植物基因组组装的最新进展
affiliations: Shenzhen Branch, Guangdong Laboratory for Lingnan Modern Agriculture, Genome Analysis Laboratory of the Ministry of Agriculture, Agricultural Genomics Institute at Shenzhen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Shenzhen 518120, China.; Shenzhen Branch, Guangdong Laboratory for Lingnan Modern Agriculture, Genome Analysis Laboratory of the Ministry of Agriculture, Agricultural Genomics Institute at Shenzhen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Shenzhen 518120, China. Electronic address: zhangxingtan@caas.cn.
title: Recent Advances in Assembly of Complex Plant Genomes.
authors: Kong Weilong; Wang Yibin; Zhang Shengcheng; Yu Jiaxin; Zhang Xingtan
keywords: Complex plant genome; Telomere-to-telomere genome; Assembly algorithm; Haplotype-resolved assembly; Sequencing technology
abstract: Over the past 20 years, tremendous advances in sequencing technologies and computational algorithms have spurred plant genomic research into a thriving era with hundreds of genomes decoded already, ranging from those of nonvascular plants to those of flowering plants. However, complex plant genome assembly is still challenging and remains difficult to fully resolve with conventional sequencing and assembly methods due to high heterozygosity, highly repetitive sequences, or high ploidy characteristics of complex genomes. Herein, we summarize the challenges of and advances in complex plant genome assembly, including feasible experimental strategies, upgrades to sequencing technology, existing assembly methods, and different phasing algorithms. Moreover, we list actual cases of complex genome projects for readers to refer to and draw upon to solve future problems related to complex genomes. Finally, we expect that the accurate, gapless, telomere-to-telomere, and fully phased assembly of complex plant genomes could soon become routine.
translated_keywords: 复杂植物基因组；端粒到端粒基因组；组装算法；单倍型解析组装；测序技术
translated_abstract: 过去20年间，测序技术和计算算法的巨大进步推动了植物基因组学研究进入蓬勃发展阶段，已经解析了从无维管植物到开花植物的数百个基因组。然而，由于复杂基因组的高杂合性、高度重复序列或高倍性特征，复杂植物基因组组装仍然充满挑战，传统测序和组装方法难以完全解决这些问题。本文综述了复杂植物基因组组装面临的挑战与取得的进展，包括可行的实验策略、测序技术的改进、现有的组装方法以及不同的分相算法。此外，我们列举了复杂基因组项目的真实案例供读者参考，以解决未来与复杂基因组相关的问题。最后，我们预计复杂植物基因组的精确、无间隙、端粒到端粒以及完全分相的组装很快将成为常规操作。

translated_title: 解析纳米污染对植物代谢和生态系统动态的影响
affiliations: Department of Botany, Nallamuthu Gounder Mahalingam College (Autonomous), Bharathiar University (Affiliated), Pollachi, 642 001, Tamil Nadu, India.; ICAR - Central Institute for Cotton Research, RS, Coimbatore, 641 003, Tamil Nadu, India.; Department of Botany, Bharathiar University, Coimbatore, 641 046, Tamil Nadu, India.; Department of Biochemistry, Bharathiar University, Coimbatore, 641 046, Tamil Nadu, India.; Department of Botany, Bharathiar University, Coimbatore, 641 046, Tamil Nadu, India. Electronic address: Vasanthlabbu@gmail.com.
title: Unraveling the impact of nanopollution on plant metabolism and ecosystem dynamics.
authors: Vignesh Arumugam; Amal Thomas Cheeran; Sivalingam Ramamoorthy; Selvakumar Subramaniam; Vasanth Krishnan
keywords: Nanopollution; Secondary metabolism; Primary metabolism; Nanoecology; Phytoremediation
abstract: Nanopollution (NPOs), a burgeoning consequence of the widespread use of nanoparticles (NPs) across diverse industrial and consumer domains, has emerged as a critical environmental issue. While extensive research has scrutinized the repercussions of NPs pollution on ecosystems and human health, scant attention has been directed towards unraveling its implications for plant life. This comprehensive review aims to bridge this gap by delving into the nuanced interplay between NPOs and plant metabolism, encompassing both primary and secondary processes. Our exploration encompasses an in-depth analysis of the intricate mechanisms governing the interaction between plants and NPs. This involves a thorough examination of how physicochemical properties such as size, shape, and surface characteristics influence the uptake and translocation of NPs within plant tissues. The impact of NPOs on primary metabolic processes, including photosynthesis, respiration, nutrient uptake, and water transport. Additionally, this study explored the multifaceted alterations in secondary metabolism, shedding light on the synthesis and modulation of secondary metabolites in response to NPs exposure. In assessing the consequences of NPOs for plant life, we scrutinize the potential implications for plant growth, development, and environmental interactions. The intricate relationships revealed in this review underscore the need for a holistic understanding of the plant-NPs dynamics. As NPs become increasingly prevalent in ecosystems, this investigation establishes a fundamental guide that underscores the importance of additional research to shape sustainable environmental management strategies and address the extensive effects of NPs on the development of plant life and environmental interactions.
translated_keywords: 纳米污染；次生代谢；初生代谢；纳米生态学；植物修复
translated_abstract: 纳米污染（NPOs）是纳米颗粒（NPs）在工业和消费品领域广泛应用所带来的日益严重的后果，已成为一个关键的环境问题。尽管已有大量研究探讨了NPs污染对生态系统和人类健康的深远影响，但对其对植物生命的影响却鲜有关注。本文旨在通过深入剖析NPOs与植物代谢之间的复杂相互作用来填补这一空白，涵盖初级和次级代谢过程。我们的研究涵盖了对植物与NPs相互作用机制的深入分析，包括纳米颗粒的物理化学性质（如大小、形状和表面特性）如何影响其在植物组织中的吸收和转运。此外，我们还探讨了NPOs对初级代谢过程（如光合作用、呼吸作用、养分吸收和水分运输）的影响。同时，本研究还探索了次级代谢的多方面变化，揭示了植物对NPs暴露响应下次生代谢物的合成与调控。在评估NPOs对植物生命的影响时，我们审视了其对植物生长、发育以及环境交互的潜在影响。本综述揭示的复杂关系强调了全面理解植物-NPs动态的重要性。随着NPs在生态系统中的普及，本研究为制定可持续的环境管理策略提供了基础，并突显了进一步研究的必要性，以应对NPs对植物生命发展及环境交互的广泛影响。

translated_title: SEN-GENOME项目
affiliations: Department of Integrative Genomics and Epidemiology, School of Graduate Studies, Meharry Medical College, Nashville, TN, USA. Electronic address: amadou.gaye@mmc.edu.; Division of Human Genetics, Faculty of Medicine, Pharmacy and Odontology, University Cheikh Anta Diop, Dakar, Senegal.; Service of Biological Hematology & Oncology-Hematology, Faculty of Medicine, Pharmacy and Odontology Stomatology, University Cheikh Anta Diop, Dakar, Senegal.; Laboratory of Prehistory and Cultural Heritage, Department of History, Faculty of Arts and Humanities, University Cheikh Anta Diop, Dakar, Senegal.; Senegalese National Academy of Science and Technology, Dakar, Senegal.; Division of Human Genetics, Faculty of Medicine, Pharmacy and Odontology, University Cheikh Anta Diop, Dakar, Senegal. Electronic address: rokhaya9.ndiaye@ucad.edu.sn.
title: Toward building a comprehensive human pan-genome: The SEN-GENOME project.
authors: Gaye Amadou; Sene Andrea Regina G; Gadji Macoura; Deme Alioune; Cisse Aynina; Ndiaye Rokhaya
keywords: (Auto-generated) 人类泛基因组; 非洲基因组; 基因组多样性; 社区驱动研究; 数据本地化; 能力建设; 基因组医学; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
abstract: The human reference genome (GRCh38), primarily sourced from individuals of European descent, falls short in capturing the vast genetic diversity across global populations. Efforts to diversify the reference genome face challenges in accessibility and representation, exacerbating the scarcity of African genomic data crucial for studying diseases prevalent in these populations. Sherman et al. proposed constructing reference genomes tailored to distinct human sub-populations. Their African Pan-Genome initiative highlighted substantial genetic variation missing from the GRCh38 human reference genome, emphasizing the necessity for population-specific genomes. In response, local initiatives like the Senegalese Genome project (SEN-GENOME) have emerged to document the genomes of historically overlooked populations. SEN-GENOME embodies community-driven decentralized research. With meticulous recruitment criteria and ethical practices, it aims to sequence 1,000 genomes from 31 ethnolinguistic groups, in the fourteen administrative regions of Senegal, fostering local genomic research tailored to the region. The key to SEN-GENOME's success is its commitment to local governance of data, capacity building, and integration with broader pan-genome projects in Africa. Despite the complexities of data harmonization and sharing, our collaborative efforts are aligned with common goals, ensuring steady progress toward a comprehensive human pan-genome. We invite and welcome collaboration with other research entities to achieve this shared vision. In summary, local initiatives such as SEN-GENOME are pivotal in bridging genomic disparities, offering pathways to equitable and inclusive genomic research. Collaborative endeavors guided by a collective vision for human health will propel us toward a more encompassing understanding of the human genome and better health through genomic medicine.
translated_keywords: 人类泛基因组; 非洲基因组; 基因组多样性; 社区驱动研究; 数据本地化; 能力建设; 基因组医学; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract:
人类参考基因组（GRCh38）主要来源于欧洲血统的个体，未能充分反映全球人群的巨大遗传多样性。在努力使参考基因组多样化的过程中，面临可及性和代表性方面的挑战，这进一步加剧了对非洲基因组数据的匮乏问题，而这些数据对于研究在这些人群中流行的疾病至关重要。Sherman等人提议构建针对不同人种亚群的参考基因组。他们的非洲泛基因组计划揭示了GRCh38人类参考基因组中大量缺失的遗传变异，强调了群体特异性基因组的必要性。作为回应，像塞内加尔基因组项目（SEN-GENOME）这样的本地倡议应运而生，旨在记录历史上被忽视的人群的基因组信息。

SEN-GENOME体现了社区驱动的去中心化研究。通过严格的招募标准和伦理实践，该项目旨在对塞内加尔14个行政区内的31个民族语言群体的1000个基因组进行测序，推动适合该地区的本地基因组研究。SEN-GENOME成功的关键在于其对数据本地治理、能力建设以及与非洲更广泛的泛基因组项目的整合的承诺。尽管数据标准化和共享存在复杂性，但我们的合作努力目标一致，确保朝着全面的人类泛基因组稳步迈进。我们欢迎与其他研究机构的合作，以实现这一共同愿景。

总之，像SEN-GENOME这样的本地倡议在弥合基因组差异方面发挥着关键作用，为实现公平包容的基因组研究提供了途径。由集体健康愿景引导的合作努力将推动我们对人类基因组有更全面的理解，并通过基因组医学改善健康状况。

translated_title: 长链非编码RNA（lncRNAs）与表观遗传调控植物对生物胁迫的适应性。
affiliations: Department of Plant Molecular Biology, University of Delhi South Campus, Benito Juarez Road, Dhaula Kuan, New Delhi, 110021, India; Department of Botany, Hansraj College, University of Delhi, Delhi, 110007, India.; Molecular Biology Research Lab, Department of Zoology, Deshbandhu College, University of Delhi, Kalkaji, New Delhi, 110019, India.; Department of Plant Molecular Biology, University of Delhi South Campus, Benito Juarez Road, Dhaula Kuan, New Delhi, 110021, India; Department of Botany, Hansraj College, University of Delhi, Delhi, 110007, India; Delhi School of Climate Change and Sustainability, Institution of Eminence, Maharishi Karnad Bhawan, University of Delhi, Delhi, India. Electronic address: archanasingh@pmb.du.ac.in.
title: lncRNAs and epigenetics regulate plant's resilience against biotic stresses.
authors: Yajnik Kalpesh Nath; Singh Indrakant K; Singh Archana
keywords: Plant immunity; Stress memory; lncRNAs; Histone modifications; Biotic stress; Transgenerational inheritance; Stress priming
abstract: With the advent of transcriptomic techniques involving single-stranded RNA sequencing and chromatin isolation by RNA purification-based sequencing, transcriptomic studies of coding and non-coding RNAs have been executed efficiently. These studies acknowledged the role of non-coding RNAs in modulating gene expression. Long non-coding RNAs (lncRNAs) are a kind of non-coding RNAs having lengths of >200 nucleotides, playing numerous roles in plant developmental processes such as photomorphogenesis, epigenetic changes, reproductive tissue development, and in regulating biotic and abiotic stresses. Epigenetic changes further control gene expression by changing their state to "ON-OFF" and also regulate stress memory and its transgenerational inheritance. With well-established regulatory mechanisms, they act as guides, scaffolds, signals, and decoys to modulate gene expression. They act as a major operator of post-transcriptional modifications such as histone and epigenetic modifications, and DNA methylations. The review elaborates on the roles of lncRNAs in plant immunity and also discusses how epigenetic markers alter gene expression in response to pest/pathogen attack and influences chromatin-associated stress memory as well as transgenerational inheritance of epigenetic imprints in plants. The review further summarizes some research studies on how histone modifications and DNA methylations resist pathogenic and pest attacks by activating defense-related genes.
translated_keywords: 植物免疫；胁迫记忆；长链非编码RNA；组蛋白修饰；生物胁迫；跨代表观遗传；预处理（或胁迫预适应）
translated_abstract: 随着涉及单链RNA测序和基于RNA纯化技术的染色质隔离测序等转录组学技术的发展，编码及非编码RNA的转录组研究得以高效开展。这些研究表明，非编码RNA在调控基因表达方面发挥着重要作用。长链非编码RNA（lncRNAs）是一种长度超过200个核苷酸的非编码RNA，在植物发育过程中扮演多种角色，如光形态建成、表观遗传变化、生殖组织发育以及对生物和非生物胁迫的调控。表观遗传变化通过将基因状态从“关闭”切换到“开启”进一步控制基因表达，并调节胁迫记忆及其跨代遗传。凭借完善的调控机制，lncRNAs作为引导者、支架、信号或诱饵来调控基因表达。它们是组蛋白修饰、表观遗传修饰以及DNA甲基化等转录后修饰的主要调控因子。本文综述了lncRNAs在植物免疫中的作用，并讨论了表观遗传标记如何响应害虫/病原体攻击而改变基因表达，以及如何影响染色质相关的胁迫记忆和植物中表观遗传印记的跨代遗传。此外，本文还总结了一些关于组蛋白修饰和DNA甲基化通过激活防御相关基因来抵抗病原体和害虫攻击的研究成果。

translated_title: 金属和类金属胁迫下植物光合作用过程的调控及与光合作用相关性状的操作策略。
affiliations: Photosynthesis Laboratory, Department of Horticulture, College of Agricultural Technology (Aburaihan), University of Tehran, Tehran, Iran; Controlled Environment Agriculture Center, College of Agricultural and Natural Sciences, University of Tehran, Iran.; Agricultural and Ecological Research Unit, Indian Statistical Institute, Kolkata 700108, India.; Department of Horticultural Science, Faculty of Agriculture, Shahid Chamran University of Ahvaz, Ahvaz, Iran.; Plant Physiology and Biochemistry Division, Department of Botany, University of Calicut, C.U. Campus P.O, Kerala 673635, India.; Department of Botany, MES KEVEEYAM College, Valanchery, Malappuram, Kerala, India.; Department of Botany, Government College for Women Gandhi Nagar, Jammu 180004, Jammu and Kashmir, India.; Photosynthesis Laboratory, Department of Horticulture, College of Agricultural Technology (Aburaihan), University of Tehran, Tehran, Iran. Electronic address: aliniaeifard@ut.ac.ir.; Department of Agronomy, Faculty of Agriculture, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Dhaka 1207, Bangladesh; Kyung Hee University, 26 Kyungheedae-ro, Dongdaemun-gu, Seoul 02447, Republic of Korea. Electronic address: mhzsauag@yahoo.com.
title: Modulation of plant photosynthetic processes during metal and metalloid stress, and strategies for manipulating photosynthesis-related traits.
authors: Shomali Aida; Das Susmita; Sarraf Mohammad; Johnson Riya; Janeeshma Edappayil; Kumar Vinod; Aliniaeifard Sasan; Puthur Jos T; Hasanuzzaman Mirza
keywords: Gas exchange; Heavy metals; Electron transfer; Photostasis; Rubisco; Phytohormones; Redox balance
abstract: Metals constitute vital elements for plant metabolism and survival, acting as essential co-factors in cellular processes which are indispensable for plant growth and survival. Excess or deficient provision of metal/metalloids puts plant's life and survival at risk, thus considered a potent stress for plants. Chloroplasts as an organelle with a high metal demand form a pivotal site within the metal homeostasis network. Therefore, the metal-mediated electron transport chain (ETC) in chloroplasts is a primary target site of metal/metalloid-induced stresses. Both excess and deficient availability of metal/metalloids threatens plant's photosynthesis in several ways. Energy demands from the photosynthetic carbon reactions should be in balance with energy output of ETC. Malfunctioning of ETC components as a result of metal/metalloid stress initiates photoinhiition. A feedback inhibition from carbon fixation process also impedes the ETC. Metal stress impairs antioxidant enzyme activity, pigment biosynthesis, and stomatal function. However, genetic manipulations, nutrient management, keeping photostasis, and application of phytohormones are among strategies for coping with metal stress. Consequently, a comprehensive understanding of the underlying mechanisms of metal/metalloid stress, as well as the exploration of potential strategies to mitigate its impact on plants are imperative. This review offers a mechanistic insight into the disruption of photosynthesis regulation by metal/metalloids and highlights adaptive approaches to ameliorate their effects on plants. Focus was made on photostasis, nutrient interactions, phytohormones, and genetic interventions for mitigating metal/metalloid stresses.
translated_keywords: 气体交换；重金属；电子传递；光适应；核酮糖-1,5-二磷酸羧化酶/加氧酶；植物激素；氧化还原平衡
translated_abstract: 光合作用碳反应的能量需求应与ETC的能量输出保持平衡，而金属/类金属胁迫导致的ETC组分功能障碍会引发光抑制，同时碳固定过程的反馈抑制也会阻碍ETC。金属胁迫会损害抗氧化酶活性、色素生物合成以及气孔功能。然而，基因操作、营养管理、维持光稳态以及植物激素的应用是应对金属胁迫的策略之一。因此，全面理解金属/类金属胁迫的潜在机制及其对植物影响的缓解策略至关重要。本文综述了金属/类金属对光合作用调控干扰的机制，并强调了适应性方法以减轻其对植物的影响。重点讨论了光稳态、营养互作、植物激素以及遗传干预在缓解金属/类金属胁迫中的作用。

translated_title: 重新审视植物角质层生物物理学
affiliations: Departamento de Biología Molecular y Bioquímica, Instituto de Hortofruticultura Subtropical y Mediterránea "La Mayora", Universidad de Málaga-Consejo Superior de Investigaciones Científicas, Universidad de Málaga, E-29010, Málaga, Spain.; Instituto de Ciencia de Materiales de Sevilla, Centro Mixto Consejo Superior de Investigaciones Científicas-Universidad de Sevilla, E-41092, Seville, Spain.; Departamento de Mejora Genética y Biotecnología, Estación Experimental La Mayora, Instituto de Hortofruticultura Subtropical y Mediterránea "La Mayora", Universidad de Málaga-Consejo Superior de Investigaciones Científicas, E-29750, Málaga, Spain.
title: Revisiting plant cuticle biophysics.
authors: Heredia Antonio; Benítez José J; González Moreno Ana; Domínguez Eva
keywords: thermal properties; plant photoprotection; plant cuticle; biomechanics; biophysics; phenolics; waxes; plant hydration
abstract: The plant cuticle is located at the interface of the plant with the environment, thus acting as a protective barrier against biotic and abiotic external stress factors, and regulating water loss. Additionally, it modulates mechanical stresses derived from internal tissues and also from the environment. Recent advances in the understanding of the hydric, mechanical, thermal, and, to a lower extent, optical and electric properties of the cuticle, as well as their phenomenological connections and relationships are reviewed. An equilibrium based on the interaction among the different biophysical properties is essential to ensure plant growth and development. The notable variability reported in cuticle geometry, surface topography, and microchemistry affects the analysis of some biophysical properties of the cuticle. This review aimed to provide an updated view of the plant cuticle, understood as a modification of the cell wall, in order to establish the state-of-the-art biophysics of the plant cuticle, and to serve as an inspiration for future research in the field.
translated_keywords: 热性质；植物光保护；植物角质层；生物力学；生物物理；酚类物质；蜡质；植物含水量
translated_abstract: 植物表皮位于植物与环境的交界面，起到保护屏障的作用，可抵御生物和非生物的外部胁迫因子，并调节水分流失。此外，它还调节来自内部组织以及环境的机械应力。本文综述了近年来对表皮含水量、机械性能、热学特性及其与光学和电学特性的现象学关联和关系的理解进展。基于不同生物物理属性相互作用的平衡对于确保植物生长发育至关重要。表皮几何结构、表面形貌和微化学性质的显著变异性影响了表皮某些生物物理特性的分析。本综述旨在提供植物表皮（被视为细胞壁的一种修饰）的最新视角，以建立植物表皮的现代生物物理学，并为该领域的未来研究提供灵感。

translated_title: 通过过渡金属分配对抗植物病害
affiliations: Centro de Biotecnología y Genómica de Plantas (UPM-INIA/CSIC), Universidad Politécnica de Madrid-Instituto Nacional de Investigación y Tecnología Agraria y Alimentaria (INIA)/Consejo Superior de Investigaciones Científicas (CSIC), 28223, Pozuelo de Alarcón (Madrid), Spain.; Departamento de Biotecnología-Biología Vegetal, Escuela Técnica Superior de Ingeniería Agronómica, Alimentaria y de Biosistemas, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid, 28040, Madrid, Spain.
title: Combating plant diseases through transition metal allocation.
authors: De Aishee; Hoang Cuong V; Escudero Viviana; Armas Alejandro M; Echavarri-Erasun Carlos; González-Guerrero Manuel; Jordá Lucía
keywords: nutritional immunity; metal transport; innate immunity; plant defense; metal homeostasis
abstract: Understanding how plants fend-off invading microbes is essential for food security and the economy of large parts of the world. Consequently, a sustained and dedicated effort has been directed at unveiling how plants protect themselves from invading microbes. Major defense hormone signaling pathways have been characterized, the identity of many immune response-triggering molecules as well as many of their receptors have been determined, and the mechanisms of pathogen-host arms race are being studied. In recent years, evidence for a new layer of plant innate immunity involving transition metals has been brought forward. This would link plant metal nutrition with plant immune responses and open up possible new strategies for pathogen control involving metal fertilizers instead of pesticides. In this review, we outline our current understanding of metal-mediated plant immune response and indicate the future avenues of exploration of this topic.
translated_keywords: 营养免疫；金属转运；先天免疫；植物防御；金属稳态
translated_abstract: 了解植物如何抵御入侵微生物对于全球许多地区的粮食安全和经济至关重要。因此，人们持续且专注地致力于揭示植物如何保护自己免受微生物侵害。已经阐明了主要防御激素信号通路，确定了许多触发免疫反应分子及其受体的身份，并正在研究病原体-宿主之间的军备竞赛机制。近年来，有证据表明植物先天免疫中存在涉及过渡金属的新一层防御机制。这将植物金属营养与植物免疫反应联系起来，并为通过金属肥料而非杀虫剂来控制病原体开辟了可能的新策略。本文综述了我们目前对金属介导的植物免疫反应的理解，并指出了未来研究该主题的方向。

translated_title: 泛基因组揭示参与猪性状的基因含量变异和结构变异
affiliations: State Key Laboratory of Animal Biotech Breeding; College of Animal Science and Technology, China Agricultural University, Beijing 100193, China.; National Animal Husbandry Service, Beijing 100125, China.
title: Pangenome Reveals Gene Content Variations and Structural Variants Contributing to Pig Characteristics.
authors: Du Heng; Zhuo Yue; Lu Shiyu; Li Wanying; Zhou Lei; Sun Feizhou; Liu Gang; Liu Jian-Feng
keywords: Pangenome; Heritability estimation; Genome-wide association study; Selection; Pig
abstract: Pigs are among the most essential sources of high-quality protein in human diets. Structural variants (SVs) are a major source of genetic variants associated with diverse traits and evolutionary events. However, the current linear reference genome of pigs limits the presentation of position information for SVs. In this study, we generated a pangenome of pigs and a genome variation map of 599 deep-sequenced genomes across Eurasia. Moreover, a section-wide gene repertoire was constructed, which indicated that core genes were more evolutionarily conserved than variable genes. Subsequently, we identified 546,137 SVs, their enrichment regions, and relationships with genomic features and found significant divergence across Eurasian pigs. More importantly, the pangenome-detected SVs could complement heritability estimates and genome-wide association studies based only on single nucleotide polymorphisms. Among the SVs shaped by selection, we identified an insertion in the promoter region of the TBX19 gene, which may be related to the development, growth, and timidity traits of Asian pigs and may affect the gene expression. Our constructed pig pangenome and the identified SVs provide rich resources for future functional genomic research on pigs.
translated_keywords: 泛基因组；遗传力估计；全基因组关联研究；选择；猪
translated_abstract: 猪是人类饮食中高质量蛋白质的主要来源之一。结构变异（SVs）是与多种性状和进化事件相关的遗传变异的重要来源。然而，目前猪的线性参考基因组限制了对SVs位置信息的展示。本研究生成了猪的泛基因组以及来自欧亚大陆599个深度测序基因组的基因组变异图谱。此外，构建了一个全基因组范围内的基因集目录，表明核心基因比可变基因更为保守。随后，我们鉴定出546,137个SV及其富集区域，并分析了其与基因组特征的关系，发现欧亚猪之间存在显著分化。更重要的是，通过泛基因组检测到的SV可以补充仅基于单核苷酸多态性（SNPs）的遗传力估算和全基因组关联研究。在受到选择的SV中，我们鉴定出TBX19基因启动子区域的一个插入，该插入可能与亚洲猪的发育、生长和胆小等性状相关，并可能影响基因表达。我们构建的猪泛基因组及鉴定的SV为未来猪的功能基因组学研究提供了丰富的资源。

translated_title: 解析植物-内生菌相互作用及其在缓解胁迫中的多面角色
affiliations: Section of Environmental Botany and Plant Pathology, Faculty of Life Sciences, Aligarh Muslim University, Aligarh, 202002, India. Electronic address: waqarsonia3333@gmail.com.; Section of Environmental Botany and Plant Pathology, Faculty of Life Sciences, Aligarh Muslim University, Aligarh, 202002, India. Electronic address: adil786ameen@gmail.com.; Section of Environmental Botany and Plant Pathology, Faculty of Life Sciences, Aligarh Muslim University, Aligarh, 202002, India. Electronic address: khanab2009@gmail.com.
title: Endophytic fungi: Unravelling plant-endophyte interaction and the multifaceted role of fungal endophytes in stress amelioration.
authors: Waqar Sonia; Bhat Adil Ameen; Khan Abrar Ahmad
keywords: Secondary metabolites; Phytopathogens; Endophytic fungi; Biotic stress; Defence mechanism
abstract: Endophytic fungi colonize interior plant tissue and mostly form mutualistic associations with their host plant. Plant-endophyte interaction is a complex mechanism and is currently a focus of research to understand the underlying mechanism of endophyte asymptomatic colonization, the process of evading plant immune response, modulation of gene expression, and establishment of a balanced mutualistic relationship. Fungal endophytes rely on plant hosts for nutrients, shelter, and transmission and improve the host plant's tolerance against biotic stresses, including -herbivores, nematodes, bacterial, fungal, viral, nematode, and other phytopathogens. Endophytic fungi have been reported to improve plant health by reducing and eradicating the harmful effect of phytopathogens through competition for space or nutrients, mycoparasitism, and through direct or indirect defense systems by producing secondary metabolites as well as by induced systemic resistance (ISR). Additionally, for efficient crop improvement, practicing them would be a fruitful step for a sustainable approach. This review article summarizes the current research progress in plant-endophyte interaction and the fungal endophyte mechanism to overcome host defense responses, their subsequent colonization, and the establishment of a balanced mutualistic interaction with host plants. This review also highlighted the potential of fungal endophytes in the amelioration of biotic stress. We have also discussed the relevance of various bioactive compounds possessing antimicrobial potential against a variety of agricultural pathogens. Furthermore, endophyte-mediated ISR is also emphasized.
translated_keywords: 次生代谢物；植物病原菌；内生真菌；生物胁迫；防御机制
translated_abstract: 内生真菌定殖于植物内部组织，并通常与其宿主植物形成互利共生关系。植物-内生菌相互作用是一种复杂的机制，目前是研究的重点，旨在理解内生菌无症状定殖、规避植物免疫反应、调控基因表达以及建立平衡互利关系的潜在机制。内生真菌依赖植物宿主获取营养、庇护和传播，并能提高宿主植物对生物胁迫（如食草动物、线虫、细菌、真菌、病毒及其他植物病原体）的耐受性。研究表明，内生真菌通过竞争空间或养分、捕食寄生、产生次生代谢物直接或间接防御系统以及诱导系统抗性（ISR），减轻甚至消除植物病原体的有害影响。此外，合理利用内生真菌将是实现作物高效改良和可持续农业的重要步骤。本文综述了植物-内生菌相互作用及内生真菌克服宿主防御反应、随后定殖并建立平衡互利关系的研究进展。同时，本文还强调了内生真菌在缓解生物胁迫方面的潜力，并讨论了具有抗菌活性的多种生物活性化合物对农业病原体的抑制作用。此外，内生菌介导的ISR也得到了重点阐述。

translated_title: 光合作用产生的活性氧（ROS）与逆行信号通路
affiliations: Shanghai Center for Plant Stress Biology, CAS Center for Excellence in Molecular Plant Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences, 200032, Shanghai, China.; University of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, 100049, Beijing, China.
title: Photosynthetic ROS and retrograde signaling pathways.
authors: Lee Keun Pyo; Kim Chanhong
keywords: oxidative modification; PSII repair; chloroplast; ROS; singlet oxygen; retrograde signaling; lipid peroxidation
abstract: Sessile plants harness mitochondria and chloroplasts to sense and adapt to diverse environmental stimuli. These complex processes involve the generation of pivotal signaling molecules, including reactive oxygen species (ROS), phytohormones, volatiles, and diverse metabolites. Furthermore, the specific modulation of chloroplast proteins, through activation or deactivation, significantly enhances the plant's capacity to engage with its dynamic surroundings. While existing reviews have extensively covered the role of plastidial retrograde modules in developmental and light signaling, our focus lies in investigating how chloroplasts leverage photosynthetic ROS to navigate environmental fluctuations and counteract oxidative stress, thereby sustaining primary metabolism. Unraveling the nuanced interplay between photosynthetic ROS and plant stress responses holds promise for uncovering new insights that could reinforce stress resistance and optimize net photosynthesis rates. This exploration aspires to pave the way for innovative strategies to enhance plant resilience and agricultural productivity amidst changing environmental conditions.
translated_keywords: 氧化修饰；PSII修复；叶绿体；活性氧（ROS）；单线态氧；逆行信号；脂质过氧化
translated_abstract: 固着植物通过线粒体和叶绿体感知并适应多样的环境刺激。这些复杂的过程涉及关键信号分子的产生，包括活性氧（ROS）、植物激素、挥发物以及多种代谢产物。此外，通过激活或失活对叶绿体蛋白进行特异性调控，显著增强了植物与动态环境相互作用的能力。尽管已有综述广泛探讨了质体逆行模块在发育和光信号中的作用，但我们的研究重点在于探究叶绿体如何利用光合ROS来应对环境波动并对抗氧化胁迫，从而维持初级代谢。揭示光合ROS与植物胁迫响应之间的微妙相互作用，有望带来新的见解，以增强抗逆性和优化净光合速率。本研究旨在为在不断变化的环境条件下提高植物韧性和农业生产力提供创新策略铺平道路。

translated_title: 植物生物学家能修理恒温器吗？
affiliations: Plant Molecular and Cellular Biology Laboratory, The Salk Institute for Biological Studies, La Jolla, CA, 92037-100210, USA.
title: Can a plant biologist fix a thermostat?
authors: Michael Todd P
keywords: artificial intelligence (AI); single‐cell sequencing (scRNA‐seq); CRISPR‐CAS9; pangenome; plant artificial chromosomes (PACs); next‐generation sequencing (NGS); large language models (LLMs); telomere‐to‐telomere (T2T)
abstract: The shift to reductionist biology at the dawn of the genome era yielded a 'parts list' of plant genes and a nascent understanding of complex biological processes. Today, with the genomics era in full swing, advances in high-definition genomics enabled precise temporal and spatial analyses of biological systems down to the single-cell level. These insights, coupled with artificial intelligence-driven in silico design, are propelling the development of the first synthetic plants. By integrating reductionist and systems approaches, researchers are not only reimagining plants as sources of food, fiber, and fuel but also as 'environmental thermostats' capable of mitigating the impacts of a changing climate.
translated_keywords: 人工智能（AI）；单细胞测序（scRNA-seq）；CRISPR-CAS9；泛基因组；植物人工染色体（PACs）；下一代测序（NGS）；大型语言模型（LLMs）；端粒到端粒（T2T）
translated_abstract: 在基因组学时代之初，生物学研究转向还原论，生成了植物基因的“部件清单”，并初步揭示了复杂生物过程的奥秘。如今，随着基因组学时代的全面展开，高精度基因组学的进步使得对生物系统的时间和空间分析能够精确到单细胞水平。这些见解结合人工智能驱动的计算机模拟设计，正在推动首例合成植物的发展。通过整合还原论与系统论的方法，研究人员不仅重新构想了植物作为食物、纤维和燃料来源的价值，还将其视为能够缓解气候变化影响的“环境恒温器”。

translated_title: 植物整体生物体多样性的一个新层次。
affiliations: Institute for Sustainable Plant Protection-Bari, National Research Council of Italy, 70126, Bari, Italy.; Institute for Sustainable Plant Protection-URT Brescia, National Research Council of Italy, 25123, Brescia, Italy.; Department of Plant Protection, School of Agriculture, The University of Jordan, Amman, 11942, Jordan.
title: Viroid and viroid-like elements in plants and plant-associated microbiota: a new layer of biodiversity for plant holobionts.
authors: Navarro Beatriz; Turina Massimo
keywords: ribozymes; plant; viroid; ambiviruses; mitoviruses; mycoviroid; ribozycirculome; RNA world
abstract: The functional relevance of plant-associated microorganisms is theoretically framed within the holobiont concept. The role of viruses in plant holobionts is being recognized both for their direct effects when hosted in plants (cryptic plant viruses) and for their indirect effects when infecting microorganisms associated with plants in tripartite interactions (e.g. mycoviruses and bacteriophages). We argue that viroids, the smallest infectious agents typically infecting only plant hosts, must also be included in plant holobiont studies. The same applies to the recently discovered large number of viroid-like elements infecting hosts of other life kingdoms that are closely associated with plants. Here we also describe in depth the diversity of such viroid-like elements and their initial functional characterization in plant-associated fungi.
translated_keywords: 核酶；植物；拟病毒；类病毒；线粒体小RNA病毒；真菌拟病毒；核酶循环组；RNA世界
translated_abstract: 植物相关微生物的功能相关性在整体生物体（holobiont）概念的理论框架内得到了阐述。病毒在植物整体生物体中的作用正被人们所认识，这既包括其直接感染植物时的作用（隐秘植物病毒），也包括其通过三向互作间接感染与植物相关的微生物时的作用（如真菌病毒和噬菌体）。我们认为，类病毒——这些通常仅感染植物宿主的最小传染性因子——也必须纳入植物整体生物体的研究范畴。同样地，最近发现的大量感染其他生命王国宿主且与植物密切相关的类病毒元件也应如此。本文还深入描述了这些类病毒元件的多样性及其在与植物相关的真菌中的初步功能特征。

translated_title: AnnoView支持对微生物基因组邻域进行大规模分析、比较和可视化。
affiliations: Department of Biology and Waterloo Centre for Microbial Research, University of Waterloo, 200 University Avenue West, Waterloo, ON N2L 3G1, Canada.; Australian Centre for Ecogenomics, School of Chemistry and Molecular Biosciences, University of Queensland, St Lucia, QLD 4072, Brisbane, Australia.; Department of Biology, Wilfrid Laurier University, 75 University Avenue West, Waterloo, ON, Canada.
title: AnnoView enables large-scale analysis, comparison, and visualization of microbial gene neighborhoods.
authors: Wei Xin; Tan Huagang; Lobb Briallen; Zhen William; Wu Zijing; Parks Donovan H; Neufeld Josh D; Moreno-Hagelsieb Gabriel; Doxey Andrew C
keywords: gene neighborhoods; bioinformatics; genomic context; genome visualization; microbial genomics; functional annotation
abstract: The analysis and comparison of gene neighborhoods is a powerful approach for exploring microbial genome structure, function, and evolution. Although numerous tools exist for genome visualization and comparison, genome exploration across large genomic databases or user-generated datasets remains a challenge. Here, we introduce AnnoView, a web server designed for interactive exploration of gene neighborhoods across the bacterial and archaeal tree of life. Our server offers users the ability to identify, compare, and visualize gene neighborhoods of interest from 30 238 bacterial genomes and 1672 archaeal genomes, through integration with the comprehensive Genome Taxonomy Database and AnnoTree databases. Identified gene neighborhoods can be visualized using pre-computed functional annotations from different sources such as KEGG, Pfam and TIGRFAM, or clustered based on similarity. Alternatively, users can upload and explore their own custom genomic datasets in GBK, GFF or CSV format, or use AnnoView as a genome browser for relatively small genomes (e.g. viruses and plasmids). Ultimately, we anticipate that AnnoView will catalyze biological discovery by enabling user-friendly search, comparison, and visualization of genomic data. AnnoView is available at http://annoview.uwaterloo.ca.
