translated_title: 基因组与表观基因组视角
affiliations: Department of Biological Sciences, The University of Alabama, Tuscaloosa, AL, 35487, USA.; Department of Forestry and Environmental Science, Shahjalal University of Science and Technology, Sylhet, 3114, Bangladesh.; Department of Horticulture, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI, 48823, USA.; Genetics and Genome Sciences Program, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI, 48823, USA.; Department of Soil and Crop Sciences, Colorado State University, Fort Collins, CO, 80523, USA.
title: Patterns, mechanisms, and consequences of homoeologous exchange in allopolyploid angiosperms: a genomic and epigenomic perspective.
authors: Deb Sontosh K; Edger Patrick P; Pires J Chris; McKain Michael R
keywords: epigenomic; allopolyploidy; evolution; recombination; genomic; phenotypic novelty; homoeologous exchange
abstract: Allopolyploids result from hybridization between different evolutionary lineages coupled with genome doubling. Homoeologous chromosomes (chromosomes with common shared ancestry) may undergo recombination immediately after allopolyploid formation and continue over successive generations. The outcome of this meiotic pairing behavior is dynamic and complex. Homoeologous exchanges (HEs) may lead to the formation of unbalanced gametes, reduced fertility, and selective disadvantage. By contrast, HEs could act as sources of novel evolutionary substrates, shifting the relative dosage of parental gene copies, generating novel phenotypic diversity, and helping the establishment of neo-allopolyploids. However, HE patterns vary among lineages, across generations, and even within individual genomes and chromosomes. The causes and consequences of this variation are not fully understood, though interest in this evolutionary phenomenon has increased in the last decade. Recent technological advances show promise in uncovering the mechanistic basis of HEs. Here, we describe recent observations of the common patterns among allopolyploid angiosperm lineages, underlying genomic and epigenomic features, and consequences of HEs. We identify critical research gaps and discuss future directions with far-reaching implications in understanding allopolyploid evolution and applying them to the development of important phenotypic traits of polyploid crops.
translated_keywords: 表观基因组学；异源多倍体化；进化；重组；基因组；表型新颖性；同源交换
translated_abstract: 异源多倍体是由不同进化谱系间的杂交与基因组加倍共同作用产生的。同源染色体（具有共同祖先的染色体）在异源多倍体形成后可能会立即发生重组，并在随后的世代中持续进行。这种减数分裂配对行为的结果是动态且复杂的。同源交换（HEs）可能导致不平衡的配子形成、生育力下降以及选择劣势。然而，从另一方面来看，同源交换可以作为新的进化基质的来源，改变亲本基因拷贝的相对剂量，产生新的表型多样性，并有助于新异源多倍体的建立。然而，同源交换模式在不同谱系间、跨世代甚至在单个基因组和染色体内部都存在差异。尽管过去十年对该进化现象的兴趣有所增加，但其变异的原因和后果尚未完全明了。近期技术的进步显示出揭示同源交换机制基础的潜力。本文描述了异源多倍体被子植物谱系中的常见模式、潜在的基因组和表观基因组特征以及同源交换的后果。我们还指出了关键的研究空白，并讨论了未来研究方向，这些方向对深入理解异源多倍体进化及其在多倍体作物重要表型性状开发中的应用具有深远意义。

translated_title: 人类基因组研究的行动呼吁
affiliations: Genomics Institute, University of California, Santa Cruz, California, USA; email: anmmccar@ucsc.edu.; Department of Science Policy and Internationalisation, Leibniz Institute DSMZ-German Collection of Microorganisms and Cell Cultures, Braunschweig, Germany; email: amber.h.scholz@dsmz.de.; Institute of Clinical Molecular Biology, Kiel University, Kiel, Germany; email: m.groussin@ikmb.uni-kiel.de.; School of Law, University of KwaZulu-Natal, Durban, South Africa.; Institute for Biomedicine, Eurac Research, Bolzano, Italy; email: ciara.staunton@eurac.edu.
title: Benefit-Sharing by Design: A Call to Action for Human Genomics Research.
authors: Mc Cartney Ann M; Scholz Amber Hartman; Groussin Mathieu; Staunton Ciara
keywords: genomics; Nagoya Protocol; biodiversity; genetic resources; Convention on Biological Diversity; human; access and benefit-sharing; science policy; equity
abstract: The ethical standards for the responsible conduct of human research have come a long way; however, concerns surrounding equity remain in human genetics and genomics research. Addressing these concerns will help society realize the full potential of human genomics research. One outstanding concern is the fair and equitable sharing of benefits from research on human participants. Several international bodies have recognized that benefit-sharing can be an effective tool for ethical research conduct, but international laws, including the Convention on Biological Diversity and its Nagoya Protocol on Access and Benefit-Sharing, explicitly exclude human genetic and genomic resources. These agreements face significant challenges that must be considered and anticipated if similar principles are applied in human genomics research. We propose that benefit-sharing from human genomics research can be a bottom-up effort and embedded into the existing research process. We propose the development of a "benefit-sharing by design" framework to address concerns of fairness and equity in the use of human genomic resources and samples and to learn from the aspirations and decade of implementation of the Nagoya Protocol.
journal: Annual review of genomics and human genetics
translated_keywords: 基因组学；名古屋议定书；生物多样性；遗传资源；生物多样性公约；人类；获取和惠益分享；科技政策；公平性
journal_full_name: Annual Review of Genomics and Human Genetics
translated_abstract: 人类研究负责任行为的伦理标准已经取得了长足的进步，然而，在人类遗传学和基因组学研究中公平性方面的担忧依然存在。解决这些担忧将有助于社会充分实现人类基因组研究的潜力。一个突出的问题是如何公平合理地分享涉及人类参与者的研究成果所带来的利益。多个国际机构已认识到，利益共享可以成为一种有效的伦理研究行为工具，但《生物多样性公约》及其《名古屋议定书》等国际法律明确排除了人类遗传和基因组资源的利益共享。如果在人类基因组学研究中应用类似的原则，这些协议面临的重大挑战必须被考虑并预见。我们提出，人类基因组研究中的利益共享可以是一种自下而上的努力，并嵌入到现有的研究过程中。我们建议制定一个“设计中的利益共享”框架，以解决在使用人类基因组资源和样本时公平性和公正性问题，并从《名古屋议定书》的期望和十年实施经验中吸取教训。

translated_title: 重新编程植物促生根际细菌的功能表达。
affiliations: Jiangsu Provincial Key Lab of Solid Organic Waste Utilization, Jiangsu Collaborative Innovation Center of Solid Organic Wastes, Nanjing Agricultural University, Nanjing, 210095, China.; College of Agriculture, Henan University, Zhengzhou, 450046, China.; School of Biology and Food, Shangqiu Normal University, Shangqiu, 476000, China.; State Key Laboratory of Efficient Utilization of Arid and Semi-arid Arable Land in Northern China, Institute of Agricultural Resources and Regional Planning, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing, 100081, China.; Hebei Key Laboratory of Soil Ecology, Center for Agricultural Resources Research, Institute of Genetics and Developmental Biology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, 286 Huaizhong Road, Yuhua District, Shijiazhuang, 050021, China.
title: Listening to plant's Esperanto via root exudates: reprogramming the functional expression of plant growth-promoting rhizobacteria.
authors: Feng Haichao; Fu Ruixin; Luo Jiayu; Hou Xueqin; Gao Kun; Su Lv; Xu Yu; Miao Youzhi; Liu Yunpeng; Xu Zhihui; Zhang Nan; Shen Qirong; Xun Weibing; Zhang Ruifu
keywords: root exudates; reprogramming; recruitment; plant health; plant growth-promoting rhizobacterium (PGPR)
abstract: Rhizomicrobiome plays important roles in plant growth and health, contributing to the sustainable development of agriculture. Plants recruit and assemble the rhizomicrobiome to satisfy their functional requirements, which is widely recognized as the 'cry for help' theory, but the intrinsic mechanisms are still limited. In this study, we revealed a novel mechanism by which plants reprogram the functional expression of inhabited rhizobacteria, in addition to the de novo recruitment of soil microbes, to satisfy different functional requirements as plants grow. This might be an efficient and low-cost strategy and a substantial extension to the rhizomicrobiome recruitment theory. We found that the plant regulated the sequential expression of genes related to biocontrol and plant growth promotion in two well-studied rhizobacteria Bacillus velezensis SQR9 and Pseudomonas protegens CHA0 through root exudate succession across the plant developmental stages. Sixteen key chemicals in root exudates were identified to significantly regulate the rhizobacterial functional gene expression by high-throughput qPCR. This study not only deepens our understanding of the interaction between the plant-rhizosphere microbiome, but also provides a novel strategy to regulate and balance the different functional expression of the rhizomicrobiome to improve plant health and growth.
translated_keywords: 根系分泌物；重新编程；招募；植物健康；植物生长促进根际细菌（PGPR）
translated_abstract: 根际微生物组在植物生长和健康方面发挥着重要作用，对农业的可持续发展具有重要意义。植物通过招募和组装根际微生物组来满足其功能需求，这一过程被广泛认为是“求救信号”理论，但其内在机制仍存在局限性。本研究揭示了一种新的机制，即除了从头招募土壤微生物外，植物还能重新编程已定居根际细菌的功能表达，以满足植物不同生长阶段的功能需求。这可能是一种高效且低成本的策略，并对根际微生物组招募理论进行了重要扩展。我们发现，植物通过根系分泌物的动态变化，在植物发育的不同阶段，调控了两种研究较为深入的根际细菌——枯草芽孢杆菌SQR9和绿假单胞菌CHA0中与生物防治和植物促生相关的基因表达。通过高通量qPCR技术，鉴定了16种关键化学物质，这些物质显著调节了根际细菌的功能基因表达。本研究不仅深化了我们对植物-根际微生物组互作的理解，还提供了一种新的策略，用于调节和平衡根际微生物组的不同功能表达，从而改善植物健康和生长。

translated_title: 破译鱼类基因组开启中国重要性状研究与分子育种的新时代。
affiliations: State Key Laboratory of Mariculture Biobreeding and Sustainable Goods, Yellow Sea Fisheries Research Institute, Chinese Academy of Fishery Sciences, Qingdao, Shandong, 266071, China.; Laboratory for Marine Fisheries Science and Food Production Processes, Qingdao Marine Science and Technology Center, Qingdao, Shandong, 266237, China.; Key Laboratory of Aquatic Genomics, Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs, Beijing Key Laboratory of Fishery Biotechnology, Chinese Academy of Fishery Sciences, Beijing, 100041, China.; State Key Laboratory of Mariculture Biobreeding and Sustainable Goods, Yellow Sea Fisheries Research Institute, Chinese Academy of Fishery Sciences, Qingdao, Shandong, 266071, China. chensl@ysfri.ac.cn.; Laboratory for Marine Fisheries Science and Food Production Processes, Qingdao Marine Science and Technology Center, Qingdao, Shandong, 266237, China. chensl@ysfri.ac.cn.
title: Decoding the fish genome opens a new era in important trait research and molecular breeding in China.
authors: Zhou Qian; Wang Jialin; Li Jiongtang; Chen Zhangfan; Wang Na; Li Ming; Wang Lei; Si Yufeng; Lu Sheng; Cui Zhongkai; Liu Xuhui; Chen Songlin
keywords: genome editing; genomic breeding; genomic selection; fish genomics; economic traits
abstract: Aquaculture represents the fastest-growing global food production sector, as it has become an essential component of the global food supply. China has the world's largest aquaculture industry in terms of production volume. However, the sustainable development of fish culture is hindered by several concerns, including germplasm degradation and disease outbreaks. The practice of genomic breeding, which relies heavily on genome information and genotypephenotype relationships, has significant potential for increasing the efficiency of aquaculture production. In 2014, the completion of the genome sequencing and annotation of the Chinese tongue sole signified the beginning of the fish genomics era in China. Since then, domestic researchers have made dramatic progress in functional genomic studies. To date, the genomes of more than 60 species of fish in China have been assembled and annotated. Based on these reference genomes, evolutionary, comparative, and functional genomic studies have revolutionized our understanding of a wide range of biologically and economically important traits of fishes, including growth and development, sex determination, disease resistance, metamorphosis, and pigmentation. Furthermore, genomic tools and breeding techniques such as SNP arrays, genomic selection, and genome editing have greatly accelerated genetic improvement through the incorporation of functional genomic information into breeding activities. This review aims to summarize the current status, advances, and perspectives of the genome resources, genomic study of important traits, and genomic breeding techniques of fish in China. The review will provide aquaculture researchers, fish breeders, and farmers with updated information concerning fish genomic research and breeding technology. The summary will help to promote the genetic improvement of production traits and thus will support the sustainable development of fish aquaculture.
translated_keywords: 基因组编辑；基因组育种；基因组选择；鱼类基因组学；经济性状
translated_abstract: 水产养殖是全球食品生产增长最快的领域，已成为全球粮食供应的重要组成部分。中国在水产养殖产量方面拥有世界上最大的产业。然而，种质退化和疾病爆发等问题阻碍了鱼类养殖的可持续发展。基于基因组信息和基因型-表型关系的基因组育种实践，在提高水产养殖效率方面具有巨大潜力。2014年，中国半滑舌鳎基因组测序与注释工作的完成标志着中国鱼类基因组学时代的开端。自那时起，国内研究人员在功能基因组学研究方面取得了显著进展。截至目前，中国已组装并注释了60多种鱼类的基因组。基于这些参考基因组，进化、比较和功能基因组学研究彻底改变了我们对鱼类众多生物学和经济重要性状的理解，包括生长发育、性别决定、抗病性、变态和色素沉着等。此外，单核苷酸多态性（SNP）芯片、基因组选择和基因编辑等基因组工具和育种技术通过将功能基因组信息整合到育种活动中，极大地加速了遗传改良进程。本文旨在总结中国鱼类基因组资源、重要性状的基因组研究以及基因组育种技术的现状、进展和展望。该综述将为水产养殖研究人员、鱼类育种者和养殖户提供有关鱼类基因组研究和育种技术的最新信息，有助于促进生产性状的遗传改良，从而支持鱼类养殖的可持续发展。

translated_title: 基于系统基因组学的种间竞争视角
affiliations: Department of Biology, Tufts University, Medford, Massachusetts, USA.
title: A phylogenomic perspective on interspecific competition.
authors: Louw Nicolas L; Wolfe Benjamin E; Uricchio Lawrence H
keywords: microbial ecology; discordance; incomplete lineage sorting; phylogenomics; community assembly; competition
abstract: Evolutionary processes may have substantial impacts on community assembly, but evidence for phylogenetic relatedness as a determinant of interspecific interaction strength remains mixed. In this perspective, we consider a possible role for discordance between gene trees and species trees in the interpretation of phylogenetic signal in studies of community ecology. Modern genomic data show that the evolutionary histories of many taxa are better described by a patchwork of histories that vary along the genome rather than a single species tree. If a subset of genomic loci harbour trait-related genetic variation, then the phylogeny at these loci may be more informative of interspecific trait differences than the genome background. We develop a simple method to detect loci harbouring phylogenetic signal and demonstrate its application through a proof-of-principle analysis of Penicillium genomes and pairwise interaction strength. Our results show that phylogenetic signal that may be masked genome-wide could be detectable using phylogenomic techniques and may provide a window into the genetic basis for interspecific interactions.
translated_keywords: 微生物生态学；不一致；不完全谱系分选；系统基因组学；群落组装；竞争
translated_abstract: 进化过程可能对群落组装产生重大影响，但关于系统发育亲缘关系作为种间相互作用强度决定因素的证据仍然不一。本文从一个新的视角出发，探讨了基因树与物种树之间的不一致性在群落生态学研究中系统发育信号解释中的潜在作用。现代基因组数据显示，许多分类群的进化历史比单一物种树更能由沿基因组分布的片段化历史所描述。如果基因组的一部分位点携带了与性状相关的遗传变异，则这些位点上的系统发育可能比整个基因组背景更能反映种间性状差异。我们提出了一种简单的方法来检测携带系统发育信号的位点，并通过青霉菌（Penicillium）基因组和种间相互作用强度的原理验证分析展示了该方法的应用。结果表明，可能被全基因组掩盖的系统发育信号可以通过系统基因组学技术检测到，从而为理解种间相互作用的遗传基础提供了一个窗口。

translated_title: 泛基因组时代野生近缘植物的多样性解锁——以多年生果树作物为例
affiliations: Plant Pathology and Plant-Microbe Biology Section, Cornell University, 630 N Street, Geneva, NY, 14456, USA.; Plant Pathology and Plant-Microbe Biology Section, Cornell University, 630 N Street, Geneva, NY, 14456, USA. Electronic address: awais.khan@cornell.edu.
title: Unlocking diversity from wild relatives of perennial fruit crops in the pan-genomics era.
authors: Sabety Jean; Svara Anze; Tegtmeier Richard; Feulner Hana; Cho Patrick; Sakina Aafreen; Hickok David; Khan Awais
keywords: Undomesticated; Domestication; Perennials; Pan-genome
abstract: Crop wild relatives of perennial fruit crops have a wealth of untapped genetic diversity that can be utilized for cultivar development. However, barriers such as linkage drag, long juvenility, and high heterozygosity have hindered their utilization. Advancements in genome sequencing technologies and assembly methods, combined with the integration of chromosome conformation capture have made it possible to construct high-quality reference genomes. These genome assemblies can be combined into pan-genomes, capturing inter- and intraspecific variations across coding and non-coding regions. Pan-genomes of perennial fruit crops are being developed to identify the genetic basis of traits. This will help overcome breeding challenges, enabling faster and more targeted development of new cultivars with novel traits through breeding and biotechnology.
translated_keywords: 未驯化；驯化；多年生植物；泛基因组
translated_abstract: 多年生果树的作物野生近缘种蕴含丰富的未开发遗传多样性，可应用于品种培育。然而，诸如连锁拖累、童期长以及高杂合度等障碍限制了其利用。随着基因组测序技术和组装方法的进步，并结合染色质构象捕获技术的应用，现已能够构建高质量参考基因组。这些基因组组装结果可以整合为泛基因组，涵盖编码区和非编码区的种内及种间变异。多年生果树的泛基因组正在开发中，以确定性状的遗传基础。这将有助于克服育种难题，通过育种和生物技术更快、更精准地开发出具有新特性的新品种。

translated_title: 前沿植物天然产物代谢途径解析

title: Cutting-edge plant natural product pathway elucidation.
authors: Han Jianing; Miller Emma Parker; Li Sijin
keywords: (Auto-generated) 植物天然产物;代谢工程;多组学;异源宿主系统;生物合成途径;系统管道;基因挖掘;生物化学;生物信息学;分子生物学
abstract: Plant natural products (PNPs) play important roles in plant physiology and have been applied across diverse fields of human society. Understanding their biosynthetic pathways informs plant evolution and meanwhile enables sustainable production through metabolic engineering. However, the discovery of PNP biosynthetic pathways remains challenging due to the diversity of enzymes involved and limitations in traditional gene mining approaches. In this review, we will summarize state-of-the-art strategies and recent examples for predicting and characterizing PNP biosynthetic pathways, respectively, with multiomics-guided tools and heterologous host systems and share our perspectives on the systematic pipelines integrating these various bioinformatic and biochemical approaches.
translated_keywords: 植物天然产物;代谢工程;多组学;异源宿主系统;生物合成途径;系统管道;基因挖掘;生物化学;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 植物天然产物（PNPs）在植物生理学中发挥着重要作用，并被广泛应用于人类社会的各个领域。解析其生物合成途径不仅有助于理解植物进化，还能通过代谢工程实现可持续生产。然而，由于参与PNPs生物合成的酶种类繁多且传统基因挖掘方法存在局限性，PNP生物合成途径的发现仍面临挑战。本文综述了预测和表征PNP生物合成途径的最新策略及近期实例，包括多组学引导工具和异源宿主系统，并分享了我们对整合多种生物信息学和生化方法的系统流程的观点。

translated_title: 植物的表观遗传时钟。

title: Time's up: Epigenetic clocks in plants.
authors: Vo Binh Thanh; Mas Paloma; Johannes Frank
keywords: (Auto-generated) 表观遗传钟;植物衰老;表观遗传变化;昼夜节律;表观遗传时钟分类;植物进化;表观遗传学;生物信息学;分子生物学
abstract: For over a decade, the animal field has led the way in using DNA methylation measurements to construct epigenetic clocks of aging. These clocks can predict organismal age with a level of accuracy that surpasses any other molecular proxy known to date. Evidence is finally emerging that epigenetic clocks also exist in plants. However, these clocks appear to differ from those in animals in some key aspects, including in their ability to measure time beyond the life span of an individual. Clock-like epigenetic changes can be found in plant circadian rhythms (scale: 24 h), during plant aging (scale: weeks/centuries), and across plant lineage evolution (scale: decades/millennia). Here, we provide a first classification of these different types of epigenetic clocks, highlight their main features, and discuss their biological basis.
translated_keywords: 表观遗传钟;植物衰老;表观遗传变化;昼夜节律;表观遗传时钟分类;植物进化;表观遗传学;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 24小时）、植物衰老（时间尺度：数周至数世纪）以及植物谱系进化（时间尺度：数十年至数千年）相关的表观遗传变化呈现出类似时钟的特性。本文首次对这些不同类型的表观遗传时钟进行分类，突出其主要特征，并探讨其生物学基础。

title: Synthetic reprogramming of plant developmental and biochemical pathways.
authors: Akter Shammi; Castaneda-Méndez Oscar; Beltrán Jesús
keywords: (Auto-generated) 合成生物学;植物发育;生化途径;基因表达工具;代谢工程;农业可持续性;天然产物生产;生物信息学;分子生物学
abstract: Plant synthetic biology (Plant SynBio) is an emerging field with the potential to enhance agriculture, human health, and sustainability. Integrating genetic tools and engineering principles, Plant SynBio aims to manipulate cellular functions and construct novel biochemical pathways to develop plants with new phenotypic traits, enhanced yield, and be able to produce natural products and pharmaceuticals. This review compiles research efforts in reprogramming plant developmental and biochemical pathways. We highlight studies leveraging new gene expression toolkits to alter plant architecture for improved performance in model and crop systems and to produce useful metabolites in plant tissues. Furthermore, we provide insights into the challenges and opportunities associated with the adoption of Plant SynBio in addressing complex issues impacting agriculture and human health.
translated_keywords: 合成生物学;植物发育;生化途径;基因表达工具;代谢工程;农业可持续性;天然产物生产;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 植物合成生物学（Plant SynBio）作为一个新兴领域，具有提升农业、人类健康和可持续性的潜力。通过整合遗传工具与工程原理，植物合成生物学旨在操控细胞功能并构建新的生化途径，从而开发出具有新表型特征、更高产量且能够生产天然产品和药物的植物。本文综述了重新编程植物发育和生化途径的研究努力。我们强调利用新的基因表达工具包来改变植物结构，以提高模式植物和作物系统的性能，并在植物组织中生产有用的代谢物。此外，我们还探讨了在应对影响农业和人类健康的复杂问题时采用植物合成生物学所面临的挑战与机遇。

translated_title: 工程化植物-微生物通信以提高植物养分利用效率
affiliations: Department of Biological Engineering, California Institute of Technology, Pasadena, CA 91125, USA.; Chemistry and Chemical Engineering, California Institute of Technology, Pasadena, CA 91125, USA.; Chemistry and Chemical Engineering, California Institute of Technology, Pasadena, CA 91125, USA. Electronic address: gdemirer@caltech.edu.
title: Engineering plant-microbe communication for plant nutrient use efficiency.
authors: Griffin Catherine; Oz M Tufan; Demirer Gozde S
keywords: (Auto-generated) 植物-微生物通信;植物营养利用效率;根系分泌物;土壤微生物;合成生物学;温室气体排放;农业生产力;生物技术;分子生物学
abstract: Nutrient availability and efficient use are critical for crop productivity. Current agricultural practices rely on excessive chemical fertilizers, contributing to greenhouse gas emissions and environmental pollution. Rhizosphere microbes facilitate plant nutrient acquisition and contribute to nutrient use efficiency. Thus, engineering plant-microbe communication within the rhizosphere emerges as a promising and sustainable strategy to enhance agricultural productivity. Recent advances in plant engineering have enabled the development of plants capable of selectively enriching beneficial microbes through root exudates. At the same time, synthetic biology techniques have produced microbes capable of improving nutrient availability and uptake by plants. By engineering plant-microbe communication, researchers aim to harness beneficial soil microbes, thereby offering a targeted and efficient approach to optimizing plant nutrient use efficiency.
translated_keywords: 植物-微生物通信;植物营养利用效率;根系分泌物;土壤微生物;合成生物学;温室气体排放;农业生产力;生物技术;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 营养的有效供应与利用对作物生产力至关重要。当前的农业实践依赖过量的化学肥料，这加剧了温室气体排放和环境污染。根际微生物能够促进植物养分吸收并提高养分利用效率，因此，调控植物-微生物在根际的通讯成为一种有前景且可持续的策略以提升农业生产力。近期植物工程领域的进展使得开发出能够通过根系分泌物选择性富集有益微生物的植物成为可能。同时，合成生物学技术也培育出了能改善植物养分可利用性和吸收能力的微生物。通过调控植物-微生物通讯，研究人员旨在利用有益土壤微生物，从而提供一种精准且高效的优化植物养分利用效率的方法。

translated_title: 现状与展望

title: Whole-genome sequencing in medicinal plants: current progress and prospect.
authors: Pei Yifei; Leng Liang; Sun Wei; Liu Baocai; Feng Xue; Li Xiwen; Chen Shilin
keywords: high throughput sequencing; herbgenomics; research strategy; model species; application; whole genome
abstract: Advancements in genomics have dramatically accelerated the research on medicinal plants, and the development of herbgenomics has promoted the "Project of 1K Medicinal Plant Genome" to decipher their genetic code. However, it is difficult to obtain their high-quality whole genomes because of the prevalence of polyploidy and/or high genomic heterozygosity. Whole genomes of 123 medicinal plants were published until September 2022. These published genome sequences were investigated in this review, covering their classification, research teams, ploidy, medicinal functions, and sequencing strategies. More than 1,000 institutes or universities around the world and 50 countries are conducting research on medicinal plant genomes. Diploid species account for a majority of sequenced medicinal plants. The whole genomes of plants in the Poaceae family are the most studied. Almost 40% of the published papers studied species with tonifying, replenishing, and heat-cleaning medicinal effects. Medicinal plants are still in the process of domestication as compared with crops, thereby resulting in unclear genetic backgrounds and the lack of pure lines, thus making their genomes more difficult to complete. In addition, there is still no clear routine framework for a medicinal plant to obtain a high-quality whole genome. Herein, a clear and complete strategy has been originally proposed for creating a high-quality whole genome of medicinal plants. Moreover, whole genome-based biological studies of medicinal plants, including breeding and biosynthesis, were reviewed. We also advocate that a research platform of model medicinal plants should be established to promote the genomics research of medicinal plants.
translated_keywords: 高通量测序；草本植物基因组学；研究策略；模式物种；应用；全基因组
translated_abstract: 基因组学的进步极大地加速了药用植物的研究，草本基因组学的发展推动了“千种药用植物基因组计划”，以破译其遗传密码。然而，由于多倍体和/或高基因组杂合性的普遍存在，获得高质量的全基因组仍然困难重重。截至2022年9月，已发表123种药用植物的全基因组序列。本文综述了这些已发表的基因组序列，涵盖其分类、研究团队、倍性、药用功能及测序策略。全球超过1000个研究所或大学以及50个国家正在开展药用植物基因组研究。二倍体物种占已测序药用植物的大多数，禾本科植物的全基因组研究最为广泛。近40%的已发表论文研究了具有补益、滋补和清热功效的物种。与作物相比，药用植物仍处于驯化阶段，因此其遗传背景不明确且缺乏纯系，这使得它们的基因组更难完成。此外，目前尚无明确的常规框架来获取药用植物的高质量全基因组。在此，我们首次提出了一个清晰完整的策略，用于创建药用植物的高质量全基因组。此外，本文还综述了基于全基因组的药用植物生物学研究，包括育种和次生代谢物合成。我们还倡导建立药用模式植物研究平台，以促进药用植物基因组学研究。

title: Chromiomics: Chromium detoxification and approaches for engineering tolerance in plants.
authors: Jobby Renitta; Sarkar Mrittika; Bose Roshnee; Srivastava Sudhakar; Suprasanna Penna
keywords: Genetic manipulation; Plant tolerance; Detoxification; Phytoremediation; Heavy metal toxicity; Chromium
abstract: Chromium (Cr) is a heavy metal that poses a grave threat to the ecosystem including plants. Chromium is very harmful to plants due to its effects on many physiological and metabolic pathways culminating in a negative impact on plant's growth, development, and ability to take up nutrients. Plants have developed physiological, biochemical, and molecular ways of defense against Cr, such as by augmenting antioxidant potential to reduce reactive oxygen species (ROS). A number of genes have been discovered to play a significant role in the defense mechanisms of plants against Cr, for example, genes associated with the activation of phytochelatins, metallothioneins, and those of enzymes like glutathione-S-transferases. Along with this, a few miRNAs have been found to be associated in alleviating Cr stress and, to augment plant tolerance by controlling transcription factors, HSPs, and the expression of a few proteins and hormones. Defense pathway genes and miRNAs have been used for the generation of transgenic phytoremediator plants. Not only do the transgenic plants have a higher tolerance to Cr, but they also act as hyperaccumulators for Cr and have the potential to remediate other heavy metals. This article describes about environmental Cr contamination, Cr effects on plants, different genes and miRNAs involved in Cr stress mitigation and use of candidate genes, microRNAs for creating transgenic plant systems for phytoremediation, and the applications of CRISPR technology. It is expected that the integration of omics approach and advanced genomics will offer scope for more effective phytoremediation of Chromium in the coming years.
translated_keywords: 基因操作；植物耐受性；解毒；植物修复；重金属毒性；铬
translated_abstract: 铬（Cr）是一种重金属，对生态系统包括植物构成了严重威胁。铬因其对许多生理和代谢途径的影响而对植物具有很强的危害性，最终导致植物生长发育受阻以及养分吸收能力下降。植物已发展出多种生理、生化和分子防御机制来应对铬胁迫，例如通过增强抗氧化能力以减少活性氧（ROS）的积累。研究发现，一些基因在植物抵御铬胁迫的过程中发挥了重要作用，如与植物络合素、金属硫蛋白激活相关的基因以及谷胱甘肽-S-转移酶等酶相关基因。此外，一些微小RNA（miRNAs）也被发现能够通过调控转录因子、热休克蛋白（HSPs）以及某些蛋白质和激素的表达来缓解铬胁迫并提高植物耐受性。这些防御途径相关基因和miRNAs已被用于培育转基因植物修复剂。转基因植物不仅对铬具有更高的耐受性，还能作为超富集植物吸收铬，并具备修复其他重金属污染的能力。本文综述了环境铬污染、铬对植物的影响、参与缓解铬胁迫的不同基因和miRNAs，以及利用候选基因和miRNAs构建转基因植物修复系统的方法，并探讨了CRISPR技术的应用。预计在未来几年内，组学方法与先进基因组学的整合将为更有效的植物修复铬污染提供新的机遇。

title: Beyond the Human Genome Project: The Age of Complete Human Genome Sequences and Pangenome References.
authors: Taylor Dylan J; Eizenga Jordan M; Li Qiuhui; Das Arun; Jenike Katharine M; Kenny Eimear E; Miga Karen H; Monlong Jean; McCoy Rajiv C; Paten Benedict; Schatz Michael C
keywords: telomere-to-telomere; pangenome; reference genome sequence; genetic diversity; precision medicine
abstract: The Human Genome Project was an enormous accomplishment, providing a foundation for countless explorations into the genetics and genomics of the human species. Yet for many years, the human genome reference sequence remained incomplete and lacked representation of human genetic diversity. Recently, two major advances have emerged to address these shortcomings: complete gap-free human genome sequences, such as the one developed by the Telomere-to-Telomere Consortium, and high-quality pangenomes, such as the one developed by the Human Pangenome Reference Consortium. Facilitated by advances in long-read DNA sequencing and genome assembly algorithms, complete human genome sequences resolve regions that have been historically difficult to sequence, including centromeres, telomeres, and segmental duplications. In parallel, pangenomes capture the extensive genetic diversity across populations worldwide. Together, these advances usher in a new era of genomics research, enhancing the accuracy of genomic analysis, paving the path for precision medicine, and contributing to deeper insights into human biology.
journal: Annual review of genomics and human genetics
translated_keywords: 端粒到端粒；泛基因组；参考基因组序列；遗传多样性；精准医学
journal_full_name: Annual Review of Genomics and Human Genetics
translated_abstract: 一是无缺口的人类全基因组序列，例如由端粒到端粒联盟开发的序列；二是高质量的泛基因组，例如由人类泛基因组参考联盟开发的序列。长读长DNA测序技术和基因组组装算法的进步促进了这些成果的实现，完整的全基因组序列解决了历史上难以测序的区域，如着丝粒、端粒和片段重复。同时，泛基因组捕获了全球范围内广泛的人类遗传多样性。这些进展共同开启了基因组学研究的新时代，提高了基因组分析的准确性，为精准医学铺平了道路，并加深了对人类生物学的理解。

title: Role of ROS signaling in the plant defense against vascular pathogens.
authors: Wang Ran; Li Jianwei; Liang Yan
keywords: Plant immunity; Vascular defense; Reactive oxygen species; Respiratory burst oxidase homologs (RBOHs); NADPH oxidase
abstract: Reactive oxygen species (ROS) is a collective term for highly reactive oxygen derivatives, including singlet oxygen, hydroxyl radicals, superoxide anions, and hydrogen peroxide. In plants, ROS are produced in apoplasts, chloroplasts, mitochondria, and peroxisomes. Although ROS are toxic when their levels exceed a certain threshold, low-concentration ROS can serve as essential signaling molecules for plant growth and development, as well as plant responses to abiotic and biotic stresses. Various aspects of the role of ROS in plants have been discussed in previous reviews. In this review, we first summarize recent progress in the regulatory mechanisms of apoplastic ROS signaling and then propose its potential roles in plant defense against vascular pathogens to provide new ideas for the prevention and control of vascular diseases.
translated_keywords: 植物免疫；维管防御；活性氧；呼吸爆发氧化酶同源物（RBOHs）；NADPH氧化酶
translated_abstract: 活性氧（ROS）是一类高反应性活性氧衍生物的总称，包括单线态氧、羟基自由基、超氧阴离子和过氧化氢。在植物中，ROS 可在细胞壁、叶绿体、线粒体和过氧化物体中产生。尽管当 ROS 水平超过一定阈值时是有毒的，但低浓度的 ROS 可作为植物生长发育以及植物响应非生物和生物胁迫的重要信号分子。ROS 在植物中的作用已在先前的综述中有过讨论。本文综述了细胞壁 ROS 信号转导调控机制的最新研究进展，并提出了其在植物防御维管束病原体方面潜在的作用，以期为维管束病害的防控提供新思路。

translated_title: 酶组装木质素和去木质素的功能与机制
affiliations: Graduate School of Pharmaceutical Sciences, The University of Tokyo, Tokyo 113-0033, Japan; Collaborative Research Institute for Innovative Microbiology, The University of Tokyo, Tokyo 113-8657, Japan. Electronic address: ushimaru@mol.f.u-tokyo.ac.jp.
title: Functions and mechanisms of enzymes assembling lignans and norlignans.
authors: Ushimaru Richiro
keywords: Plant natural product; Lignan; Enzyme mechanism; Norlignan; Biosynthesis
abstract: Lignans and norlignans are distributed throughout the plant kingdom and exhibit diverse chemical structures and biological properties that offer potential for therapeutic use. Originating from the phenylpropanoid biosynthesis pathway, their characteristic carbon architectures are formed through unique enzyme catalysis, featuring regio- and stereoselective C-C bond forming processes. Despite extensive research on these plant natural products, their biosynthetic pathways, and enzyme mechanisms remain enigmatic. This review highlights recent advancements in elucidating the functions and mechanisms of the biosynthetic enzymes responsible for constructing the distinct carbon frameworks of lignans and norlignans.
translated_keywords: 植物天然产物； lignan（在此可译为木脂素）； 酶机制； norlignan（在此可译为去氧木脂素）； 次生代谢
translated_abstract: 木脂素和去氢木脂素广泛分布于植物界，具有多样的化学结构和生物活性，展现出潜在的治疗价值。它们来源于苯丙烷生物合成途径，其特有的碳骨架通过独特的酶催化形成，特征在于区域选择性和立体选择性的C-C键形成过程。尽管对这些植物天然产物的研究已较为深入，但其生物合成途径及酶机制仍有许多未解之谜。本文综述了近年来在解析负责构建木脂素和去氢木脂素独特碳骨架的生物合成酶功能与机制方面的最新进展。

translated_title: 植物-病原体相互作用中基于碳水化合物的信号来源
affiliations: Centro de Biotecnología y Genómica de Plantas, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid (UPM) - Instituto Nacional de Investigación y Tecnología Agraria y Alimentaria (INIA/CSIC), Campus de Montegancedo UPM, Pozuelo de Alarcón (Madrid), Spain; Departamento de Biotecnología-Biología Vegetal, Escuela Técnica Superior de Ingeniería Agronómica, Alimentaría y de Biosistemas, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid (UPM), Madrid, Spain. title: Plant cell walls: source of carbohydrate-based signals in plant-pathogen interactions.
authors: Molina Antonio; Sánchez-Vallet Andrea; Jordá Lucía; Carrasco-López Cristian; Rodríguez-Herva José Juan; López-Solanilla Emilia
keywords: Pattern Triggered Immunity (PTI); disease resistance; Arabidopsis thaliana; Cell Wall Degrading Enzyme (CWDE); chemoreceptor (CR); chemotaxis; Pattern Recognition Receptor (PRR); Glycosyl Hydrolase (GH); Damage-Associated Molecular Pattern (DAMP); virulence; Methyl-accepting Chemotaxis Protein (MCP); glycan; cell wall
abstract: Plant cell walls are essential elements for disease resistance that pathogens need to overcome to colonise the host. Certain pathogens secrete a large battery of enzymes to hydrolyse plant cell wall polysaccharides, which leads to the release of carbohydrate-based molecules (glycans) that are perceived by plant pattern recognition receptors and activate pattern-triggered immunity and disease resistance. These released glycans are used by colonizing microorganisms as carbon source, chemoattractants to locate entry points at plant surface, and as signals triggering gene expression reprogramming. The release of wall glycans and their perception by plants and microorganisms determines plant-microbial interaction outcome. Here, we summarise and discuss the most recent advances in these less explored aspects of plant-microbe interaction.
translated_keywords: 模式触发免疫（PTI）；抗病性；拟南芥（*Arabidopsis thaliana*）；细胞壁降解酶（CWDE）；化学感受受体（CR）；趋化性；模式识别受体（PRR）；糖苷水解酶（GH）；损伤相关分子模式（DAMP）；毒力；甲基接受趋化蛋白（MCP）；糖链；细胞壁
translated_abstract: 植物细胞壁是植物抵御病原体入侵的关键组成部分，而病原体需要克服这一屏障才能成功定殖宿主。某些病原体会分泌大量酶类来降解植物细胞壁多糖，从而释放基于碳水化合物的分子（糖类），这些分子被植物模式识别受体感知后会激活模式触发免疫反应和抗病性。这些释放的糖类分子被定殖的微生物用作碳源、化学引诱剂以定位植物表面的侵入点，同时也是触发基因表达重编程的信号。细胞壁糖类的释放及其在植物与微生物中的感知决定了植物-微生物互作的结果。本文综述并讨论了植物-微生物互作领域中一些较少研究的最新进展。

translated_title: 揭示植物生物相互作用中外泌体的角色、节律与调控机制
affiliations: Department of Biology, South Parks Road, University of Oxford, Oxford, OX1 3RB, United Kingdom.; Department of Biology, South Parks Road, University of Oxford, Oxford, OX1 3RB, United Kingdom. Electronic address: Ronelle.roth@biology.ox.ac.uk.
title: Messenger and message: Uncovering the roles, rhythm and regulation of extracellular vesicles in plant biotic interactions.
authors: Qiao Serena Agnes; Roth Ronelle
keywords: cross-kingdom communications; plant-microbe interactions; extracellular vesicles
abstract: Extracellular vesicles (EVs) are membrane-delimited nanoparticles found in every kingdom of life and are known to mediate cell-cell communication in animal systems through the trafficking of proteins and nucleic acids. Research into plant and microbial EVs suggests that these have similar transport capacity, and moreover are able to mediate signalling not only within an organism but also between organisms, acting between plants and their microbial partners in cross-kingdom signalling. Here, we review recent research exploring the roles of these EVs, both plant and microbial, highlighting emerging trends of functional conservation between species and across kingdoms, complemented by the heterogeneity of EV subpopulations at the organism level that places EVs as powerful regulatory mechanisms in plant biotic interactions.
translated_keywords: 跨王国通讯；植物-微生物互作；细胞外囊泡
translated_abstract: 细胞外囊泡（EVs）是存在于生命各个界中的膜状纳米颗粒，已知通过蛋白质和核酸的转运在动物系统中介导细胞间通讯。关于植物和微生物EVs的研究表明，它们具有类似的运输能力，并且能够不仅在生物体内，还能在生物体之间传递信号，在跨界的植物与其微生物伙伴之间进行交叉通讯。本文综述了近期关于植物和微生物EVs功能的研究，强调了物种间以及界别间功能保守性的新兴趋势，同时结合了个体水平上EV亚群的异质性，这使得EVs成为植物生物相互作用中强有力的调控机制。

translated_title: 异源多倍化后浮萍的泛基因组揭示了结构变异和不对称亚基因组分化。
affiliations: Systematic and Evolutionary Botany and Biodiversity Laboratory, College of Life Sciences, Zhejiang University, Hangzhou, 310058, Zhejiang, China.; CAS Key Laboratory of Plant Germplasm Enhancement and Specialty Agriculture, Wuhan Botanical Garden, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Wuhan, 430074, Hubei, China.; Provincial Key Laboratory of Characteristic Aquatic Vegetable Breeding and Cultivation, Jinhua Academy of Agricultural Sciences (Zhejiang Institute of Agricultural Machinery), Jinhua, 321000, Zhejiang, China.; Jiaxing Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Jiaxing, 314016, Zhejiang, China.; Institute of Botany, Jiangsu Province and Chinese Academy of Sciences, Nanjing 210014, Jiangsu, China.; Department of Environment & Biodiversity, Salzburg University, Salzburg, 5020, Austria.; State Key Laboratory of Tropical Crop Breeding, Shenzhen Branch, Guangdong Laboratory of Lingnan Modern Agriculture; Key Laboratory of Synthetic Biology, Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs, Agricultural Genomics Institute at Shenzhen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Shenzhen 518124, Guangdong, China.
title: Pangenome of water caltrop reveals structural variations and asymmetric subgenome divergence after allopolyploidization.
authors: Zhang Xinyi; Chen Yang; Wang Lingyun; Yuan Ye; Fang Mingya; Shi Lin; Lu Ruisen; Comes Hans Peter; Ma Yazhen; Chen Yuanyuan; Huang Guizhou; Zhou Yongfeng; Zheng Zhaisheng; Qiu Yingxiong
keywords: (Auto-generated) 水芸草;异源多倍体;泛基因组;结构变异;亚基因组分化;表达差异;可移动元件;生物信息学;分子进化
abstract: Water caltrop (Trapa spp., Lythraceae) is a traditional but currently underutilized non-cereal crop. Here, we generated chromosome-level genome assemblies for the two diploid progenitors of allotetraploid Trapa. natans (4x, AABB), i.e., diploid T. natans (2x, AA) and Trapa incisa (2x, BB). In conjunction with four published (sub)genomes of Trapa, we used gene-based and graph-based pangenomic approaches and a pangenomic transposable element (TE) library to develop Trapa genomic resources. The pangenome displayed substantial gene-content variation with dispensable and private gene clusters occupying a large proportion (51.95%) of the total cluster sets in the six (sub)genomes. Genotyping of presence-absence variation (PAVs) identified 40 453 PAVs associated with 2570 genes specific to A- or B-lineages, of which 1428 were differentially expressed, and were enriched in organ development process, organic substance metabolic process and response to stimulus. Comparative genome analyses showed that the allotetraploid T. natans underwent asymmetric subgenome divergence, with the B-subgenome being more dominant than the A-subgenome. Multiple factors, including PAVs, asymmetrical amplification of TEs, homeologous exchanges (HEs), and homeolog expression divergence, together affected genome evolution after polyploidization. Overall, this study sheds lights on the genome architecture and evolution of Trapa, and facilitates its functional genomic studies and breeding program.
translated_keywords: 水芸草;异源多倍体;泛基因组;结构变异;亚基因组分化;表达差异;可移动元件;生物信息学;分子进化
translated_abstract: 芡实（Trapa spp., Lythraceae）是一种传统但目前利用不足的非谷物作物。本文构建了异源四倍体芡实（Trapa natans，4x，AABB）两个二倍体祖先种——二倍体T. natans（2x，AA）和裂叶芡（Trapa incisa，2x，BB）的染色体水平基因组组装。结合已发表的四种（亚）基因组，我们采用基于基因和图的泛基因组方法以及一个泛基因组转座子（TE）文库开发了芡属植物的基因组资源。泛基因组显示了显著的基因含量变异，其中可有可无的基因簇和私有基因簇占六个（亚）基因组总簇集的51.95%。通过存在-缺失变异（PAV）的基因分型，鉴定了与A系或B系特异性相关的40,453个PAV，涉及2570个基因，其中1428个基因差异表达，并富集于器官发育过程、有机物质代谢过程及对刺激的响应。比较基因组分析表明，异源四倍体T. natans经历了不对称的亚基因组分化，B亚基因组比A亚基因组更为占主导地位。多种因素，包括PAV、TE的不对称扩增、同源交换（HE）和同源表达分化，共同影响了多倍化后的基因组演化。总体而言，本研究揭示了芡属植物的基因组结构和演化机制，为其功能基因组学研究和育种计划提供了支持。

translated_title: 蓝莓与蔓越莓的泛基因组资源在遗传学研究和育种工作中的应用前景

title: Blueberry and cranberry pangenomes as a resource for future genetic studies and breeding efforts.
authors: Yocca Alan E; Platts Adrian; Alger Elizabeth; Teresi Scott; Mengist Molla F; Benevenuto Juliana; Ferrão Luis Felipe V; Jacobs MacKenzie; Babinski Michal; Magallanes-Lundback Maria; Bayer Philipp; Golicz Agnieszka; Humann Jodi L; Main Dorrie; Espley Richard V; Chagné David; Albert Nick W; Montanari Sara; Vorsa Nicholi; Polashock James; Díaz-Garcia Luis; Zalapa Juan; Bassil Nahla V; Munoz Patricio R; Iorizzo Massimo; Edger Patrick P
keywords: (Auto-generated) 蓝莓;蔓越莓;泛基因组;遗传多样性;疾病抗性;代谢物合成;辅助基因;生物信息学;分子生物学
abstract: Domestication of cranberry and blueberry began in the United States in the early 1800s and 1900s, respectively, and in part owing to their flavors and health-promoting benefits are now cultivated and consumed worldwide. The industry continues to face a wide variety of production challenges (e.g. disease pressures), as well as a demand for higher-yielding cultivars with improved fruit quality characteristics. Unfortunately, molecular tools to help guide breeding efforts for these species have been relatively limited compared with those for other high-value crops. Here, we describe the construction and analysis of the first pangenome for both blueberry and cranberry. Our analysis of these pangenomes revealed both crops exhibit great genetic diversity, including the presence-absence variation of 48.4% genes in highbush blueberry and 47.0% genes in cranberry. Auxiliary genes, those not shared by all cultivars, are significantly enriched with molecular functions associated with disease resistance and the biosynthesis of specialized metabolites, including compounds previously associated with improving fruit quality traits. The discovery of thousands of genes, not present in the previous reference genomes for blueberry and cranberry, will serve as the basis of future research and as potential targets for future breeding efforts. The pangenome, as a multiple-sequence alignment, as well as individual annotated genomes, are publicly available for analysis on the Genome Database for Vaccinium-a curated and integrated web-based relational database. Lastly, the core-gene predictions from the pangenomes will serve useful to develop a community genotyping platform to guide future molecular breeding efforts across the family.
translated_keywords: 蓝莓;蔓越莓;泛基因组;遗传多样性;疾病抗性;代谢物合成;辅助基因;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 蔓越莓和蓝莓的人工栽培分别始于19世纪早期和20世纪早期的美国，由于其风味及其促进健康的益处，如今这两种浆果已在全球范围内种植和消费。然而，该产业仍面临诸多生产挑战（如病害压力），并且对更高产且果实品质更优的品种需求迫切。遗憾的是，与其它高价值作物相比，针对这些物种进行育种所需的分子工具相对有限。本文描述了蓝莓和蔓越莓的第一个泛基因组的构建与分析。我们对这两个泛基因组的分析表明，这两种作物具有极大的遗传多样性，其中高丛蓝莓中有48.4%的基因存在表达与否的变化，蔓越莓中这一比例为47.0%。辅助基因（即并非所有品种共有的基因）显著富集了与抗病性和次生代谢物合成相关的分子功能，包括之前与改善果实品质特性相关的化合物。发现的数千个未包含在先前蓝莓和蔓越莓参考基因组中的基因，将成为未来研究的基础，并作为未来育种工作的潜在目标。泛基因组作为一个多序列比对，以及单独注释的基因组，均可通过Genome Database for Vaccinium（一个经过整理和集成的基于网络的关系型数据库）供公众分析使用。最后，泛基因组的核心基因预测结果将有助于开发社区基因分型平台，以指导该科植物未来的分子育种工作。

translated_title: 理解植物对微生物组反馈的响应性
affiliations: Department of Environmental Sciences, University of Basel, Basel, Switzerland.; Department of Environmental Sciences, University of Basel, Basel, Switzerland. Electronic address: klaus.schlaeppi@unibas.ch.
title: Understanding plant responsiveness to microbiome feedbacks.
authors: Janse van Rensburg Henry; Stengele Katja; Schlaeppi Klaus
keywords: (Auto-generated) 植物-微生物组反馈；双向互作；根际微生物组；因果关系；土壤微生物群；植物遗传基础；作物改良；生态学；分子生物学
abstract: Plant microbiome interactions are bidirectional with processes leading to microbiome assembly and processes leading to effects on plants, so called microbiome feedbacks. With belowground focus we systematically decomposed both of these directions into plant and (root and rhizosphere) microbiome components to identify methodological challenges and research priorities. We found that the bidirectionality of plant microbiome interactions presents a challenge for genetic studies. Establishing causality is particularly difficult when a plant mutant has both, an altered phenotype and an altered microbiome. Is the mutation directly affecting the microbiome (e.g., through root exudates), which then causes an altered phenotype of the plant and/or is the altered microbiome the consequence of the mutation altering the plant's phenotype (e.g., root architecture)? Here, we put forward that feedback experiments allow to separate cause and effect and furthermore, they are useful for investigating plant interactions with complex microbiomes in natural soils. They especially allow to investigate the plant genetic basis how plants respond to soil microbiomes and we stress that such microbiome feedbacks are understudied compared to the mechanisms contributing to microbiome assembly. Thinking towards application, this may allow to develop crops with both abilities to assemble a beneficial microbiome and to actively exploit its feedbacks.
translated_keywords: 植物-微生物组反馈；双向互作；根际微生物组；因果关系；土壤微生物群；植物遗传基础；作物改良；生态学；分子生物学
translated_abstract: 植物与微生物组之间的相互作用是双向的，一方面涉及微生物组的组装过程，另一方面则涉及微生物组对植物的影响，即所谓的微生物组反馈。本文聚焦于地下部分，系统地将这两个方向分解为植物及其（根和根际）微生物组的组成部分，以识别方法学挑战和研究重点。我们发现，植物与微生物组之间的双向相互作用给遗传学研究带来了挑战。当植物突变体表现出表型改变且其微生物组也发生改变时，确定因果关系尤为困难。这种变化是直接由突变引起的（例如通过根系分泌物），还是由于突变改变了植物的表型（例如根系结构）从而导致微生物组的变化？在此，我们认为反馈实验能够分离因果关系，并且这些实验对于研究植物在自然土壤中的复杂微生物组相互作用非常有用。它们尤其有助于探究植物基因基础如何响应土壤微生物组，同时强调与微生物组组装相关的机制相比，微生物组反馈的研究相对不足。从应用的角度来看，这可能有助于培育既能组装有益微生物组又能积极利用其反馈的作物品种。

translated_title: 阐明、重构及重编程生物合成途径的最新进展。

title: Integration of discovery and engineering in plant alkaloid research: Recent developments in elucidation, reconstruction, and repurposing biosynthetic pathways.
authors: Bui Van-Hung; Rodríguez-López Carlos Eduardo; Dang Thu-Thuy T
keywords: Semisynthesis; Alkaloids; New-to-nature; Biosynthesis; New-in-nature
abstract: Plants synthesize tens of thousands of bioactive nitrogen-containing compounds called alkaloids, including some clinically important drugs in modern medicine. The discovery of new alkaloid structures and their metabolism in plants have provided ways to access these rich sources of bioactivities including new-to-nature compounds relevant to therapeutic and industrial applications. This review discusses recent advances in alkaloid biosynthesis discovery, including complete pathway elucidations. Additionally, the latest developments in the production of new and established plant alkaloids based on either biosynthesis or semisynthesis are discussed.
translated_keywords: 半合成；生物碱；新天然产物；生物合成；新天然产物
translated_abstract: 植物合成数以万计的含氮生物活性化合物，称为生物碱，其中包含现代医学中一些重要的临床药物。植物中新生物碱结构及其代谢途径的发现，为获取这些丰富的生物活性来源（包括自然界中新的、与治疗和工业应用相关的化合物）提供了途径。本文综述了关于生物碱生物合成研究的最新进展，包括完整的代谢通路解析。此外，还讨论了基于生物合成或半合成技术生产新老植物生物碱的最新发展。

translated_title: 异源表达系统中药物生产的进展
affiliations: Pelotonia Research Center, Department of Horticulture and Crop Science, the Ohio State University, 2255 Kenny Rd, Columbus, OH 43210, USA. Electronic address: sadre.2@osu.edu.
title: Plant synthetic biology for human health: advances in producing medicines in heterologous expression systems.
authors: Sadre Radin
keywords: (Auto-generated) 植物合成生物学;异源表达系统;高价值天然产物;药物生产;基因发现;生物合成工程;植物代谢工程;生物信息学;分子生物学
abstract: Plant synthetic biology has the capability to provide solutions to global challenges in the production and supply of medicines. Recent advances in 'omics' technologies have accelerated gene discoveries in medicinal plant research so that even multistep biosynthetic pathways for bioactive plant natural products with high structural complexity can be reconstituted in heterologous plant expression systems more rapidly. This review provides an overview of concept and strategies used to produce high-value plant natural products in heterologous plant systems and highlights recent successes in engineering the biosynthesis of conventional and new medicines in alternative plant hosts.
translated_keywords: 植物合成生物学;异源表达系统;高价值天然产物;药物生产;基因发现;生物合成工程;植物代谢工程;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 植物合成生物学有能力为全球医药产品的生产和供应提供解决方案。近年来，“组学”技术的进步加速了药用植物基因的发现，使得具有高度结构复杂性的活性植物天然产物的多步骤生物合成途径能够更快速地在异源植物表达系统中重建。本文综述了用于在异源植物系统中生产高价值植物天然产物的概念和策略，并强调了在替代植物宿主中工程化改造传统和新型药物生物合成方面的最新成功案例。

translated_title: 细菌基因组折叠的研究进展
affiliations: Institut Pasteur, CNRS UMR 3525, Université Paris Cité, Unité Régulation Spatiale des Génomes, 75015, Paris, France.; Institut Pasteur, CNRS UMR 3525, Université Paris Cité, Unité Régulation Spatiale des Génomes, 75015, Paris, France. Electronic address: romain.koszul@pasteur.fr.
title: Insights in bacterial genome folding.
authors: Yáñez-Cuna Fares Osam; Koszul Romain
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因组折叠;细菌染色体;核区;非编码序列;动态特性;结构特征;核酸蛋白;生物信息学;分子生物学
abstract: Chromosomes in all domains of life are well-defined structural entities with complex hierarchical organization. The regulation of this hierarchical organization and its functional interplay with gene expression or other chromosome metabolic processes such as repair, replication, or segregation is actively investigated in a variety of species, including prokaryotes. Bacterial chromosomes are typically gene-dense with few non-coding sequences and are organized into the nucleoid, a membrane-less compartment composed of DNA, RNA, and proteins (nucleoid-associated proteins or NAPs). The continuous improvement of imaging and genomic methods has put the organization of these Mb-long molecules at reach, allowing to disambiguate some of their highly dynamic properties and intertwined structural features. Here we review and discuss some of the recent advances in the field of bacterial chromosome organization.
translated_keywords: 基因组折叠;细菌染色体;核区;非编码序列;动态特性;结构特征;核酸蛋白;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 生命各个领域的染色体都是具有复杂层级组织的明确结构实体。对这种层级组织及其与基因表达或其他染色体代谢过程（如修复、复制和分离）之间功能相互作用的研究正在多种物种中积极展开，包括原核生物。细菌染色体通常基因密度较高，非编码序列较少，并被组织成类核体——一种由DNA、RNA和蛋白质（核 Associated 蛋白或NAPs）组成的无膜结构域。成像和基因组学方法的持续改进使得对这些兆碱基长分子的组织研究成为可能，从而揭示其高度动态性质和复杂的相互交织的结构特征。本文综述并讨论了细菌染色体组织领域的一些最新进展。

translated_title: 植物中杯蛋白的结构与功能多样性
affiliations: School of Life Sciences, Jiangsu University, Zhenjiang 212013, Jiangsu, China.; School of Life Sciences, Jiangsu University, Zhenjiang 212013, Jiangsu, China. Electronic address: cjinfor@163.com.
title: Divergent structures and functions of the Cupin proteins in plants.
authors: Hu Fei; Ye Ziyi; Dong Kui; Zhang Weimeng; Fang Da; Cao Jun
keywords: Crop improvement; Structure; Function; Evolution; Cupin gene family
abstract: Cupin superfamily proteins have extensive functions. Their members are not only involved in the development of plants but also responded to various stresses. Whereas, the research on the Cupin members has not attracted enough attention. In this article, we summarized the research progress on these family genes in recent years and explored their evolution, structural characteristics, and biological functions. The significance of members of the Cupin family in the development of plant cell walls, roots, leaves, flowers, fruits, and seeds and their role in stress response are highlighted. Simultaneously, the prospective application of Cupin protein in crop enhancement was introduced. Some members can enhance plant growth, development, and resistance to adversity, thereby increasing crop yield. It will be as a foundation for future effective crop research and breeding.
translated_keywords: 作物改良；结构；功能；进化；杯状蛋白基因家族
translated_abstract: 杯状蛋白超家族蛋白具有广泛的功能，其成员不仅参与植物的发育，还响应各种胁迫。然而，对杯状蛋白家族成员的研究尚未引起足够的重视。本文综述了近年来该家族基因的研究进展，探讨了其进化、结构特征及生物学功能。重点介绍了杯状蛋白家族成员在植物细胞壁、根、叶、花、果实和种子发育中的意义及其在胁迫响应中的作用，并介绍了杯状蛋白在作物改良中的潜在应用。一些成员可以促进植物生长、发育并提高抗逆性，从而增加作物产量，这将为今后有效的作物研究与育种奠定基础。

translated_title: 物种特异性“专化”基因组区域为揭示植物代谢多态性的功能基因组学特性提供了新见解。
affiliations: Graduate School of Biological Sciences, Nara Institute of Science and Technology (NAIST), Takayama-cho 8916-5, Ikoma, Nara 630-0192, Japan.; Graduate School of Biological Sciences, Nara Institute of Science and Technology (NAIST), Takayama-cho 8916-5, Ikoma, Nara 630-0192, Japan. Electronic address: tohge@bs.naist.jp.
title: Species-specific 'specialized' genomic region provides the new insights into the functional genomics characterizing metabolic polymorphisms in plants.
authors: Watanabe Mutsumi; Tohge Takayuki
keywords: Metabolomics; Species specificity; Plant specialized metabolism; Integrative omics; Functional genomics; Comparative genomics
abstract: Functional genomics approaches with comparative omics analyses of wild-accessions and cultivars/wild species, as well as comparative genomic analyses in plant species focusing on gene clusters, have successfully detected key metabolic polymorphisms in plant specialized metabolism. In recent decades, (i) intra-species specific metabolic polymorphisms, (ii) new functionalization of tandem duplicated genes, and (iii) metabolic gene clusters were found as the main factors creating metabolic diversity of specialized metabolites in plants. However, given findings aware us that the identification of genes in plant specialized metabolism requires strategic approaches depending on the target metabolic pathways. The increasing availability of plant genome sequences and transcriptome data has facilitated inter-specific comparative analyses, including genomic analysis and gene co-expression network analysis. Here, we introduce functional genomics approaches with the integration of inter-/intra-species comparative metabolomics, their key roles in providing genomic signatures of metabolic evolution, and discuss future prospects of functional genomics on plant specialized metabolism.
translated_keywords: 代谢组学；物种特异性；植物次生代谢；整合组学；功能基因组学；比较基因组学
translated_abstract: （i）种内特异性代谢多态性、（ii）串联重复基因的新功能化以及（iii）代谢基因簇。然而，这些发现提醒我们，识别植物次生代谢中的基因需要根据目标代谢通路采取针对性策略。随着植物基因组序列和转录组数据的日益丰富，促进了种间比较分析，包括基因组学分析和基因共表达网络分析。本文介绍了整合种间/种内比较代谢组学的功能基因组学方法，阐述了其在提供代谢进化基因组特征方面的重要作用，并探讨了功能基因组学在植物次生代谢研究中的未来前景。

Electronic address: jfk@chembiotech.co.uk.
title: β-glucan-induced disease resistance in plants: A review.
authors: Riseh Roohallah Saberi; Vazvani Mozhgan Gholizadeh; Kennedy John F
keywords: β-Glucan; SAR; Interaction plant-pathogen
abstract: Systemic acquired resistance (SAR) and induced systemic resistance (ISR) are caused by various factors, including both pathogenic and non-pathogenic ones. β-glucan primarily originates from bacteria and fungi, some species of these organisms work as biological agents in causing diseases. When β-glucan enters plants, it triggers the defense system, leading to various reactions such as the production of proteins related to pathogenicity and defense enzymes. By extracting β-glucan from disturbed microorganisms and using it as an inducing agent, plant diseases can be effectively controlled by activating the plant's defense system. β-glucan plays a crucial role during the interaction between plants and pathogens. Therefore, modeling the plant-pathogen relationship and using the molecules involved in this interaction can help in controlling plant diseases, as pathogens have genes related to resistance against pathogenicity. Thus, it is reasonable to identify and use biological induction agents at a large scale by extracting these compounds.
translated_keywords: β-葡聚糖；系统获得性抗性；植物-病原体相互作用
translated_abstract: 系统获得抗性（SAR）和诱导系统抗性（ISR）由多种因素引发，包括病原性和非病原性因子。β-葡聚糖主要来源于细菌和真菌，其中一些物种作为生物因子导致疾病。当β-葡聚糖进入植物时，会触发防御系统，导致一系列反应，如病原相关蛋白和防御酶的产生。通过从受干扰的微生物中提取β-葡聚糖并用作诱导剂，可以有效控制植物病害，激活植物的防御系统。在植物与病原体的相互作用过程中，β-葡聚糖起着至关重要的作用。因此，建模植物-病原体关系并利用参与该相互作用的分子有助于控制植物病害，因为病原体具有与致病性相关的抗性基因。因此，通过提取这些化合物，在大规模上识别和使用生物诱导剂是合理的。

title: Chitin-induced disease resistance in plants: A review.
authors: Saberi Riseh Roohallah; Gholizadeh Vazvani Mozhgan; Vatankhah Masoumeh; Kennedy John F
keywords: Sustainable strategies; Chitin; Defense genes
abstract: Chitin is composed of N-acetylglucosamine units. Chitin a polysaccharide found in the cell walls of fungi and exoskeletons of insects and crustaceans, can elicit a potent defense response in plants. Through the activation of defense genes, stimulation of defensive compound production, and reinforcement of physical barriers, chitin enhances the plant's ability to defend against pathogens. Chitin-based treatments have shown efficacy against various plant diseases caused by fungal, bacterial, viral, and nematode pathogens, and have been integrated into sustainable agricultural practices. Furthermore, chitin treatments have demonstrated additional benefits, such as promoting plant growth and improving tolerance to abiotic stresses. Further research is necessary to optimize treatment parameters, explore chitin derivatives, and conduct long-term field studies. Continued efforts in these areas will contribute to the development of innovative and sustainable strategies for disease management in agriculture, ultimately leading to improved crop productivity and reduced reliance on chemical pesticides.
translated_keywords: 可持续发展战略；几丁质；防御基因
translated_abstract: 几丁质由N-乙酰葡萄糖胺单元组成，是一种存在于真菌细胞壁和节肢动物外骨骼中的多糖，能够激发植物强烈的防御反应。通过激活防御基因、刺激防御化合物的产生以及强化物理屏障，几丁质增强了植物抵御病原体的能力。基于几丁质的处理方法对由真菌、细菌、病毒和线虫等多种病原体引起的植物病害显示出良好的防治效果，并已被整合到可持续农业实践中。此外，几丁质处理还表现出促进植物生长和提高对非生物胁迫耐受性的额外益处。未来需要进一步研究优化处理参数、探索几丁质衍生物并开展长期田间试验。在这些领域的持续努力将有助于开发创新且可持续的农业病害管理策略，最终提高作物产量并减少对化学农药的依赖。

translated_title: 组学驱动的植物凝集素发现与功能注释的生物信息学方法——综述
