title: Recent progress on phytoremediation of urban air pollution.
authors: Duan Xiaoyi; Gu Haiping; Lam Su Shiung; Sonne Christian; Lu Wenjie; Li Hanyin; Chen Xiangmeng; Peng Wanxi
keywords: Particulate matter; Air pollution; Plant transpiration; Greenhouse gases; Three-dimensional greening
abstract: The rapid growth of population and economy has led to an increase in urban air pollutants, greenhouse gases, energy shortages, environmental degradation, and species extinction, all of which affect ecosystems, biodiversity, and human health. Atmospheric pollution sources are divided into direct and indirect pollutants. Through analysis of the sources of pollutants, the self-functioning of different plants can be utilized to purify the air quality more effectively. Here, we explore the absorption of greenhouse gases and particulate matter in cities as well as the reduction of urban temperatures by plants based on international scientific literature on plant air pollution mitigation, according to the adsorption, dust retention, and transpiration functions of plants. At the same time, it can also reduce the occurrence of extreme weather. It is necessary to select suitable tree species for planting according to different plant functions and environmental needs. In the context of tight urban land use, the combination of vertical greening and urban architecture, through the rational use of plants, has comprehensively addressed urban air pollution. In the future, in urban construction, attention should be paid to the use of heavy plants and the protection and development of green spaces. Our review provides necessary references for future urban planning and research.
translated_keywords: 颗粒物；空气污染；植物蒸腾；温室气体；三维绿化
translated_abstract: 人口和经济的快速增长导致城市空气污染物、温室气体、能源短缺、环境污染以及物种灭绝等问题增加，这些问题影响着生态系统、生物多样性和人类健康。大气污染源分为直接污染物和间接污染物。通过分析污染物来源，可以更有效地利用不同植物的自净功能净化空气质量。本文基于国际上关于植物缓解空气污染的科学文献，探讨了植物对城市温室气体、颗粒物的吸收以及降温效应，这些效应分别依赖于植物的吸附、滞尘和蒸腾作用。同时，植物还可以减少极端天气的发生。在城市绿化中，需要根据不同的植物功能和环境需求选择适宜的树种进行种植。在城市用地紧张的情况下，通过合理利用植物实现垂直绿化与城市建筑相结合，全面解决了城市空气污染问题。未来，在城市规划建设中应注重重力植物的应用以及绿地的保护与开发。本综述为未来的城市规划和研究提供了必要的参考依据。

translated_title: CBL-CIPK信号通路在植物非生物胁迫耐受性和激素 Crosstalk中的分子机制
affiliations: Soil Science and Plant Nutrition Department, Agriculture Faculty, Harran University, Sanliurfa 63200, Turkey.; Section of Botany, Department of Biology, National and Kapodistrian University of Athens, 15784 Athens, Greece.
title: Molecular Mechanisms of CBL-CIPK Signaling Pathway in Plant Abiotic Stress Tolerance and Hormone Crosstalk.
authors: Kaya Cengiz; Uğurlar Ferhat; Adamakis Ioannis-Dimosthenis S
keywords: hormone interplay; CBL-interacting protein kinases; genetic modification; calcineurin B-like proteins; plant stress resilience
abstract: Abiotic stressors, including drought, salt, cold, and heat, profoundly impact plant growth and development, forcing elaborate cellular responses for adaptation and resilience. Among the crucial orchestrators of these responses is the CBL-CIPK pathway, comprising calcineurin B-like proteins (CBLs) and CBL-interacting protein kinases (CIPKs). While CIPKs act as serine/threonine protein kinases, transmitting calcium signals, CBLs function as calcium sensors, influencing the plant's response to abiotic stress. This review explores the intricate interactions between the CBL-CIPK pathway and plant hormones such as ABA, auxin, ethylene, and jasmonic acid (JA). It highlights their role in fine-tuning stress responses for optimal survival and acclimatization. Building on previous studies that demonstrated the enhanced stress tolerance achieved by upregulating CBL and CIPK genes, we explore the regulatory mechanisms involving post-translational modifications and protein-protein interactions. Despite significant contributions from prior research, gaps persist in understanding the nuanced interplay between the CBL-CIPK system and plant hormone signaling under diverse abiotic stress conditions. In contrast to broader perspectives, our review focuses on the interaction of the pathway with crucial plant hormones and its implications for genetic engineering interventions to enhance crop stress resilience. This specialized perspective aims to contribute novel insights to advance our understanding of the potential of the CBL-CIPK pathway to mitigate crops' abiotic stress.
translated_keywords: 激素互作；CBL相互作用蛋白激酶；基因修饰；钙调磷酸酶B样蛋白；植物胁迫耐受力
translated_abstract: 非生物胁迫因子（如干旱、盐害、冷害和热害）对植物的生长发育具有深远影响，迫使植物启动复杂的细胞响应以实现适应与抗逆。在这些响应中，CBL-CIPK通路扮演着关键角色，该通路由钙调磷酸酶B样蛋白（CBLs）和CBL相互作用蛋白激酶（CIPKs）组成。其中，CIPKs作为丝氨酸/苏氨酸蛋白激酶，负责传递钙信号；而CBLs则作为钙传感器，调控植物对非生物胁迫的响应。本文综述了CBL-CIPK通路与植物激素（如脱落酸ABA、生长素IAA、乙烯ETH和茉莉酸JA）之间的复杂交互关系，并强调其在精细调节胁迫响应以优化生存和适应中的作用。基于先前研究表明通过上调CBL和CIPK基因可增强植物的胁迫耐受性，本文进一步探讨了涉及翻译后修饰和蛋白质-蛋白质相互作用的调控机制。尽管已有研究在这一领域取得了显著进展，但关于CBL-CIPK系统与不同非生物胁迫条件下植物激素信号之间微妙交互的理解仍存在不足。与更广泛的研究视角相比，本文聚焦于该通路与关键植物激素的相互作用及其对遗传工程干预提升作物抗逆性的意义。本研究的独特视角旨在为深入理解CBL-CIPK通路在缓解作物非生物胁迫中的潜力提供新的见解。

translated_title: 单细胞扩增基因组揭示了海洋中最为简约的自由生活的细菌。
affiliations: Evolutionary Genomics Group, Departamento Producción Vegetal y Microbiología, Universidad Miguel Hernández, Alicante, Spain.; Burnett School of Biomedical Sciences, University of Central Florida, Orlando, Florida, USA.; National Center for Integrated Coastal Research, University of Central Florida, Orlando, Florida, USA.
title: Single-amplified genomes reveal most streamlined free-living marine bacteria.
authors: Roda-Garcia Juan J; Haro-Moreno Jose M; Rodriguez-Valera Francisco; Almagro-Moreno Salvador; López-Pérez Mario
keywords: (Auto-generated) Single-amplified genomes; 流线型基因组; SAR86 clade; 基因组简化; 生存依赖性; Black Queen假说; 共现微生物; 生物信息学; 分子进化
abstract: Evolutionary adaptations of prokaryotes to the environment sometimes result in genome reduction. Our knowledge of this phenomenon among free-living bacteria remains scarce. We address the dynamics and limits of genome reduction by examining one of the most abundant bacteria in the ocean, the SAR86 clade. Despite its abundance, comparative genomics has been limited by the absence of pure cultures and the poor representation in metagenome-assembled genomes. We co-assembled multiple previously available single-amplified genomes to obtain the first complete genomes from members of the four families. All families showed a convergent evolutionary trajectory with characteristic features of streamlined genomes, most pronounced in the TMED112 family. This family has a genome size of ca. 1 Mb and only 1 bp as median intergenic distance, exceeding values found in other abundant microbes such as SAR11, OM43 and Prochlorococcus. This genomic simplification led to a reduction in the biosynthesis of essential molecules, DNA repair-related genes, and the ability to sense and respond to environmental factors, which could suggest an evolutionary dependence on other co-occurring microbes for survival (Black Queen hypothesis). Therefore, these reconstructed genomes within the SAR86 clade provide new insights into the limits of genome reduction in free-living marine bacteria.
translated_keywords: Single-amplified genomes; 流线型基因组; SAR86 clade; 基因组简化; 生存依赖性; Black Queen假说; 共现微生物; 生物信息学; 分子进化
translated_abstract: 原核生物对环境的进化适应有时会导致基因组缩减。然而，关于自由生活的细菌中这一现象的知识仍然非常有限。我们通过研究海洋中最为丰富的细菌之一——SAR86菌株来探讨基因组缩减的动力学和极限。尽管其丰度很高，但由于缺乏纯培养物以及在宏基因组组装基因组中的代表性不足，比较基因组学的研究一直受到限制。我们通过对多个先前获得的单细胞扩增基因组进行共组装，获得了来自四个家族成员的第一个完整基因组。所有家族都表现出一种趋同的进化轨迹，具有典型的简约型基因组特征，其中TMED112家族表现得最为显著。该家族的基因组大小约为1 Mb，中位数间基因距离仅为1个碱基对，超过了其他丰富微生物如SAR11、OM43和Prochlorococcus等的数值。这种基因组简化导致了必需分子合成能力、DNA修复相关基因数量以及对外界环境感知与响应能力的下降，这可能表明这些细菌在生存上对其他共存微生物存在依赖性（即“黑皇后假说”）。因此，这些重建的SAR86菌株基因组为理解自由生活海洋细菌基因组缩减的极限提供了新的视角。

translated_title: 比较基因组学分析揭示了芒果三个品种中CC-NBS-LRR基因的多重胁迫响应功能。
affiliations: State Key Laboratory for Conservation and Utilization of Subtropical Agro-bioresources, College of Life Science and Technology, Guangxi University, Nanning, Guangxi, China.; Department of Bioinformatics and Biotechnology, Government College University Faisalabad (GCUF), Faisalabad, Pakistan.; Key Laboratory of Biology and Genetic Improvement of Oil Crops, Ministry of Agriculture, Oil Crops Research Institute, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Wuhan, China.; Environment and Plant Protection Institute, Chinese Academy of Tropical Agricultural Sciences, Haikou, China.; Department of Pharmacology and Toxicology, College of Pharmacy, King Saud University, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
title: Comparative genomics profiling revealed multi-stress responsive roles of the CC-NBS-LRR genes in three mango cultivars.
authors: Tahir Ul Qamar Muhammad; Sadaqat Muhammad; Zhu Xi-Tong; Li Huan; Huang Xing; Fatima Kinza; Almutairi Mashal M; Chen Ling-Ling
keywords: multi omics; NBS-LRR; draft pan-genome; mango; machine learning
abstract: The nucleotide-binding site-leucine-rich repeat (NBS-LRR) gene family is the largest group of disease resistance (R) genes in plants and is active in response to viruses, bacteria, and fungi usually involved in effector-triggered immunity (ETI). Pangenome-wide studies allow researchers to analyze the genetic diversity of multiple species or their members simultaneously, providing a comprehensive understanding of the evolutionary relationships and diversity present among them. The draft pan-genome of three Mangifera indica cultivars (Alphonso, Hong Xiang Ya, and Tommy atkins) was constructed and Presence/absence variants (PAVs) were filtered through the ppsPCP pipeline. As a result, 2823 genes and 5907 PAVs from H. Xiang Ya, and 1266 genes and 2098 PAVs from T. atkins were added to the reference genome. For the identification of CC-NBS-LRR (CNL) genes in these mango cultivars, this draft pan-genome study has successfully identified 47, 27, and 36 members in Alphonso, H. Xiang Ya, and T. atkins respectively. The phylogenetic analysis divided MiCNL proteins into four distinct subgroups. All MiCNL genes are unevenly distributed on chromosomes. Both tandem and segmental duplication events played a significant role in the expansion of the CNL gene family. These genes contain cis-elements related to light, stress, hormone, and development. The analysis of protein-protein interactions (PPI) revealed that MiCNL proteins interacted with other defense-responsive proteins. Gene Ontology (GO) analysis indicated that MiCNL genes play a role in defense mechanisms within the organism. The expression level of the identified genes in fruit peel was observed under disease and cold stress which showed that Mi_A_CNL13 and 14 were up-regulated while Mi_A_CNL15, 25, 30, 31, and 40 were down-regulated in disease stress. On the other hand, Mi_A_CNL2, 14, 41, and 45 were up-regulated and Mi_A_CNL47 is down-regulated in cold stress. Subsequently, the Random Forest (RF) classifier was used to assess the multi-stress response of MiCNLs. It was found that Mi_A_CNL14 is a gene that responds to multiple stress conditions. The CNLs have similar protein structures which show that they are involved in the same function. The above findings provide a foundation for a deeper understanding of the functional characteristics of the mango CNL gene family.
translated_keywords: 多组学；NBS-LRR；泛基因组草图；芒果；机器学习
translated_abstract: 核苷酸结合位点-富含亮氨酸重复序列（NBS-LRR）基因家族是植物中最大的抗病（R）基因家族，在响应病毒、细菌和真菌等病原体时通常参与效应子触发免疫（ETI）。泛基因组研究使研究人员能够同时分析多个物种或其成员的遗传多样性，从而全面了解它们之间的进化关系和多样性。本研究构建了三个杧果栽培品种（Alphonso、Hong Xiang Ya 和 Tommy Atkins）的泛基因组草图，并通过ppsPCP 管道筛选了存在/缺失变异（PAVs）。结果表明，从Hong Xiang Ya 中添加了2823个基因和5907个PAVs 到参考基因组，而从Tommy Atkins 中添加了1266个基因和2098个PAVs。为了鉴定这些杧果栽培品种中的CC-NBS-LRR（CNL）基因，该泛基因组研究成功鉴定了Alphonso、Hong Xiang Ya 和 Tommy Atkins 分别有47、27 和36 个成员。系统发育分析将MiCNL 蛋白分为四个不同的亚组。所有MiCNL 基因在染色体上的分布不均。串联复制和片段复制事件在CNL 基因家族的扩展中发挥了重要作用。这些基因包含与光、胁迫、激素和发育相关的顺式作用元件。蛋白质-蛋白质相互作用（PPI）分析显示MiCNL 蛋白与其他防御响应蛋白相互作用。基因本体论（GO）分析表明MiCNL 基因在生物体的防御机制中发挥作用。观察到在果实表皮中鉴定出的基因在疾病和冷胁迫下的表达水平，结果显示Mi_A_CNL13 和Mi_A_CNL14 在疾病胁迫下上调，而Mi_A_CNL15、Mi_A_CNL25、Mi_A_CNL30、Mi_A_CNL31 和Mi_A_CNL40 下调。另一方面，在冷胁迫下，Mi_A_CNL2、Mi_A_CNL14、Mi_A_CNL41 和Mi_A_CNL45 上调，而Mi_A_CNL47 下调。随后，使用随机森林（RF）分类器评估MiCNL 的多胁迫响应。发现Mi_A_CNL14 是一个对多种胁迫条件有响应的基因。CNLs 具有相似的蛋白结构，表明它们参与相同的功能。上述发现为深入理解杧果CNL 基因家族的功能特性奠定了基础。

translated_title: 一种新兴的工业酵母
affiliations: Departamento de Ciências da Vida, Faculdade de Ciências e Tecnologia, UCIBIO, Universidade Nova de Lisboa, Caparica, Portugal.; Faculdade de Ciências e Tecnologia, Associate Laboratory i4HB - Institute for Health and Bioeconomy, Universidade Nova de Lisboa, Caparica, Portugal.; Department of Biology, CBMA (Centre of Molecular and Environmental Biology), University of Minho, Braga, Portugal.; Institute of Science and Innovation for Bio-Sustainability (IB-S), University of Minho, Braga, Portugal.
title: A glimpse at an early stage of microbe domestication revealed in the variable genome of Torulaspora delbrueckii, an emergent industrial yeast.
authors: Silva Margarida; Pontes Ana; Franco-Duarte Ricardo; Soares Pedro; Sampaio José Paulo; Sousa Maria João; Brito Patrícia H
keywords: Torulaspora delbrueckii; galactose metabolization gene; microbe domestication; pangenome and variable genome; microbial genomics; maltose metabolization gene
abstract: Microbe domestication has a major applied relevance but is still poorly understood from an evolutionary perspective. The yeast Torulaspora delbrueckii is gaining importance for biotechnology but little is known about its population structure, variation in gene content or possible domestication routes. Here, we show that T. delbrueckii is composed of five major clades. Among the three European clades, a lineage associated with the wild arboreal niche is sister to the two other lineages that are linked to anthropic environments, one to wine fermentations and the other to diverse sources including dairy products and bread dough (Mix-Anthropic clade). Using 64 genomes we assembled the pangenome and the variable genome of T. delbrueckii. A comparison with Saccharomyces cerevisiae indicated that the weight of the variable genome in the pangenome of T. delbrueckii is considerably smaller. An association of gene content and ecology supported the hypothesis that the Mix-Anthropic clade has the most specialized genome and indicated that some of the exclusive genes were implicated in galactose and maltose utilization. More detailed analyses traced the acquisition of a cluster of GAL genes in strains associated with dairy products and the expansion and functional diversification of MAL genes in strains isolated from bread dough. In contrast to S. cerevisiae, domestication in T. delbrueckii is not primarily driven by alcoholic fermentation but rather by adaptation to dairy and bread-production niches. This study expands our views on the processes of microbe domestication and on the trajectories leading to adaptation to anthropic niches.
translated_keywords: 德布氏酵母（Torulaspora delbrueckii）；半乳糖代谢基因；微生物驯化；泛基因组与可变基因组；微生物基因组学；麦芽糖代谢基因
translated_abstract: 微生物驯化具有重要的应用价值，但从进化的角度来看仍缺乏深入理解。Torulaspora delbrueckii 酵母在生物技术领域的重要性日益增加，但对其种群结构、基因内容变异以及可能的驯化路径知之甚少。本文研究发现，T. delbrueckii 包含五个主要分支。在三个欧洲分支中，与野生树栖生态位相关的分支是另外两个与人工作环境相关的分支的姐妹分支，其中一个分支与葡萄酒发酵相关，另一个分支则与包括乳制品和面团在内的多种来源相关（混合人源分支）。通过分析64个基因组，我们构建了T. delbrueckii的核心基因组和可变基因组，并将其与酿酒酵母（Saccharomyces cerevisiae）进行了比较，结果显示T. delbrueckii的可变基因组在其泛基因组中的比重明显较小。基因内容与生态关联分析支持了混合人源分支具有最特化基因组的假设，并表明一些专属基因可能与半乳糖和麦芽糖利用有关。进一步详细分析追踪了与乳制品相关的菌株中GAL基因簇的获得，以及从面团中分离的菌株中MAL基因的扩展和功能多样化。与酿酒酵母不同，T. delbrueckii的驯化并非主要由酒精发酵驱动，而是由适应乳制品和面包生产等生态位所主导。本研究拓展了我们对微生物驯化过程及其向人工作用生态位适应轨迹的理解。

translated_title: 泛基因组分析揭示了棉花中转座子驱动的基因组演化。
affiliations: National Key Laboratory of Crop Genetic Improvement, Hubei Hongshan Laboratory, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan, China.; National Key Laboratory of Crop Genetic Improvement, Hubei Hongshan Laboratory, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan, China. jyli@mail.hzau.edu.cn.; National Key Laboratory of Crop Genetic Improvement, Hubei Hongshan Laboratory, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan, China. mjwang@mail.hzau.edu.cn.
title: Pangenome analysis reveals transposon-driven genome evolution in cotton.
authors: He Xin; Qi Zhengyang; Liu Zhenping; Chang Xing; Zhang Xianlong; Li Jianying; Wang Maojun
keywords: Polyploidy; Comparative pangenome; Cotton; LTR retrotransposon
abstract: Transposable elements (TEs) have a profound influence on the trajectory of plant evolution, driving genome expansion and catalyzing phenotypic diversification. The pangenome, a comprehensive genetic pool encompassing all variations within a species, serves as an invaluable tool, unaffected by the confounding factors of intraspecific diversity. This allows for a more nuanced exploration of plant TE evolution. Here, we constructed a pangenome for diploid A-genome cotton using 344 accessions from representative geographical regions, including 223 from China as the main component. We found 511 Mb of non-reference sequences (NRSs) and revealed the presence of 5479 previously undiscovered protein-coding genes. Our comprehensive approach enabled us to decipher the genetic underpinnings of the distinct geographic distributions of cotton. Notably, we identified 3301 presence-absence variations (PAVs) that are closely tied to gene expression patterns within the pangenome, among which 2342 novel expression quantitative trait loci (eQTLs) were found residing in NRSs. Our investigation also unveiled contrasting patterns of transposon proliferation between diploid and tetraploid cotton, with long terminal repeat (LTR) retrotransposons exhibiting a synchronized surge in polyploids. Furthermore, the invasion of LTR retrotransposons from the A subgenome to the D subgenome triggered a substantial expansion of the latter following polyploidization. In addition, we found that TE insertions were responsible for the loss of 36.2% of species-specific genes, as well as the generation of entirely new species-specific genes. Our pangenome analyses provide new insights into cotton genomics and subgenome dynamics after polyploidization and demonstrate the power of pangenome approaches for elucidating transposon impacts and genome evolution.
translated_keywords: 多倍体；比较泛基因组；棉花；长末端重复反转录转座子
translated_abstract: 转座元件（TEs）对植物进化轨迹具有深远影响，驱动基因组扩张并催化表型多样化。泛基因组作为包含物种内所有变异的综合遗传池，不受种内多样性干扰因素的影响，为更细致地探索植物TE进化提供了宝贵的工具。本文利用来自代表性地理区域的344个棉花样本构建了二倍体A基因组棉的泛基因组，其中包括来自中国的223个样本作为主要组成部分。我们发现了511 Mb的非参考序列（NRSs），并揭示了5479个先前未发现的编码蛋白基因的存在。我们的全面方法使我们能够解读棉花不同地理分布的遗传基础。值得注意的是，我们鉴定了3301个与泛基因组内基因表达模式密切相关的存在-缺失变异（PAVs），其中2342个新的表达数量性状位点（eQTLs）位于NRSs中。此外，我们的研究还揭示了二倍体和四倍体棉花之间转座子扩增的不同模式，长末端重复（LTR）反转录转座子在多倍体中表现出同步增长。进一步的研究表明，A亚基因组向D亚基因组的LTR反转录转座子入侵在多倍化后触发了D亚基因组的显著扩张。此外，我们发现TE插入导致了36.2%的物种特有基因的丢失以及全新物种特有基因的产生。我们的泛基因组分析为多倍化后棉花基因组学和亚基因组动态提供了新见解，并展示了泛基因组方法在阐明转座子影响和基因组进化中的强大作用。

translated_title: 来自模式系统的启示
affiliations: Fuller Evolutionary Biology Program, Cornell Lab of Ornithology, Ithaca, New York, USA.; Department of Ecology and Evolutionary Biology, Cornell University, Ithaca, New York, USA.
title: How structural variants shape avian phenotypes: Lessons from model systems.
authors: Recuerda María; Campagna Leonardo
keywords: Avian model systems; pangenomes; structural variants; chromosomal rearrangements; genotype/phenotype associations
abstract: Despite receiving significant recent attention, the relevance of structural variation (SV) in driving phenotypic diversity remains understudied, although recent advances in long-read sequencing, bioinformatics and pangenomic approaches have enhanced SV detection. We review the role of SVs in shaping phenotypes in avian model systems, and identify some general patterns in SV type, length and their associated traits. We found that most of the avian SVs so far identified are short indels in chickens, which are frequently associated with changes in body weight and plumage colouration. Overall, we found that relatively short SVs are more frequently detected, likely due to a combination of their prevalence compared to large SVs, and a detection bias, stemming primarily from the widespread use of short-read sequencing and associated analytical methods. SVs most commonly involve non-coding regions, especially introns, and when patterns of inheritance were reported, SVs associated primarily with dominant discrete traits. We summarise several examples of phenotypic convergence across different species, mediated by different SVs in the same or different genes and different types of changes in the same gene that can lead to various phenotypes. Complex rearrangements and supergenes, which can simultaneously affect and link several genes, tend to have pleiotropic phenotypic effects. Additionally, SVs commonly co-occur with single-nucleotide polymorphisms, highlighting the need to consider all types of genetic changes to understand the basis of phenotypic traits. We end by summarising expectations for when long-read technologies become commonly implemented in non-model birds, likely leading to an increase in SV discovery and characterisation. The growing interest in this subject suggests an increase in our understanding of the phenotypic effects of SVs in upcoming years.
translated_keywords: 鸟类模型系统；泛基因组；结构变异；染色体易位；基因型/表型关联
translated_abstract: 尽管结构变异（SV）在驱动表型多样性中的作用近年来引起了广泛关注，但其相关研究仍显不足，尽管长读长测序、生物信息学和泛基因组方法的进步已经提升了SV检测的能力。本文综述了SV在鸟类模式生物系统中塑造表型的作用，并识别了一些SV类型、长度及其相关性状的一般模式。我们发现，迄今为止大多数被鉴定出的鸟类SV是鸡中的短片段插入缺失突变，这些突变更常与体重变化和羽毛颜色变化有关。总体而言，我们发现相对短的SV更常被检测到，这可能归因于它们相对于大型SV的普遍性以及检测偏倚，这种偏倚主要源于短读长测序及其相关分析方法的广泛应用。SV最常见于非编码区域，尤其是内含子区，且当遗传模式被报道时，SV主要与显性离散性状相关联。我们总结了几种不同物种通过相同或不同基因中的不同SV以及同一基因中不同类型的变化导致表型趋同的例子。复杂的重排和超级基因，这些可以同时影响并关联多个基因，往往具有多效性表型效应。此外，SV通常与单核苷酸多态性共存，这凸显了需要考虑所有类型的遗传变化以理解表型性状的基础。最后，我们总结了当长读长技术在非模式鸟类中得到广泛应用时的预期，这可能会导致SV的发现和特征描述增加。对该主题的兴趣日益增长表明，我们对SV表型效应的理解将在未来几年有所提高。

translated_title: 叶绿体基因组的综合分析为黄花稔属的进化提供了新见解。
affiliations: Hubei Provincial Key Laboratory for Protection and Application of Special Plant Germplasm in Wuling Area of China, College of Life Sciences, South-Central Minzu University, Wuhan 430074, China.; College of Life Sciences, Zhejiang Normal University, Jinhua 321004, China.; College of Computer Science, South-Central Minzu University, Wuhan 430074, China.
title: A Comprehensive Analysis of Chloroplast Genome Provides New Insights into the Evolution of the Genus Chrysosplenium.
authors: Yang Tiange; Wu Zhihua; Tie Jun; Qin Rui; Wang Jiangqing; Liu Hong
keywords: phylogeny; comparative genome; Chrysosplenium; chloroplast; selection pressure
abstract: Chrysosplenium, a perennial herb in the family Saxifragaceae, prefers to grow in low light and moist environments and is divided into two sections of Alternifolia and Oppositifolia based on phyllotaxy. Although there has been some progress in the phylogeny of Chrysosplenium over the years, the phylogenetic position of some species is still controversial. In this study, we assembled chloroplast genomes (cp genomes) of 34 Chrysosplenium species and performed comparative genomic and phylogenetic analyses in combination with other cp genomes of previously known Chrysosplenium species, for a total of 44 Chrysosplenium species. The comparative analyses revealed that cp genomes of Chrysosplenium species were more conserved in terms of genome structure, gene content and arrangement, SSRs, and codon preference, but differ in genome size and SC/IR boundaries. Phylogenetic analysis showed that cp genomes effectively improved the phylogenetic support and resolution of Chrysosplenium species and strongly supported Chrysosplenium species as a monophyletic taxon and divided into three branches. The results also showed that the sections of Alternifolia and Oppositifolia were not monophyletic with each other, and that C. microspermum was not clustered with other Chrysosplenium species with alternate leaves, but with C. sedakowii into separate branches. In addition, we identified 10 mutational hotspot regions that could serve as potential DNA barcodes for Chrysosplenium species identification. In contrast to Peltoboykinia, the clpP and ycf2 genes of Chrysosplenium were subjected to positive selection and had multiple significant positive selection sites. We further detected a significant positive selection site on the petG gene between the two sections of Chrysosplenium. These evolutionary characteristics may be related to the growth environment of Chrysosplenium species. This study enriches the cp genomes of Chrysosplenium species and provides a reference for future studies on its evolution and origin.
translated_keywords: 系统发育；比较基因组；黄花蒿；叶绿体；选择压力
translated_abstract: 黄花繁缕属（Chrysosplenium）是虎耳草科的一种多年生草本植物，偏好在弱光和潮湿环境中生长，根据叶序可分为Alternifolia和Oppositifolia两个组。尽管多年来黄花繁缕属的系统发育研究取得了一些进展，但某些物种的系统发育位置仍存在争议。本研究对34种黄花繁缕属植物的叶绿体基因组（cp基因组）进行了组装，并结合已知的其他黄花繁缕属植物的cp基因组数据，共分析了44种黄花繁缕属植物。比较分析显示，黄花繁缕属植物的cp基因组在基因组结构、基因内容与排列、SSR以及密码子偏好等方面较为保守，但在基因组大小和SC/IR边界上存在差异。系统发育分析表明，cp基因组显著提高了黄花繁缕属植物的系统发育支持度和分辨率，明确支持该属为单系群，并分为三个分支。结果还显示，Alternifolia组和Oppositifolia组并非单系群，且C. microspermum并未与其他具有对生叶的黄花繁缕属物种聚类，而是与C. sedakowii聚为独立分支。此外，我们鉴定了10个可能作为黄花繁缕属物种鉴定潜在DNA条形码的突变热点区域。与Peltoboykinia相比，黄花繁缕属的clpP和ycf2基因经历了正选择，并具有多个显著的正选择位点。进一步检测发现，黄花繁缕属两个组之间的petG基因也存在显著的正选择位点。这些进化特征可能与其生长环境有关。本研究丰富了黄花繁缕属植物的cp基因组数据，为今后对其进化和起源的研究提供了参考。

translated_title: 一种发现不完整微生物组装的泛基因组内容的方法学
affiliations: Department of Mathematical, Physical and Computer Sciences, University of Parma, Parco Area delle Scienze 53/a (Campus), Parma, 43124, PR, Italy. Electronic address: vincenzo.bonnici@unipr.it.; Department of Computer Science, University of Verona, Strada le Grazie, 15, Verona, 37134, VR, Italy.; Fondazione IRCCS Casa Sollievo della Sofferenza, San Giovanni Rotondo (FG), 71013, Italy; Department of Experimental Medicine, Sapienza University of Rome, Rome (RM), Italy.
title: PanDelos-frags: A methodology for discovering pangenomic content of incomplete microbial assemblies.
authors: Bonnici Vincenzo; Mengoni Claudia; Mangoni Manuel; Franco Giuditta; Giugno Rosalba
keywords: Computational approach; Gene families; Pangenome; Fragmented genomes; Sequence homology
abstract: Pangenomics was originally defined as the problem of comparing the composition of genes into gene families within a set of bacterial isolates belonging to the same species. The problem requires the calculation of sequence homology among such genes. When combined with metagenomics, namely for human microbiome composition analysis, gene-oriented pangenome detection becomes a promising method to decipher ecosystem functions and population-level evolution. Established computational tools are able to investigate the genetic content of isolates for which a complete genomic sequence is available. However, there is a plethora of incomplete genomes that are available on public resources, which only a few tools may analyze. Incomplete means that the process for reconstructing their genomic sequence is not complete, and only fragments of their sequence are currently available. However, the information contained in these fragments may play an essential role in the analyses. Here, we present PanDelos-frags, a computational tool which exploits and extends previous results in analyzing complete genomes. It provides a new methodology for inferring missing genetic information and thus for managing incomplete genomes. PanDelos-frags outperforms state-of-the-art approaches in reconstructing gene families in synthetic benchmarks and in a real use case of metagenomics. PanDelos-frags is publicly available at https://github.com/InfOmics/PanDelos-frags.

translated_title: 基于人群的纳米孔测序研究HIV-1泛基因组以识别耐药突变
affiliations: Clinical Research Center, National Hospital Organization Nagoya Medical Center, 4-1-1 Sannomaru, Naka-ku, Nagoya, Aichi, 460-0001, Japan.; Clinical Research Center, National Hospital Organization Nagoya Medical Center, 4-1-1 Sannomaru, Naka-ku, Nagoya, Aichi, 460-0001, Japan. iwatani.yasumasa.cp@mail.hosp.go.jp.; Division of Basic Medicine, Nagoya University Graduate School of Medicine, Nagoya, Aichi, Japan. iwatani.yasumasa.cp@mail.hosp.go.jp.
title: Population-based nanopore sequencing of the HIV-1 pangenome to identify drug resistance mutations.
authors: Ode Hirotaka; Matsuda Masakazu; Shigemi Urara; Mori Mikiko; Yamamura Yoshimi; Nakata Yoshihiro; Okazaki Reiko; Kubota Mai; Setoyama Yuka; Imahashi Mayumi; Yokomaku Yoshiyuki; Iwatani Yasumasa
keywords: Mutation; Pangenome; Viral genome; Nanopore sequencing; Drug resistance; HIV-1; Recombinant forms
abstract: HIV-1 drug resistance genotypic tests have primarily been performed by Sanger sequencing of gene segments encoding different drug target proteins. Since the number of targets has increased with the addition of a new class of antiretroviral drugs, a simple high-throughput system for assessing nucleotide sequences throughout the HIV-1 genome is required. Here, we developed a new solution using nanopore sequencing of viral pangenomes amplified by PCR. Benchmark tests using HIV-1 molecular clones demonstrated an accuracy of up to 99.9%. In addition, validation tests of our protocol in 106 clinical samples demonstrated high concordance of drug resistance and tropism genotypes (92.5% and 98.1%, respectively) between the nanopore sequencing-based results and archived clinical determinations made based on Sanger sequencing data. These results suggest that our new approach will be a powerful solution for the comprehensive survey of HIV-1 drug resistance mutations in clinical settings.
translated_keywords: 突变；泛基因组；病毒基因组；纳米孔测序；耐药性；HIV-1；重组形式
translated_abstract: 针对HIV-1药物耐药性的基因型检测主要通过Sanger测序法对编码不同药物靶点蛋白的基因片段进行测序。随着新型抗逆转录病毒药物的加入，HIV-1的药物靶点数量增加，因此需要一种简单且高通量的系统来评估整个HIV-1基因组的核苷酸序列。本文开发了一种基于PCR扩增病毒泛基因组并通过纳米孔测序的新方法。使用HIV-1分子克隆的基准测试显示其准确性高达99.9%。此外，在106份临床样本中的验证测试表明，基于纳米孔测序的结果与基于Sanger测序数据的存档临床判定在药物耐药性和病毒株嗜性基因型方面具有高度一致性（分别为92.5%和98.1%）。这些结果表明，我们的新方法将是临床环境中全面调查HIV-1药物耐药突变的强大工具。

translated_title: 咪唑乙烟酸破坏植物磷稳态和获取策略。
affiliations: MOE Key Laboratory of Environment Remediation and Ecological Health, College of Natural Resource & Environmental Sciences, Zhejiang University, Hangzhou 310058, PR China.; Key Laboratory of Pollution Exposure and Health Intervention of Zhejiang Province, Interdisciplinary Research Academy (IRA), Zhejiang Shuren University, Hangzhou 310015, PR China. Electronic address: liulij@zjsru.edu.cn.; State Key Laboratory of Rice Biology, China National Rice Research Institute, No. 359 Tiyuchang Road, Hangzhou 310006, PR China.; MOE Key Laboratory of Environment Remediation and Ecological Health, College of Natural Resource & Environmental Sciences, Zhejiang University, Hangzhou 310058, PR China. title: Imazethapyr disrupts plant phosphorus homeostasis and acquisition strategies.
authors: Li Yihao; Zhang Nan; Xu Jiarui; Liu Lijuan; Cao Xiaochuang; Lin Xianyong; Sun Chengliang
keywords: Phytotoxicity; Adaption response; Imazethapyr; Phosphorus; Mineral nutrition
abstract: The deficiency of essential mineral nutrients caused by xenobiotics often results in plant mortality or an inability to complete its life cycle. Imazethapyr, a widely utilized imidazolinone herbicide, has a long-lasting presence in the soil-plant system and can induce toxicity in non-target plants. However, the effects of imazethapyr on mineral nutrient homeostasis remain poorly comprehended. In this study, Arabidopsis seedlings exposed to concentrations of 4 and 10 μg/L imazethapyr showed noticeable reductions in shoot development and displayed a distinct dark purple color, which is commonly associated with phosphorus (P) deficiency in crops. Additionally, the total P content in both the shoots and roots of Arabidopsis significantly decreased following imazethapyr treatment when compared to the control groups. Through the complementary use of physiological and molecular analyses, we discovered that imazethapyr hinders the abundance and functionality of inorganic phosphorus (Pi) transporters and acid phosphatase. Furthermore, imazethapyr impairs the plant's Pi-deficiency adaptation strategies, such as inhibiting Pi transporter activities and impeding root hair development, which ultimately exacerbate P starvation. These results provide compelling evidence that residues of imazethapyr have the potential to disrupt plant P homeostasis and acquisition strategies. These findings offer valuable insights for risk assessment and highlight the need to reconsider the indiscriminate use of imazethapyr, particularly under specific scenarios such as nutrient deficiency.
translated_keywords: 植毒效应；适应性响应；咪唑乙烟酸；磷；矿质营养
translated_abstract: 由异生物质引起的必需矿质营养缺乏常导致植物死亡或无法完成其生命周期。咪唑乙烟酸（imazethapyr）是一种广泛应用的咪唑啉酮类除草剂，在土壤-植物系统中持久存在，并可能对非靶标植物产生毒性作用。然而，咪唑乙烟酸对矿质营养稳态的影响尚不完全清楚。本研究中，暴露于4和10 μg/L浓度咪唑乙烟酸下的拟南芥幼苗表现出明显的地上部分发育抑制以及显著的深紫色外观，这通常与作物中的磷（P）缺乏相关。此外，与对照组相比，经过咪唑乙烟酸处理后，拟南芥地上部分和根系中的总磷含量均显著下降。通过生理学和分子生物学分析的互补使用，我们发现咪唑乙烟酸会抑制无机磷（Pi）转运蛋白和酸性磷酸酶的丰度及其功能。此外，咪唑乙烟酸还损害了植物应对Pi缺乏的适应策略，例如抑制Pi转运蛋白活性并阻碍根毛发育，最终加剧了磷饥饿。这些结果提供了有力证据，表明咪唑乙烟酸残留可能破坏植物的磷稳态和获取策略。这些发现为风险评估提供了宝贵的见解，并强调了重新考虑咪唑乙烟酸非选择性使用的必要性，特别是在特定情境下如养分缺乏时。

translated_title: 海洋微藻病毒泛基因组的功能谱系分析与进化研究

title: Functional Profiling and Evolutionary Analysis of a Marine Microalgal Virus Pangenome.
authors: Lobb Briallen; Shapter Anson; Doxey Andrew C; Nissimov Jozef I
keywords: pangenomics; Coccolithovirus; Chlorovirus; algal viruses; AlphaFold; Phycodnaviridae; Prasinovirus; functional annotation; genomes
abstract: Phycodnaviridae are large double-stranded DNA viruses, which facilitate studies of host-virus interactions and co-evolution due to their prominence in algal infection and their role in the life cycle of algal blooms. However, the genomic interpretation of these viruses is hampered by a lack of functional information, stemming from the surprising number of hypothetical genes of unknown function. It is also unclear how many of these genes are widely shared within the clade. Using one of the most extensively characterized genera, Coccolithovirus, as a case study, we combined pangenome analysis, multiple functional annotation tools, AlphaFold structural modeling, and literature analysis to compare the core and accessory pangenome and assess support for novel functional predictions. We determined that the Coccolithovirus pangenome shares 30% of its genes with all 14 strains, making up the core. Notably, 34% of its genes were found in at most three strains. Core genes were enriched in early expression based on a transcriptomic dataset of Coccolithovirus EhV-201 algal infection, were more likely to be similar to host proteins than the non-core set, and were more likely to be involved in vital functions such as replication, recombination, and repair. In addition, we generated and collated annotations for the EhV representative EhV-86 from 12 different annotation sources, building up information for 142 previously hypothetical and putative membrane proteins. AlphaFold was further able to predict structures for 204 EhV-86 proteins with a modelling accuracy of good-high. These functional clues, combined with generated AlphaFold structures, provide a foundational framework for the future characterization of this model genus (and other giant viruses) and a further look into the evolution of the Coccolithovirus proteome.
translated_keywords: 泛基因组学；方壳病毒；绿藻病毒；藻类病毒；AlphaFold；衣藻病毒科；原绿病毒；功能注释；基因组
translated_abstract: Phycodnaviridae是一类大型双链DNA病毒，在藻类感染及藻华生命周期中占据重要地位，因此有助于研究宿主-病毒相互作用和共同进化。然而，由于大量未知功能的假想基因的存在，这些病毒的基因组解释受到阻碍。此外，尚不清楚这些基因中有多少在该分支中广泛共享。以Coccolithovirus这一最广泛研究的属为例，我们结合泛基因组分析、多种功能注释工具、AlphaFold结构建模以及文献分析，比较了核心与辅助泛基因组，并评估了对新功能预测的支持。研究发现，Coccolithovirus泛基因组中有30%的基因与所有14个菌株共享，构成核心基因组；值得注意的是，有34%的基因仅存在于最多三个菌株中。基于Coccolithovirus EhV-201藻类感染的转录组数据集，核心基因在早期表达中富集，更可能与宿主蛋白相似，且更可能参与复制、重组和修复等关键功能。此外，我们从12种不同的注释来源生成并整合了EhV代表株EhV-86的注释信息，为142个先前假定或推测的膜蛋白提供了信息。AlphaFold还能够以良好的建模精度预测EhV-86蛋白中204个蛋白的结构。这些功能线索，结合生成的AlphaFold结构，为未来对该模型属（及其他巨型病毒）的表征以及对Coccolithovirus蛋白质组进化的进一步研究提供了基础框架。

translated_title: 综述
affiliations: School of Agriculture, GIET University, Rayagada, Odisha, India.; RCSM College of Agriculture, Kolhapur, Maharashtra, India.; Department of Botany, Shailabala Women's Autonomous College, Cuttack, Odisha, India.; Department of Soil Science and Agricultural Chemistry, VOC AGRL College and Research Institute, Killikulam, India.; Department of Plant Pathology, College of Agriculture, Jawarharlal Nehru Krishi Vishwavidyalaya, Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh, India.; Department of Botany, Ravenshaw University, Cuttack, Odisha, India.; Department of Botany, College of Basic Science and Humanities, Odisha University of Agriculture & Technology, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India.; Department of Chemistry, IIT Bombay, Mumbai, India.; Department of Plant Pathology, College of Agriculture, Odisha University of Agriculture & Technology, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India.
title: Enhancing Agricultural Sustainability Through Rhizomicrobiome: A Review.
authors: Behera Prateek Ranjan; Behera Kishan Kumar; Sethi Gangadhar; Prabina B Jeberlin; Bai A Thoyajakshi; Sipra B S; Adarsh Varanasi; Das Sasmita; Behera Kanhu Charan; Singh Lakshmi; Mishra Mihir Kumar; Behera Maheswari
keywords: rhizomicrobiome; sustainable agriculture; plant−microbe interaction; rhizosphere
abstract: Sustainable agriculture represents the responsible utilization of natural resources while safeguarding the well-being of the natural environment. It encompasses the objectives of preserving the environment, fostering economic growth, and promoting socioeconomic equality. To achieve sustainable development for humanity, it is imperative to prioritize sustainable agriculture. One significant approach to achieving this transition is the extensive utilization of microbes, which play a crucial role due to the genetic reliance of plants on the beneficial functions provided by symbiotic microbes. This review focuses on the significance of rhizospheric microbial communities, also known as the rhizomicrobiome (RM). It is a complex community of microorganisms that live in the rhizosphere and influence the plant's growth and health. It provides its host plant with various benefits related to plant growth, including biocontrol, biofertilization, phytostimulation, rhizoremediation, stress resistance, and other advantageous properties. Yet, the mechanisms by which the RM contributes to sustainable agriculture remain largely unknown. Investigating this microbial population presents a significant opportunity to advance toward sustainable agriculture. Hence, this study aims to provide an overview of the diversity and applications of RM in sustainable agriculture practices. Lately, there has been growing momentum in various areas related to rhizobiome research and its application in agriculture. This includes rhizosphere engineering, synthetic microbiome application, agent-based modeling of the rhizobiome, and metagenomic studies. So, developing bioformulations of these beneficial microorganisms that support plant growth could serve as a promising solution for future strategies aimed at achieving a new green revolution.
translated_keywords: 根际微生物群；可持续农业；植物-微生物互作；根际
translated_abstract: 可持续农业代表了对自然资源负责任的利用，同时保护自然环境的福祉。其目标包括保护环境、促进经济增长以及推动社会经济平等。为了实现人类的可持续发展，优先发展可持续农业至关重要。实现这一转型的一个重要途径是广泛利用微生物，因为植物依赖于共生微生物提供的有益功能，这使得微生物发挥了关键作用。本文综述了根际微生物群落（即根系微生物组，RM）的重要性。这是一种生活在根际并影响植物生长和健康的复杂微生物群落，它为宿主植物提供了多种与植物生长相关的益处，包括生物防治、生物肥料、植物刺激、根区修复、抗逆性和其他有利特性。然而，根系微生物组对可持续农业的贡献机制仍知之甚少。研究这一微生物群体为推进可持续农业提供了重大机遇。因此，本研究旨在概述根系微生物组在可持续农业实践中的多样性和应用。近年来，与根系微生物组研究及其在农业中的应用相关的多个领域取得了显著进展，包括根际工程、合成微生物组的应用、根系微生物组的基于代理的建模以及宏基因组学研究。因此，开发支持植物生长的这些有益微生物的生物制剂，可能成为未来实现新的绿色革命战略的有前景的解决方案。

translated_title: 解脲支原体复合体中的物种界定与比较基因组学
affiliations: Department of Pathology and Laboratory Medicine, University of Rochester Medical Center, Rochester, New York, USA.; Department of Pathology, Anatomy, and Cell Biology, Thomas Jefferson University, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA.; Department of Microbiology and Immunology, University of Rochester Medical Center, Rochester, New York, USA.
title: Species Delineation and Comparative Genomics within the Campylobacter ureolyticus Complex.
authors: Maki Joel J; Howard Mondraya; Connelly Sara; Pettengill Matthew A; Hardy Dwight J; Cameron Andrew
keywords: macrolide; macrolides; anaerobe; Campylobacter; Campylobacter ureolyticus; pangenome; breast abscess; whole-genome sequencing
abstract: Campylobacter ureolyticus is an emerging pathogen increasingly appreciated as a common cause of gastroenteritis and extra-intestinal infections in humans. Outside the setting of gastroenteritis, little work has been done to describe the genomic content and relatedness of the species, especially regarding clinical isolates. We reviewed the epidemiology of clinical C. ureolyticus cultured by our institution over the past 10 years. Fifty-one unique C. ureolyticus isolates were identified between January 2010 and August 2022, mostly originating from abscesses and blood cultures. To clarify the taxonomic relationships between isolates and to attribute specific genes with different clinical manifestations, we sequenced 19 available isolates from a variety of clinical specimen types and conducted a pangenomic analysis with publicly available C. ureolyticus genomes. Digital DNA:DNA hybridization suggested that these C. ureolyticus comprised a species complex of 10 species clusters (SCs) and several subspecies clusters. Although some orthologous genes or gene functions were enriched in isolates found in different SCs and clinical specimens, no association was significant. Nearly a third of the isolates possessed antimicrobial resistance genes, including the ermA resistance gene, potentially conferring resistance to macrolides, the treatment of choice for severe human campylobacteriosis. This work effectively doubles the number of publicly available C. ureolyticus genomes, provides further clarification of taxonomic relationships within this bacterial complex, and identifies target SCs for future analysis.
translated_keywords: 大环内酯类；大环内酯类；厌氧菌；弯曲菌；解脲弯曲菌；泛基因组；乳腺脓肿；全基因组测序
translated_abstract: 尿素分解菌（*Campylobacter ureolyticus*）是一种新兴的人类病原体，在胃肠道感染和肠外感染中的致病作用日益受到重视。在非胃肠道感染背景下，关于该物种基因组内容及其亲缘关系的研究较少，尤其是针对临床分离株的研究。我们回顾了过去十年本机构分离到的临床*Campylobacter ureolyticus*的流行病学特征。2010年1月至2022年8月期间共鉴定出51株独特的*Campylobacter ureolyticus*分离株，主要来源于脓液和血液培养物。为了明确分离株之间的分类学关系，并将特定基因与不同的临床表现联系起来，我们对19株来自多种临床标本类型的可获得分离株进行了全基因组测序，并结合公共数据库中的*Campylobacter ureolyticus*基因组开展了泛基因组分析。数字DNA-DNA杂交结果显示，这些*Campylobacter ureolyticus*构成了一个包含10个种群簇（SCs）以及若干亚种群簇的复合体。尽管不同种群簇和临床标本来源的分离株中存在一些同源基因或基因功能的富集现象，但未发现显著相关性。近三分之一的分离株携带抗微生物耐药基因，包括可能赋予大环内酯类药物（治疗人类严重弯曲杆菌病的首选药物）耐药性的*ermA*耐药基因。本研究有效将公开可用的*Campylobacter ureolyticus*基因组数量增加了一倍，进一步明确了这一细菌复合体内的分类学关系，并确定了未来研究的目标种群簇。

translated_title: 一种细菌基因组和可移动元件注释管道

title: Beav: a bacterial genome and mobile element annotation pipeline.
authors: Jung Jewell M; Rahman Arafat; Schiffer Andrea M; Weisberg Alexandra J
keywords: genomics; plant-microbe interactions; Agrobacterium tumefaciens; annotation; mobile genetic elements
abstract: Comprehensive and accurate genome annotation is crucial for inferring the predicted functions of an organism. Numerous tools exist to annotate genes, gene clusters, mobile genetic elements, and other diverse features. However, these tools and pipelines can be difficult to install and run, be specialized for a particular element or feature, or lack annotations for larger elements that provide important genomic context. Integrating results across analyses is also important for understanding gene function. To address these challenges, we present the Beav annotation pipeline. Beav is a command-line tool that automates the annotation of bacterial genome sequences, mobile genetic elements, molecular systems and gene clusters, key regulatory features, and other elements. Beav uses existing tools in addition to custom models, scripts, and databases to annotate diverse elements, systems, and sequence features. Custom databases for plant-associated microbes are incorporated to improve annotation of key virulence and symbiosis genes in agriculturally important pathogens and mutualists. Beav includes an optional Agrobacterium-specific pipeline that identifies and classifies oncogenic plasmids and annotates plasmid-specific features. Following the completion of all analyses, annotations are consolidated to produce a single comprehensive output. Finally, Beav generates publication-quality genome and plasmid maps. Beav is on Bioconda and is available for download at https://github.com/weisberglab/beav. Annotation of genome features, such as the presence of genes and their predicted function, or larger loci encoding secretion systems or biosynthetic gene clusters, is necessary for understanding the functions encoded by an organism. Genomes can also host diverse mobile genetic elements, such as integrative and conjugative elements and/or phages, that are often not annotated by existing pipelines. These elements can horizontally mobilize genes encoding for virulence, antimicrobial resistance, or other adaptive functions and alter the phenotype of an organism. We developed a software pipeline, called Beav, that combines new and existing tools for the comprehensive annotation of these and other major features. Existing pipelines often misannotate loci important for virulence or mutualism in plant-associated bacteria. Beav includes custom databases and optional workflows for the improved annotation of plant-associated bacteria. Beav is designed to be easy to install and run, making comprehensive genome annotation broadly available to the research community.
translated_keywords: 基因组学；植物-微生物互作；农杆菌；注释；可移动遗传元件
translated_abstract: //github.com/weisberglab/beav下载。注释基因组特征（如基因的存在及其预测功能，或编码分泌系统或生物合成基因簇的大片段）对于理解生物体所编码的功能是必要的。基因组还可以携带各种移动遗传元件，例如整合型和接合型元件以及/或噬菌体，而这些通常未被现有流程注释。这些元件可以通过水平转移编码毒力、抗微生物耐药性或其他适应性功能的基因，并改变生物体的表型。我们开发了一种名为Beav的软件流程，结合新旧工具对这些及其他主要特征进行全面注释。现有流程常常错误注释植物相关细菌中与毒力或共生相关的位点。Beav包含自定义数据库和可选工作流，以改善植物相关细菌的注释质量。Beav的设计易于安装和运行，使全面的基因组注释广泛应用于研究社区。

affiliations: Department of Biophysics, Molecular Biology and Bioinformatics, University of Calcutta, Kolkata, India.
title: Systems biology of plant metabolic interactions.
authors: Sarkar Devlina; Kundu Sudip
keywords: (Auto-generated) 代谢;系统生物学;植物生理;代谢通量;计算工具;代谢网络;代谢变异;生物信息学;分子生物学
abstract: Metabolism is the key cellular process of plant physiology. Understanding metabolism and its dynamical behavior under different conditions may help plant biotechnologists to design new cultivars with desired goals. Computational systems biochemistry and incorporation of different omics data unravelled active metabolism and its variations in plants. In this review, we mainly focus on the basics of flux balance analysis (FBA), elementary flux mode analysis (EFMA), and some advanced computational tools. We describe some important results that were obtained using these tools. Limitations and challenges are also discussed.
translated_keywords: 代谢;系统生物学;植物生理;代谢通量;计算工具;代谢网络;代谢变异;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 代谢是植物生理学的关键细胞过程。理解代谢及其在不同条件下的动态行为，可能有助于植物生物技术专家设计出具有期望目标的新品种。计算系统生化方法与多种组学数据的整合揭示了植物中活跃的代谢活动及其变化。本文综述了通量平衡分析（FBA）、初等通量模式分析（EFMA）以及一些高级计算工具的基础知识，并描述了使用这些工具所获得的一些重要结果。同时讨论了其局限性和挑战。

title: The human pangenome reference anticipates equitable and fundamental genomic insights.
authors: Frazer Kelly A; Schork Nicholas J

abstract: For the past few years, researchers in the Human Pangenome Reference Consortium (HPRC) have been working to catalog almost all human genomic diversity. Frazer and Schork preview an article recently published in Nature, "A draft human pangenome reference,"1 which represents the initial release of 47 fully phased diploid assemblies of genomes of individuals with diverse ancestries.

translated_abstract: 在过去的几年里，人类泛基因组参考联盟（HPRC）的研究人员一直致力于编目几乎所有的人类基因组多样性。弗雷泽和斯科尔回顾了近期发表在《自然》上的一篇文章《一份草图人类泛基因组参考》，该文章代表了47个具有不同祖先的个体完全分相二倍体基因组组装的初步发布。

title: Environment and taxonomy shape the genomic signature of prokaryotic extremophiles.
authors: Arias Pablo Millán; Butler Joseph; Randhawa Gurjit S; Soltysiak Maximillian P M; Hill Kathleen A; Kari Lila
keywords: (Auto-generated) 环境适应;极端微生物;基因组特征;机器学习;温度;pH值;氨基酸组成;生物信息学;分子生物学
abstract: This study provides comprehensive quantitative evidence suggesting that adaptations to extreme temperatures and pH imprint a discernible environmental component in the genomic signature of microbial extremophiles. Both supervised and unsupervised machine learning algorithms were used to analyze genomic signatures, each computed as the k-mer frequency vector of a 500 kbp DNA fragment arbitrarily selected to represent a genome. Computational experiments classified/clustered genomic signatures extracted from a curated dataset of [Formula: see text] extremophile (temperature, pH) bacteria and archaea genomes, at multiple scales of analysis, [Formula: see text]. The supervised learning resulted in high accuracies for taxonomic classifications at [Formula: see text], and medium to medium-high accuracies for environment category classifications of the same datasets at [Formula: see text]. For [Formula: see text], our findings were largely consistent with amino acid compositional biases and codon usage patterns in coding regions, previously attributed to extreme environment adaptations. The unsupervised learning of unlabelled sequences identified several exemplars of hyperthermophilic organisms with large similarities in their genomic signatures, in spite of belonging to different domains in the Tree of Life.
translated_keywords: 环境适应;极端微生物;基因组特征;机器学习;温度;pH值;氨基酸组成;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 本研究提供了全面的定量证据，表明对极端温度和pH值的适应在微生物嗜极菌的基因组特征中留下了可识别的环境成分印记。监督学习和无监督学习的机器学习算法均被用于分析基因组特征，每个特征通过任意选择的代表基因组的500 kbp DNA片段的k-mer频率向量来计算。计算实验对从经过筛选的数据集中提取的[公式]嗜极菌（温度、pH值）细菌和古菌基因组的基因组特征进行了多尺度分类/聚类分析，[公式]。监督学习在[公式]级别上实现了较高的分类准确性，并且对于同一数据集的环境类别分类，在[公式]级别上达到了中等到中高水平的准确性。对于[公式]，我们的发现与编码区中的氨基酸组成偏差和密码子使用模式基本一致，这些偏差和模式之前被归因于极端环境适应。无监督学习对未标记序列的分析确定了多个超嗜热生物实例，尽管它们属于生命之树的不同域，但其基因组特征具有很大的相似性。

translated_title: 全基因组测序揭示了克里奥尔牛中的适应性混合信号。
affiliations: INRAE, ASSET, 97170, Petit-Bourg, France. slim.ben-jemaa@inrae.fr.; Laboratoire des Productions Animales et Fourragères, Institut National de la Recherche Agronomique de Tunisie, Université de Carthage, 2049, Ariana, Tunisia. slim.ben-jemaa@inrae.fr.; INRAE, ASSET, 97170, Petit-Bourg, France.; AgroParisTech, GABI, INRAE, Université Paris-Saclay, 78350, Jouy-en-Josas, France.; GenPhySE, Ecole Nationale Vétérinaire de Toulouse (ENVT), INRA, Université de Toulouse, 24 Chemin de Borde Rouge, 31320, Castanet-Tolosan, France.; Sigenae, INRAE, 24 Chemin de Borde Rouge, 31320, Castanet-Tolosan, France.; Genotoul Bioinfo, BioInfoMics, MIAT UR875, Sigenae, INRAE, Castanet-Tolosan, France.; INRAE, ASSET, 97170, Petit-Bourg, France. michel.naves@inrae.fr.
title: Whole genome sequencing reveals signals of adaptive admixture in Creole cattle.
authors: Ben-Jemaa Slim; Adam Gabriele; Boussaha Mekki; Bardou Philippe; Klopp Christophe; Mandonnet Nathalie; Naves Michel
keywords: (Auto-generated) 适应性混合;全基因组测序;Creole牛;单核苷酸多态性(SNPs);热带适应;选择信号;RXFP2基因;生物信息学;分子生物学
abstract: The Creole cattle from Guadeloupe (GUA) are well adapted to the tropical environment. Its admixed genome likely played an important role in such adaptation. Here, we sought to detect genomic signatures of selection in the GUA genome. For this purpose, we sequenced 23 GUA individuals and combined our data with sequenced genomes of 99 animals representative of European, African and indicine groups. We detect 17,228,983 single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) in the GUA genome, providing the most detailed exploration, to date, of patterns of genetic variation in this breed. We confirm the higher level of African and indicine ancestries, compared to the European ancestry and we highlight the African origin of indicine ancestry in the GUA genome. We identify five strong candidate regions showing an excess of indicine ancestry and consistently supported across the different detection methods. These regions encompass genes with adaptive roles in relation to immunity, thermotolerance and physical activity. We confirmed a previously identified horn-related gene, RXFP2, as a gene under strong selective pressure in the GUA population likely owing to human-driven (socio-cultural) pressure. Findings from this study provide insight into the genetic mechanisms associated with resilience traits in livestock.
translated_keywords: 适应性混合;全基因组测序;Creole牛;单核苷酸多态性(SNPs);热带适应;选择信号;RXFP2基因;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 瓜德罗普Creole牛（GUA）非常适应热带环境，其混合基因组可能在这一适应过程中发挥了重要作用。本文旨在检测GUA基因组中的选择信号。为此，我们对23头GUA个体进行了测序，并结合了代表欧洲、非洲和 indicine 群体的99个动物的已测序基因组数据。我们在GUA基因组中检测到17,228,983个单核苷酸多态性（SNP），这是迄今为止对该品种遗传变异模式最详细的探索。我们确认了GUA的非洲和 indicine 血统高于欧洲血统，并揭示了GUA基因组中 indicine 血统的非洲起源。我们确定了五个强候选区域，这些区域显示出 indicine 血统的过量存在，并且在不同的检测方法中始终得到支持。这些区域包含与免疫、热耐受性和体力活动相关的适应性基因。我们还确认了一个先前鉴定的与角相关的基因RXFP2，在GUA群体中受到强烈的定向选择压力，这可能归因于人类驱动（社会文化）的压力。本研究的结果为家畜抗逆性状的遗传机制提供了见解。

title: Perspicacious insights into plant-virus-vector interactions applying omics.
authors: Jangra Sumit; Devendran Ragunathan; Ghosh Amalendu
keywords: Whiteflies; Aphids; Planthoppers; Thrips; RNA-seq; Leafhoppers; Viral entry and transmission
abstract: Transmission of plant viruses by insect vectors is facilitated by unequivocal tri-partite interactions among host plants, viruses, and associated vectors. The advent of next-generation sequencing including whole genome sequencing, RNA/small RNA sequencing, proteomics, and metabolomics aided in elucidating the molecular mechanisms involved in virus transmission by insect vectors and infection in host plants.

translated_abstract: 植物病毒通过昆虫传播依赖于宿主植物、病毒和相关昆虫媒介之间明确的三向互作。新一代测序技术（包括全基因组测序、RNA/小RNA测序）、蛋白质组学和代谢组学的发展，有助于阐明昆虫媒介传播病毒以及感染宿主植物的分子机制。

translated_title: 诺如病毒属的基因组多样性和比较基因组学分析
affiliations: Department of Life Science, Chung-Ang University, Seoul, 06974, Korea.; Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc, Seoul, 06349, Korea.; Department of Diseases Research, Incheon Metropolitan City Institute of Public Health and Environment, Incheon, 22320, Korea.; Department of Food and Nutrition, Chung-Ang University, Gyeonggi, 17546, Korea.; Department of Life Science, Chung-Ang University, Seoul, 06974, Korea. eyun@cau.ac.kr.
title: Genomic diversity and comparative phylogenomic analysis of genus Norovirus.
authors: Doh Huijeong; Lee Changhyeon; Kim Nam Yee; Park Yun-Yong; Kim Eun-Jeong; Choi Changsun; Eyun Seong-Il
keywords: Sequence similarity network; Norovirus; Selection pressure; Phylogenomics
abstract: Noroviruses consist of ten genogroups, five of which (GI, GII, GIV, GVIII, GIX) infect humans. Noroviruses are traditionally classified based on the VP1 (genotype), RdRP (P-type), or dual-typing nomenclature. However, current classifications solely relying on specific proteins may be insufficient to represent the evolutionary history due to their recombination events. Thus, it is challenging to identify the dual-types in environmental or stool samples co-infected with more than two types using the existing system. We performed a comprehensive genomic analysis using ten assembled genomes with 1417 genomes from NCBI. Our study provides a detailed examination of the genomic characteristics of norovirus and the criteria for current genotypes and P-types. The phylogenomic analysis revealed two key findings: (1) GVIII and GIX are nested within GII and (2) strains of GII.11, GII.18, and GII.19 (swine noroviruses) as well as GIV and GVI form host-based clusters, with GIV.2[GVI.P1] strains in particular suggesting the possibility of another instance of zoonotic transmission. We present a comparison of the phylogenetic findings from gene-based and genome-based analyses. Overall, our study represents an initial step towards the phylogenomic analysis of genus Norovirus. This is valuable for not only interpreting the evolutionary trajectory among norovirus strains but also developing antiviral targeting strategies.
translated_keywords: 序列相似性网络；诺如病毒；选择压力；系统基因组学
translated_abstract: （1）GVIII和GIX嵌套在GII内；（2）GII.11、GII.18、GII.19（猪源诺如病毒）、GIV和GVI的毒株形成了基于宿主的集群，特别是GIV.2[GVI.P1]毒株提示了另一种潜在的人畜共患病传播实例。我们还比较了基于基因和全基因组分析的系统发育结果。总体而言，本研究是属诺如病毒系统发育基因组学分析的初步尝试，不仅有助于解释诺如病毒株之间的进化轨迹，也为开发针对诺如病毒的抗病毒策略提供了重要价值。
