translated_abstract: 即低维（例如二维）表示的图嵌入。然而，由于泛基因组图可能非常庞大，这成为一个重要的挑战。为了解决这一问题，我们提出了一种新的图布局算法：路径引导随机梯度下降法（PG-SGD）。PG-SGD利用泛基因组图中表示为路径的基因组作为嵌入的位置系统，来采样节点对之间的基因组距离。这种方法避免了以往基于随机梯度下降（SGD）绘图方法中的二次成本。我们证明了我们的实现能够高效地计算吉字节规模泛基因组图的低维布局，揭示其生物学特征。我们将PG-SGD集成到ODGI中，ODGI已作为MIT开源许可证下的自由软件发布。源代码可在https://github.com/pangenome/odgi获取。

translated_title: 结核分枝杆菌泛基因组重建作为揭示与菌株临床表型相关基因组特征的指导
affiliations: División de Estudios de Posgrado, Facultad de Ciencias Médicas y Biológicas "Dr. Ignacio Chávez", Universidad Michoacana de San Nicolás de Hidalgo, Morelia 58020, Michoacán, Mexico.; Centro Multidisciplinario de Estudios en Biotecnología, Facultad de Medicina Veterinaria y Zootecnia, Universidad Michoacana de San Nicolás de Hidalgo, Tarímbaro 58893, Michoacán, Mexico.; Instituto de Ciencias Biomédicas, Vicerrectoría de Investigación y Doctorados, Universidad Autónoma de Chile, Santiago 7500912, Chile.
title: Pangenome Reconstruction of Mycobacterium tuberculosis as a Guide to Reveal Genomic Features Associated with Strain Clinical Phenotype.
authors: Negrete-Paz Andrea Monserrat; Vázquez-Marrufo Gerardo; Gutiérrez-Moraga Ana; Vázquez-Garcidueñas Ma Soledad
keywords: extrapulmonary; pangenome; tuberculosis
abstract: Tuberculosis (TB) is one of the leading causes of human deaths worldwide caused by infectious diseases. TB infection by Mycobacterium tuberculosis can occur in the lungs, causing pulmonary tuberculosis (PTB), or in any other organ of the body, resulting in extrapulmonary tuberculosis (EPTB). There is no consensus on the genetic determinants of this pathogen that may contribute to EPTB. In this study, we constructed the M. tuberculosis pangenome and used it as a tool to seek genomic signatures associated with the clinical presentation of TB based on its accessory genome differences. The analysis carried out in the present study includes the raw reads of 490 M. tuberculosis genomes (PTB n = 245, EPTB n = 245) retrieved from public databases that were assembled, as well as ten genomes from Mexican strains (PTB n = 5, EPTB n = 5) that were sequenced and assembled. All genomes were annotated and then used to construct the pangenome with Roary and Panaroo. The pangenome obtained using Roary consisted of 2231 core genes and 3729 accessory genes. On the other hand, the pangenome resulting from Panaroo consisted of 2130 core genes and 5598 accessory genes. Associations between the distribution of accessory genes and the PTB/EPTB phenotypes were examined using the Scoary and Pyseer tools. Both tools found a significant association between the hspR, plcD, Rv2550c, pe_pgrs5, pe_pgrs25, and pe_pgrs57 genes and the PTB genotype. In contrast, the deletion of the aceA, esxR, plcA, and ppe50 genes was significantly associated with the EPTB phenotype. Rv1759c and Rv3740 were found to be associated with the PTB phenotype according to Scoary; however, these associations were not observed when using Pyseer. The robustness of the constructed pangenome and the gene-phenotype associations is supported by several factors, including the analysis of a large number of genomes, the inclusion of the same number of PTB/EPTB genomes, and the reproducibility of results thanks to the different bioinformatic tools used. Such characteristics surpass most of previous M. tuberculosis pangenomes. Thus, it can be inferred that the deletion of these genes can lead to changes in the processes involved in stress response and fatty acid metabolism, conferring phenotypic advantages associated with pulmonary or extrapulmonary presentation of TB. This study represents the first attempt to use the pangenome to seek gene-phenotype associations in M. tuberculosis.
translated_keywords: 肺外的；泛基因组；结核病
translated_abstract: 结核病（TB）是全球范围内由传染性疾病导致的主要死亡原因之一，由结核分枝杆菌引起的感染可发生在肺部导致肺结核（PTB），或发生在身体其他器官导致肺外结核（EPTB）。目前尚未就可能导致EPTB的病原体遗传决定因素达成共识。本研究构建了结核分枝杆菌的泛基因组，并将其作为工具，基于其辅助基因组差异来寻找与TB临床表现相关的基因组特征。本研究分析了从公共数据库获取的490株结核分枝杆菌基因组的原始读数（PTB n=245，EPTB n=245），以及来自墨西哥菌株的10个基因组（PTB n=5，EPTB n=5），这些基因组均已完成组装和注释，随后用于使用Roary和Panaroo构建泛基因组。使用Roary构建的泛基因组包含2231个核心基因和3729个辅助基因，而使用Panaroo构建的泛基因组则包含2130个核心基因和5598个辅助基因。通过Scoary和Pyseer工具对辅助基因分布与PTB/EPTB表型之间的关联进行了分析。两种工具均发现hspR、plcD、Rv2550c、pe_pgrs5、pe_pgrs25和pe_pgrs57基因与PTB基因型之间存在显著关联。相反，aceA、esxR、plcA和ppe50基因的缺失则与EPTB表型显著相关。根据Scoary的结果，Rv1759c和Rv3740与PTB表型相关，但使用Pyseer时未观察到这种关联。所构建泛基因组及其基因-表型关联的稳健性得到了多个因素的支持，包括分析大量基因组、包含相同数量的PTB/EPTB基因组以及由于使用不同生物信息学工具而获得结果的可重复性。这些特点超过了大多数先前的结核分枝杆菌泛基因组。因此可以推断，这些基因的缺失可能导致参与应激反应和脂肪酸代谢的过程发生变化，从而赋予与肺结核或肺外结核表型相关的表型优势。本研究首次尝试利用泛基因组在结核分枝杆菌中寻找基因-表型关联。

translated_title: 单基因分辨率，简而不凡。
affiliations: USDA-ARS, Athens, Georgia, USA.; Hudson-Alpha Institute of Biotechnology, Huntsville, Alabama, USA.; University of Georgia, Athens, Georgia, USA.
title: Agile Genetics: Single gene resolution without the fuss.
authors: Vaughn Justin N; Korani Walid; Clevenger Josh; Ozias-Akins Peggy
keywords: pangenomic graph; bulk segregant analysis; QTL‐seq; ID‐seq; experimental; population design
abstract: Gene discovery reveals new biology, expands the utility of marker-assisted selection, and enables targeted mutagenesis. Still, such discoveries can take over a decade. We present a general strategy, "Agile Genetics," that uses nested, structured populations to overcome common limits on gene resolution. Extensive simulation work on realistic genetic architectures shows that, at population sizes of >5000 samples, single gene-resolution can be achieved using bulk segregant pools. At this scale, read depth and technical replication become major drivers of resolution. Emerging enrichment methods to address coverage are on the horizon; we describe one possibility - iterative depth sequencing (ID-seq). In addition, graph-based pangenomics in experimental populations will continue to maximize accuracy and improve interpretation. Based on this merger of agronomic scale with molecular and bioinformatic innovation, we predict a new age of rapid gene discovery.
journal: BioEssays : news and reviews in molecular, cellular and developmental biology
translated_keywords: 泛基因组图谱；混合分离群体分析；QTL-测序；ID-测序；实验性；群体设计
translated_abstract: 基因发现揭示新的生物学知识，扩展了标记辅助选择的应用范围，并实现了目标突变体的精准编辑。然而，这类发现通常需要超过十年的时间。我们提出了一种通用策略——“敏捷遗传学”，利用嵌套且结构化的群体来克服基因分辨率的常见限制。通过对真实遗传架构进行广泛的模拟研究显示，在样本数量大于5000的情况下，通过混合分离池可以实现单基因分辨率。在此规模下，测序深度和实验技术重复成为影响分辨率的主要因素。一些新兴的富集方法正在解决覆盖度问题；我们描述了一种可能性——迭代深度测序（ID-seq）。此外，在实验群体中基于图模型的泛基因组学将继续提高准确性并改善解释能力。基于农业规模与分子及生物信息学创新的融合，我们预测将迎来一个快速基因发现的新时代。

translated_title: 你考虑过遗传因素吗？
affiliations: Service de Néphrologie, Centre de Référence Des Maladies Rénales Rares, Filières de Santé Maladies Rares ORKID Et ERKNet, Hôpital Édouard-Herriot, Hospices Civils de Lyon, Lyon, France. enzo.vedrine@chu-lyon.fr.; Department of Pediatric Nephrology, Centre Hospitalier Universitaire de Clermont-Ferrand, Clermont-Ferrand, France.; Nephrology, Dialysis and Transplantation Department, University Hospital, Clermont-Ferrand, France.; Consortium Auragen, LBMMS Auragen, Lyon, France.; Pediatric Nephrology - Rheumatology and Dermatology Unit, Centre de Référence Des Maladies Rénales Rares, Filières de Santé Maladies Rares ORKID Et ERKNet, Hôpital Femme Mère Enfant, Hospices Civils de Lyon, Bron, France.
title: Granulomatous nephropathy: have you thought about genetics?
authors: Vedrine Enzo; Bessenay Lucie; Philipponnet Carole; Dancer Marine; Bertholet-Thomas Aurelia
keywords: Monogenic nephropathy; Pangenomic analysis; Granulomatous nephropathy; Nephronophthisis
abstract: We report here the case of a 16-year-old girl with chronic kidney disease, where biopsy revealed tubulointerstitial nephropathy with granulomas. Initial treatments included immunosuppressive therapy unless genetic testing with exome sequencing identified nephronophthisis due to a homozygous deletion of the NPHP1 gene, marking a unique instance of granulomatous nephropathy related to nephronophthisis. With severe kidney damage, her function has not recovered, necessitating peritoneal dialysis and transplantation. This case highlights the need to consider nephronophthisis in inflammatory interstitial and granulomatous nephropathy, especially when it appears severe and early in life. In addition, it underscores the importance of genetic testing for accurate diagnosis and management in pediatric nephropathies.
translated_keywords: 单基因肾病；泛基因组分析；肉芽肿性肾病；肾小管间质性肾病（或称肾病综合征）
translated_abstract: 本文报道了一例16岁女孩慢性肾病的病例，肾活检显示为伴有肉芽肿的 tubulointerstitial 肾病。初始治疗包括免疫抑制疗法，直至外显子组测序的基因检测发现其患有由于 NPHP1 基因纯合缺失引起的肾结构异常性肾病，这标志着一种与肾结构异常性肾病相关的独特肉芽肿性肾病。由于严重的肾损伤，其肾功能未恢复，需要进行腹膜透析和肾移植。该病例强调了在炎症性间质性和肉芽肿性肾病中考虑肾结构异常性肾病的重要性，尤其是在病情严重且发病较早时。此外，还突显了基因检测在儿童肾病的准确诊断和管理中的重要性。

translated_title: 基于内存的泛基因组索引用于k-mer查询
affiliations: XDBio Program, Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, MD, USA.; Department of Computer Science, Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, MD, USA.; Department of Computer Science, Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, MD, USA. langmea@cs.jhu.edu.
title: Mem-based pangenome indexing for k-mer queries.
authors: Hwang Stephen; Brown Nathaniel K; Ahmed Omar Y; Jenike Katharine M; Kovaka Sam; Schatz Michael C; Langmead Ben
keywords: Comparative genomics; Pangenomics; Compressed indexing
abstract: Pangenomes are growing in number and size, thanks to the prevalence of high-quality long-read assemblies. However, current methods for studying sequence composition and conservation within pangenomes have limitations. Methods based on graph pangenomes require a computationally expensive multiple-alignment step, which can leave out some variation. Indexes based on k-mers and de Bruijn graphs are limited to answering questions at a specific substring length k. We present Maximal Exact Match Ordered (MEMO), a pangenome indexing method based on maximal exact matches (MEMs) between sequences. A single MEMO index can handle arbitrary-length queries over pangenomic windows. MEMO enables both queries that test k-mer presence/absence (membership queries) and that count the number of genomes containing k-mers in a window (conservation queries). MEMO's index for a pangenome of 89 human autosomal haplotypes fits in 2.04 GB, 8.8 × smaller than a comparable KMC3 index and 11.4 × smaller than a PanKmer index. MEMO indexes can be made smaller by sacrificing some counting resolution, with our decile-resolution HPRC index reaching 0.67 GB. MEMO can conduct a conservation query for 31-mers over the human leukocyte antigen locus in 13.89 s, 2.5 × faster than other approaches. MEMO's small index size, lack of k-mer length dependence, and efficient queries make it a flexible tool for studying and visualizing substring conservation in pangenomes.
translated_keywords: 比较基因组学；泛基因组学；压缩索引
translated_abstract: 测试k-mer是否存在（成员资格查询）以及统计窗口内包含k-mer的基因组数量（保守性查询）。对于由89个人类常染色体单倍型组成的泛基因组，其对应的MEMO索引大小为2.04 GB，仅为等效KMC3索引的1/8.8，也仅为PanKmer索引的1/11.4。通过牺牲部分计数分辨率，MEMO索引可以变得更小，例如我们的十分位分辨率HPRC索引大小仅为0.67 GB。在人类白细胞抗原位点上，MEMO可以在13.89秒内完成31-mer的保守性查询，比其他方法快2.5倍。MEMO的小型索引、不受k-mer长度限制以及高效的查询能力使其成为研究和可视化泛基因组中子字符串保守性的灵活工具。

translated_title: 泛基因组图中注释索引与查询的高效方法
affiliations: UC Santa Cruz Genomics Institute, University of California, Santa Cruz, Santa Cruz, CA, USA.; IRSD - Digestive Health Research Institute, University of Toulouse, INSERM, INRAE, ENVT, UPS, Toulouse, France.; Department of Computational Biology and Medical Sciences, Graduate School of Frontier Sciences, The University of Tokyo, Chiba, Japan.; Department of Genetics, Genomics and Informatics, University of Tennessee Health Science Center, Memphis, TN, USA.; New York Genome Center, New York, NY 10013, USA.
title: Efficient indexing and querying of annotations in a pangenome graph.
authors: Novak Adam M; Chung Dickson; Hickey Glenn; Djebali Sarah; Yokoyama Toshiyuki T; Garrison Erik; Narzisi Giuseppe; Paten Benedict; Monlong Jean
keywords: (Auto-generated) 高效索引;注释查询;泛基因组图;Graph Alignment Format;BGZIP压缩;HTSlib索引;文本格式;生物信息学;分子生物学
abstract: The current reference genome is the backbone of diverse and rich annotations. Simple text formats, like VCF or BED, have been widely adopted and helped the critical exchange of genomic information. There is a dire need for tools and formats enabling pangenomic annotation to facilitate such enrichment of pangenomic references. The Graph Alignment Format (GAF) is a text format, tab-delimited like BED/VCF files, which was proposed to represent alignments. GAF could also be used to store paths representing annotations in a pangenome graph, but there are no tools to index and query them efficiently. Here, we present extensions to vg and HTSlib that provide efficient sorting, indexing, and querying for GAF files. With this approach, annotations overlapping a subgraph can be extracted quickly. Paths are sorted based on the IDs of traversed nodes, compressed with BGZIP, and indexed with HTSlib/tabix via our extensions for the GAF format. Compared to the binary GAM format, GAF files are easier to edit or inspect because they are plain text, and we show that they are twice as fast to sort and half as large on disk. In addition, we updated vg annotate, which takes BED or GFF3 annotation files relative to linear sequences and projects them into the pangenome. It can now produce GAF files representing these annotations' paths through the pangenome. We showcase these new tools on several applications. We projected annotations for all Human Pangenome Reference Consortium Year 1 haplotypes, including genes, segmental duplications, tandem repeats and repeats annotations, into the Minigraph-Cactus pangenome (GRCh38-based v1.1). We also projected known variants from the GWAS Catalog and expression QTLs from the GTEx project into the pangenome. Finally, we reanalyzed ATAC-seq data from ENCODE to demonstrate what a coverage track could look like in a pangenome graph. These rich annotations can be quickly queried with vg and visualized using existing tools like the Sequence Tube Map or Bandage.
journal: bioRxiv : the preprint server for biology
translated_keywords: 高效索引;注释查询;泛基因组图;Graph Alignment Format;BGZIP压缩;HTSlib索引;文本格式;生物信息学;分子生物学
journal_full_name: bioRxiv: The Preprint Server for Biology
translated_abstract: 当前参考基因组是多样化和丰富注释的基础。像VCF或BED这样的简单文本格式已被广泛采用，并促进了基因组信息的关键交换。迫切需要工具和格式来实现泛基因组注释，以促进泛基因组参考的这种丰富化。图对齐格式（GAF）是一种类似于BED/VCF文件的制表符分隔的文本格式，被提议用于表示对齐。GAF还可以用于存储泛基因组图中的路径表示注释，但目前没有高效的工具对其进行索引和查询。在这里，我们介绍了对vg和HTSlib的扩展，这些扩展为GAF文件提供了高效的排序、索引和查询功能。通过这种方法，可以快速提取与子图重叠的注释。路径根据遍历节点的ID进行排序，使用BGZIP压缩，并通过我们针对GAF格式的扩展与HTSlib/tabix一起索引。与二进制GAM格式相比，GAF文件由于是纯文本格式，因此更容易编辑或检查，我们证明它们的排序速度是其两倍，磁盘占用仅为一半。此外，我们更新了vg annotate，该工具可以处理基于线性序列的BED或GFF3注释文件，并将其投影到泛基因组中。现在它可以生成表示这些注释在泛基因组中路径的GAF文件。我们在多个应用中展示了这些新工具。我们将所有人类泛基因组参考联盟第一年单倍型的注释（包括基因、片段重复、串联重复和重复注释）投影到了Minigraph-Cactus泛基因组（基于GRCh38版本1.1）。我们还将GWAS目录中的已知变异和GTEx项目的表达QTL投影到了泛基因组中。最后，我们重新分析了ENCODE的ATAC-seq数据，以展示泛基因组图中的覆盖轨迹可能是什么样子。这些丰富的注释可以通过vg快速查询，并使用现有的工具（如Sequence Tube Map或Bandage）可视化。

title: Structural variation-based and gene-based pangenome construction reveals untapped diversity of hexaploid wheat.
authors: Cheng Hong; Kong Lingpeng; Zhu Kun; Zhao Hang; Li Xiuli; Zhang Yanwen; Ning Weidong; Jiang Mei; Song Bo; Cheng Shifeng
keywords: Growth habit; Centromere Plasticity; Pangenome; Structural Variation; Wheat
abstract: Increasing number of structural variations (SVs) have been identified as causative mutations for diverse agronomic traits. However, the systematic exploration of SVs quantity, distribution and contribution in wheat was lacking. Here, we report high-quality gene-based and SV-based pangenomes comprising 22 hexaploid wheat assemblies showing a wide range of chromosome size, gene number, and TE component, which indicates their representativeness of wheat genetic diversity. Pan-gene analyses uncover 140,261 distinct gene families, of which only 23.2% are shared in all accessions. Moreover, we built a ∼16.15 Gb graph pangenome containing 695,897 bubbles, intersecting 5,132 genes and 230,307 cis-regulatory regions. Pairwise genome comparisons identified ∼1,978,221 non-redundant SVs and 497 SV hotspots. Notably, the density of bubbles as well as SVs show remarkable aggregation in centromeres, which probably play an important role in chromosome plasticity and stability. As for functional SVs exploration, we identify 2,769 SVs with absolute relative frequency differences exceeding 0.7 between spring and winter growth habit groups. Additionally, several reported functional genes in wheat display complex structural graphs, for example PPD-A1, VRT-A2, and TaNAAT2-A. These findings deepen our understanding of wheat genetic diversity, providing valuable graphical pangenome and variation resources to improve the efficiency of genome-wide association mapping in wheat.
journal: Journal of genetics and genomics = Yi chuan xue bao
translated_keywords: 生长习性；着丝粒可塑性；泛基因组；结构变异；小麦
translated_abstract: 越来越多的研究表明，结构变异（SVs）是多种农艺性状的重要致变突变。然而，小麦中SVs的数量、分布及其贡献的系统性探索仍显不足。本文报道了基于高质量基因组和SV的泛基因组，包含22个六倍体小麦组装数据，这些数据展示了广泛的染色体大小、基因数量和转座元件（TE）组成，表明其具有代表性的小麦遗传多样性。泛基因分析揭示了140,261个独特的基因家族，其中仅有23.2%在所有样本中共享。此外，我们构建了一个约16.15 Gb的图泛基因组，包含695,897个气泡，涉及5,132个基因和230,307个顺式调控区域。两两基因组比较鉴定了约1,978,221个非冗余SVs和230,307个SV热点。值得注意的是，气泡和SVs的密度在着丝粒区域表现出显著聚集，这可能在染色体的可塑性和稳定性中起重要作用。在功能SVs的探索方面，我们鉴定出2,769个绝对相对频率差异超过0.7的SVs，这些SVs在春化型和冬化型生长习性群体之间存在显著差异。此外，一些已知的功能基因如PPD-A1、VRT-A2和TaNAAT2-A在小麦中显示出复杂的结构图谱。这些发现加深了对小麦遗传多样性的理解，为提高全基因组关联映射的效率提供了宝贵的图形化泛基因组和变异资源。

translated_title: 2021年至2023年期间中国湖北省链球菌（Streptococcus suis）的分离、鉴定、基因组多样性及抗菌药物耐药性分析
affiliations: State Key Laboratory of Agricultural Microbiology, College of Veterinary Medicine, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan 430070, China.; Key Laboratory of Preventive Veterinary Medicine in Hubei Province, Wuhan 430070, China.; Key Laboratory of Animal Epidemical Disease and Infectious Zoonoses, Ministry of Agriculture, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan 430070, China.
title: Isolation, Identification, Genomic Diversity, and Antimicrobial Resistance Analysis of Streptococcus suis in Hubei Province of China from 2021 to 2023.
authors: Xia Yingjun; Wang Zhaoyang; Hu Yanli; Zhao Pengfei; Li Jianhai; Zhang Li; Fang Rui; Zhao Junlong
keywords: antimicrobial resistance; ARG; Streptococcus suis; MLST; pan-genome
abstract: Streptococcus suis (S. suis) is a zoonotic pathogen capable of causing severe diseases in humans and pigs, including meningitis, sepsis, polyserositis, arthritis, and endocarditis. This study aimed to investigate the biological characteristics of 19 strains of S. suis isolated from diseased pigs in Hubei Province between 2021 and 2023. Through bioinformatics analysis, we investigated the serotype, MLST, pan-genome characteristics, SNP, AMR, and ICE of the 19 S. suis isolates. Among the 19 S. suis strains, ten serotypes were identified, and serotype 9 was the most prevalent (21.05%). Ten new alleles and nine new sequence types (STs) were discovered, with ST28 and ST243 emerging as the predominant STs. The results of the pan-genomic analysis of S. suis indicate that there are 943 core genes, 2259 shell genes, and 5663 cloud genes. Through SNP evolutionary analysis, we identified a strong genetic similarity between SS31 and the reference genome P1/7. The analysis of antibiotic resistance genes revealed widespread presence of erm(B) and tet(O) genes among 19 strains of S. suis. This association may be linked to the high resistance of S. suis to lincosamides, macrolides, and tetracyclines. Integrative and conjugative elements (ICEs) and integrative and mobilizable elements (IMEs) were identified in 16 strains, with a carriage rate of 84.21%, and resistance genes were identified within the ICE/IME elements of 8 strains. Antimicrobial susceptibility testing revealed that all strains showed sensitivity to vancomycin and lincomycin but resistance to tilmicosin, tiamulin, amoxicillin, and doxycycline. This study contributes to our understanding of the genomic diversity of S. suis in Hubei Province of China, providing essential data for the comprehensive prevention and control of S. suis infections in China.
translated_keywords: 抗菌药物耐药性；ARG；猪链球菌；多位点序列分型；泛基因组
translated_abstract: 猪链球菌（*Streptococcus suis*, S. *suis*）是一种人畜共患病原体，可引起人类和猪的严重疾病，包括脑膜炎、败血症、多浆膜炎、关节炎和心内膜炎。本研究旨在调查2021年至2023年间从湖北省患病猪体内分离的19株S. *suis*菌株的生物学特性。通过生物信息学分析，我们探讨了这19株S. *suis*分离株的血清型、多位点序列分型（MLST）、泛基因组特征、单核苷酸多态性（SNP）、耐药性和整合与接合元件（ICE）。在19株S. *suis*菌株中，鉴定出10种血清型，其中血清型9最为常见（占21.05%）。发现了10个新的等位基因和9个新的序列类型（STs），ST28和ST243成为主要的ST类型。S. *suis*泛基因组分析结果显示共有943个核心基因、2259个壳基因和5663个云基因。通过SNP进化分析发现SS31与参考基因组P1/7之间存在较强的遗传相似性。抗生素耐药基因分析显示，19株S. *suis*菌株中普遍存在erm(B)和tet(O)基因，这可能与S. *suis*对林可酰胺类、大环内酯类和四环素类药物的高耐药性相关。在16株菌株中检测到整合与接合元件（ICEs）及整合与可移动元件（IMEs），携带率为84.21%，其中8株菌株的ICE/IME元件内检测到耐药基因。抗菌药物敏感性测试表明，所有菌株均对万古霉素和林可霉素敏感，但对替米考星、泰妙菌素、阿莫西林和多西环素耐药。本研究有助于了解中国湖北省地区S. *suis*的基因组多样性，为全国范围内S. *suis*感染的综合预防和控制提供了重要数据。

translated_title: 蓝莓与蔓越莓的泛基因组资源在遗传学研究和育种工作中的应用前景
affiliations: Department of Horticulture, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI, 48824, USA.; Department of Plant Biology, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI, 48824, USA.; Genetics and Genome Sciences, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI, 48824, USA.; Plants for Human Health Institute, North Carolina State University, Kannapolis, NC USA.; Horticultural Sciences Department, University of Florida, Gainesville, FL 32611, USA.; Department of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI, 48824, USA.; University of Western Australia, Perth 6009 Australia.; Justus Liebig University, Giessen, 35390 Germany.; Department of Horticulture, Washington State University, Pullman, WA, 99163, USA.; The New Zealand Institute for Plant and Food Research Limited (PFR), Auckland, New Zealand.; The New Zealand Institute for Plant and Food Research Limited (PFR), Palmerston, New Zealand.; The New Zealand Institute for Plant and Food Research Limited (PFR), Motueka, New Zealand.; SEBS, Plant Biology, Rutgers University, New Brunswick NJ 01019 USA.; USDA-ARS, VCRU, Department of Horticulture, University of Wisconsin-Madison, Madison, WI 53706, USA.; USDA-ARS, National Clonal Germplasm Repository, Corvallis, OR 97333, USA.; Department of Horticulture, North Carolina State University, Kannapolis, NC USA.; MSU AgBioResearch, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI, 48824, USA.
title: Blueberry and cranberry pangenomes as a resource for future genetic studies and breeding efforts.
authors: Yocca Alan E; Platts Adrian; Alger Elizabeth; Teresi Scott; Mengist Molla F; Benevenuto Juliana; Ferrão Luis Felipe V; Jacobs MacKenzie; Babinski Michal; Magallanes-Lundback Maria; Bayer Philipp; Golicz Agnieszka; Humann Jodi L; Main Dorrie; Espley Richard V; Chagné David; Albert Nick W; Montanari Sara; Vorsa Nicholi; Polashock James; Díaz-Garcia Luis; Zalapa Juan; Bassil Nahla V; Munoz Patricio R; Iorizzo Massimo; Edger Patrick P
keywords: (Auto-generated) 蓝莓;蔓越莓;泛基因组;遗传多样性;辅助基因;疾病抗性;代谢物合成;生物信息学;分子生物学
abstract: Domestication of cranberry and blueberry began in the United States in the early 1800s and 1900s, respectively, and in part owing to their flavors and health-promoting benefits are now cultivated and consumed worldwide. The industry continues to face a wide variety of production challenges (e.g. disease pressures) as well as a demand for higher-yielding cultivars with improved fruit quality characteristics. Unfortunately, molecular tools to help guide breeding efforts for these species have been relatively limited compared with those for other high-value crops. Here, we describe the construction and analysis of the first pangenome for both blueberry and cranberry. Our analysis of these pangenomes revealed both crops exhibit great genetic diversity, including the presence-absence variation of 48.4% genes in highbush blueberry and 47.0% genes in cranberry. Auxiliary genes, those not shared by all cultivars, are significantly enriched with molecular functions associated with disease resistance and the biosynthesis of specialized metabolites, including compounds previously associated with improving fruit quality traits. The discovery of thousands of genes, not present in the previous reference genomes for blueberry and cranberry, will serve as the basis of future research and as potential targets for future breeding efforts. The pangenome, as a multiple-sequence alignment, as well as individual annotated genomes, are publicly available for analysis on the Genome Database for Vaccinium - a curated and integrated web-based relational database. Lastly, the core-gene predictions from the pangenomes will serve useful to develop a community genotyping platform to guide future molecular breeding efforts across the family.
journal: bioRxiv : the preprint server for biology
translated_keywords: 蓝莓;蔓越莓;泛基因组;遗传多样性;辅助基因;疾病抗性;代谢物合成;生物信息学;分子生物学
journal_full_name: bioRxiv: The Preprint Server for Biology
translated_abstract: 蔓越莓和蓝莓的人工栽培分别始于19世纪早期和20世纪早期的美国，由于其风味以及对健康的促进作用，如今这两种浆果已在世界范围内种植和消费。然而，该行业仍然面临着诸多生产挑战（例如病害压力），同时也需要更高产且果实品质更优的品种。遗憾的是，与一些高价值作物相比，针对这些物种的分子工具相对有限。本文描述了蓝莓和蔓越莓的第一个泛基因组的构建与分析。通过对这两个泛基因组的分析发现，这两种作物表现出极大的遗传多样性，高丛蓝莓中有48.4%的基因存在表达与否的变化，而蔓越莓中这一比例为47.0%。辅助基因（即不被所有品种共享的基因）显著富集了与抗病性和次生代谢物合成相关的分子功能，其中包括之前与改善果实品质性状相关的化合物。发现的数千个未出现在先前蓝莓和蔓越莓参考基因组中的基因，将成为未来研究的基础，并作为未来育种工作的潜在目标。泛基因组作为一个多序列比对工具，以及单个注释基因组均已公开，可供Genome Database for Vaccinium数据库进行分析。该数据库是一个经过整理和集成的基于网络的关系型数据库。最后，泛基因组的核心基因预测结果将有助于开发一个社区基因分型平台，以指导该科植物未来的分子育种工作。

translated_title: 多组学在荞麦功能成分提升和性状改良中的进展
affiliations: Institute of Nanfan and Seed Industry, Guangdong Academy of Sciences, Guangzhou, P.R. China.; College of Life and Environmental Sciences, Minzu University of China, Beijing, China.; Key Laboratory of South China Agricultural Plant Molecular Analysis and Genetic Improvement & Guangdong Provincial Key Laboratory of Applied Botany, South China Botanical Garden, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Guangzhou, China.
title: Advancements in multi-omics for nutraceutical enhancement and traits improvement in buckwheat.
authors: Song Yingjie; Long Chunlin; Wang Ying; An Yuxing; Lu Yinglin
keywords: biosynthesis; agronomic traits; nutraceutical; bioactive components; multi-omics; Buckwheat
abstract: Buckwheat (Fagopyrum spp.) is a typical pseudocereal, valued for its extensive nutraceutical potential as well as its centuries-old cultivation. Tartary buckwheat and common buckwheat have been used globally and become well-known nutritious foods due to their high quantities of: proteins, flavonoids, and minerals. Moreover, its increasing demand makes it critical to improve nutraceutical, traits and yield. In this review, bioactive compounds accumulated in buckwheat were comprehensively evaluated according to their chemical structure, properties, and physiological function. Biosynthetic pathways of flavonoids, phenolic acids, and fagopyrin were methodically summarized, with the regulation of flavonoid biosynthesis. Although there are classic synthesis pathways presented in the previous research, the metabolic flow of how these certain compounds are being synthesized in buckwheat still remains uncovered. The functional genes involved in the biosynthesis of flavonols, stress response, and plant development were identified based on multi-omics research. Furthermore, it delves into the applications of multi-omics in improving buckwheat's agronomic traits, including: yield, nutritional content, stress resilience, and bioactive compounds biosynthesis. While pangenomics combined with other omics to mine elite genes, the regulatory network and mechanism of specific agronomic traits and biosynthetic of bioactive components, and developing a more efficient genetic transformation system for genetic engineering require further investigation for the execution of breeding designs aimed at enhancing desirable traits in buckwheat. This critical review will provide a comprehensive understanding of multi-omics for nutraceutical enhancement and traits improvement in buckwheat.
translated_keywords: 生物合成；农艺性状；营养素；生物活性成分；多组学；荞麦
translated_abstract: 荞麦（Fagopyrum spp.）是一种典型的假谷物，因其丰富的营养保健潜力以及数百年的栽培历史而备受重视。鞑靼荞麦和普通荞麦因富含蛋白质、黄酮类物质和矿物质等营养成分而在全球范围内被广泛使用，并成为广为人知的营养食品。此外，其日益增长的需求使得提升荞麦的营养保健特性和产量变得尤为重要。本文综述了荞麦中积累的生物活性化合物，根据其化学结构、性质及其生理功能进行了全面评估。系统总结了黄酮类、酚酸类及荞麦素的合成途径，并探讨了黄酮类物质合成的调控机制。尽管已有经典合成途径的研究成果，但荞麦中这些特定化合物的代谢流仍尚未完全揭示。基于多组学研究，鉴定了参与黄酮醇合成、逆境响应及植物发育的功能基因。此外，深入探讨了多组学在改善荞麦农艺性状（包括产量、营养成分含量、抗逆性和生物活性物质合成）中的应用。通过泛基因组与其他组学结合挖掘优异基因，研究特定农艺性状的调控网络与机制，开发更高效的遗传转化系统以实现荞麦优良性状的遗传改良仍需进一步探索。本综述将为荞麦营养保健特性的提升和性状改良提供全面理解。

translated_title: 南美分支中的两个新宏基因组组装基因组
affiliations: Department of Botany, Phycology Laboratory, Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais, 31270-901, Belo Horizonte, MG, Brazil.; Department of Biochemistry, Institute of Chemistry, Universidade de São Paulo, 05508-000, São Paulo, SP, Brazil.; Department of Botany, Phycology Laboratory, Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais, 31270-901, Belo Horizonte, MG, Brazil. Electronic address: agiani@ufmg.br.
title: The Raphidiopsis (= Cylindrospermopsis) raciborskii pangenome updated: Two new metagenome-assembled genomes from the South American clade.
authors: Laux Marcele; Piroupo Carlos Morais; Setubal João Carlos; Giani Alessandra
keywords: Nostocales; Cyanobacteria blooms; Phylogeny; Pampulha lake; Metagenomics
abstract: Two Raphidiopsis (=Cylindrospermopsis) raciborskii metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) were recovered from two freshwater metagenomic datasets sampled in 2011 and 2012 in Pampulha Lake, a hypereutrophic, artificial, shallow reservoir, located in the city of Belo Horizonte (MG), Brazil. Since the late 1970s, the lake has undergone increasing eutrophication pressure, due to wastewater input, leading to the occurrence of frequent cyanobacterial blooms. The major difference observed between PAMP2011 and PAMP2012 MAGs was the lack of the saxitoxin gene cluster in PAMP2012, which also presented a smaller genome, while PAMP2011 presented the complete sxt cluster and all essential proteins and clusters. The pangenome analysis was performed with all Raphidiopsis/Cylindrospermopsis genomes available at NCBI to date, with the addition of PAMP2011 and PAMP2012 MAGs (All33 subset), but also without the South American strains (noSA subset), and only among the South American strains (SA10 and SA8 subsets). We observed a substantial increase in the core genome size for the 'noSA' subset, in comparison to 'All33' subset, and since the core genome reflects the closeness among the pangenome members, the results strongly suggest that the conservation level of the essential gene repertoire seems to be affected by the geographic origin of the strains being analyzed, supporting the existence of a distinct SA clade. The Raphidiopsis pangenome comprised a total of 7943 orthologous protein clusters, and the two new MAGs increased the pangenome size by 11%. The pangenome based phylogenetic relationships among the 33 analyzed genomes showed that the SA genomes clustered together with 99% bootstrap support, reinforcing the metabolic particularity of the Raphidiopsis South American clade, related to its saxitoxin producing unique ability, while also indicating a different evolutionary history due to its geographic isolation.
translated_keywords: 念珠藻目；蓝细菌水华；系统发育；潘普利亚湖；宏基因组学
translated_abstract: 从2011年和2012年采自巴西贝洛奥里藏特市（米纳斯吉拉斯州）帕姆普拉湖的两个淡水宏基因组数据集中，成功恢复了两种Raphidiopsis（=Cylindrospermopsis）raciborskii宏基因组组装基因组（MAGs）。自20世纪70年代末以来，由于废水输入，该超富营养化的人工浅水水库经历了日益严重的富营养化压力，导致频繁发生蓝藻水华。PAMP2011和PAMP2012 MAGs的主要差异在于PAMP2012缺乏石房蛤毒素基因簇，同时其基因组较小，而PAMP2011则携带完整的sxt基因簇以及所有必需的蛋白质和基因簇。通过NCBI数据库中所有可用的Raphidiopsis/Cylindrospermopsis基因组进行泛基因组分析，包括PAMP2011和PAMP2012 MAGs（All33子集），但排除南美菌株（noSA子集），以及仅限于南美菌株（SA10和SA8子集）。我们观察到与“All33”子集相比，“noSA”子集的核心基因组大小显著增加，鉴于核心基因组反映了泛基因组成员之间的亲缘关系，结果强烈表明关键基因库的保守程度似乎受到被分析菌株地理来源的影响，支持存在一个独特的南美（SA）分支的观点。Raphidiopsis的泛基因组包含总共7943个直系同源蛋白簇，这两个新MAGs使泛基因组规模增加了11%。基于泛基因组的系统发育关系分析显示，33个分析基因组中的南美（SA）基因组以99%的自展支持率聚类在一起，进一步证实了Raphidiopsis南美分支在产生石房蛤毒素方面的独特代谢特性，同时也表明由于地理隔离导致了不同的进化历史。

translated_title: 利用机器学习识别肠球菌耐药性的关键驱动因素
affiliations: Faculty of Computer Science, Dalhousie University, Halifax, NS, Canada.; Institute for Comparative Genomics, Dalhousie University, Halifax, NS, Canada.; Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, Lethbridge, AB, Canada.; Department of Community Health and Epidemiology, Dalhousie University, Faculty of Medicine, Halifax, NS, Canada.
title: Identification of key drivers of antimicrobial resistance in Enterococcus using machine learning.
authors: Kim Jee In; Manuele Alexander; Maguire Finlay; Zaheer Rahat; McAllister Tim A; Beiko Robert G
keywords: antimicrobial resistance; Enterococcus faecalis; feature ranking; model interpretability; Enterococcus faecium; machine learning
abstract: With antimicrobial resistance (AMR) rapidly evolving in pathogens, quick and accurate identification of genetic determinants of phenotypic resistance is essential for improving surveillance, stewardship, and clinical mitigation. Machine learning (ML) models show promise for AMR prediction in diagnostics but require a deep understanding of internal processes to use effectively. Our study utilised AMR gene, pangenomic, and predicted plasmid features from 647 Enterococcus faecium and Enterococcus faecalis genomes across the One Health continuum, along with corresponding resistance phenotypes, to develop interpretive ML classifiers. Vancomycin resistance could be predicted with 99% accuracy with AMR gene features, 98% with pangenome features, and 96% with plasmid clusters. Top pangenome features overlapped with the resistance genes of the vanA operon, which are often laterally transmitted via plasmids. Doxycycline resistance prediction achieved approximately 92% accuracy with pangenome features, with the top feature being elements of Tn916 conjugative transposon, a tet(M) carrier. Erythromycin resistance prediction models achieved about 90% accuracy, but top features were negatively correlated with resistance due to the confounding effect of population structure. This work demonstrates the importance of reviewing ML models' features to discern biological relevance even when achieving high-performance metrics. Our workflow offers the potential to propose hypotheses for experimental testing, enhancing the understanding of AMR mechanisms, which are crucial for combating the AMR crisis.
translated_keywords: 抗菌耐药性；粪肠球菌；特征排名；模型可解释性；屎肠球菌；机器学习
translated_abstract: 随着病原体抗微生物药物耐药性（AMR）的迅速演变，快速且准确地识别表型耐药的遗传决定因素对于改善监测、用药管理和临床缓解至关重要。机器学习（ML）模型在诊断中的AMR预测显示出潜力，但要有效使用这些模型，需要深入了解其内部过程。本研究利用来自647株屎肠球菌和粪肠球菌基因组的AMR基因、泛基因组和预测质粒特征，结合相应的耐药表型，开发了解释性的ML分类器。以万古霉素耐药为例，使用AMR基因特征可达到99%的预测准确性，使用泛基因组特征为98%，使用质粒聚类为96%。泛基因组的顶级特征与vanA操纵子的耐药基因重叠，这些基因通常通过质粒水平转移。四环素耐药的预测使用泛基因组特征达到了约92%的准确性，其中顶级特征是Tn916结合转座子的元素以及tet(M)载体。红霉素耐药的预测模型达到了约90%的准确性，但顶级特征与耐药性呈负相关，这是由于种群结构的混杂效应所致。这项工作表明，即使在获得高性能指标的情况下，审查ML模型的特征以辨别其生物学意义仍然非常重要。我们的工作流程有望提出实验验证的假设，从而增强对AMR机制的理解，这对于应对AMR危机至关重要。

translated_title: 基于等位和非等位同源重组
affiliations: Institute for Medical Biometry and Bioinformatics, Medical Faculty, and Center for Digital Medicine, Heinrich Heine University, Moorenstr. 5, 40225, Düsseldorf, Germany.; Institute for Medical Biometry and Bioinformatics, Medical Faculty, and Center for Digital Medicine, Heinrich Heine University, Moorenstr. 5, 40225, Düsseldorf, Germany. tobias.marschall@hhu.de.; Institute for Medical Biometry and Bioinformatics, Medical Faculty, and Center for Digital Medicine, Heinrich Heine University, Moorenstr. 5, 40225, Düsseldorf, Germany. daniel.doerr@hhu.de.
title: Constructing founder sets under allelic and non-allelic homologous recombination.
authors: Bonnet Konstantinn; Marschall Tobias; Doerr Daniel
keywords: Homologous recombination; NAHR; Founder set reconstruction; Pangenomics; Variation graph
abstract: Homologous recombination between the maternal and paternal copies of a chromosome is a key mechanism for human inheritance and shapes population genetic properties of our species. However, a similar mechanism can also act between different copies of the same sequence, then called non-allelic homologous recombination (NAHR). This process can result in genomic rearrangements-including deletion, duplication, and inversion-and is underlying many genomic disorders. Despite its importance for genome evolution and disease, there is a lack of computational models to study genomic loci prone to NAHR. In this work, we propose such a computational model, providing a unified framework for both (allelic) homologous recombination and NAHR. Our model represents a set of genomes as a graph, where haplotypes correspond to walks through this graph. We formulate two founder set problems under our recombination model, provide flow-based algorithms for their solution, describe exact methods to characterize the number of recombinations, and demonstrate scalability to problem instances arising in practice.
translated_keywords: 同源重组；非等位同源重组（NAHR）；祖先集重建；泛基因组学；变异图谱
translated_abstract: 母体和父体染色体之间的同源重组是人类遗传的关键机制，并塑造了我们物种的群体遗传特性。然而，类似的机制也可以在相同序列的不同拷贝之间起作用，这种情况下称为非等位同源重组（NAHR）。这一过程可能导致基因组重排，包括缺失、重复和倒位，并与许多基因组疾病相关。尽管它对基因组进化和疾病具有重要意义，但目前缺乏用于研究易受NAHR影响的基因组位点的计算模型。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种这样的计算模型，为等位同源重组和NAHR提供了统一的框架。我们的模型将一组基因组表示为一个图，其中单倍型对应于该图中的路径。我们在重组模型下提出了两个奠基者集问题，提供了基于流的算法来解决这些问题，并描述了精确方法来表征重组事件的数量，同时展示了其在实际问题实例上的可扩展性。

translated_title: 口腔微生物组研究中组学和生物信息学技术的最新进展。
affiliations: Department of Oral Rehabilitation & Biosciences, School of Dentistry, Oregon Health & Science University, 3181 Sam Jackson Park Road, Portland, OR 97202, United States.; Genomic Medicine Group, J. Craig Venter Institute, La Jolla, CA 92037, United States.; Department of Pediatrics, UC San Diego School of Medicine, La Jolla, CA 92093, United States.
title: Illuminating the oral microbiome and its host interactions: recent advancements in omics and bioinformatics technologies in the context of oral microbiome research.
authors: Baker Jonathon L
keywords: genomics; pangenomics; metagenomics; transcriptomics; lipidomics; oral microbiome; proteomics; metabolomics
abstract: The oral microbiota has an enormous impact on human health, with oral dysbiosis now linked to many oral and systemic diseases. Recent advancements in sequencing, mass spectrometry, bioinformatics, computational biology, and machine learning are revolutionizing oral microbiome research, enabling analysis at an unprecedented scale and level of resolution using omics approaches. This review contains a comprehensive perspective of the current state-of-the-art tools available to perform genomics, metagenomics, phylogenomics, pangenomics, transcriptomics, proteomics, metabolomics, lipidomics, and multi-omics analysis on (all) microbiomes, and then provides examples of how the techniques have been applied to research of the oral microbiome, specifically. Key findings of these studies and remaining challenges for the field are highlighted. Although the methods discussed here are placed in the context of their contributions to oral microbiome research specifically, they are pertinent to the study of any microbiome, and the intended audience of this includes researchers would simply like to get an introduction to microbial omics and/or an update on the latest omics methods. Continued research of the oral microbiota using omics approaches is crucial and will lead to dramatic improvements in human health, longevity, and quality of life.
translated_keywords: 基因组学；泛基因组学；宏基因组学；转录组学；脂质组学；口腔微生物群；蛋白质组学；代谢组学
translated_abstract: 口腔微生物群对人类健康具有巨大影响，目前已被证实与多种口腔疾病和全身性疾病相关。近年来，测序技术、质谱分析、生物信息学、计算生物学以及机器学习的进步正在彻底改变口腔微生物组研究，使通过组学方法以空前的规模和分辨率进行分析成为可能。本文综述了当前最先进的工具，可用于基因组学、宏基因组学、系统发育基因组学、泛基因组学、转录组学、蛋白质组学、代谢组学、脂质组学以及多组学分析，并提供了这些技术在口腔微生物组研究中的具体应用实例。文章还总结了相关研究的关键发现及该领域面临的挑战。尽管文中讨论的方法主要针对口腔微生物组研究，但它们同样适用于任何微生物组的研究。本文面向希望了解微生物组学基础或最新组学方法进展的研究人员。继续使用组学方法研究口腔微生物群对于改善人类健康、延长寿命和提高生活质量至关重要。

translated_title: 寄主范围可塑性与基因组变异
affiliations: Protecting Crops and the Environment, Rothamsted Research, Harpenden, Herts, AL5 2JQ, UK.; Intelligent Data Ecosystems, Rothamsted Research, Harpenden, Herts, AL5 2JQ, UK.; Protecting Crops and the Environment, Rothamsted Research, Harpenden, Herts, AL5 2JQ, UK. Electronic address: kim.hammond-kosack@rothamsted.ac.uk.
title: Navigating the Fusarium species complex: Host-range plasticity and genome variations.
authors: Armer Victoria J; Kroll Erika; Darino Martin; Smith Daniel P; Urban Martin; Hammond-Kosack Kim E
keywords: Non-pathogenic and pathogenic; Niches and environments; Genomes and pangenomes; Fusariosis; Genus Fusarium, diverse biologies; Industrial uses; Mycotoxicosis
abstract: The Ascomycete genus Fusarium, first introduced by Link in 1809, currently consists of 431 species and 3558 unclassified isolates and hybrids (according to NCBI Taxonomy lists). Collectively, these fungi have diverse lifestyles and infection cycles exploiting a wide range of environments, hosts, ecological niches, and nutrient sources. Here, we carried out a pan-Fusarium species review to describe and explore the glamorous, and the less attractive niches, exploited by pathogenic and endophytic species. We survey species that infect plant, human, animal and/or invertebrate hosts, free-living non-pathogenic species dwelling in land, air or water-based natural ecosystems, through to those species that exploit human-modified environments or are cultivated in industrial production systems. Fully sequenced, assembled and annotated reference genomes are already available for 189 Fusarium species, many at chromosome scale. In addition, for some of the world's most important species extensive single species pangenomes or closely related formae speciales genome clusters are readily available. Previous comparative genomics studies have focussed on taxonomically restricted clusters of Fusarium species. We now investigate potential new relationships between these vastly contrasting Fusarium biologies, niches and environmental occupancies and the evolution of their respective genomes.
translated_keywords: 非致病与致病；生态位与环境；基因组与泛基因组；镰刀菌病；镰刀菌属，多样生物学；工业应用；霉菌毒素中毒
translated_abstract: 子囊菌门的镰刀菌属（Fusarium）最早由Link于1809年提出，目前包括431个物种和3558个未分类的分离株及杂交种（根据NCBI分类列表）。这些真菌具有多样化的生存方式和感染周期，能够利用广泛的环境、宿主、生态位和营养来源。本文综述了镰刀菌属的泛基因组学研究，描述并探讨了致病性和内生性物种所利用的迷人以及较少被关注的生态位。我们调查了感染植物、人类、动物和/或无脊椎动物宿主的物种，以及栖息于陆地、空气或水基天然生态系统的自由生活的非致病性物种，直至那些利用人为改造环境或在工业生产系统中培养的物种。已有189个镰刀菌物种的全基因组序列被完全测序、组装和注释，其中许多达到了染色体水平。此外，对于一些世界上最重要的镰刀菌物种，其广泛单物种泛基因组或密切相关形式的基因组簇也已可获得。以往的比较基因组学研究主要集中在分类学上受限的镰刀菌物种群组。现在，我们进一步探索这些在生物学特性、生态位和环境占据方面存在巨大差异的镰刀菌之间可能存在的新关系，以及它们各自基因组的进化过程。

translated_title: 创新是关键。
affiliations: European Centre for Environment and Human Health, University of Exeter Medical School, Environment and Sustainability Institute, Treliever Road, Penryn Campus, Penryn, TR10 9FE, United Kingdom.; Environment and Sustainability Institute, University of Exeter, Treliever Road, Penryn Campus, Penryn, TR10 9FE, United Kingdom.; Organisms and Ecosystems, Earlham Institute, Norwich Research Park, Norwich NR4 7UZ, United Kingdom.; Gut Microbes and Health, Quadram Institute, Norwich Research Park, Norwich NR4 7UQ, United Kingdom.; Naturalis Biodiversity Center, Understanding Evolution, Darwinweg 2, Leiden 2333 CR, the Netherlands.; Institute of Biology Leiden, Leiden University, Sylviusweg 72, Leiden 2333 BE, the Netherlands.
title: Adaptive radiations in natural populations of prokaryotes: innovation is key.
authors: Vos Michiel; Padfield Daniel; Quince Christopher; Vos Rutger
keywords: speciation; pangenomes; adaptive radiations; key innovations; diversification; macroevolution
abstract: Prokaryote diversity makes up most of the tree of life and is crucial to the functioning of the biosphere and human health. However, the patterns and mechanisms of prokaryote diversification have received relatively little attention compared to animals and plants. Adaptive radiation, the rapid diversification of an ancestor species into multiple ecologically divergent species, is a fundamental process by which macrobiological diversity is generated. Here, we discuss whether ecological opportunity could lead to similar bursts of diversification in bacteria. We explore how adaptive radiations in prokaryotes can be kickstarted by horizontally acquired key innovations allowing lineages to invade new niche space that subsequently is partitioned among diversifying specialist descendants. We discuss how novel adaptive zones are colonized and exploited after the evolution of a key innovation and whether certain types of are more prone to adaptive radiation. Radiation into niche specialists does not necessarily lead to speciation in bacteria when barriers to recombination are absent. We propose that in this scenario, niche-specific genes could accumulate within a single lineage, leading to the evolution of an open pangenome.
translated_keywords: 物种形成；泛基因组；适应辐射；关键创新；多样化；宏进化
translated_abstract: 原核生物多样性构成了生命之树的绝大部分，并对生物圈的功能以及人类健康至关重要。然而，与动物和植物相比，原核生物多样化的模式和机制受到的关注相对较少。适应辐射（adaptive radiation），即祖先物种快速分化为多个生态上不同的物种的过程，是宏观生物多样性产生的基本过程之一。本文探讨了生态机会是否可能在细菌中引发类似的多样化爆发。我们探索了原核生物如何通过水平获得的关键创新启动适应辐射，这些创新使谱系能够入侵新的生态位空间，随后由分化的专业化后代占据。我们讨论了关键创新进化后新型适应区如何被殖民和利用，以及某些类型的原核生物是否更容易发生适应辐射。当重组障碍不存在时，向生态位专家的辐射不一定导致细菌中的物种形成。我们提出，在这种情况下，特定生态位的基因可能在一个单一谱系内积累，从而导致开放型泛基因组的进化。

translated_title: 大鼠泛基因组重建增强了基因型-表型映射和新变异发现。
affiliations: Department of Genetics, Genomics, and Informatics, University of Tennessee Health Science Center, Memphis, TN, USA.; Department of Pharmacology, Addiction Science, and Toxicology, University of Tennessee Health Science Center.; Institute of Genetics and Biophysics, National Research Council, Naples, 80111, Italy.; Institute of Physiology, Czech Academy of Sciences, 14200 Prague, Czech Republic.
title: Pangenome reconstruction in rats enhances genotype-phenotype mapping and novel variant discovery.
authors: Villani Flavia; Guarracino Andrea; Ward Rachel R; Green Tomomi; Emms Madeleine; Pravenec Michal; Prins Pjotr; Garrison Erik; Williams Robert W; Chen Hao; Colonna Vincenza
keywords: Glucose; Pangenome; Chromogranin expression; Insulin; Recombinant Inbred; Rat; Genotype-Phenotype
abstract: The HXB/BXH family of recombinant inbred rat strains is a unique genetic resource that has been extensively phenotyped over 25 years, resulting in a vast dataset of quantitative molecular and physiological phenotypes. We built a pangenome graph from 10x Genomics Linked-Read data for 31 recombinant inbred rats to study genetic variation and association mapping. The pangenome includes 0.2Gb of sequence that is not present the reference mRatBN7.2, confirming the capture of substantial additional variation. We validated variants in challenging regions, including complex structural variants resolving into multiple haplotypes. Phenome-wide association analysis of validated SNPs uncovered variants associated with glucose/insulin levels and hippocampal gene expression. We propose an interaction between Pirl1l1, chromogranin expression, TNF-α levels, and insulin regulation. This study demonstrates the utility of linked-read pangenomes for comprehensive variant detection and mapping phenotypic diversity in a widely used rat genetic reference panel.
journal: bioRxiv : the preprint server for biology
translated_keywords: 葡萄糖；泛基因组；染色granin表达；胰岛素；重组近交；大鼠；基因型-表型
journal_full_name: bioRxiv: The Preprint Server for Biology
translated_abstract: HXB/BXH大鼠重组近交系家族是一种独特的遗传资源，已在25年间进行了广泛的表型分析，产生了大量的定量分子和生理表型数据集。我们利用来自10x Genomics Linked-Read数据构建了一个包含31个重组近交大鼠的泛基因组图谱，用于研究遗传变异和关联作图。该泛基因组包含了0.2Gb未出现在参考mRatBN7.2中的序列，证实了捕获到大量额外的变异。我们在具有挑战性的区域验证了变异，包括复杂结构变异，这些变异可以解析为多种单倍型。对经验证的SNP进行全表型组关联分析揭示了与葡萄糖/胰岛素水平和海马基因表达相关的变异。我们提出了Pirl1l1、铬粒蛋白表达、TNF-α水平和胰岛素调节之间的相互作用。本研究表明，Linked-Read泛基因组在广泛使用的大鼠遗传参考品系中全面检测变异和映射表型多样性方面具有重要价值。

translated_title: 少量组装错误对基于泛基因组的宏基因组分析可能产生不成比例的影响。
affiliations: Dept. of Microbiology, The Ohio State University, Columbus, OH 43210 USA.; Infectious Diseases Institute, The Ohio State University, Columbus, OH 43210 USA.; Center of Microbiome Science, The Ohio State University, Columbus, OH 43210 USA.
title: Small amounts of misassembly can have disproportionate effects on pangenome-based metagenomic analyses.
authors: Majernik Stephanie N; Beaver Larry; Bradley Patrick H
keywords: (Auto-generated) pangenome; metagenomic analysis; contamination; gene prevalence; Clostridia; flagellar motility; cirrhosis; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
abstract: Individual genes from microbiomes can drive host-level phenotypes. To help identify such candidate genes, several recent tools estimate microbial gene copy numbers directly from metagenomes. These tools rely on alignments to pangenomes, which in turn are derived from the set of all individual genomes from one species. While large-scale metagenomic assembly efforts have made pangenome estimates more complete, mixed communities can also introduce contamination into assemblies, and it is unknown how robust pangenome-based metagenomic analyses are to these errors. To gain insight into this problem, we re-analyzed a case-control study of the gut microbiome in cirrhosis, focusing on commensal Clostridia previously implicated in this disease. We tested for differentially prevalent genes in the Lachnospiraceae, then investigated which were likely to be contaminants using sequence similarity searches. Out of 86 differentially prevalent genes, we found that 33 (38%) were probably contaminants originating in taxa such as Veillonella and Haemophilus, unrelated genera that were independently correlated with disease status. Our results demonstrate that even small amounts of contamination in metagenome assemblies, below typical quality thresholds, can threaten to overwhelm gene-level metagenomic analyses. However, we also show that such contaminants can be accurately identified using a method based on gene-to-species correlation. After removing these contaminants, we observe that several flagellar motility gene clusters in the Lachnospira eligens pangenome are associated with cirrhosis status. We have integrated our analyses into an analysis and visualization pipeline, PanSweep, that can automatically identify cases where pangenome contamination may bias the results of gene-resolved analyses. Metagenome-assembled genomes, or MAGs, can be constructed without pure cultures of microbes. Large scale efforts to build MAGs have yielded more complete pangenomes (i.e., sets of all genes found in one species). Pangenomes allow us to measure strain variation in gene content, which can strongly affect phenotype. However, because MAGs come from mixed communities, they can contaminate pangenomes with unrelated DNA, and how much this impacts downstream analyses has not been studied. Using a metagenomic study of gut microbes in cirrhosis as our test case, we investigate how contamination affects analyses of microbial gene content. Surprisingly, even small, typical amounts of MAG contamination (<5%) result in disproportionately high levels of false positive associations (38%). Fortunately, we show that most contaminants can be automatically flagged, and provide a simple method for doing so. Furthermore, applying this method reveals a new association between cirrhosis and gut microbial motility.
journal: bioRxiv : the preprint server for biology
translated_keywords: pangenome; metagenomic analysis; contamination; gene prevalence; Clostridia; flagellar motility; cirrhosis; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
journal_full_name: bioRxiv: The Preprint Server for Biology
translated_abstract: 微生物组中的单个基因可以驱动宿主表型。为了帮助识别这些候选基因，最近的一些工具直接从宏基因组数据中估算微生物基因拷贝数。这些工具依赖于与泛基因组的比对，而泛基因组又是基于某一物种的所有个体基因组集合推导而来。尽管大规模的宏基因组组装工作使泛基因组估计更加完整，但混合群落也可能引入污染，并且尚不清楚基于泛基因组的宏基因组分析对这些错误有多大的鲁棒性。为了深入了解这一问题，我们重新分析了一项关于肝硬化肠道微生物组的病例对照研究，重点关注之前与该疾病相关的共生梭菌。我们测试了毛螺旋菌科中不同流行率的基因，然后使用序列相似性搜索来调查哪些基因可能是污染物。在86个不同流行率的基因中，我们发现其中33个（占38%）很可能是来自与疾病状态独立相关的无关属（如韦荣球菌和嗜血杆菌）的污染物。我们的结果表明，即使在宏基因组组装中存在少量污染（低于典型质量阈值），也可能威胁到基于基因的宏基因组分析。然而，我们也展示了可以通过基于基因与物种相关性的方法准确识别这些污染物。去除这些污染物后，我们观察到在Lachnospira eligens的泛基因组中，几个鞭毛运动基因簇与肝硬化状态相关联。我们将我们的分析整合到一个名为PanSweep的分析和可视化管道中，该工具可以自动识别泛基因组污染可能影响基因解析分析结果的情况。宏基因组组装的基因组（MAGs）可以在没有纯培养微生物的情况下构建。大规模构建MAGs的努力已经产生了更完整的泛基因组（即某一物种中所有基因的集合）。泛基因组使我们能够测量基因内容中的菌株变异，这可能对表型产生强烈影响。然而，由于MAGs来自混合群落，它们可能会用无关的DNA污染泛基因组，而这种影响对下游分析的影响尚未被研究。以肝硬化肠道微生物组的宏基因组研究作为测试案例，我们探讨了污染如何影响微生物基因内容的分析。令人惊讶的是，即使是小量、典型的MAG污染（<5%）也会导致假阳性关联的比例显著增加（38%）。幸运的是，我们展示了大多数污染物可以被自动标记，并提供了一种简单的方法来实现这一点。此外，应用这种方法揭示了肝硬化与肠道微生物运动之间的一种新关联。

translated_title: 比较基因组学揭示枯草芽孢杆菌群的功能多样性、泛基因组开放性及潜在的生物学驱动因素
affiliations: National Key Laboratory of Agricultural Microbiology, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan 430070, China.; Hubei Key Laboratory of Agricultural Bioinformatics, College of Informatics, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan 430070, China.
title: Comparative Genomics Unveils Functional Diversity, Pangenome Openness, and Underlying Biological Drivers among Bacillus subtilis Group.
authors: Wang Taiquan; Shi Yiling; Zheng Mengzhuo; Zheng Jinshui
keywords: Bacillus subtilis; pangenome openness; comparative pangenomics; mobile elements; functional enrichment; Bacillus subtilis group
abstract: The Bacillus subtilis group (Bs group), with Bacillus subtilis as its core species, holds significant research and economic value in various fields, including science, industrial production, food, and pharmaceuticals. However, most studies have been confined to comparative genomics analyses and exploration within individual genomes at the level of species, with few conducted within groups across different species. This study focused on Bacillus subtilis, the model of Gram-positive bacteria, and 14 other species with significant research value, employing comparative pangenomics as well as population enrichment analysis to ascertain the functional enrichment and diversity. Through the quantification of pangenome openness, this work revealed the underlying biological drivers and significant correlation between pangenome openness and various factors, including the distribution of toxin-antitoxin- and integrase-related genes, as well as the number of endonucleases, recombinases, repair system-related genes, prophages, integrases, and transfer mobile elements. Furthermore, the functional enrichment results indicated the potential for secondary metabolite, probiotic, and antibiotic exploration in Bacillus licheniformis, Bacillus paralicheniformis, and Bacillus spizizenii, respectively. In general, this work systematically exposed the quantification of pangenome openness, biological drivers, the pivotal role of genomic instability factors, and mobile elements, providing targeted exploration guidance for the Bs group.
translated_keywords: 枯草芽孢杆菌；泛基因组开放性；比较泛基因组学；可移动元件；功能富集；枯草芽孢杆菌群
translated_abstract: 枯草芽孢杆菌复合群（Bs复合群）以枯草芽孢杆菌为核心种，具有重要的科学研究与经济价值，在科学、工业生产、食品及医药等领域均有广泛应用。然而，目前大多数研究局限于物种水平上的比较基因组学分析或单一基因组探索，跨物种群体层面的研究较少。本研究以模式革兰氏阳性菌枯草芽孢杆菌和14个具有重要研究价值的物种为研究对象，采用比较泛基因组学与群体富集分析方法，揭示了功能富集与多样性特征。通过量化泛基因组开放性，研究揭示了泛基因组开放性背后的生物学驱动因素及其与毒素-抗毒素系统、整合酶相关基因分布、内切酶、重组酶、修复系统相关基因、前噬菌体、整合酶以及可移动元件数量等因子之间的显著关联。此外，功能富集结果表明，地衣芽孢杆菌、副地衣芽孢杆菌和斯氏芽孢杆菌在次级代谢物、益生菌和抗生素研究方面具有潜在应用价值。总体而言，本研究系统地量化了泛基因组开放性、生物学驱动因素、基因组不稳定性因子及可移动元件的作用，为Bs复合群的深入研究提供了有针对性的指导。

translated_title: 盐沼硫循环细菌在单核苷酸到泛基因组尺度上的多样性。
affiliations: The Ecosystems Center, Marine Biological Laboratory , Woods Hole, Massachusetts, USA.; Crop and Soil Sciences, University of Georgia , Athens, USA.; Thomas H. Gosnell School of Life Sciences, Rochester Institute of Technology , Rochester, New York, USA.; Department of Earth, Ocean and Atmospheric Science, Florida State University , Tallahassee, Florida, USA.; Department of Marine and Environmental Sciences, Marine Science Center, Northeastern University , Nahant, Massachusetts, USA.; Department of Biological Sciences, University of Alabama , Tuscaloosa, Alabama, USA.; Bay Paul Center, Marine Biological Laboratory , Woods Hole, Massachusetts, USA.
title: Diversity at single nucleotide to pangenome scales among sulfur cycling bacteria in salt marshes.
authors: Pérez Castro Sherlynette; Peredo Elena L; Mason Olivia U; Vineis Joseph; Bowen Jennifer L; Mortazavi Behzad; Ganesh Anakha; Ruff S Emil; Paul Blair G; Giblin Anne E; Cardon Zoe G
keywords: pangenomics; diversity-generating retroelement; sulfate-reducing bacteria; site-specific genetic diversity; sulfur-oxidizing bacteria; single-nucleotide polymorphism
abstract: Salt marshes are known for their significant carbon storage capacity, and sulfur cycling is closely linked with the ecosystem-scale carbon cycling in these ecosystems. Sulfate reducers are key for the decomposition of organic matter, and sulfur oxidizers remove toxic sulfide, supporting the productivity of marsh plants. To date, the complexity of coastal environments, heterogeneity of the rhizosphere, high microbial diversity, and uncultured majority hindered our understanding of the genomic diversity of sulfur-cycling microbes in salt marshes. Here, we use comparative genomics to overcome these challenges and provide an in-depth characterization of sulfur-cycling microbial diversity in salt marshes. We characterize communities across distinct sites and plant species and uncover extensive genomic diversity at the taxon level and specific genomic features present in MAGs affiliated with uncultivated sulfur-cycling lineages. Our work provides insights into the partnerships in salt marshes and a roadmap for multiscale analyses of diversity in complex biological systems.
translated_keywords: 泛基因组学；多样性生成逆转录元件；硫酸盐还原菌；位点特异性遗传多样性；硫氧化菌；单核苷酸多态性
translated_abstract: 盐沼以其显著的碳储存能力而闻名，硫循环与这些生态系统的生态系统尺度碳循环密切相关。硫酸盐还原菌在有机质分解中起关键作用，而硫氧化菌则通过去除有毒的硫化物来支持盐沼植物的生产力。迄今为止，沿海环境的复杂性、根际的异质性、微生物多样性的丰富性以及未培养微生物占多数等因素阻碍了我们对盐沼中硫循环微生物基因组多样性的理解。本文利用比较基因组学克服了这些挑战，并深入描述了盐沼中硫循环微生物的多样性。我们对不同地点和植物种类的群落进行了表征，并揭示了在分类学水平上广泛的基因组多样性，以及与未培养硫循环谱系相关的MAGs（宏基因组组装基因组）中存在的特定基因组特征。我们的研究为盐沼中的共生关系提供了见解，并为复杂生物系统中多尺度多样性的分析提供了路线图。

translated_title: 全基因组关联研究在探索疾病关联与生物学机制方面的进展
affiliations: Rutgers Institute for Health, Health Care Policy and Aging Research, Rutgers University, 112 Paterson St, New Brunswick, NJ, USA.; Department of Medicine, Robert Wood Johnson Medical School, Rutgers Biomedical and Health Sciences, 125 Paterson St, New Brunswick, NJ, USA.
title: GWAS advancements to investigate disease associations and biological mechanisms.
authors: Omidiran Oluwaferanmi; Patel Aashna; Usman Sarah; Mhatre Ishani; Abdelhalim Habiba; DeGroat William; Narayanan Rishabh; Singh Kritika; Mendhe Dinesh; Ahmed Zeeshan
keywords: HuBMAP; Pangenome; Whole Genome Sequencing; GWAS; Mendelian Randomization
abstract: Genome-wide association studies (GWAS) have been instrumental in elucidating the genetic architecture of various traits and diseases. Despite the success of GWAS, inherent limitations such as identifying rare and ultra-rare variants, the potential for spurious associations, and in pinpointing causative agents can undermine diagnostic capabilities. This review provides an overview of GWAS and highlights recent advances in genetics that employ a range of methodologies, including Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS), Mendelian Randomization (MR), the Pangenome's high-quality T2T-CHM13 panel, and the Human BioMolecular Atlas Program (HuBMAP), as potential enablers of current and future GWAS research. State of the literature demonstrate the capabilities of these techniques in enhancing the statistical power of GWAS. WGS, with its comprehensive approach, captures the entire genome, surpassing the capabilities of the traditional GWAS technique focused on predefined Single Nucleotide Polymorphism (SNP) sites. The Pangenome's T2T-CHM13 panel, with its holistic approach, aids in the analysis of regions with high sequence identity, such as segmental duplications (SDs). Mendelian Randomization has advanced causative inference, improving clinical diagnostics and facilitating definitive conclusions. Furthermore, spatial biology techniques like HuBMAP, enable 3D molecular mapping of tissues at single-cell resolution, offering insights into pathology of complex traits. This study aims to elucidate and advocate for the increased application of these technologies, highlighting their potential to shape the future of GWAS research.
translated_keywords: HuBMAP；泛基因组；全基因组测序；全基因组关联研究；孟德尔随机化
translated_abstract: 全基因组关联研究（GWAS）在揭示各种特征和疾病的遗传结构方面发挥了重要作用。尽管GWAS取得了成功，但其固有的局限性，如识别稀有和超稀有变异、潜在的虚假关联以及确定因果因素的能力不足，可能削弱诊断能力。本文综述了GWAS，并重点介绍了遗传学领域的一些最新进展，这些进展采用了多种方法，包括全基因组测序（WGS）、孟德尔随机化（MR）、高质量的泛基因组T2T-CHM13面板以及人类生物分子图谱计划（HuBMAP），作为推动当前和未来GWAS研究的潜在工具。现有文献表明，这些技术能够增强GWAS的统计功效。WGS以其全面的方法捕获整个基因组，超越了传统GWAS技术仅关注预定义单核苷酸多态性（SNP）位点的能力。泛基因组的T2T-CHM13面板以其整体方法有助于分析高序列同一性的区域，例如片段重复（SD）。孟德尔随机化提升了因果推断的能力，改善了临床诊断并促进了明确结论的得出。此外，空间生物学技术如HuBMAP，能够在单细胞分辨率下对组织进行三维分子测绘，为复杂特征的病理提供见解。本研究旨在阐明并倡导这些技术的更广泛应用，强调它们塑造GWAS研究未来的潜力。

translated_title: 鸡肠球菌对家禽的宿主特异性适应性
affiliations: Institute of Animal Science, University of Hohenheim, Emil-Wolff-Str. 6-10, Stuttgart 70593, Germany.; HoLMiR-Hohenheim Center for Livestock Microbiome Research, University of Hohenheim, Leonore-Blosser-Reisen Weg 3, Stuttgart 70593, Germany.
title: Host specific adaptations of Ligilactobacillus aviarius to poultry.
authors: Rios Galicia Bibiana; Sáenz Johan Sebastian; Yergaliyev Timur; Camarinha-Silva Amélia; Seifert Jana
keywords: Poultry; Chicken; Ligilactobacillus aviarius; Pan-genome
abstract: The genus Ligilactobacillus encompasses species adapted to vertebrate hosts and fermented food. Their genomes encode adaptations to the host lifestyle. Reports of gut microbiota from chicken and turkey gastrointestinal tract have shown a high persistence of Ligilactobacillus aviarius along the digestive system compared to other species found in the same host. However, its adaptations to poultry as a host has not yet been described. In this work, the pan-genome of Ligilactobacillus aviarius was explored to describe the functional adaptability to the gastrointestinal environment. The core genome is composed of 1179 gene clusters that are present at least in one copy that codifies to structural, ribosomal and biogenesis proteins. The rest of the identified regions were classified into three different functional clusters of orthologous groups (clusters) that codify carbohydrate metabolism, envelope biogenesis, viral defence mechanisms, and mobilome inclusions. The pan-genome of Ligilactobacillus aviarius is a closed pan-genome, frequently found in poultry and highly prevalent across chicken faecal samples. The genome of L. aviarius codifies different clusters of glycoside hydrolases and glycosyltransferases that mediate interactions with the host cells. Accessory features, such as antiviral mechanisms and prophage inclusions, variate amongst strains from different GIT sections. This information provides hints about the interaction of this species with viral particles and other bacterial species. This work highlights functional adaptability traits present in L. aviarius that make it a dominant key member of the poultry gut microbiota and enlightens the convergent ecological relation of this species to the poultry gut environment.
translated_keywords: 家禽；鸡；鸽源肠球菌；泛基因组
translated_abstract: 属Ligilactobacillus包含适应于脊椎动物宿主和发酵食品的物种。它们的基因组编码了适应宿主生活方式的特性。来自鸡和火鸡胃肠道的肠道微生物群报告表明，在消化系统中Ligilactobacillus aviarius的持久性高于在同一宿主体内发现的其他物种。然而，其对家禽作为宿主的适应性尚未被描述。在这项工作中，我们探索了Ligilactobacillus aviarius的泛基因组，以描述其对胃肠道环境的功能适应性。核心基因组由1179个基因簇组成，这些基因簇至少以一份拷贝存在，编码结构蛋白、核糖体蛋白和生物发生蛋白。其余识别出的区域被分类为三个不同的直系同源群（cluster）功能簇，分别编码碳水化合物代谢、包膜生物发生、病毒防御机制以及可移动遗传元件的包含。Ligilactobacillus aviarius的泛基因组是一个封闭的泛基因组，常见于家禽并在鸡粪便样本中高度流行。L. aviarius的基因组编码了多种糖苷水解酶和糖基转移酶的簇，这些酶介导与宿主细胞的相互作用。辅助特征，如抗病毒机制和前噬菌体的包含，在来自不同胃肠道部位的菌株之间有所不同。这些信息提供了关于该物种与病毒颗粒和其他细菌物种相互作用的线索。这项工作突出了L. aviarius中存在的功能适应性特征，使其成为家禽肠道微生物群中的主要关键成员，并揭示了该物种与家禽肠道环境的趋同生态关系。

translated_title: 基于泛基因组的基因组推断整数规划框架
affiliations: Department of Computational and Data Sciences, Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore KA 560012, India.; Department of Computer Science, The University of Texas at Dallas, TX 75080, USA.; Institute of Medical Microbiology and Hospital Hygiene, Heinrich Heine University Düsseldorf, Düsseldorf, Germany.; Center for Digital Medicine, Heinrich Heine University Düsseldorf, Düsseldorf, Germany.
title: Integer programming framework for pangenome-based genome inference.
authors: Chandra Ghanshyam; Hossen Md Helal; Scholz Stephan; Dilthey Alexander T; Gibney Daniel; Jain Chirag
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因组推断;整数规划;泛基因组图;结构变异;重组事件;低覆盖度测序;主要组织相容性复合体;生物信息学;分子生物学
abstract: Affordable genotyping methods are essential in genomics. Commonly used genotyping methods primarily support single nucleotide variants and short indels but neglect structural variants. Additionally, accuracy of read alignments to a reference genome is unreliable in highly polymorphic and repetitive regions, further impacting genotyping performance. Recent works highlight the advantage of haplotype-resolved pangenome graphs in addressing these challenges. Building on these developments, we propose a rigorous alignment-free genotyping framework. Our formulation seeks a path through the pangenome graph that maximizes the matches between the path and substrings of sequencing reads (e.g., k-mers) while minimizing recombination events (haplotype switches) along the path. We prove that this problem is NP-Hard and develop efficient integer-programming solutions. We benchmarked the algorithm using downsampled short-read datasets from homozygous human cell lines with coverage ranging from 0.1× to 10×. Our algorithm accurately estimates complete major histocompatibility complex (MHC) haplotype sequences with small edit distances from the ground-truth sequences, providing a significant advantage over existing methods on low-coverage inputs. Although our algorithm is designed for haploid samples, we discuss future extensions to diploid samples.
journal: bioRxiv : the preprint server for biology
translated_keywords: 基因组推断;整数规划;泛基因组图;结构变异;重组事件;低覆盖度测序;主要组织相容性复合体;生物信息学;分子生物学
journal_full_name: bioRxiv: The Preprint Server for Biology
translated_abstract: 在基因组学中，可负担得起的基因分型方法至关重要。目前常用的基因分型方法主要支持单核苷酸变异和短插入缺失，但忽略了结构变异。此外，在高度多态性和重复区域中，读段与参考基因组的比对准确性不可靠，进一步影响了基因分型性能。近期的研究强调了以单倍型解析的泛基因组图谱在解决这些挑战中的优势。在此基础上，我们提出了一种严格的无参基因分型框架。我们的方法旨在通过泛基因组图谱寻找一条路径，使该路径与测序读段（例如k-mer）子串之间的匹配最大化，同时最小化路径上的重组事件（单倍型切换）。我们证明了此问题属于NP难问题，并开发了高效的整数规划解决方案。我们在来自纯合人类细胞系的下采样短读数据集上评估了该算法，覆盖度范围从0.1×到10×。我们的算法能够以较小的编辑距离准确估计完整的主要组织相容性复合体（MHC）单倍型序列，相较于现有方法在低覆盖度输入上具有显著优势。尽管我们的算法设计用于单倍体样本，但我们讨论了将其扩展到二倍体样本的未来方向。

translated_title: 泛基因组分析揭示了黄单胞菌属的遗传多样性、代谢多样性和进化特征。
affiliations: Department of Biology, Jeju National University , Jeju, South Korea.; Microorganism Resources Division, National Institute of Biological Resources , Incheon, South Korea.; Archaeal Biology Center, Institute for Advanced Study, Shenzhen University , Shenzhen, China.; Shenzhen Key Laboratory of Marine Microbiome Engineering, Institute for Advanced Study, Shenzhen University , Shenzhen, China.
title: Pangenome analysis provides insights into the genetic diversity, metabolic versatility, and evolution of the genus Flavobacterium.
authors: Kim Minji; Cha In-Tae; Lee Ki-Eun; Li Meng; Park Soo-Je
keywords: Flavobacterium; evolution; pangenome; proteorhodopsin; comparative genomics; carbohydrate-active enzymes
abstract: Members of the genus Flavobacterium are widely distributed and produce various polysaccharide-degrading enzymes. Many species in the genus have been isolated and characterized. However, few studies have focused on marine isolates or fish pathogens, and in-depth genomic analyses, particularly comparative analyses of isolates from different habitat types, are lacking. Here, we isolated 20 strains of the genus from various environments in South Korea and sequenced their full-length genomes. Combined with published sequence data, we examined genomic traits, evolution, environmental adaptation, and putative metabolic functions in total 187 genomes of isolated species in Flavobacterium categorized as marine, host-associated, and terrestrial including freshwater. A pangenome analysis revealed a correlation between genome size and coding or noncoding density. Flavobacterium spp. had high levels of diversity, allowing for novel gene repertories via recombination events. Defense-related genes only accounted for approximately 3% of predicted genes in all Flavobacterium genomes. While genes involved in metabolic pathways did not differ with respect to isolation source, there was substantial variation in genomic traits; in particular, the abundances of tRNAs and rRNAs were higher in the host-associdated group than in other groups. One genome in the host-associated group contained a Microviridae prophage closely related to an enterobacteria phage. The proteorhodopsin gene was only identified in four terrestrial strains isolated for this study. Furthermore, recombination events clearly influenced genomic diversity and may contribute to the response to environmental stress. These findings shed light on the high genetic variation in Flavobacterium and functional roles in diverse ecosystems as a result of their metabolic versatility. IMPORTANCE The genus Flavobacterium is a diverse group of bacteria that are found in a variety of environments. While most species of this genus are harmless and utilize organic substrates such as proteins and polysaccharides, some members may play a significant role in the cycling for organic substances within their environments. Nevertheless, little is known about the genomic dynamics and/or metabolic capacity of Flavobacterium. Here, we found that Flavobacterium species may have an open pangenome, containing a variety of diverse and novel gene repertoires. Intriguingly, we discovered that one genome (classified into host-associated group) contained a Microviridae prophage closely related to that of enterobacteria. Proteorhodopsin may be expressed under conditions of light or oxygen pressure in some strains isolated for this study. Our findings significantly contribute to the understanding of the members of the genus Flavobacterium diversity exploration and will provide a framework for the way for future ecological characterizations.
translated_keywords: 黄杆菌；进化；泛基因组；视紫红质蛋白；比较基因组学；碳水化合物活性酶
translated_abstract: 黄杆菌属是一类多样化的细菌群体，存在于各种环境中。虽然该属的大多数物种无害且利用有机底物如蛋白质和多糖，但某些成员可能在其环境中对有机物质循环起重要作用。然而，关于黄杆菌属的基因组动态和/或代谢能力知之甚少。本文发现，黄杆菌属物种可能具有开放的泛基因组，包含多种多样且新颖的基因库。有趣的是，我们发现一株基因组（归类为宿主相关组）含有一个与肠杆菌密切相关的微小病毒科前噬菌体。蛋白紫质可能在某些本研究中分离的菌株中受到光照或氧气压力的诱导表达。我们的研究结果显著增进了对黄杆菌属多样性的理解，并为未来生态特征的研究提供了框架。

title: Genomic characterization of the C. tuberculostearicum species complex, a prominent member of the human skin microbiome.
authors: Ahmed Nashwa; Joglekar Payal; Deming Clayton; NISC Comparative Sequencing Program; Lemon Katherine P; Kong Heidi H; Segre Julie A; Conlan Sean
keywords: Corynebacterium; genomics; tuberculostearicum; pangenome
abstract: Amplicon sequencing data combined with isolate whole genome sequencing have expanded our understanding of Corynebacterium on the skin. Healthy human skin is colonized by a diverse collection of Corynebacterium species, but Corynebacterium tuberculostearicum predominates on many skin sites. Our work supports the emerging idea that C. tuberculostearicum is a species complex encompassing several distinct species. We produced a collection of genomes that help define this complex, including a potentially new species we term Corynebacterium hallux based on a preference for sites on the feet, whole-genome average nucleotide identity, pangenomic analysis, and growth in skin-like media. This isolate collection and high-quality genome resource set the stage for developing engineered strains for both basic and translational clinical studies.
translated_keywords: 棒状杆菌；基因组学；结核亚种；泛基因组
translated_abstract: 通过扩增子测序数据与分离株全基因组测序的结合，我们对皮肤上棒状杆菌的理解得到了扩展。健康的人类皮肤被多种棒状杆菌物种定植，而结核分枝杆菌脂肪酶样菌（Corynebacterium tuberculostearicum）在许多皮肤部位占据主导地位。我们的研究支持了这样一个新兴观点，即C. tuberculostearicum 是一个包含多个不同物种的复合种。我们生成了一系列基因组数据，这些数据有助于定义这一复合种，其中包括一种我们基于脚部特定部位偏好、全基因组平均核苷酸一致性、泛基因组分析以及在类似皮肤培养基中的生长情况，将其命名为“Corynebacterium hallux”的潜在新物种。这一分离株集合和高质量基因组资源为开发用于基础研究和临床转化研究的工程菌株奠定了基础。

translated_title: 整合蛋白质组和泛基因组分析揭示了微藻Isochrysis galbana及其相关细菌群落对2,6-二叔丁基对甲酚（BHT）胁迫的响应变异。
affiliations: College of Safety and Environment Engineering, Shandong University of Science & Technology, Qingdao, 266510, China.; Institute of Yellow River Delta Earth Surface Processes and Ecological Integrity, Shandong University of Science & Technology, Qingdao, 266510, China.; College of Safety and Environment Engineering, Shandong University of Science & Technology, Qingdao, 266510, China. linlinzhsd@126.com.; Institute of Yellow River Delta Earth Surface Processes and Ecological Integrity, Shandong University of Science & Technology, Qingdao, 266510, China. linlinzhsd@126.com.; College of Safety and Environment Engineering, Shandong University of Science & Technology, Qingdao, 266510, China. lujianjiang1990@126.com.; Institute of Yellow River Delta Earth Surface Processes and Ecological Integrity, Shandong University of Science & Technology, Qingdao, 266510, China. lujianjiang1990@126.com.
title: Integrated proteome and pangenome analysis revealed the variation of microalga Isochrysis galbana and associated bacterial community to 2,6-Di-tert-butyl-p-cresol (BHT) stress.
authors: Guo Linke; Li Shuangwei; Cheng Dongle; Lu Xiao; Gao Xinying; Zhang Linlin; Lu Jianjiang
keywords: Isochrysis galbana; Pangenome; Phycosphere bacteria; 2,6-Di-tert-butyl-p-cresol; Proteomics
abstract: The phenolic antioxidant 2,6-Di-tert-butyl-p-cresol (BHT) has been detected in various environments and is considered a potential threat to aquatic organisms. Algal-bacterial interactions are crucial for maintaining ecosystem balance and elemental cycling, but their response to BHT remains to be investigated. This study analyzed the physiological and biochemical responses of the microalga Isochrysis galbana and the changes of associated bacterial communities under different concentrations of BHT stress. Results showed that the biomass of I. galbana exhibited a decreasing trend with increasing BHT concentrations up to 40 mg/L. The reduction in chlorophyll, carotenoid, and soluble protein content of microalgal cells was also observed under BHT stress. The production of malondialdehyde and the activities of superoxide dismutase, peroxidase, and catalase were further determined. Scanning electron microscopy analysis revealed that BHT caused surface rupture of the algal cells and loss of intracellular nutrients. Proteomic analysis demonstrated the upregulation of photosynthesis and citric acid cycle pathways as a response to BHT stress. Additionally, BHT significantly increased the relative abundance of specific bacteria in the phycosphere, including Marivita, Halomonas, Marinobacter, and Alteromonas. Further experiments confirmed that these bacteria had the ability to utilize BHT as the sole carbon resource for growth, and genes related to the degradation of phenolic compounds were detected through pangenome analysis.
translated_keywords: 异养小球藻；泛基因组；藻际细菌；2,6-二叔丁基对甲酚；蛋白质组学
translated_abstract: 酚类抗氧化剂2,6-二叔丁基对甲酚（BHT）已在多种环境中被检测到，被认为对水生生物构成潜在威胁。藻菌相互作用对于维持生态系统平衡和元素循环至关重要，但其对BHT的响应尚未得到充分研究。本研究分析了微藻异弯藻（*Isochrysis galbana*）在不同浓度BHT胁迫下的生理生化反应以及相关细菌群落的变化。结果表明，异弯藻的生物量随着BHT浓度的增加（最高至40 mg/L）呈现下降趋势。在BHT胁迫下，微藻细胞中的叶绿素、类胡萝卜素和可溶性蛋白含量也有所减少。此外，还测定了丙二醛的产生以及超氧化物歧化酶、过氧化物酶和过氧化氢酶的活性。扫描电子显微镜分析显示，BHT导致藻细胞表面破裂并丧失细胞内营养物质。蛋白质组学分析表明，光合作用和柠檬酸循环途径在应对BHT胁迫时上调表达。此外，BHT显著增加了浮游植物球囊菌群中特定细菌的相对丰度，包括*Marivita*、*Halomonas*、*Marinobacter*和*Alteromonas*。进一步实验确认这些细菌能够利用BHT作为唯一的碳源生长，并通过泛基因组分析检测到与酚类化合物降解相关的基因。

title: FoPGDB: a pangenome database of Fusarium oxysporum, a cross-kingdom fungal pathogen.
authors: Meng Tan; Jiao Hanqing; Zhang Yi; Zhou Yi; Chen Shaoying; Wang Xinrui; Yang Bowen; Sun Jie; Geng Xin; Ayhan Dilay Hazal; Guo Li
keywords: (Auto-generated) FoPGDB; Fusarium oxysporum; 菌物泛基因组; 交叉王国病原体; 遗传多样性; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
abstract: Pangenomes, capturing the genetic diversity of a species or genus, are essential to understanding the ecology, pathobiology and evolutionary mechanisms of fungi that cause infection in crops and humans. However, fungal pangenome databases remain unavailable. Here, we report the first fungal pangenome database, specifically for Fusarium oxysporum species complex (FOSC), a group of cross-kingdom pathogens causing devastating vascular wilt to over 100 plant species and life-threatening fusariosis to immunocompromised humans. The F. oxysporum Pangenome Database (FoPGDB) is a comprehensive resource integrating 35 high-quality FOSC genomes, coupled with robust analytical tools. FoPGDB allows for both gene-based and graph-based exploration of the F. oxysporum pangenome. It also curates a large repository of putative effector sequences, crucial for understanding the mechanisms of FOSC pathogenicity. With an assortment of functionalities including gene search, genomic variant exploration and tools for functional enrichment, FoPGDB provides a platform for in-depth investigations of the genetic diversity and adaptability of F. oxysporum. The modular and user-friendly interface ensures efficient data access and interpretation. FoPGDB promises to be a valuable resource for F. oxysporum research, contributing to our understanding of this pathogen's pangenomic landscape and aiding in the development of novel disease management strategies. Database URL: http://www.fopgdb.site.
