translated_title: 植物倍半萜内酯
affiliations: School of Biological Sciences, Nanyang Technological University, 60 Nanyang Drive , Singapore 637551, Singapore.
title: Plant sesquiterpene lactones.
authors: Agatha Olivia; Mutwil-Anderwald Daniela; Tan Jhing Yein; Mutwil Marek
keywords: plants; biosynthesis; bioinformatics; medicinal; sesquiterpene; specialized metabolism
abstract: Sesquiterpene lactones (STLs) are a prominent group of plant secondary metabolites predominantly found in the Asteraceae family and have multiple ecological roles and medicinal applications. This review describes the evolutionary and ecological significance of STLs, highlighting their roles in plant defence mechanisms against herbivory and as phytotoxins, alongside their function as environmental signalling molecules. We also cover the substantial role of STLs in medicine and their mode of action in health and disease. We discuss the biosynthetic pathways and the various modifications that make STLs one of the most diverse groups of metabolites. Finally, we discuss methods for identifying and predicting STL biosynthesis pathways. This article is part of the theme issue 'The evolution of plant metabolism'.
journal: Philosophical transactions of the Royal Society of London. Series B, Biological sciences
translated_keywords: 植物；生物合成；生物信息学；药用；倍半萜；次生代谢
journal_full_name: Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society of London. Series B, Biological Sciences
translated_abstract: 倍半萜内酯（STLs）是一类主要存在于菊科植物中的重要次生代谢物，在生态系统和医药领域具有多重功能。本文综述了STLs的进化与生态意义，重点介绍了其在植物抵御食草动物、作为植物毒素以及作为环境信号分子中的作用，并探讨了其在医学领域的广泛应用及其在健康与疾病中的作用机制。此外，文章还讨论了STLs的生物合成途径及其多样化的修饰方式，使其成为代谢物中最多样化的一类。最后，我们概述了识别和预测STL生物合成途径的方法。本文是“植物代谢的进化”专题系列的一部分。

translated_title: 加德纳菌同线性泛基因组揭示了物种间的分类界限及代谢与毒力潜力的分层差异。
title: A Syntenic Pangenome for Gardnerella Reveals Taxonomic Boundaries and Stratification of Metabolic and Virulence Potential across Species.
authors: Bouzek Heather; Srinivasan Sujatha; Jones Dakota S; McMahon Elsa F; Strenk Susan M; Fiedler Tina L; Fredricks David N; Johnston Christopher D
keywords: (Auto-generated) Gardnerella; 细菌性阴道病; 基因组学; 蛋白核糖体小亚基; 聚合酶链式反应; 生物膜; 抗微生物药物耐药性; 分子生物学; 生物信息学
abstract: Bacterial vaginosis (BV) is a prevalent condition associated with an imbalance in the vaginal microbiota, often involving species of Gardnerella . The taxonomic complexity and inconsistent nomenclature of Gardnerella have impeded progress in understanding the role of specific species in health and disease. In this study, we conducted a comprehensive genomic and pangenomic analysis to resolve taxonomic ambiguities and elucidate metabolic and virulence potential across Gardnerella species. We obtained complete, closed genomes for 42 Gardnerella isolates from women with BV and curated publicly available genome sequences (n = 291). Average nucleotide identity (ANI) analysis, digital DNA-DNA hybridization (dDDH), and the cpn60 gene sequences identified nine species and eleven subspecies within Gardnerella , for which we refined species and subspecies boundaries and proposed updated nomenclature. Pangenome analysis revealed species-specific gene clusters linked to metabolic pathways, virulence factors, and niche adaptations, distinguishing species specialized for mucin degradation in the vaginal environment from those potentially adapted to urinary tract colonization. Notably, we identified lineage-specific evolutionary divergence in gene clusters associated with biofilm formation, carbohydrate metabolism, and antimicrobial resistance. We further discovered the first cryptic plasmids naturally present within the Gardnerella genus. Our findings provide a unified framework for Gardnerella taxonomy and nomenclature, and enhance our understanding of species-specific functional capabilities, with implications for Gardnerella research, diagnostics, and targeted therapeutics in BV.

journal_full_name: bioRxiv: The Preprint Server for Biology
translated_abstract: 细菌性阴道病（BV）是一种与阴道微生物群失衡相关的常见病症，通常涉及加德纳菌属（Gardnerella）物种。然而，加德纳菌属在分类学上的复杂性以及不一致的命名法阻碍了对其特定物种在健康和疾病中作用的理解。本研究通过全面的基因组和泛基因组分析，解决了分类学上的模糊问题，并阐明了加德纳菌属物种的代谢和毒力潜力。我们获得了来自BV女性患者的42株加德纳菌分离株的完整、封闭基因组，并整理了公共数据库中可用的291个基因组序列。基于平均核苷酸相似度（ANI）、数字DNA-DNA杂交（dDDH）以及cpn60基因序列分析，我们确定了加德纳菌属内的九个物种和十一个亚种，并重新界定了物种和亚种边界，提出了更新的命名建议。泛基因组分析揭示了与代谢途径、毒力因子和生态位适应相关的物种特异性基因簇，区分了在阴道环境中专门降解粘蛋白的物种与其他可能适应尿路定植的物种。值得注意的是，我们在与生物膜形成、碳水化合物代谢和抗菌耐药性相关的基因簇中发现了谱系特异性的进化分歧。此外，我们首次发现了天然存在于加德纳菌属中的隐秘质粒。本研究结果为加德纳菌属的分类学和命名提供了统一框架，并加深了对物种特异性功能能力的理解，这对BV的研究、诊断和靶向治疗具有重要意义。

translated_title: 一项全球比较群体基因组学研究
title: CC180 clade dynamics do not universally explain Streptococcus pneumoniae serotype 3 persistence post-vaccine: a global comparative population genomics study.
authors: Stanley Sydney; Silva-Costa Catarina; Gomes-Silva Joana; Melo-Cristino Jose; Malley Richard; Ramirez Mario
keywords: (Auto-generated) Streptococcus pneumoniae; serotype 3; CC180 clade; PCV13 vaccine; population genomics; antibiotic susceptibility; pangenome; 假设蛋白编码基因; 预后基因组学; 生物信息学
abstract: Background Clonal complex 180 (CC180) is currently the major clone of serotype 3 Streptococcus pneumoniae (Spn). The 13-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine (PCV13) does not have significant efficacy against serotype 3 despite polysaccharide inclusion in the vaccine. It was hypothesized that PCV13 may effectively control Clade I of CC180 but that Clades III and IV are resistant, provoking a population shift that enables serotype 3 persistence. This has been observed in the United States, England, and Wales but not Spain. We tested this hypothesis further utilizing a dataset from Portugal. Methods We whole-genome sequenced (WGS) 501 serotype 3 strains from Portugal isolated from patients with pneumococcal infections between 1999-2020. The draft genomes underwent phylogenetic analyses, pangenome profiling, and a genome-wide association study (GWAS). We also completed antibiotic susceptibility testing and compiled over 2,600 serotype 3 multilocus sequence type 180 (MLST180) WGSs to perform global comparative genomics. Findings CC180 Clades I, II, III, IV, and VI distributions were similar when comparing non-invasive pneumonia isolates and invasive disease isolates (Fisher's exact test, P=0.29), and adult and pediatric cases (Fisher's exact test, P=0.074). The serotype 3 CCs shifted post-PCV13 (Fisher's exact test, P<0.0001) and Clade I became dominant. Clade I is largely antibiotic-sensitive and carries the phiOXC141 prophage but the pangenome is heterogenous. Strains from Portugal and Spain, where Clade I remains dominant post-PCV13, have larger pangenomes and are associated with the presence of two genes encoding hypothetical proteins. Interpretation Clade I became dominant in Portugal post-PCV13, despite the burden of the prophage and antibiotic sensitivity. The accessory genome content may mitigate these fitness costs. Regional differences in Clade I prevalence and pangenome heterogeneity suggest that clade dynamics is not a generalizable approach to understanding serotype 3 vaccine escape. Funding National Institute of Child Health and Human Development, Pfizer, and Merck Sharp & Dohme.
journal: medRxiv : the preprint server for health sciences
translated_keywords: Streptococcus pneumoniae; serotype 3; CC180 clade; PCV13 vaccine; population genomics; antibiotic susceptibility; pangenome; 假设蛋白编码基因; 预后基因组学; 生物信息学
translated_abstract: 克隆复合体180（CC180）目前是血清型3肺炎链球菌（Spn）的主要克隆株。尽管疫苗中包含多糖成分，但13价肺炎球菌结合疫苗（PCV13）对血清型3没有显著的效力。有人假设PCV13可能有效控制CC180中的Clade I，而Clades III和IV具有抗药性，这可能导致种群结构的变化，从而促进血清型3的持续存在。这种情况在美国、英国和威尔士被观察到，但在西班牙却没有。我们利用葡萄牙的数据集进一步测试了这一假设。方法：我们对1999年至2020年间从葡萄牙肺炎链球菌感染患者中分离出的501株血清型3菌株进行了全基因组测序（WGS）。这些草图基因组接受了系统发育分析、泛基因组分析以及全基因组关联研究（GWAS）。我们还完成了抗生素敏感性测试，并收集了超过2600个血清型3多 locus 序列类型180（MLST180）的WGS进行全球比较基因组学分析。结果：在比较非侵入性肺炎分离株与侵袭性疾病分离株（Fisher精确检验，P=0.29），以及成人与儿童病例（Fisher精确检验，P=0.074）时，发现CC180 Clades I、II、III、IV和VI的分布相似。PCV13接种后，血清型3 CC发生了变化（Fisher精确检验，P<0.0001），Clade I成为主导。Clade I主要对抗生素敏感，并携带phiOXC141前噬菌体，但其泛基因组异质性较高。葡萄牙和西班牙的菌株在PCV13接种后Clade I仍占主导地位，它们拥有更大的泛基因组，并与两个编码假想蛋白的基因的存在相关。解释：尽管受到前噬菌体负担和抗生素敏感性的限制，PCV13接种后Clade I在葡萄牙仍占主导地位。辅助基因组内容可能缓解了这些适应性成本。Clade I流行率和地区间泛基因组异质性的差异表明，克隆动态并非理解血清型3疫苗逃逸现象的一般方法。资金来源：美国国立儿童健康与人类发展研究所、辉瑞公司和默克公司。

translated_title: 移动遗传元件定义了伤寒沙门氏菌血清型的非随机泛基因组结构。
affiliations: Instituto de Biomedicina y Biotecnología de Cantabria, (CSIC, Universidad de Cantabria), Santander, Spain.; Division of Foodborne, Waterborne, and Environmental Diseases, Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, Atlanta, Georgia, USA.; Biomar Microbial Technologies, León, Spain.; Departamento de Ingeniería de las Comunicaciones, Universidad de Cantabria, Santander, Spain.; Oak Ridge Institute for Science and Education (ORISE), Oak Ridge, Tennessee, USA.; ASRT, Inc., Suwanee, Georgia, USA.
title: Mobile genetic elements define the non-random structure of the Salmonella enterica serovar Typhi pangenome.
authors: Peñil-Celis Arancha; Tagg Kaitlin A; Webb Hattie E; Redondo-Salvo Santiago; Francois Watkins Louise; Vielva Luis; Griffin Chelsey; Kim Justin Y; Folster Jason P; Garcillan-Barcia M Pilar; de la Cruz Fernando
keywords: antimicrobial resistance; pangenome; plasmids; Salmonella Typhi
abstract: Bacterial relatedness measured using select chromosomal loci forms the basis of public health genomic surveillance. While approximating vertical evolution through this approach has proven exceptionally valuable for understanding pathogen dynamics, it excludes a fundamental dimension of bacterial evolution-horizontal gene transfer. Incorporating the accessory genome is the logical remediation and has recently shown promise in expanding epidemiological resolution for enteric pathogens. Employing k-mer-based Jaccard index analysis, and a novel genome length distance metric, we computed pangenome (i.e., core and accessory) relatedness for the globally important pathogen Salmonella enterica serotype Typhi (Typhi), and graphically express both vertical (homology-by-descent) and horizontal (homology-by-admixture) evolutionary relationships in a reticulate network of over 2,200 U.S. Typhi genomes. This analysis revealed non-random structure in the Typhi pangenome that is driven predominantly by the gain and loss of mobile genetic elements, confirming and expanding upon known epidemiological patterns, revealing novel plasmid dynamics, and identifying avenues for further genomic epidemiological exploration. With an eye to public health application, this work adds important biological context to the rapidly improving ways of analyzing bacterial genetic data and demonstrates the value of the accessory genome to infer pathogen epidemiology and evolution.IMPORTANCEGiven bacterial evolution occurs in both vertical and horizontal dimensions, inclusion of both core and accessory genetic material (i.e., the pangenome) is a logical step toward a more thorough understanding of pathogen dynamics. With an eye to public, and indeed, global health relevance, we couple contemporary tools for genomic analysis with decades of research on mobile genetic elements to demonstrate the value of the pangenome, known and unknown, annotated, and hypothetical, for stratification of Salmonella enterica serovar Typhi (Typhi) populations. We confirm and expand upon what is known about Typhi epidemiology, plasmids, and antimicrobial resistance dynamics, and offer new avenues of exploration to further deduce Typhi ecology and evolution, and ultimately to reduce the incidence of human disease.
translated_keywords: 抗菌耐药性；泛基因组；质粒；伤寒沙门氏菌
translated_abstract:
基于选择性染色体位点测量的细菌亲缘关系构成了公共卫生基因组监测的基础。尽管通过这种方法近似垂直进化已被证明在理解病原体动态方面极具价值，但它排除了细菌进化的一个基本维度——水平基因转移。纳入辅助基因组是合乎逻辑的补救措施，并且最近在扩展肠杆菌科病原体的流行病学分辨率方面显示出前景。我们利用基于k-mer的Jaccard指数分析和一种新颖的基因组长度距离度量方法，计算了全球重要病原体伤寒沙门氏菌（Typhi）的泛基因组（即核心和辅助基因组）亲缘关系，并以图形方式展示了超过2,200株美国Typhi菌株中的垂直（同源性由遗传）和水平（同源性由混合）进化关系的网状网络。该分析揭示了Typhi泛基因组中存在的非随机结构，这种结构主要由可移动遗传元件的获得和丢失驱动，证实并扩展了已知的流行病学模式，揭示了新的质粒动力学，并确定了进一步进行基因流行病学探索的方向。着眼于公共卫生应用，这项工作为快速改进的细菌遗传数据分析方法增添了重要的生物学背景，并展示了辅助基因组在推断病原体流行病学和进化方面的价值。

**重要意义**  
鉴于细菌进化发生在垂直和水平两个维度上，包含核心和辅助遗传物质（即泛基因组）是更全面理解病原体动态的合乎逻辑的一步。着眼于公共卫生乃至全球健康的相关性，我们将当代基因组分析工具与数十年关于可移动遗传元件的研究相结合，证明了已知和未知、注释和假设的泛基因组在分层Salmonella enterica血清型Typhi（Typhi）群体中的价值。我们确认并扩展了对Typhi流行病学、质粒和抗菌素耐药性动态的认识，并提出了新的探索途径，以进一步推导Typhi的生态和进化，最终减少人类疾病的发病率。

translated_title: 人口腔中嗜血杆菌与聚集杆菌的空间生态学
affiliations: The Forsyth Institute, Cambridge, Massachusetts, USA.; Harvard School of Dental Medicine, Boston, Massachusetts, USA.; Marine Biological Laboratory, Woods Hole, Massachusetts, USA.
title: Spatial ecology of Haemophilus and Aggregatibacter in the human oral cavity.
authors: Giacomini Jonathan J; Torres-Morales Julian; Tang Jonathan; Dewhirst Floyd E; Borisy Gary G; Mark Welch Jessica L
keywords: tropism; pangenomics; metagenomics; Haemophilus; metapangenomics; Aggregatibacter; site-specialists
abstract: Haemophilus and Aggregatibacter are two of the most common bacterial genera in the human oral cavity, encompassing both commensals and pathogens of substantial ecological and medical significance. In this study, we conducted a metapangenomic analysis of oral Haemophilus and Aggregatibacter species to uncover genomic diversity, phylogenetic relationships, and habitat specialization within the human oral cavity. Using three metrics-pangenomic gene content, phylogenomics, and average nucleotide identity (ANI)-we first identified distinct species and sub-species groups among these genera. Mapping of metagenomic reads then revealed clear patterns of habitat specialization, such as Aggregatibacter species predominantly in dental plaque, a distinctive Haemophilus parainfluenzae sub-species group on the tongue dorsum, and H. sp. HMT-036 predominantly in keratinized gingiva and buccal mucosa. In addition, we found that supragingival plaque samples contained predominantly only one out of the three taxa, H. parainfluenzae, Aggregatibacter aphrophilus, and A. sp. HMT-458, suggesting independent niches or a competitive relationship. Functional analyses revealed the presence of key metabolic genes, such as oxaloacetate decarboxylase, correlated with habitat specialization, suggesting metabolic versatility as a driving force. Additionally, heme synthesis distinguishes H. sp. HMT-036 from closely related Haemophilus haemolyticus, suggesting that the availability of micronutrients, particularly iron, was important in the evolutionary ecology of these species. Overall, our study exemplifies the power of metapangenomics to identify factors that may affect ecological interactions within microbial communities, including genomic diversity, habitat specialization, and metabolic versatility. Understanding the microbial ecology of the mouth is essential for comprehending human physiology. This study employs metapangenomics to reveal that various Haemophilus and Aggregatibacter species exhibit distinct ecological preferences within the oral cavity of healthy individuals, thereby supporting the site-specialist hypothesis. Additionally, it was observed that the gene pool of different Haemophilus species correlates with their ecological niches. These findings shed light on the significance of key metabolic functions in shaping microbial distribution patterns and interspecies interactions in the oral ecosystem.

translated_abstract: 副流感嗜血杆菌、阿弗他聚集杆菌或A. sp. HMT-458，这表明它们可能占据独立的生态位或存在竞争关系。功能分析显示，关键代谢基因（如草酰乙酸脱羧酶）的存在与栖息地特化相关，表明代谢可塑性可能是驱动因素。此外，血红素合成能力将H. sp. HMT-036与密切相关的溶血嗜血杆菌区分开来，表明微量元素特别是铁的可用性对这些物种的进化生态学具有重要意义。总体而言，本研究表明元泛基因组学在识别影响微生物群落内生态相互作用的因素方面具有强大潜力，包括基因组多样性、栖息地特化和代谢可塑性。理解口腔微生物生态对于了解人体生理至关重要。本研究利用元泛基因组学揭示，多种嗜血杆菌和聚集杆菌物种在健康个体口腔中表现出不同的生态偏好，从而支持了“位点特化假说”。此外，观察到不同嗜血杆菌物种的基因库与其生态位相关联。这些发现强调了关键代谢功能在塑造口腔生态系统中微生物分布模式和种间相互作用中的重要性。

translated_title: 一年内孟加拉国不同地理区域的霍乱弧菌谱系和泛基因组多样性变化。
affiliations: Department of Microbiology & Immunology, McGill University, Montréal, Canada.; McGill Genome Centre, McGill University, Montréal, Canada.; Departments of Pediatrics and Environmental and Global Health, Emerging Pathogens Institute, University of Florida, Gainesville, FL, USA.; Infectious Diseases Division (IDD), International Centre for Diarrhoeal Disease Research, Bangladesh (icddr,b), Dhaka, Bangladesh.; Alabama State University, Montgomery, AL, USA.; McGill Centre for Microbiome Research, McGill University, Montréal, Canada.
title: Vibrio cholerae lineage and pangenome diversity varies geographically across Bangladesh over one year.
authors: Qin Chuhan; Lypaczewski Patrick; Sayeed Abu; Cuénod Aline C; Brinkley Lindsey; Creasy-Marrazzo Ashton; Cato Emilee T; Islam Kamrul; Khabir Imam Ul; Bhuiyan Taufiqur R; Begum Yasmin; Qadri Firdausi; Khan Ashraful I; Nelson Eric J; Shapiro B Jesse
keywords: (Auto-generated) Vibrio cholerae; 地理分布; 菌株多样性; 抗生素抗性; 噬菌体敏感性; 整合与接合元件; 痢疾暴发; 生态选择压力; Vibrio噬菌体; 生物地理学; 分子进化; 生物信息学
abstract: Cholera is a diarrhoeal disease caused by Vibrio cholerae. It remains a major public health challenge in the endemic region around the Bay of Bengal. Over decadal time scales, one lineage typically dominates the others and spreads in global pandemic waves. However, it remains unclear to what extent diverse lineages co-circulate during a single outbreak season. Defining the pool of diversity during finer time scales is important because the selective pressures that impact V. cholerae - namely antibiotics and phages - are dynamic on these time scales. To study the nationwide diversity of V. cholerae, we long-read sequenced 273 V. cholerae genomes from seven hospitals over one year (2018) in Bangladesh. Four major V. cholerae lineages were identified: known lineages BD-1, BD-2a, and BD-2b, and a novel lineage that we call BD-3. In 2022, BD-1 caused a large cholera outbreak in Dhaka, apparently outcompeting BD-2 lineages. We show that, in 2018, BD-1 was already dominant in the five northern regions, including Dhaka, consistent with an origin from India in the north. By contrast, we observed a higher diversity of lineages in the two southern regions near the coast. The four lineages differed in pangenome content, including integrative and conjugative elements (ICEs) and genes involved in resistance to bacteriophages and antibiotics. Notably, BD-2a lacked an ICE and is predicted to be more sensitive to phages and antibiotics, but nevertheless persisted throughout the year-long sampling period. Genes associated with antibiotic resistance in V. cholerae from Bangladesh in 2006 were entirely absent from all lineages in 2018-19, suggesting shifting costs and benefits of encoding these genes. Together, our results highlight the dynamic nature of the V. cholerae pangenome and the geographic structure of its lineage diversity.

journal_full_name: bioRxiv: The Preprint Server for Biology
translated_abstract: 已知的BD-1、BD-2a和BD-2b谱系以及一个新的我们称为BD-3的谱系。2022年，BD-1在达卡引发了大规模霍乱疫情，似乎击败了BD-2谱系。我们显示，在2018年，BD-1已经在包括达卡在内的五个北部地区占据主导地位，这与它起源于北部印度相一致。相比之下，我们在靠近海岸的两个南部地区观察到更高的谱系多样性。这四个谱系在泛基因组内容上存在差异，包括整合和结合元件（ICEs）以及参与抗噬菌体和抗生素耐药性的基因。值得注意的是，BD-2a缺乏ICE，预计对噬菌体和抗生素更为敏感，但仍然在整个一年的采样期间持续存在。2006年孟加拉国霍乱弧菌中与抗生素耐药性相关的基因在2018-19年的所有谱系中完全缺失，表明编码这些基因的成本和收益发生了变化。总之，我们的结果突显了霍乱弧菌泛基因组的动态性质及其谱系多样性的地理结构。

translated_title: 植物抵御病原体的必要物质——NBS-LRR 和“氮池”生物碱。

title: Indispensable biomolecules for plant defense against pathogens: NBS-LRR and "nitrogen pool" alkaloids.
authors: Liu Qian; Zhang Chunhong; Fang Huiyong; Yi Letai; Li Minhui
keywords: Alkaloids; Biotechnology; Disease resistance protein NBS-LRR; Defense mechanism
abstract: In a complex natural environment, plants have evolved intricate and subtle defense response regulatory mechanisms for survival. Plant specific defenses, including the disease resistance protein nucleotide-binding site leucine-rich repeat (NBS-LRR) protein and metabolite derived alkaloids, are key components of these complex mechanisms. The NBS-LRR protein can specifically recognize the invasion of pathogenic microorganisms to trigger the immune response mechanism. Alkaloids, synthesized from amino acids or their derivatives, can also inhibit pathogens. This study reviews NBS-LRR protein activation, recognition, and downstream signal transduction in plant protection, as well as the synthetic signaling pathways and regulatory defense mechanisms associated with alkaloids. In addition, we clarify the basic regulation mechanism and summarize their current applications and the development of future applications in biotechnology for these plant defense molecules. Studies on the NBS-LRR protein and alkaloid plant disease resistance molecules may provide a theoretical foundation for the cultivation of disease resistant crops and the development of botanical pesticides.
journal: Plant science : an international journal of experimental plant biology
translated_keywords: 生物碱；生物技术；疾病抗性蛋白NBS-LRR；防御机制
translated_abstract: 在复杂的自然环境中，植物为求生存进化出了复杂而精妙的防御反应调控机制。植物特异性的防御包括疾病抗性蛋白核苷酸结合位点富含亮氨酸重复序列（NBS-LRR）蛋白以及代谢物衍生的生物碱，是这些复杂机制中的关键组分。NBS-LRR蛋白能够特异性识别病原微生物入侵以触发免疫反应机制，而生物碱（由氨基酸或其衍生物合成）同样能够抑制病原体。本研究综述了植物保护中NBS-LRR蛋白的激活、识别及其下游信号转导，以及与生物碱相关的合成信号通路和防御调控机制。此外，我们阐明了这些植物防御分子的基本调控机制，并总结了它们在当前生物技术中的应用及未来发展的潜力。对NBS-LRR蛋白和生物碱植物抗病分子的研究可能为培育抗病作物和开发植物源农药提供理论基础。

translated_title: 伯氏疏螺旋体科家族级泛基因组的特征分析与表型分型方案的开发
affiliations: Center for Genomic Sciences, Institute for Molecular Medicine and Infectious Disease, Drexel University College of Medicine.; Department of Microbiology and Immunology, Virginia Commonwealth University Medical Center.
title: Characterization of the family-level Borreliaceae pan-genome and development of an episomal typing protocol.
authors: Socarras Kayla M; Marino Mary C; Earl Joshua P; Ehrlich Rachel L; Cramer Nicholas A; Mell Joshua C; Sen Bhaswati; Ahmed Azad; Marconi Richard T; Ehrlich Garth D
keywords: Borreliella; taxonomy; Borreliaceae; distributed genome hypothesis; Spirochete; phylogenetics; supragenome; comparative genomics; Borrelia; pan-genome
abstract: The Borreliaceae family includes many obligate parasitic bacterial species which are etiologically associated with a myriad of zoonotic borrelioses including Lyme disease and vector-borne relapsing fevers. Infections by the Borreliaceae are difficult to detect by both direct and indirect methods, often leading to delayed and missed diagnoses. Efforts to improve diagnoses center around the development of molecular diagnostics (MDx), but due to deep tissue sequestration of the causative spirochaetes and the lack of persistent bacteremias, even MDx assays suffer from a lack of sensitivity. Additionally, the highly extensive genomic heterogeneity among isolates, even within the same species, contributes to the lack of assay sensitivity as single target assays cannot provide universal coverage. This within-species heterogeneity is partly due to differences in replicon repertoires and genomic structures that have likely arisen to support the complex Borreliaceae lifecycle in which these parasites have to survive in multiple hosts each with unique immune responses. We constructed a Borreliaceae family-level pangenome and characterized the phylogenetic relationships among the constituent taxa which supports the recent taxonomy of splitting the family into at least two genera. Gene content pro les were created for the majority of the Borreliaceae replicons, providing for the first time their unambiguous molecular typing. Our characterization of the Borreliaceae pan-genome supports the splitting of the former Borrelia genus into two genera and provides for the phylogenetic placement of several non-species designated isolates. Mining this family-level pangenome will enable precision diagnostics corresponding to gene content-driven clinical outcomes while also providing targets for interventions.

translated_abstract: Borreliaceae家族包含许多专性寄生细菌种类，这些细菌与多种人畜共患的伯氏疏螺旋体病（如莱姆病和虫媒回归热）密切相关。Borreliaceae引起的感染通过直接和间接检测方法均难以发现，常常导致诊断延迟或漏诊。提高诊断水平的努力主要集中在分子诊断技术（MDx）的发展上，但由于致病疏螺旋体在深部组织中的隐匿以及缺乏持续的菌血症，即使是MDx检测也存在敏感性不足的问题。此外，不同分离株之间广泛的基因组异质性，即使在同一物种内也是如此，这进一步加剧了检测灵敏度的不足，因为单一靶标检测无法提供普遍覆盖。这种种内异质性部分是由于复制子组合和基因组结构的差异所引起，这些差异可能是为了支持Borreliaceae复杂的生命周期而演化出来的，在这个生命周期中，这些寄生虫必须在多个具有独特免疫反应的不同宿主中生存。我们构建了Borreliaceae家族级别的泛基因组，并分析了组成成员之间的系统发育关系，这支持了最近对将该家族划分为至少两个属的分类学建议。我们为大多数Borreliaceae复制子创建了基因含量特征，首次提供了其明确的分子分型。我们对Borreliaceae泛基因组的描述支持将原来的Borrelia属拆分为两个属，并为一些未被归类为物种的分离株提供了系统发育定位。挖掘这一家族级别的泛基因组将能够实现基于基因内容的临床结果精准诊断，同时为干预措施提供靶点。

translated_title: 一种快速且缓存高效的全基因组泛基因索引
affiliations: Department of Computer Science, Johns Hopkins University.; Faculty of Computer Science, Dalhousie University.
title: Movi: a fast and cache-efficient full-text pangenome index.
authors: Zakeri Mohsen; Brown Nathaniel K; Ahmed Omar Y; Gagie Travis; Langmead Ben
keywords: (Auto-generated) Movi; 全文索引; 基因组泛化; 缓存效率; 查询速度; 运行次数; 索引大小; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
abstract: Efficient pangenome indexes are promising tools for many applications, including rapid classification of nanopore sequencing reads. Recently, a compressed-index data structure called the "move structure" was proposed as an alternative to other BWT-based indexes like the FM index and r-index. The move structure uniquely achieves both O(r) space and O(1)-time queries, where r is the number of runs in the pangenome BWT. We implemented Movi, an efficient tool for building and querying move-structure pangenome indexes. While the size of the Movi's index is larger than the r-index, it scales at a smaller rate for pangenome references, as its size is exactly proportional to r, the number of runs in the BWT of the reference. Movi can compute sophisticated matching queries needed for classification - such as pseudo-matching lengths and backward search - at least ten times faster than the fastest available methods, and in some cases more than 30-fold faster. Movi achieves this speed by leveraging the move structure's strong locality of reference, incurring close to the minimum possible number of cache misses for queries against large pangenomes. We achieve still further speed improvements by using memory prefetching to attain a degree of latency hiding that would be difficult with other index structures like the r-index. Movi's fast constant-time query loop makes it well suited to real-time applications like adaptive sampling for nanopore sequencing, where decisions must be made in a small and predictable time interval.
journal: bioRxiv : the preprint server for biology
translated_keywords: Movi; 全文索引; 基因组泛化; 缓存效率; 查询速度; 运行次数; 索引大小; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
journal_full_name: bioRxiv: The Preprint Server for Biology
translated_abstract: 高效的泛基因组索引是许多应用的有前景工具，包括快速分类纳米孔测序读段。最近，一种名为“移动结构”的压缩索引数据结构被提出作为其他基于BWT的索引（如FM索引和r索引）的替代方案。移动结构独特地实现了O(r)空间复杂度和O(1)时间复杂度的查询，其中r是泛基因组BWT中的运行次数。我们开发了Movi，一个用于构建和查询移动结构泛基因组索引的高效工具。尽管Movi的索引大小大于r索引，但对于泛基因组参考序列，其增长速率更小，因为其大小正好与参考序列BWT中的运行次数r成正比。Movi能够以至少现有最快方法十倍的速度计算复杂的匹配查询（例如伪匹配长度和反向搜索），在某些情况下甚至超过30倍更快。Movi通过利用移动结构的强局部性引用特性，在针对大型泛基因组的查询中接近最小可能的缓存未命中数来实现这一速度。我们还通过使用内存预取技术进一步提高了速度，这种技术在其他索引结构（如r索引）中难以实现类似的延迟隐藏效果。Movi快速常量时间查询循环使其非常适合实时应用，例如纳米孔测序的自适应采样，其中必须在小而可预测的时间间隔内做出决策。

translated_title: 寄生植物——植物病原体的潜在传播媒介
affiliations: Department of Biochemistry, Faculty of Biology, Sofia University "St. Kliment Ohridski", 8 Dragan Tsankov blvd., 1164 Sofia, Bulgaria.
title: Parasitic Plants-Potential Vectors of Phytopathogens.
authors: Savov Stefan; Marinova Bianka; Teofanova Denitsa; Savov Martin; Odjakova Mariela; Zagorchev Lyuben
keywords: haustoria; plant virus; parasitic plants; phytoplasma
abstract: Parasitic plants represent a peculiar group of semi- or fully heterotrophic plants, possessing the ability to extract water, minerals, and organic compounds from other plants. All parasitic plants, either root or stem, hemi- or holoparasitic, establish a vascular connection with their host plants through a highly specialized organ called haustoria. Apart from being the organ responsible for nutrient extraction, the haustorial connection is also a highway for various macromolecules, including DNA, proteins, and, apparently, phytopathogens. At least some parasitic plants are considered significant agricultural pests, contributing to enormous yield losses worldwide. Their negative effect is mainly direct, by the exhaustion of host plant fitness and decreasing growth and seed/fruit formation. However, they may pose an additional threat to agriculture by promoting the trans-species dispersion of various pathogens. The current review aims to summarize the available information and to raise awareness of this less-explored problem. We further explore the suitability of certain phytopathogens to serve as specific and efficient methods of control of parasitic plants, as well as methods for control of the phytopathogens.
translated_keywords: 吸器；植物病毒；寄生植物；植原体
translated_abstract: 寄生植物是一类半寄生或全寄生的特殊植物，具有从其他植物中提取水分、矿物质和有机化合物的能力。所有寄生植物，无论是根寄生还是茎寄生、半寄生还是全寄生，都通过一种高度特化的器官——吸器，与宿主植物建立维管连接。除了是营养物质提取的器官外，吸器连接还充当了各种大分子（包括DNA、蛋白质以及显然还有植物病原体）的传输通道。至少一些寄生植物被视为重要的农业害虫，导致全球范围内巨大的产量损失。它们对农作物的主要负面影响是直接的，通过削弱宿主植物的适应能力、抑制其生长以及减少种子或果实的形成。此外，它们可能通过促进跨物种病原体传播而对农业构成额外威胁。本文旨在总结现有信息并提高对这一较少被研究问题的认识。我们进一步探讨某些植物病原体作为控制寄生植物以及控制植物病原体的具体且有效方法的适用性。
